description: Apple’s iPad Air (M1, 2022) brings incredible power to a lightweight form factor. Featuring the M1 chip, this tablet handles multitasking, graphics-intensive apps, and creative workflows easily. The 10.9-inch Liquid Retina display, Apple Pencil 2 compatibility, and all-day battery life make it perfect for students, professionals, and digital artists alike.

name: Canon EOS R6 Mark II
description: The Canon EOS R6 Mark II is a high-performance full-frame mirrorless camera featuring a 24.2MP sensor, up to 40fps burst shooting, and advanced autofocus with subject tracking. Its 4K60p video, 5-axis in-body stabilization, and weather-sealed construction make it a versatile choice for photographers and videographers who demand reliability in any setting.

name: Philips Hue White & Color Ambiance Starter Kit
description: Philips Hue Starter Kit offers three color-capable LED bulbs and a bridge so users can control lighting scenarios with apps or voice assistants. With millions of available colors, tunable whites, and routines for schedules and security, it creates custom moods anywhere in your home, integrating seamlessly with other smart devices.

name: Garmin Fenix 7 Sapphire Solar
description: The Garmin Fenix 7 Sapphire Solar is a rugged multisport smartwatch with solar charging, advanced GPS, and heart rate monitoring. It offers weeks of battery life, mapping, and training tools for athletes, hikers, and outdoor adventurers. With durable sapphire glass and waterproof design, it excels in all environments, supporting an active lifestyle.

name: Blue Yeti X USB Microphone
description: Blue Yeti X USB Microphone delivers professional-grade recording with four-capsule technology, high-resolution LED metering, and customizable sound. Ideal for podcasters, streamers, and musicians, it makes vocal captures crystal clear and is easy to use with plug-and-play USB connectivity.

name: Anker PowerCore 26800mAh Portable Charger
description: Anker PowerCore 26800mAh offers ultra-high capacity backup power with three USB ports, allowing simultaneous charging for multiple devices. Its advanced safety system and fast charging technology make it reliable for travelers, commuters, and outdoor adventurers who need power on the go.

name: LG Gram 17 (2023)
description: The LG Gram 17 (2023) redefines portability in large-screen laptops with its 17-inch WQXGA IPS display and ultra-light chassis weighing under three pounds. Powered by Intel’s latest processors and featuring Thunderbolt 4, a long-lasting battery, and a slim bezel design, it’s perfect for users needing lots of screen real estate on the go.

name: Apple Watch Series 9
description: Apple Watch Series 9 introduces new health sensors, a brighter Always-On Retina display, and a faster S9 SiP chip. With blood oxygen, ECG, fitness and sleep tracking, it integrates deeply with the Apple ecosystem for communication, navigation, and wellness, cementing its place as a top choice for tech-savvy users and fitness enthusiasts.

name: BenQ PD3205U 32-inch 4K Monitor
description: BenQ PD3205U is a factory-calibrated 32-inch 4K IPS monitor designed for creative professionals. With 99% sRGB, HDR support, and multiple color modes, it ensures accuracy for design, photography, and video editing. Eye-care tech and an adjustable stand provide a comfortable, productive workspace.

name: Acer Predator Helios 16
description: Acer Predator Helios 16 is a gaming powerhouse with Intel Core i9 processors, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4080 GPU, and a 16-inch 240Hz Mini LED display. Customized cooling and RGB lighting enhance performance during intense gaming sessions, making it a go-to choice for competitive gamers.

name: Jabra Elite 7 Pro
description: Jabra Elite 7 Pro earbuds feature MultiSensor Voice technology for clear calls, adjustable Active Noise Cancellation, and up to 30 hours of battery with case. Their secure, comfortable fit and water resistance make them ideal for commuting, working out, and daily music enjoyment.

name: Samsung Odyssey G9 Neo 49-inch Curved Gaming Monitor
description: Samsung Odyssey G9 Neo is a 49-inch curved gaming monitor with Quantum Mini LED, 240Hz refresh rate, and stunning DQHD resolution. Its expansive, immersive display and ultra-fast response time give gamers a competitive edge, while customizable RGB lighting and ergonomic features enhance long gaming sessions.

name: Instant Pot Pro Plus 6-Quart Smart Multi-Cooker
description: The Instant Pot Pro Plus Smart Multi-Cooker offers 10-in-1 versatility with Wi-Fi connectivity for app-based control. Pressure cook, slow cook, rice cook, steam, sauté, and more in one compact device. Its large digital display and customizable presets make healthy, homemade meals fast and easy.

name: Dell XPS 13 Plus (2023)
description: Dell XPS 13 Plus 2023 brings a modern, minimalist aesthetic with a borderless 13.4-inch InfinityEdge display and capacitive touch function row. Packing Intel’s 13th-gen processors, a haptic touchpad, and a lightweight build, it’s built for performance and ultralight mobility. Long battery life and a sharp OLED option make it ideal for everyday computing.

name: Sony PlayStation 5 (Disc Edition)
description: Sony PlayStation 5 offers next-generation gaming with ultra-fast SSD storage, ray tracing visuals, and a revamped DualSense controller with adaptive triggers. The Disc Edition supports physical and digital games, 4K UHD Blu-ray playback, and access to a vast game library. Its bold, futuristic design houses tremendous power for immersive gaming experiences.

name: Eero Pro 6E Mesh Wi-Fi System (3-pack)
description: Eero Pro 6E Mesh Wi-Fi System delivers blazing-fast, reliable whole-home coverage using Wi-Fi 6E technology. The 3-pack supports hundreds of active connections, works with Alexa, and ensures seamless video streaming and gaming, even in large multistory homes. Easy setup and robust security features help protect your network and data.

name: OnePlus 11 5G
description: OnePlus 11 5G balances flagship power with value, featuring a Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 chip, 120Hz AMOLED display, Hasselblad-tuned triple camera, and ultra-fast charging. OxygenOS ensures a clean Android experience, while the sleek, durable design highlights its premium feel at a competitive price.

name: Sonos Arc Soundbar
description: The Sonos Arc is a premium Dolby Atmos soundbar that produces immersive, room-filling audio for movies, music, and TV. Adaptive sound, voice control integration, and wireless expansion support make it the centerpiece for smart home entertainment. Its elegant design blends into any home theater setup.

name: Bryte Balance Smart Bed
description: The Bryte Balance Smart Bed uses AI to sense and adjust firmness, temperature, and support for the best sleep quality. With biometric tracking, automatic firmness zones, and an intuitive companion app, it provides detailed sleep insights and proactive comfort adjustments nightly.

name: Tile Pro (2023) Bluetooth Tracker
description: The Tile Pro 2023 is a powerful Bluetooth tracker for finding lost keys, bags, or devices. With a 400ft range, replaceable battery, and loud ring, it offers reliable peace of mind. The companion app supports network finding, smart alerts, and easy sharing to help you keep tabs on your valuables.

name: Canon Pixma G7020 MegaTank All-in-One Printer
description: Canon Pixma G7020 is a high-yield all-in-one inkjet printer with refillable MegaTank ink reservoirs, wireless connectivity, automatic duplex, and ADF for home offices. It delivers ultra-low running costs, crisp prints, scanning, copying, and faxing in a compact package suited for heavy-duty users.

name: Withings Body Comp Smart Scale
description: Withings Body Comp Smart Scale provides full body composition analysis, including body fat, water percentage, muscle mass, visceral fat, and cardiovascular insights. The sleek Wi-Fi scale syncs data to your phone for progress tracking, supports multiple users, and delivers premium health insights for families and individuals alike.

name: Corsair K95 RGB Platinum XT Mechanical Gaming Keyboard
description: The Corsair K95 RGB Platinum XT combines Cherry MX switches with per-key RGB lighting, dedicated macro keys, and premium build quality for serious gamers and streamers. Its plush wrist rest, onboard profiles, and Elgato Stream Deck integration make it an all-in-one input solution for gaming and content creation.

name: Huawei MateView GT 34-inch Ultra-Wide Monitor
description: Huawei MateView GT is a 34-inch ultra-wide curved monitor with a 165Hz refresh rate and 21:9 aspect ratio. It’s perfect for immersive gaming and productivity multitasking. The built-in soundbar, customizable RGB lighting, and HDR support provide both striking visuals and enhanced audio in a sleek frame.

name: KitchenAid Artisan Series 5 Quart Tilt-Head Stand Mixer
description: KitchenAid Artisan Stand Mixer comes with a robust 325-watt motor, versatile speed controls, and a tilting head for effortless bowl access. Known for its durability and broad range of compatible attachments, it’s an essential appliance for home bakers craving consistent, professional-quality results from mixing and kneading to whipping and blending.

name: Bissell CrossWave HydroSteam Wet Dry Vac
description: Bissell CrossWave HydroSteam is an all-in-one wet dry cleaner that vacuums, washes, and steams hard floors and area rugs simultaneously. Its powerful suction, touch controls, and easy-clean brush roll make it efficient for busy homes needing multi-surface convenience and comprehensive cleaning power.

name: Roku Streaming Stick 4K
description: Roku Streaming Stick 4K offers fast, reliable streaming in stunning 4K, Dolby Vision, and HDR10+ quality. Its compact design plugs directly into your TV’s HDMI port, includes a voice remote, and supports all major streaming services, delivering a seamless, affordable smart TV upgrade.

name: Samsung Bespoke 4-Door Flex Refrigerator
description: The Samsung Bespoke 4-Door Flex Refrigerator features customizable door panels, a versatile FlexZone drawer, and dual ice makers. With Wi-Fi controls, precise temperature management, and a modern aesthetic, it blends seamlessly into contemporary kitchens, catering to families seeking smart, adaptable refrigeration solutions.

name: NETGEAR Nighthawk M6 5G Mobile Hotspot
description: NETGEAR Nighthawk M6 is a 5G mobile hotspot offering ultra-fast internet on the go. It supports up to 32 devices, features long battery life, an intuitive touchscreen, and advanced security controls, making it ideal for remote work, travel, or backup connectivity during home outages.

name: DeLonghi Magnifica Evo Espresso Machine
description: The DeLonghi Magnifica Evo delivers barista-quality espresso at home with one-touch controls, a built-in grinder, programmable milk frothing, and easy self-cleaning. Its compact design fits most kitchens and provides consistently rich and aromatic coffee with every brew.

name: iRobot Roomba Combo j7+
description: iRobot Roomba Combo j7+ is a premium robot vacuum and mop that uses smart obstacle avoidance, automatic dirt disposal, and advanced mapping for total floor cleaning. The combo brush roll easily handles pet hair and debris, while app scheduling and voice integration add welcome convenience.

name: HP Envy Inspire 7955e All-in-One Printer
description: The HP Envy Inspire 7955e combines wireless printing, scanning, and copying in a sleek AIO package. It supports borderless prints, automatic duplex, photo printing, and is compatible with HP+ for cloud-based document management, making it ideal for family and home office use.

name: Govee Glide Wall Light
description: Govee Glide Wall Light offers customizable RGBIC lighting segments, music sync, and app/voice control via Alexa and Google Assistant. These modular wall lights add vibrant color and personality to living rooms, gaming setups, or bedrooms, letting users create a unique ambiance and dynamic scenes.

name: Kobo Libra 2 eReader
description: The Kobo Libra 2 eReader has a sharp 7-inch E Ink Carta 1200 touchscreen, adjustable ComfortLight PRO, and waterproofing for reading anywhere. With 32GB storage, Bluetooth for audiobooks, and support for numerous file formats, it’s a flexible device for book lovers on the go.

name: TP-Link Archer AX11000 Tri-Band Wi-Fi 6 Router
description: TP-Link Archer AX11000 is a tri-band Wi-Fi 6 router designed for large homes and high-demand users. It delivers lightning-fast speeds for gaming, streaming, and heavy multitasking, with built-in security, parental controls, and robust wired connectivity for a complete network solution.

name: Braun Series 9 Pro Electric Shaver
description: The Braun Series 9 Pro is a flagship electric shaver with 5 synchronized shaving elements, sonic technology, and a 60-minute cordless runtime. It adapts to dense beards and sensitive skin, delivers a close and gentle shave, and includes a SmartCare cleaning station for easy maintenance.

name: Oura Ring Gen3
description: The Oura Ring Gen3 is a discrete, stylish wearable that provides advanced sleep, activity, and wellness tracking. Its sensors monitor heart rate, temperature, and blood oxygen, delivering daily readiness and health insights in the app. Lightweight and water-resistant, it’s perfect for 24/7 use without distraction.

name: Honeywell Lyric T6 Pro Wi-Fi Thermostat
description: Honeywell Lyric T6 Pro offers flexible 7-day scheduling, geofencing, and Wi-Fi controls via app or smart assistants. It’s designed for easy installation and compatibility, allowing users to optimize heating and cooling for maximum comfort and energy savings in homes or offices.

name: LEGO Mindstorms Robot Inventor Kit
description: LEGO Mindstorms Robot Inventor Kit merges creative play with coding education. It includes 949 pieces and an intelligent hub for building a variety of remote-controlled robots. With step-by-step guides, app-based programming, and Bluetooth connectivity, it introduces kids and teens to STEM learning through engaging, hands-on projects.

name: Sony Alpha ZV-E10 Mirrorless Camera
description: Sony Alpha ZV-E10 is a vlogging-focused camera with a 24.2MP APS-C sensor, interchangeable lenses, real-time Eye autofocus, and advanced audio capabilities. Compact and lightweight, it’s perfect for content creators and streamers seeking professional image quality with intuitive controls and connectivity.

name: Roborock S8 Pro Ultra
description: Roborock S8 Pro Ultra integrates advanced obstacle avoidance, dual-brush cleaning, automatic mop washing, and smart navigation for complete home cleaning. It features a multi-function dock that empties, refills, and maintains the robot for nearly hands-off operation, setting a new benchmark for automated floor care.

name: Bang & Olufsen Beosound A1 (2nd Gen) Bluetooth Speaker
description: Bang & Olufsen Beosound A1 (2nd Gen) is a premium portable Bluetooth speaker with IP67 water resistance, 18-hour battery, and Alexa voice control. Its petite, elegant design, rich sound, and strong bass make it ideal for travel, outdoor gatherings, and stylish homes.

name: Amazfit GTR 4
description: Amazfit GTR 4 is a versatile smartwatch with dual-band GPS, a bright AMOLED screen, more than 150 sports modes, and health tracking for heart rate, SpO2, and sleep. With voice assistant support, Bluetooth calls, and up to two weeks of battery life, it’s a feature-rich, budget-friendly wearable for fitness and lifestyle.

name: Panasonic Lumix GH6
description: Panasonic Lumix GH6 is a Micro Four Thirds camera geared for video production, boasting a 25.2MP sensor, unlimited 4K/120p recording, and advanced stabilization. It supports ProRes internal recording and offers expanded dynamic range, making it a top choice for filmmakers and multimedia creators.

name: All-Clad Prep & Cook Food Processor
description: All-Clad Prep & Cook is an all-in-one food processor that chops, steams, blends, kneads, and cooks with precision temperature controls. Its 6 automatic programs and powerful motor streamline meal prep, making it a centerpiece for modern kitchens focused on convenience and healthy, homemade dishes.

name: Roku Ultra (2022)
description: Roku Ultra (2022) is the most powerful streaming player in Roku’s lineup, supporting Dolby Vision, Dolby Atmos, and ultra-fast wired or wireless connectivity. Its lost remote finder and private listening features enhance usability, while a massive channel library brings virtually endless entertainment options to any TV.

name: JBL Flip 6 Portable Bluetooth Speaker
description: JBL Flip 6 offers punchy bass, IP67 waterproof and dustproof protection, and 12 hours of playtime in a compact, travel-ready form. Its rugged design, Bluetooth multipoint connection, and PartyBoost capability make it the perfect companion for outdoor adventures or poolside relaxation.

name: Belkin BoostCharge Pro 3-in-1 Wireless Charging Stand
description: Belkin BoostCharge Pro 3-in-1 Stand can simultaneously fast-charge iPhone, Apple Watch, and AirPods. Its magnetic MagSafe support ensures effortless alignment, while the elegant stand conserves desk space and blends into both home and office settings.

name: Samsung Galaxy Watch5 Pro
description: The Samsung Galaxy Watch5 Pro is built for adventure with advanced GPS, turn-by-turn navigation, a titanium case, and Sapphire Crystal display. Its robust set of health features—like body composition, sleep tracking, and heart rate sensors—combined with a multi-day battery, makes it the definitive smartwatch for outdoor enthusiasts and fitness-minded users.

name: Sony WH-1000XM5 Wireless Noise-Canceling Headphones
description: The Sony WH-1000XM5 headphones set a new standard in wireless noise-canceling audio. With their industry-leading noise cancellation technology, these headphones effectively block out ambient sounds, making them perfect for travel or commuting. The lightweight design and plush ear cushions ensure long-term comfort, while the adaptive sound control automatically adjusts to your environment. Enjoy crystal clear calls, touch controls, and up to 30 hours of battery life on a single charge. With Hi-Res Audio support and customizable EQ, these headphones deliver rich, detailed sound whether you’re at home or on the go.

name: Samsung QN90C Neo QLED 4K Smart TV (65-Inch)
description: Experience next-level home entertainment with the Samsung QN90C Neo QLED 4K Smart TV. Utilizing Quantum Matrix technology and Mini LED backlighting, this 65-inch screen delivers breathtaking detail, intense contrast, and vibrant colors. The ultra-slim profile seamlessly blends into any living space. With built-in Smart TV features, voice assistants, and advanced gaming capabilities including low input lag and HDMI 2.1 ports, this TV is designed for cinematic and responsive viewing whether watching, streaming, or gaming.

name: Apple Watch Series 9 (GPS, 41mm)
description: The Apple Watch Series 9 is the most advanced smartwatch in Apple’s lineup, offering innovative features for health, fitness, and connectivity. The always-on Retina display is brighter and more efficient, while the updated sensors enable advanced health tracking including blood oxygen monitoring and ECG. Integrated GPS, fitness tracking, and water resistance make this watch an essential daily companion. Stay connected to notifications, apps, and calls directly from your wrist and leverage the power of watchOS 10.

name: GoPro HERO12 Black Action Camera
description: The GoPro HERO12 Black is the ultimate rugged action camera for adventurers and content creators alike. Capture ultra-smooth 5.3K video and 27MP photos with innovative HyperSmooth stabilization. Waterproof to 33ft, it withstands the elements and offers versatile mounting options. With improved battery life, wireless file transfer, and a touch screen interface, the HERO12 is perfect for recording every thrilling moment, whether you’re on the slopes, underwater, or the trail.

name: Bose SoundLink Revolve+ II Portable Bluetooth Speaker
description: The Bose SoundLink Revolve+ II delivers deep, immersive sound in a compact, portable design. Its 360-degree audio ensures consistent coverage, and the water-resistant build makes it perfect for outdoor gatherings. With up to 17 hours of battery life, built-in speakerphone, and voice assistant integration, this Bluetooth speaker lets you enjoy your music wherever you go. The convenient carrying handle and seamless connectivity make it ideal for both home and adventure use.

name: Google Nest Thermostat (2023)
description: The Google Nest Thermostat (2023) brings intelligent climate control to your home. Its sleek, minimalist design fits any décor, while advanced learning algorithms optimize heating and cooling schedules to save energy and money. Control the thermostat remotely through the Google Home app or with your voice assistant, and receive helpful alerts for system maintenance. With easy installation and compatibility with most HVAC systems, upgrading to smart home comfort has never been easier.

name: Canon EOS R8 Full-Frame Mirrorless Camera
description: The Canon EOS R8 is a full-frame mirrorless camera designed for creators seeking professional image quality and portability. Featuring a 24.2MP sensor, fast Dual Pixel autofocus, and 4K60p video recording, the EOS R8 delivers stunning results in both photography and videography. Its compact, lightweight body is complemented by a user-friendly touch screen and robust connectivity options, making it suitable for on-the-go shoots, travel, and content production.

name: Anker 737 Power Bank (PowerCore 24K)
description: The Anker 737 Power Bank provides massive 24,000mAh capacity in a compact, durable package—enough to recharge smartphones, tablets, and laptops multiple times. With dual USB-C and USB-A ports supporting fast charging protocols, it's the ultimate travel or emergency companion. The digital display shows precise charging status, making power management effortless wherever you are.

name: Dell UltraSharp U2723QE 27'' 4K USB-C Monitor
description: The Dell UltraSharp U2723QE monitor brings your visuals to life with stunning 4K resolution and vibrant color accuracy, thanks to the IPS Black technology. Perfect for creative professionals or multitaskers, it offers a comprehensive USB-C hub, adjustable ergonomic design, and flicker-free ComfortView Plus technology to reduce眼 strain during long sessions. Its slim bezels and flexible connectivity make any workspace feel modern and efficient.

name: Philips Hue White & Color Ambiance Starter Kit (4 bulbs)
description: Transform your home with the Philips Hue Starter Kit. This set includes four smart bulbs and a Hue Bridge for seamless control of your lighting from your smartphone or voice assistant. Choose from millions of colors and customize lighting scenes for every moment. Expandable and compatible with major platforms, Hue lights bring convenience, energy efficiency, and creativity to your home’s ambience.

name: Eufy RoboVac X8 Robot Vacuum
description: The Eufy RoboVac X8 uses twin turbines for powerful suction, making it highly effective at cleaning carpets and hard floors. Smart navigation and mapping allow for efficient, methodical cleaning, and the Wi-Fi connectivity lets you schedule or monitor cleaning from your phone. Pet hair, dust, and debris are no match for this intelligent home helper, which returns to its dock to recharge automatically.

name: Garmin Forerunner 965 GPS Smartwatch
description: Track your fitness goals in style with the Garmin Forerunner 965. Boasting a vivid AMOLED display, precise GPS, and advanced fitness analytics, this smartwatch supports runners, cyclists, and triathletes. Integrated music storage, payment solutions, and up to 23 days battery life in smartwatch mode make it a versatile companion for serious athletes and fitness enthusiasts alike.

name: Brother HL-L2350DW Compact Monochrome Laser Printer
description: The Brother HL-L2350DW is a reliable, high-speed monochrome printer ideal for home offices or small businesses. It offers wireless and mobile printing, fast print speeds up to 32 ppm, and automatic duplex (double-sided) printing. Its compact footprint saves space, while the large paper capacity minimizes interruptions for maximum productivity.

name: DJI Mini 3 Pro Drone with Remote Controller
description: The DJI Mini 3 Pro is a lightweight yet powerful camera drone designed for creative aerial photography. Weighing under 249g, it doesn’t require FAA registration for hobbyists, but packs a stunning 4K60 video camera with tri-directional obstacle sensors. With intelligent shooting modes, a 34-minute flight time, and a user-friendly remote, it’s perfect for beginners and advanced pilots alike.

name: LG C3 55'' OLED Evo 4K TV
description: The LG C3 4K OLED TV delivers exceptional picture quality with self-lit pixels and vibrant colors. With support for Dolby Vision and HDMI 2.1, it’s designed for cinematic viewing and advanced gaming. The ultra-thin design, AI-powered upscaling, and webOS smart features make this a centerpiece for any home theater setup.

name: Beats Studio Buds True Wireless Earbuds
description: Beats Studio Buds deliver powerful, balanced sound in a compact, true wireless form. With Active Noise Cancelling and Transparency modes, you can focus on music or tune into your surroundings. Enjoy up to 24 hours of total battery life with the case, IPX4 sweat and water resistance, and effortless pairing with both Apple and Android devices.

name: Acer Predator Helios 16 Gaming Laptop
description: The Acer Predator Helios 16 is built for high-end gaming with its 13th Gen Intel Core i9 processor, NVIDIA RTX 4080 GPU, and fast 240Hz QHD display. It features custom RGB keyboard, advanced cooling, and an array of ports for all your gaming peripherals. Perfect for gamers demanding top-tier performance and immersive visuals.

name: Sonos Arc Premium Soundbar
description: The Sonos Arc is a premium soundbar with Dolby Atmos that brings immersive, room-filling sound to your home theater. Eleven precisely engineered drivers produce clear dialogue and deep bass, while the sleek design fits seamlessly beneath TVs. With voice control, multiroom integration, and both HDMI eARC and optical connection, the Arc elevates every detail in your movies and music.

name: Apple iPad Pro 12.9-inch (6th Gen, M2)
description: The Apple iPad Pro 12.9-inch (6th Gen) with M2 chip is the ultimate tablet for professionals and creators. Its Liquid Retina XDR display offers unparalleled brightness and color accuracy. The M2 chip delivers powerful multitasking and creative performance, while support for the Apple Pencil (2nd Gen) and Magic Keyboard transforms how you work or create. Ultra-fast Wi-Fi 6E and Thunderbolt connectivity make this iPad an all-in-one workstation.

name: Fitbit Charge 6 Fitness Tracker
description: The Fitbit Charge 6 offers comprehensive health tracking, including heart rate, SpO2, sleep analysis, and GPS. Compatible with Google apps, features include stress tracking and ECG. Up to 7-day battery life, water resistance, and customizable exercise modes make it a versatile and affordable fitness companion for everyday health monitoring.

name: Samsung Galaxy Tab S9 Ultra
description: The Samsung Galaxy Tab S9 Ultra redefines tablet versatility with its 14.6-inch AMOLED display, S Pen support, and PC-like DeX mode. With Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 chipset and multi-window multitasking, it's built for productivity, drawing, or immersive entertainment. Long battery life, fast charging, and Ultra-Wide front camera make this Android tablet a professional and creative powerhouse.

name: Kasa Smart Plug HS103P4 (4-Pack)
description: The Kasa Smart Plug HS103P4 is a practical solution for managing your devices remotely. Easily control lamps, fans, and appliances with your smartphone or voice assistant. The compact design fits any outlet, supports schedules and timers, and is compatible with Alexa and Google Assistant. Automate your home and save energy with this convenient 4-pack solution.

name: HP ENVY Inspire 7955e All-in-One Printer
description: The HP ENVY Inspire 7955e is a family-friendly all-in-one printer that simplifies printing, scanning, and copying. With wireless connectivity, automatic two-sided printing, and a 2.7-inch color touchscreen, it’s ideal for both work-from-home and school assignments. The printer offers Instant Ink compatibility for affordable, hassle-free ink replenishment.

name: Arlo Pro 5S 2K Spotlight Security Camera
description: The Arlo Pro 5S 2K Spotlight Camera delivers day and night security with vibrant 2K HDR video and color night vision. Two-way audio, an integrated spotlight, and rechargeable battery make it easy to install and monitor any property, indoors or outdoors. Works with Alexa, Google Assistant, and Apple HomeKit for flexible smart home integration.

name: ASUS ROG Swift PG32UQX 32” 4K Gaming Monitor
description: The ASUS ROG Swift PG32UQX is a flagship 32-inch 4K gaming monitor featuring a Mini LED panel for dazzling HDR, 144Hz refresh, and G-SYNC Ultimate support. Designed for elite gamers and creators, it offers peak brightness levels with precise color reproduction and a robust array of connectivity options, ideal for competitive play or creative workflows.

name: Shark FlexStyle Air Styling & Drying System
description: The Shark FlexStyle is a versatile air styling and drying tool, offering multiple attachments for curling, straightening, and volumizing. The lightweight design and powerful airflow let you achieve salon-quality styles at home without extreme heat. With intelligent heat control, it protects hair while delivering flawless results every time.

name: Microsoft Surface Pro 9 (i7, 16GB, 512GB)
description: The Microsoft Surface Pro 9 combines the power of a laptop with the flexibility of a tablet. Featuring a 13-inch PixelSense touchscreen, Intel Core i7 processor, and all-day battery life, it adapts seamlessly to work or play. With fast Wi-Fi 6 connectivity, Thunderbolt 4, and support for the Surface Slim Pen 2, it’s perfect for on-the-go professionals and creatives alike.

name: Wyze Cam Pan v3
description: The Wyze Cam Pan v3 elevates home security with 360-degree pan and tilt coverage, crystal-clear 2K video, and instant mobile alerts. Weather-resistant and equipped with two-way audio, it is ideal for monitoring large indoor or outdoor spaces. Set motion tracking, patrol zones, and connect to Alexa or Google Assistant for seamless smart home integration.

name: LG Gram 17 (2023) Ultralight Laptop
description: The LG Gram 17 is a featherweight powerhouse with a massive 17-inch WQXGA display and Intel Evo performance. Slim, durable, and boasting up to 20 hours of battery life, it’s tailored for productivity and portability. Thunderbolt 4, fingerprint login, and a backlit keyboard ensure effortless use wherever your work takes you.

name: TP-Link Archer AX5400 Wi-Fi 6 Router
description: The TP-Link Archer AX5400 ensures blazing-fast Wi-Fi 6 speeds for streaming, gaming, and smart home connectivity. With six antennas, strong parental controls, and higher capacity for multiple devices, it covers large homes with reliable, low-latency internet. Easy setup and robust security features bring the next generation of wireless to your fingertips.

name: Epson EcoTank ET-3850 Wireless Color All-in-One Printer
description: The Epson EcoTank ET-3850 revolutionizes home and office printing with cartridge-free, high-capacity ink tanks and ultra-low running cost. Wireless, automatic two-sided printing and a vibrant color LCD make operation simple. Enjoy exceptional print quality, robust scanning and copying, and up to two years of ink in the box.

name: Marshall Emberton II Portable Bluetooth Speaker
description: The Marshall Emberton II combines iconic design with loud, clear Marshall sound. This rugged and water-resistant Bluetooth speaker offers over 30 hours of playtime, multi-directional sound, and simple control knob. Its compact size and reliable connectivity make it the perfect portable speaker for music lovers on the move.

name: Samsung Odyssey G9 49'' Curved Gaming Monitor
description: The Samsung Odyssey G9 49'' Curved Gaming Monitor is a game-changer for immersive PC gaming. With its super ultrawide 32:9 aspect ratio, rapid 240Hz refresh, and QLED color, this monitor delivers panoramic visuals that fill your view. NVIDIA G-SYNC and FreeSync Premium Pro support guarantee smooth, tear-free performance for the most demanding titles.

name: Ooni Karu 16 Multi-Fuel Outdoor Pizza Oven
description: The Ooni Karu 16 Multi-Fuel Pizza Oven brings authentic wood-fired pizza to your backyard. Compatible with wood, charcoal, or gas (attachment needed), it reaches 950°F in 15 minutes for perfectly crispy crusts. Its large 16-inch cooking surface and digital thermometer offer versatility, making it a must-have for foodies and outdoor cooks.

name: DJI Osmo Mobile 6 Smartphone Gimbal Stabilizer
description: The DJI Osmo Mobile 6 transforms smartphone videography with advanced stabilization, ActiveTrack 6.0, and an extendable built-in rod for versatile shooting. Lightweight, foldable, and easy to use, it enables smooth, cinematic videos for vlogs, travel, or live streaming. Quick launch, dynamic angles, and a long battery life make it a content creator’s dream accessory.

name: Ecobee Smart Thermostat Premium
description: The Ecobee Smart Thermostat Premium offers intelligent climate management and energy savings. With integrated voice control, built-in air quality monitoring, and compatibility with leading smart home platforms, you can customize comfort and save on utility bills. The high-res touch display, SmartSensor support, and sleek design make it a standout for modern homes.

name: LG OLED C2 55" 4K TV
description: The LG OLED C2 is a premium 55-inch 4K TV that offers an exceptional cinematic viewing experience. The self-lit OLED pixels provide perfect blacks, vibrant colors, and infinite contrast, making every scene come alive. With support for Dolby Vision IQ and Dolby Atmos, movies and TV shows sound as immersive as they look. Powered by the α9 Gen 5 AI Processor, this TV intelligently enhances everything you watch. Featuring HDMI 2.1 ports, low input lag, and G-SYNC compatibility, it's perfect for gamers and home theater enthusiasts alike.

name: Bose SoundLink Revolve+ II
description: The Bose SoundLink Revolve+ II delivers 360-degree sound with deep, rich bass and clear highs, ensuring your music fills any space evenly. Its robust, water-resistant design makes it suitable for outdoor adventures, while a soft handle provides portability. With a battery life of up to 17 hours, speakerphone capability, and voice assistant integration, this Bluetooth speaker is built for both fun and function. The rechargeable lithium-ion battery makes it easy to keep the party going wherever you are.

name: LG OLED65C2PUA 65" 4K OLED TV
description: The LG OLED65C2PUA is a 65-inch 4K Smart TV that dazzles with its self-lit OLED technology, producing perfect blacks and vibrant colors. Powered by the α9 Gen 5 AI Processor, this TV delivers onboard Dolby Vision IQ, Dolby Atmos sound, and immersive cinema-like experience. With webOS 22, streaming is seamless, and the ultra-thin design complements any modern living space. Gamers benefit from HDMI 2.1 ports, G-SYNC compatibility, and low input lag, making it a versatile choice for home entertainment.

name: Bose SoundLink Revolve+ (Series II) Bluetooth Speaker
description: The Bose SoundLink Revolve+ (Series II) is a portable Bluetooth speaker engineered to offer 360-degree sound coverage. Featuring a durable, water-resistant design and flexible handle, it’s perfect for both indoor and outdoor gatherings. The rechargeable battery delivers up to 17 hours of playtime and supports voice assistants, making it a convenient solution for high-quality music wherever you go. Pair two speakers for stereo or party mode for an expansive listening experience.

name: Sony WH-1000XM5 Wireless Noise Cancelling Headphones
description: The Sony WH-1000XM5 delivers industry-leading noise canceling performance with innovative features. These wireless headphones utilize two processors and eight microphones for unprecedented noise reduction, especially in busy environments like airports or cafés. Their lightweight design with plush earcups ensures comfort for long listening sessions. The headphones also support adaptive sound control, integrating with your smartphone's sensors to adjust settings automatically based on your activity. With up to 30 hours of battery life and fast pairing, they are perfect for travelers and audiophiles alike.

name: Apple MacBook Air M2 (2022)
description: Apple’s MacBook Air M2 brings next-generation performance in an impossibly thin and light design. It features the Apple M2 chip, yielding significant improvements in speed and efficiency over its predecessor. Its 13.6-inch Retina display is perfect for editing photos, watching movies, or professional work on the move. With Touch ID, an improved keyboard, and up to 18 hours of battery life, it’s an ideal choice for students or professionals who value portability and power.

name: Apple Watch Series 8 GPS + Cellular
description: Apple Watch Series 8 brings advanced health and fitness tracking to your wrist, including temperature sensing, ECG, and blood oxygen monitoring. With cellular connectivity, you can make calls, stream music, and receive notifications even when away from your phone. The vibrant always-on Retina display, crash detection, and new workout features make it a must-have for anyone wanting to stay healthy and connected on the go.

name: Fitbit Charge 5
description: The Fitbit Charge 5 is an advanced fitness and health tracker with built-in GPS, EDA stress monitoring, and daily readiness scores. Its color AMOLED touchscreen is bright and easy to read in any light. The device tracks heart rate, sleep, and over 20 exercise modes, offering valuable insights right on your wrist. With up to 7 days battery life and a slim, comfortable design, it’s ideal for active individuals.

name: Philips Sonicare DiamondClean 9700
description: The Philips Sonicare DiamondClean 9700 is a top-of-the-line electric toothbrush featuring advanced sonic technology for superior cleaning. It comes with multiple brushing modes, a premium travel case, and real-time feedback via the Sonicare app. AdaptiveClean brush heads reach deep for plaque removal, and the glass charger looks great on any counter. An excellent choice for those seeking optimal dental health.

name: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4090 Founders Edition
description: NVIDIA’s GeForce RTX 4090 sets a new standard in elite gaming and creative workflows. Built on the Ada Lovelace architecture, it boasts 24GB GDDR6X memory and advanced ray tracing cores. Perfect for 4K gaming and heavy computational tasks like 3D rendering or AI development, it delivers unmatched graphical fidelity. The triple-fan Founders Edition design keeps it cool even under extreme loads.

name: DJI Osmo Mobile 6 Gimbal
description: The DJI Osmo Mobile 6 is a smartphone gimbal for smooth, shake-free video shooting. With 3-axis stabilization, custom shooting modes, and built-in extension rod, it’s perfect for vloggers and content creators. The gimbal folds for easy transport, and the companion app unlocks creative shooting options, including gesture control and subject tracking.

name: iRobot Roomba j7+ Robot Vacuum
description: The iRobot Roomba j7+ is a robotic vacuum with PrecisionVision Navigation, avoiding obstacles like pet waste and cords. It empties itself for up to 60 days and learns your cleaning preferences via the iRobot Home app. With powerful suction and smart mapping, it’s ideal for busy households and pet owners.

name: Eufy Security Video Doorbell Dual
description: Eufy Security’s Video Doorbell Dual provides enhanced front door protection. It features two cameras—one for head-to-toe views and another for package detection. With 2K resolution, local storage, and AI-powered alerts, homeowners can monitor their entrances clearly and securely. It operates without monthly fees and offers customizable detection zones.

name: OnePlus 11 5G Smartphone
description: The OnePlus 11 5G combines blazing Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 performance with a stunning 120Hz AMOLED display. Its Hasselblad-tuned triple camera system delivers professional-quality photos, and 100W fast charging powers the 5000mAh battery in minutes. OxygenOS ensures a smooth, customizable user experience. Perfect for tech enthusiasts and demanding multitaskers.

name: Razer Basilisk V3 Pro Wireless Gaming Mouse
description: Razer’s Basilisk V3 Pro delivers wireless freedom with ultra-low latency, 11 programmable buttons, a customizable scroll wheel, and Razer Chroma RGB lighting. Its advanced Focus Pro 30K optical sensor and ergonomic design give gamers a competitive edge over extended play sessions.

name: Hisense 65U8H QLED 4K ULED Android TV
description: Hisense 65U8H QLED TV blends Quantum Dot color and ULED technology for vivid images and deep contrast. With a 120Hz native panel, Dolby Vision/Atmos, and HDMI 2.1, it excels at both watching movies and gaming. Integrated Google TV provides smooth navigation through apps and streaming services. A solid option for large living spaces.

name: Apple iPad Mini (6th Generation)
description: Apple’s 6th-gen iPad Mini packs big performance into a compact size. The all-screen 8.3-inch Liquid Retina display, A15 Bionic chip, and 5G support make it a power user’s portable companion. With Touch ID, Apple Pencil (2nd gen) support, and a 12MP ultra-wide front camera, it’s ideal for note-takers, students, and creatives on the go.

name: LG Gram 16 (2023)
description: The LG Gram 16 is an ultra-light laptop with impressive battery life and a vivid 16-inch WQXGA display. Powered by Intel’s 13th Gen Core processors, it balances portability with power, weighing under 3 lbs. Its premium magnesium alloy construction, Thunderbolt 4 ports, and long battery runtime make it ideal for productivity and travel.

name: Ecobee SmartThermostat with Voice Control
description: The Ecobee SmartThermostat offers modern climate control with Alexa built-in and remote temperature sensors. It learns your routine and saves energy by adapting to your schedule. Smart integrations support all major ecosystems, and its sleek glass finish enhances any home’s aesthetic. Easy to use by voice, app, or touchscreen.

name: Tile Pro (2022) Bluetooth Tracker
description: Tile Pro is a powerful Bluetooth tracker helping you find lost items like keys or bags. With a 400ft range, replaceable battery, loud ring, and integration with smart assistants, it's a practical tool for busy people. The companion app helps locate your belongings anywhere there’s a Tile network.

name: Sony Bravia XR A80K OLED 4K TV
description: Sony's Bravia XR A80K delivers incredible OLED picture quality with Cognitive Processor XR, ensuring natural colors and perfect blacks. With Google TV built-in, HDMI 2.1 support, and Acoustic Surface Audio+, it’s designed for cinephiles and gamers. The minimalist design suits modern living spaces.

name: Apple HomePod (2nd Generation)
description: The Apple HomePod 2 delivers room-filling, high-fidelity sound with spatial audio support. Seamlessly integrating with the Apple ecosystem, it features Siri voice control, HomeKit compatibility, and smart home automation. Its mesh fabric exterior looks stylish in any setting, while advanced sensors adjust sound to the room’s acoustics.

name: iLife A10s Robot Vacuum and Mop
description: iLife’s A10s is a hybrid robot vacuum and mop with Lidar-guided mapping for precise, efficient cleaning. Multiple cleaning modes, app and voice-control support, and a dedicated water tank for mopping offer total floor care in one device. It navigates around furniture, avoids cliffs, and schedules cleanings automatically.

name: Canon PIXMA TR8620a All-in-One Printer
description: The Canon PIXMA TR8620a delivers versatile performance for home and business. With fast print speeds, auto-duplex printing, and a 20-sheet ADF, it handles scanning, copying, and fax needs. Featuring seamless wireless connectivity, a 4.3-inch touchscreen, and compatibility with Alexa and Google Assistant, it's perfect for connected offices.

name: TP-Link Archer AX6000 Wi-Fi 6 Router
description: The TP-Link Archer AX6000 Wi-Fi 6 Router delivers blazing-fast Internet for homes with multiple devices. With 8 Gigabit LAN ports, advanced parental controls, and support for 1148 Mbps (2.4GHz) and 4804 Mbps (5GHz), it’s ideal for gamers, streamers, and smart homes. High-gain antennas and BSS Color reduce interference for stable connections.

name: HyperX Cloud Alpha Wireless Gaming Headset
description: The HyperX Cloud Alpha Wireless is known for its ultra-long 300-hour battery life on a single charge. Delivering immersive gaming audio, its dual chamber drivers and noise-canceling mic keep communication crisp and gameplay clear. Comfortable, robust design makes it a top choice for extended gaming sessions.

name: Instant Pot Pro Plus Smart 6-Quart Multi Cooker
description: The Instant Pot Pro Plus Smart Multi Cooker is a Wi-Fi connected kitchen essential supporting pressure cooking, slow cooking, rice making, and more. Control and customize recipes from your phone, and access safety features with the app. Its stainless steel pot, 20+ cooking modes, and versatile performance simplify home cooking.

name: Asus ROG Zephyrus G14 (2023)
description: The Asus ROG Zephyrus G14 is a powerhouse for gamers and creators, featuring AMD Ryzen 9 CPUs and Nvidia RTX 4060 graphics in a compact 14-inch chassis. The high-refresh QHD+ display and AniMe Matrix LED customization make it look as good as it performs. Its lightweight yet durable build suits those needing top-tier performance on the go.

name: Wyze Cam v3 Pro
description: Wyze Cam v3 Pro is an affordable home security cam with 2K resolution, color night vision, and AI-powered alerts. Designed for indoor or outdoor use, it’s weather-resistant and features two-way audio. Free cloud and local storage options make it easy to monitor your home securely from anywhere.

name: Ecovacs Deebot X1 Omni Robot Vacuum & Mop
description: The Ecovacs Deebot X1 Omni is a flagship 2-in-1 robot vacuum and mop with an all-in-one cleaning station for auto-washing and emptying. With AI navigation, 5000Pa suction power, and voice assistant integration, it deep-cleans every room with minimal effort. The elegant design makes it fit effortlessly into modern homes.

name: Samsung QN90C Neo QLED 4K Smart TV
description: The Samsung QN90C Neo QLED 4K Smart TV delivers breathtaking clarity and vibrant color with Quantum Mini LED technology. This smart TV supports HDR10+ for enhanced contrast and offers smooth motion with a 120Hz refresh rate, making it perfect for movies, sports, and gaming. Enjoy voice control and seamless access to streaming services with integrated Bixby and Alexa support. The ultra-thin design allows for elegant wall mounting, while Dolby Atmos audio provides an immersive sound experience. Ideal for modern living spaces.

name: Dell XPS 15 (9520) Laptop
description: The Dell XPS 15 (9520) offers powerful productivity and creative potential in a sleek, compact chassis. This laptop features a 15.6-inch 4K OLED display that renders vivid visuals with outstanding color accuracy. Powered by Intel’s 12th Gen Core processors and NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 Ti GPU, it handles demanding tasks such as video editing, programming, and gaming effortlessly. With up to 32GB RAM and 1TB SSD storage, the XPS 15 is built for speed and reliability. Its premium build quality and long-lasting battery make it an excellent choice for professionals on the move.

name: Bose Smart Soundbar 900
description: The Bose Smart Soundbar 900 delivers room-filling, realistic sound with Dolby Atmos and proprietary TrueSpace technology. With its minimalist yet elegant construction, this soundbar integrates voice assistants, Apple AirPlay 2, Bluetooth, and Wi-Fi streaming. Adaptive sound calibration tailors audio output to your space, rendering crisp dialogue and dynamic bass for any genre of music or movie. Installation is streamlined with HDMI eARC connectivity and intuitive controls through the Bose Music app or voice commands.

name: GoPro HERO12 Black
description: The GoPro HERO12 Black is built for adventurers and content creators who need a rugged, waterproof action camera that captures incredible 5.3K video and 27MP photos. Featuring enhanced stabilization with HyperSmooth 5.0, this camera ensures ultra-smooth footage in dynamic environments. The integrated touchscreen and voice controls make operation intuitive, even when mounted to gear. With extended battery life and compatibility with a wide range of mounts and accessories, the HERO12 Black is the ultimate companion for capturing any high-energy moment.

name: Amazon Kindle Paperwhite (11th Gen)
description: The Amazon Kindle Paperwhite (11th Gen) is a lightweight, waterproof e-reader with a 6.8-inch glare-free display and adjustable warm light for comfortable reading any time of day. With weeks-long battery life and ample storage for thousands of books, it’s the perfect travel companion for book lovers. Seamless integration with the Kindle store and extensive support for audiobooks and library borrowing enhance the reading experience. Its ergonomic design ensures you can enjoy your favorite titles for hours on end with minimal fatigue.

name: Nest Learning Thermostat (3rd Gen)
description: The Nest Learning Thermostat (3rd Gen) helps home owners save energy and control their heating and cooling systems with ease. Its sleek, circular design features a bright, high-res display and learns your habits to automatically adjust the temperature. Remote access via smartphone app, compatibility with most HVAC systems, and integration with smart home devices make temperature control seamless. Energy reports help you monitor usage, while voice assistant support brings effortless climate management to your fingertips.

name: ASUS ROG Zephyrus G14
description: The ASUS ROG Zephyrus G14 is a portable powerhouse, featuring AMD Ryzen 9 processors and the NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4060 GPU. Its 14-inch QHD display boasts a 165Hz refresh rate, providing buttery-smooth gaming visuals. The magnesium-alloy chassis is lightweight yet durable, and the AniMe Matrix LED display adds a customizable touch. With an impressive battery life for its category, robust cooling, and extensive connectivity options, it’s ideal for gamers who need serious performance on the go.

name: Sony PlayStation VR2
description: The Sony PlayStation VR2 elevates virtual reality gaming with its high-resolution OLED displays and advanced tracking capabilities. Its responsive haptic feedback and adaptive triggers immerse players deeper into the action, while 3D audio technology enhances situational awareness. Lightweight and comfortable, the VR2 is designed for long sessions, with easy setup for both new and seasoned gamers. It integrates flawlessly with the PlayStation 5, unlocking a new level of realism and interaction in gaming worlds.

name: LG UltraWide 34WP65C-B Monitor
description: The LG UltraWide 34WP65C-B Monitor delivers expansive workspace with its 34-inch curved QHD IPS display. Designed for professionals, content creators, and gamers, it supports 99% sRGB coverage for vivid, accurate colors and a fast 160Hz refresh rate. The monitor’s ergonomic stand offers height, tilt, and swivel adjustments, while features like split-screen, USB-C connectivity, and built-in speakers add convenience and versatility. Its immersive curve inspires productivity and entertainment alike.

name: TP-Link Archer AX11000 WiFi 6 Router
description: The TP-Link Archer AX11000 WiFi 6 Router is a tri-band router engineered for high-performance gaming and large homes. It delivers blistering wireless speeds up to 10.8 Gbps and is powered by a robust 1.8GHz quad-core CPU. With eight external antennas and advanced QoS, this router supports multiple devices with minimal latency. Enhanced security features, parental controls, and easy setup via the Tether app make it a versatile choice for modern connected households.

name: Anker Soundcore Liberty 4 NC Earbuds
description: The Anker Soundcore Liberty 4 NC Earbuds deliver exceptional noise cancellation and crisp, well-balanced audio performance for music lovers and commuters. Their ergonomic design ensures long-lasting comfort, while touch controls and multi-point connectivity offer convenience for switching between devices. Enjoy up to 10 hours of listening time on a single charge, with a compact charging case providing additional charges for all-day use. These earbuds are water resistant, making them perfect for workouts and outdoor activities.

name: Apple Mac Studio (M2 Max)
description: The Apple Mac Studio (M2 Max) redefines desktop performance for creative professionals and developers. It features Apple’s cutting-edge M2 Max chip, providing remarkable CPU and GPU speed for video editing, 3D rendering, and app development. With versatile port options, excellent thermal management, and support for multiple high-resolution monitors, the Mac Studio brings workstation-class power to compact desktops. Its whisper-quiet operation and sleek form factor fit perfectly into any workspace.

name: Shark AI Ultra 2-in-1 Robot Vacuum & Mop
description: The Shark AI Ultra 2-in-1 Robot Vacuum & Mop offers powerful, hands-free floor cleaning for busy households. Using advanced AI Laser Navigation, the device maps your rooms, avoids obstacles, and provides deep cleaning on carpets and hard floors. The mop function ensures thorough cleaning of spills and stains. With app and voice assistant controls, customizable schedules, and self-emptying capabilities, this robot vacuum & mop simplifies home maintenance, letting you enjoy cleaner floors with minimal effort.

name: Raspberry Pi 5 (8GB)
description: The Raspberry Pi 5 (8GB) is the latest iteration of the popular single-board computer platform, designed for enthusiasts, educators, and makers. It features a quad-core ARM Cortex-A76 processor, improved graphics performance, and ultra-fast USB 3.0 ports. With dual HDMI outputs supporting 4K, enhanced GPIO and connectivity, the Pi 5 is perfect for DIY projects, coding, and media centers. Its compact design fits into tight spaces, opening endless possibilities for digital experimentation and learning.

name: Sony Alpha ZV-E1 Vlogging Camera
description: The Sony Alpha ZV-E1 Vlogging Camera is crafted specifically for content creators and vloggers. With a high-resolution full-frame sensor, advanced autofocus, and professional-quality 4K video recording, it delivers stunning visuals for both photos and video blogs. Integrated directional microphone and real-time eye autofocus make recording effortless, while the compact, lightweight design ensures portability. Intuitive controls, flip-out LCD screen, and connectivity for external mics let you take your content production to the next level.

name: Google Nest Audio
description: The Google Nest Audio is a powerful, voice-activated smart speaker with rich, room-filling sound. Designed to blend seamlessly into any decor, it features enhanced bass, clear midrange, and crisp vocals for an immersive audio experience. With Google Assistant built-in, Nest Audio lets you control smart home devices, play music, set reminders, and get answers to questions hands-free. Privacy controls, multi-room support, and an eco-friendly design make this speaker a modern home essential.

name: Samsung Galaxy Watch 6 Classic
description: The Samsung Galaxy Watch 6 Classic combines timeless design with cutting-edge wearable technology. It features a rotating bezel for intuitive navigation, comprehensive health tracking (including ECG and blood pressure monitoring), and a vibrant AMOLED display. The watch is powered by the latest Wear OS, offering smooth performance and a wide range of third-party apps. With GPS, NFC, and LTE options, this smartwatch caters to fitness, productivity, and connectivity seamlessly.

name: Acer Predator X34 GS Curved Gaming Monitor
description: The Acer Predator X34 GS is a 34-inch curved ultrawide gaming monitor with a blistering 180Hz refresh rate and NVIDIA G-SYNC compatibility. Its IPS panel delivers vibrant colors and wide viewing angles, making it an excellent choice for immersive gameplay and cinematic experiences. Adjustable ergonomics, extensive connectivity options, and customizable RGB lighting further enhance user experience. Whether gaming or multitasking, this monitor elevates performance and entertainment.

name: Western Digital My Passport 5TB Portable HDD
description: The Western Digital My Passport 5TB Portable HDD provides ample secure storage in a compact, easy-to-carry form. Compatible with both Windows and macOS, its USB 3.0 interface ensures fast data transfer, while built-in backup software and password protection keep your files safe. With space for photos, videos, and documents, the My Passport is ideal for users who need to expand their digital storage on the go or back up precious memories conveniently.

name: Netgear Nighthawk M6 5G Mobile Hotspot
description: The Netgear Nighthawk M6 5G Mobile Hotspot provides fast, secure internet connectivity on the go, supporting the latest 5G and WiFi 6 standards. It allows multiple devices to connect simultaneously, delivering reliable high-speed internet for travel, remote work, or backup at home. Its long-lasting battery, intuitive touchscreen, and robust security features make it ideal for those who need dependable connectivity wherever they are. Versatile and portable, it keeps you online anytime, anywhere.

name: Canon PIXMA G6020 MegaTank All-in-One Printer
description: The Canon PIXMA G6020 MegaTank All-in-One Printer provides high-volume printing, scanning, and copying with ultra-low ink costs. Its integrated MegaTank ink reservoirs deliver thousands of pages without replacing cartridges, making it ideal for offices and home businesses. Wireless connectivity and support for mobile printing apps streamline productivity, while borderless photo printing lets you create stunning photos easily. Efficient, reliable, and versatile, the G6020 meets diverse printing demands.

name: Sennheiser Momentum 4 Wireless
description: Sennheiser Momentum 4 Wireless headphones deliver superior sound quality, featuring advanced adaptive noise cancellation and up to 60 hours of battery life. Crafted for audiophiles and commuters, their plush earcups and lightweight design ensure lasting comfort. Intuitive touch controls, customizable EQ via the Sennheiser Smart Control app, and exceptional call clarity make these headphones a standout choice for immersive listening and on-the-go productivity.

name: Samsung Portable SSD T7 Shield 2TB
description: The Samsung Portable SSD T7 Shield 2TB is a compact, ruggedized external drive built to withstand drops, water, and dust. Its advanced PCIe NVMe technology offers blazing-fast read and write speeds up to 1050MB/s. Secure your data with password protection and AES 256-bit hardware encryption. Compatible with PC, Mac, Android, and gaming consoles, the T7 Shield is ideal for transferring large files or expanding storage quickly across multiple devices on the go.

name: HyperX Cloud II Wireless Gaming Headset
description: The HyperX Cloud II Wireless Gaming Headset provides an immersive audio experience with its virtual 7.1 surround sound and signature memory foam ear cushions. Designed for gamers, it delivers up to 30 hours of wireless play on a single charge. The detachable noise-cancelling microphone ensures clear, crisp communication, while durable aluminum framing ensures long-lasting build quality. Compatible with PC, PS5, and Nintendo Switch, it’s an outstanding accessory for any gaming setup.

name: LG CineBeam HU70LA 4K UHD Projector
description: The LG CineBeam HU70LA 4K UHD Projector offers a stunning 140-inch display with vivid colors and HDR10 support. Its LED light source provides up to 30,000 hours of viewing, and the webOS smart platform streams your favorite content effortlessly. With wireless screen sharing, four HDMI inputs, and auto keystone adjustment, this projector is perfect for home theaters, presentations, or movie nights. Compact and portable, it transforms any space into a cinematic experience.

name: Sony UBP-X700M 4K Ultra HD Blu-ray Player
description: The Sony UBP-X700M 4K Ultra HD Blu-ray Player lets you enjoy home entertainment in astonishing clarity. It supports HDR10 and Dolby Vision for deep, vibrant color, alongside high-resolution audio output. The player handles a wide range of disc formats and offers streaming access to popular apps via built-in Wi-Fi. Its compact design, intuitive interface, and fast boot-up make it an excellent addition to any home theater setup, delivering premium video and audio experiences.

name: Ring Spotlight Cam Wired
description: The Ring Spotlight Cam Wired is a robust home security camera with built-in motion-activated LED spotlights and a 1080p HD camera. With two-way talk, customizable motion zones, and remote monitoring via the Ring app, it provides peace of mind at any time of day. Its weather-resistant construction and integrated siren add extra layers of protection, while enhanced night vision ensures you’ll never miss a thing, even in total darkness. Installation is straightforward, perfect for homeowners seeking added security.

name: Anova Precision Cooker Nano 3.0
description: The Anova Precision Cooker Nano 3.0 offers precise temperature control for restaurant-quality sous vide cooking at home. Compact and easy to use, it connects to your smartphone for remote monitoring and scheduling. Designed for both beginners and gourmet chefs, this device maintains water at the perfect temperature for perfectly cooked meats, vegetables, and more. The detachable clamp fits on most pots, and the splash-resistant design ensures reliable performance even in busy kitchens.

name: Apple MacBook Pro 14-inch M2
description: The Apple MacBook Pro 14-inch with the M2 chip delivers blazing-fast performance for both professional and personal workloads. Featuring a Liquid Retina XDR display, advanced thermal management, and a robust battery that lasts all day, this laptop is built to handle high-end tasks like video editing, programming, and graphic design.

name: Amazon Echo Dot (5th Gen)
description: The Amazon Echo Dot (5th Gen) brings rich sound and Alexa’s intelligence to your living space. Use it to control smart home devices, play music, set reminders, or check the weather using just your voice. Its compact size and stylish fabric finish make it a great fit for any room.

name: Fitbit Sense 2
description: Track your health holistically with the Fitbit Sense 2 smartwatch. Featuring stress management, ECG capability, sleep tracking, and multi-day battery life, this wearable is designed to offer a comprehensive view of your wellbeing and guide you toward healthier habits.

name: Canon EOS R8 Mirrorless Camera
description: The Canon EOS R8 merges portability with performance, making it an excellent choice for budding photographers looking for crisp images and rapid autofocus. With a full-frame sensor and advanced image stabilization, the R8 excels in both stills and videos.

name: Samsung QN90B Neo QLED 4K TV
description: Immerse yourself in breathtaking color and contrast with the Samsung QN90B Neo QLED 4K TV. Quantum dot technology combines with advanced local dimming to deliver lifelike pictures, while smart features bring streaming platforms and voice assistants directly to your living room.

name: TP-Link Archer AX6000 WiFi 6 Router
description: Elevate your home network with the TP-Link Archer AX6000, a next-generation WiFi 6 router capable of blazing data rates, wide coverage, and robust security protocols. Ideal for households with many connected devices and large streaming or gaming demands.

name: Garmin Forerunner 265
description: Designed for athletes and fitness enthusiasts, the Garmin Forerunner 265 offers in-depth running metrics, GPS navigation, heart rate monitoring, and smart notifications. Its battery can last up to two weeks on a single charge, making it a reliable companion for daily workouts and long runs.

name: Anker 737 PowerCore Power Bank
description: Don’t let your devices run out of juice on the go. The Anker 737 PowerCore Power Bank offers ultra-fast charging with a massive 24,000mAh capacity, capable of charging laptops, tablets, and phones multiple times, all in a compact and sturdy design.

name: Lenovo Yoga 9i (14”) 2-in-1 Laptop
description: The Lenovo Yoga 9i 2-in-1 Laptop delivers flexibility and power in an elegant chassis. Equipped with powerful Intel processors, a rotating soundbar for immersive audio, and a vibrant touchscreen, it’s adaptable for both creative and productivity tasks.

name: Sonos Beam Gen 2 Soundbar
description: Get cinematic sound in a compact package with the Sonos Beam Gen 2 Soundbar, featuring Dolby Atmos, voice assistants, and effortless wireless setup. Perfect for upgrading your TV's audio and seamlessly integrating with Sonos multi-room systems.

name: Oculus Quest 2 VR Headset
description: Dive into an immersive world of virtual reality with the Oculus Quest 2. Featuring an all-in-one wireless design, high-resolution visuals, and a vast selection of games and experiences, the Quest 2 is suitable for both casual users and VR enthusiasts alike.

name: LG CordZero A9 Kompressor Stick Vacuum
description: Effortlessly tackle dirt and debris with the LG CordZero A9 Kompressor Stick Vacuum, offering strong suction, long-lasting dual batteries, and a compressing dust bin. This lightweight vacuum is ideal for households looking for convenience and robust cleaning power.

name: Asus ROG Swift PG32UQX Gaming Monitor
description: Serious gamers demand serious monitors, and the Asus ROG Swift PG32UQX delivers. With 4K HDR performance, 144Hz refresh rate, G-SYNC Ultimate, and local dimming, it provides flawless visuals and butter-smooth action for the ultimate gaming setups.

name: Logitech MX Keys Wireless Keyboard
description: Type comfortably and efficiently with the Logitech MX Keys Wireless Keyboard, designed for both Mac and Windows users. Its tactile keys, customizable shortcuts, and rechargeable battery make it a productivity powerhouse for modern workspaces.

name: Seagate Expansion Portable 5TB External Hard Drive
description: Expand your digital storage with the Seagate Expansion Portable 5TB Hard Drive. Plug-and-play simplicity, robust build, and lightning-fast transfer speeds make it ideal for backing up important files, games, or a growing media library.

name: Samsung Galaxy Tab S8+
description: Elevate your productivity and creativity with the Samsung Galaxy Tab S8+. Its expansive Super AMOLED display, included S Pen, and advanced multitasking capabilities make it a top choice for both professional and personal use.

name: Sonos Move Portable Speaker
description: Take rich, room-filling sound wherever you go with the Sonos Move Portable Speaker. Its rugged design is weather-resistant and provides up to 11 hours of playback with Wi-Fi and Bluetooth connectivity, making it ideal for indoor and outdoor use.

name: Arlo Pro 5S 2K Wireless Security Camera
description: Monitor your home or business confidently with the Arlo Pro 5S 2K Wireless Security Camera. Its 2K HDR video, night vision, extended battery life, and smart alerts ensure comprehensive surveillance, accessible anytime from your smartphone.

name: Corsair K95 RGB Platinum XT Mechanical Keyboard
description: Embrace precision and customization with the Corsair K95 RGB Platinum XT Mechanical Keyboard. With Cherry MX switches, dedicated macro keys, and brilliant RGB lighting, this keyboard is tailored to gamers and productivity enthusiasts alike.

name: Apple AirTag (4 Pack)
description: Keep track of all your essentials with the Apple AirTag. Using the Find My network, these compact trackers help you quickly locate lost items with precision finding and easy setup across any Apple device.

name: Dell XPS 27 All-in-One Desktop
description: The Dell XPS 27 All-in-One combines powerful performance and striking visuals in a compact form. With a vibrant 4K touchscreen display, Intel Core i7 processor, and immersive audio, this desktop is perfect for multimedia, creative work, and everyday computing.

name: Nanoleaf Shapes Hexagon Smarter Kit
description: Design your own lighting masterpiece with the Nanoleaf Shapes Hexagon Smarter Kit. These modular LED panels let you create personalized patterns, sync lights to music, and control everything via app or voice assistant for enhanced ambiance.

name: Beats Studio Buds
description: Enjoy robust sound and easy connectivity with Beats Studio Buds. These truly wireless earbuds provide active noise cancellation, IPX4 water resistance, and a secure, comfortable fit for music lovers and active lifestyles.

name: Kasa Smart Plug HS103P4 (4-pack)
description: Make any home device smart with the Kasa Smart Plug HS103P4. This pack of four lets you remotely control appliances, schedule routines, and monitor energy usage via the Kasa app, making home automation simple and accessible.

name: Canon PIXMA TR8620a Wireless Printer
description: The Canon PIXMA TR8620a Wireless Printer is perfect for home and office needs with fast, high-quality prints, scanning, copying, and faxing. With wireless connectivity and compact design, it brings versatility and convenience to any workspace.

name: Withings Body+ Smart Wi-Fi Scale
description: Achieve your health goals with the Withings Body+ Smart Wi-Fi Scale. It tracks weight, body composition, and syncs seamlessly with health apps. The sleek design and multiple user support make it the perfect addition to any modern bathroom.

name: Sony WH-1000XM4 Wireless Headphones
description: The Sony WH-1000XM4 wireless headphones deliver industry-leading noise cancellation, crystal-clear sound, and up to 30 hours of battery life on a single charge. With adaptive sound control, these headphones automatically adjust the ambient sound settings based on your location and activity. The soft ear pads ensure comfort during long listening sessions, while the touch controls make it easy to manage your music and calls. With support for hands-free voice assistants and multipoint connection, the WH-1000XM4 is a versatile option for both travel and work environments.

name: Dell XPS 13 Laptop
description: The Dell XPS 13 is a premium ultrabook designed for both productivity and entertainment. With a virtually borderless 13.4-inch InfinityEdge display, 11th-generation Intel Core processors, and up to 16GB RAM, it delivers impeccable performance and visuals. The aluminum chassis offers durability and a sleek look, while the long battery life ensures you stay powered on the go. The compact size makes it ideal for travel and work, offering Thunderbolt 4 ports for versatile connectivity.

name: Samsung QN90A Neo QLED Smart TV
description: Samsung’s QN90A Neo QLED TV is designed for the ultimate home theater experience. Featuring Quantum Matrix technology for precise lighting control and a rich 4K resolution, this television delivers incredibly vibrant picture quality. With its ultra-slim design, Dolby Atmos sound support, and Tizen-powered smart interface, users get easy access to streaming services and voice assistants. HDMI 2.1 connectivity ensures compatibility with the latest gaming consoles for a future-ready setup.

name: Logitech MX Master 3S
description: The Logitech MX Master 3S wireless mouse is engineered for ultimate productivity, featuring ultra-fast MagSpeed electromagnetic scrolling, ergonomic design, and customizable buttons. With quiet clicks, a high-precision sensor, and multi-device support, it’s the perfect companion for professionals seeking comfort, control, and efficiency in their workflow.

name: TP-Link Deco XE75
description: The TP-Link Deco XE75 is a Wi-Fi 6E mesh system designed to eliminate dead zones and boost internet speeds for seamless connectivity throughout your home. Supporting tri-band speeds, robust parental controls, and easy app-based network management, the Deco XE75 simplifies internet access for homes filled with smart devices, gamers, and remote workers alike.

name: HP ENVY Inspire 7955e
description: The HP ENVY Inspire 7955e All-in-One Printer makes home office tasks effortless with fast print speeds, automatic two-sided printing, wireless connectivity, and high-quality color output. With support for scanning, copying, and advanced photo printing features, it's ideal for families and professionals who need reliable and versatile printing capabilities.

name: Anker PowerCore III Elite 25600mAh
description: The Anker PowerCore III Elite 25600mAh is a high-capacity portable charger, equipped with multiple USB-C and USB-A ports for fast charging of laptops, tablets, and smartphones. With advanced safety features, durable design, and the ability to charge multiple devices at once, it's the perfect travel companion for staying powered on the go.

name: Netgear Nighthawk AX12
description: The Netgear Nighthawk AX12 (RAX120) is a Wi-Fi 6 router delivering gigabit-speed connectivity and wide coverage for intensive streaming, gaming, and smart home setups. Its 12-stream architecture, 2.2GHz quad-core processor, and advanced security features ensure reliable, high-performance networking for demanding households.

name: Jabra Elite 7 Active
description: Jabra Elite 7 Active earbuds supply crystal clear calls, adaptive active noise cancellation, and secure fit technology for workouts and daily use. With IP57 water and dust resistance, 8 hours of battery life (plus 30 with the case), and customizable sound profiles, they are made to keep up with any active lifestyle, indoors or outdoors.

name: Apple AirTag (4 pack)
description: Apple AirTags are sleek, compact Bluetooth trackers that help you locate lost items through the Find My network. With ultra-wideband precision, water resistance, and customizable engraving options, each AirTag offers effortless peace of mind for tracking keys, wallets, luggage, and more, making them an everyday essential for organization and security.

name: Razer BlackWidow V4 Pro
description: The Razer BlackWidow V4 Pro mechanical gaming keyboard offers Razer Green switches for exceptional tactile feedback and customizable RGB Chroma backlighting. Featuring a detachable wrist rest, dedicated macro keys, and premium build quality, it provides serious gamers with the edge needed for competitive gameplay and long-lasting comfort.

name: LG UltraGear 27GP950-B Gaming Monitor
description: The LG UltraGear 27GP950-B is a 27-inch 4K gaming monitor with 1ms response time, 144Hz refresh, NVIDIA G-SYNC and AMD FreeSync Premium support. Vivid Nano IPS color, HDR support, and plenty of connectivity ensure immersive, blazingly fast display performance for gaming enthusiasts and content creators alike.

name: Kindle Scribe
description: The Amazon Kindle Scribe introduces handwriting support to e-readers with a large 10.2-inch glare-free display and included stylus. Its seamless integration of reading, writing, and annotating makes it perfect for students, professionals, and note-takers who want a distraction-free digital paper experience with weeks-long battery life.

name: Acer Predator Helios 300
description: The Acer Predator Helios 300 is a mid-range gaming laptop featuring Intel’s latest Core i7 processor, NVIDIA RTX 3060 graphics, and a 15.6-inch 144Hz display. Enhanced with custom cooling, RGB keyboard, and a rugged chassis, it balances power, style, and value for gamers who want smooth, on-the-go gameplay.

name: Ninja Foodi DualZone Air Fryer
description: The Ninja Foodi DualZone Air Fryer uses two independent cooking baskets, allowing simultaneous preparation of two different foods at varying settings. With six customizable programs, easy-to-clean parts, and rapid air circulation for crispy results, it's ideal for fast, healthier meals for busy families and home cooks alike.

name: Corsair iCUE H150i ELITE CAPELLIX XT
description: Corsair's iCUE H150i ELITE CAPELLIX XT is a liquid CPU cooler with a 360mm radiator, powerful airflow fans, and customizable RGB lighting. Intended for high-performance gaming PCs, it offers quiet, efficient cooling, intuitive monitoring with iCUE software, and striking aesthetics to match custom builds.

name: Eero Pro 6E
description: Eero Pro 6E is a powerful mesh Wi-Fi 6E system delivering lightning-fast speeds up to 2.3Gbps and expansive coverage across homes of all sizes. With simple app-based setup, advanced parental controls, and powerful security features, it provides uninterrupted, secure internet for modern households.

name: Logitech G Pro X Superlight
description: The Logitech G Pro X Superlight redefines esports performance with its ultra-lightweight design (under 63g), HERO 25K sensor, and zero-additive PTFE feet for smooth gliding. Built for competitive gamers, it features robust wireless connectivity and over 70 hours of continuous playtime per charge.

name: LG Styler Steam Closet
description: The LG Styler Steam Closet refreshes and sanitizes clothing with gentle steam technology, eliminating odors and allergens while reducing wrinkles. Its slim, stylish freestanding design is perfect for laundry rooms, bedrooms, or walk-in closets, offering a convenient, garment-friendly way to extend the life of your wardrobe.

name: Tile Pro (2022)
description: The Tile Pro (2022) is a robust Bluetooth tracker with up to 400ft range and a loud ring to help find lost items. Water-resistant and featuring user-replaceable battery, it’s easily attached to keys, bags, or luggage and locates items via the Tile app and community network for quick recovery.

name: Wyze Cam v3
description: Wyze Cam v3 is a budget-friendly smart security camera offering full HD night vision, weatherproof design, motion/sound detection, and free cloud storage. Well-suited for indoor or outdoor use, it provides affordable, reliable home surveillance and peace of mind through its intuitive app.

name: Yamaha YAS-209 Soundbar with Wireless Subwoofer
description: The Yamaha YAS-209 is a compact soundbar system with DTS Virtual:X surround sound, wireless subwoofer, and Alexa voice control integration. It enhances TV audio clarity, offering simple setup and Bluetooth streaming to create a dynamic and immersive home entertainment soundscape.

name: Garmin Dash Cam 67W
description: Garmin Dash Cam 67W records crisp 1440p video with a wide 180-degree field of view and automatically saves footage with GPS tagging. Compact, unobtrusive, and Wi-Fi enabled for app uploads, it provides added safety and documentation for commutes or road trips.

name: Belkin BoostCharge Pro 3-in-1 Wireless Charger
description: The Belkin BoostCharge Pro 3-in-1 Wireless Charger powers iPhone, Apple Watch, and AirPods simultaneously with fast and convenient MagSafe compatibility. Its premium build, sleek design, and reliable charging speed make it an essential accessory for Apple users seeking hassle-free organization.

name: Hisense U8K ULED TV
