description: The Hisense U8K is a high-performance 4K ULED TV utilizing Quantum Dot technology for vibrant color, Dolby Vision and Atmos for cinematic experience, and a 120Hz refresh rate for smooth motion. With built-in Google TV, voice controls, and broad smart compatibility, it brings premium features within reach for any living room.

name: Tile Mate (2022)
description: Tile Mate (2022) offers a reliable solution to everyday item loss with up to 250ft Bluetooth range, water-resistant build, and up to 3 years of battery life. Easily attach it to keys, bags, or remotes and locate items via the Tile app—perfect for busy families and individuals alike.

name: Bang & Olufsen Beosound A1 (2nd Gen)
description: The Bang & Olufsen Beosound A1 (2nd Gen) is an ultra-portable Bluetooth speaker with stunning 360-degree sound, IP67 water/dust protection, and up to 18 hours of playtime. Its premium materials and Alexa integration make it an elegant companion for travel, picnics, or home listening.

name: JBL Charge 5
description: JBL Charge 5 boasts powerful, room-filling sound, a rugged waterproof design, and up to 20 hours of battery life. Doubles as a power bank for charging devices on the go, making it a top pick for outdoor adventures, parties, or everyday use.

name: Western Digital My Passport SSD 1TB
description: The Western Digital My Passport SSD 1TB combines compact portability with blazing-fast NVMe speeds up to 1050MB/s, password protection, and shock resistance. Its sleek, robust design is perfect for photographers, videographers, and anyone who needs secure, high-speed storage on the go.

name: Logitech Brio 4K Webcam
description: The Logitech Brio 4K Webcam provides crystal-clear Ultra HD video, high dynamic range, and infrared facial recognition, making it ideal for video conferencing and content creation. In addition to multiple field-of-view settings and background replacement, Brio supports seamless compatibility with major platforms for professional-quality communication.

name: Sony Xperia 1 IV
description: Sony Xperia 1 IV targets creative professionals and enthusiasts with its 4K OLED display, true optical zoom lens, and pro-grade audio/video recording tools. With Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 power and streamlined 21:9 design, it offers a unique multimedia and productivity experience for Android aficionados.

name: TP-Link Archer AX90
description: TP-Link Archer AX90 is a tri-band Wi-Fi 6 router featuring 8-stream speeds, advanced HomeShield security, and a robust range for smart homes with many devices. Easy to manage via app and secure for families, it ensures blazing speeds and strong streaming and gaming performance.

name: Sony WF-1000XM4
description: Sony WF-1000XM4 earbuds set the standard for wireless audio with powerful noise cancellation, adaptive sound control, and LDAC hi-res streaming. Water-resistant and ergonomically designed, with up to 24 hours of total battery, they're the perfect blend of performance and comfort for everyday listening.

name: Google Nest Doorbell (Battery)
description: Google’s Nest Doorbell (Battery) delivers sharp HDR video, person/package/motion alerts, and wire-free installation with easy smartphone integration. Robust, weather-resistant build and flexible mounting make it an intelligent way to monitor your front door, no subscription required for core features.

name: Steam Deck OLED 512GB
description: The Steam Deck OLED 512GB offers portable PC gaming with a vibrant 7.4-inch OLED display, powerful AMD APU, and storage for hundreds of games. Controls are optimized for both quick sessions and extended play, supporting Steam’s vast library and emulation for gaming on the go.

name: Ecovacs Deebot T10 Omni
description: The Ecovacs Deebot T10 Omni is an intelligent robot vacuum and mop with advanced navigation, AI obstacle avoidance, self-emptying dustbin, and deep-cleaning modes. Suited for pet owners and busy families, it delivers thorough, hands-free floor care with app-based scheduling and monitoring.

name: Joby GorillaPod 3K Kit
description: The Joby GorillaPod 3K Kit is a versatile tripod designed for cameras up to 3kg, featuring flexible, grippy legs that wrap around objects for unique angles and stability. Lightweight and compact, it’s an indispensable choice for vloggers, photographers, and travelers capturing content on the move.

name: Samsung Odyssey G5 34” Ultra-Wide Monitor
description: Samsung’s Odyssey G5 34” Ultra-Wide Monitor immerses users in games and workflows with a 1000R curve, QHD resolution, and 165Hz refresh rate. AMD FreeSync support and cinematic 21:9 ratio make it ideal for enthusiasts seeking expansive screen real estate for multitasking and entertainment.

name: Shark IQ Robot Self-Empty XL
description: Shark's IQ Robot Self-Empty XL features self-cleaning brushroll, advanced mapping, and bagless base to hold up to 45 days of dirt. Powerful suction and app/voice controls make cleaning effortless, perfect for pet owners and busy families with large areas to maintain.

name: Amazfit GTR 4 Smartwatch
description: Amazfit GTR 4 is a stylish smartwatch equipped with a bright AMOLED screen, dual-band GPS, 24-day battery life, and advanced fitness/health tracking capabilities. With Alexa built-in and robust app integration, it’s designed for users seeking an affordable, reliable wearable with comprehensive wellness features.

name: BenQ ScreenBar Halo
description: The BenQ ScreenBar Halo is an innovative monitor light with asymmetric optical design for glare-free desk illumination. Featuring an adjustable color temperature, wireless controller, and automatic dimming, it improves workspace comfort and reduces eye strain for professionals and gamers.

name: Fujifilm X-T5
description: The Fujifilm X-T5 is a mirrorless camera that combines classic aesthetics with modern imaging, offering a 40MP sensor, fast autofocus, and in-body stabilization. With 6K video, high-res EVF, and tactile analogue controls, the X-T5 inspires creativity for enthusiast photographers and professionals alike.

name: Jabra Evolve2 75
description: Jabra Evolve2 75 is a wireless office headset with hybrid ANC, adjustable boom mic, and dual connectivity for productivity in busy environments. Its comfortable memory foam ear cushions and extended battery life make it essential for call centers, remote work, or business travel.

name: Sony SRS-XG500 Portable Speaker
description: Sony SRS-XG500 is a portable Bluetooth speaker offering big, clear sound on the go, X-Balanced speakers, and up to 30 hours battery. IP66 dust and water resistance make it a rugged companion for outdoor parties, plus USB charging and customizable lighting add to its versatile appeal.

name: Blink Outdoor (3rd Gen)
description: Blink Outdoor (3rd Gen) is a wireless, weather-resistant smart security camera with 1080p HD video, two-year battery life, and customizable alerts via app. Quick to install and Alexa-friendly, it's ideal for affordable, maintenance-free home monitoring and peace of mind.

name: SteelSeries Arctis Nova Pro Wireless Headset
description: The SteelSeries Arctis Nova Pro Wireless sets the benchmark for wireless gaming audio with 360° spatial sound, active noise cancellation, and simultaneous dual wireless connectivity. Its swappable battery packs and comfort-focused design make it the ultimate headset for marathon gaming sessions.

name: iRobot Braava Jet m6
description: The iRobot Braava Jet m6 is a smart robot mop designed for hard floors, using precision jet spray and advanced mapping to clean multiple rooms. Controlled by app or voice, it efficiently tackles sticky messes and grime, creating spotless spaces with minimal effort from users.

name: Dell UltraSharp U2723QE
description: Dell’s UltraSharp U2723QE boasts a sharp 4K IPS Black display, comprehensive USB-C connectivity with 90W power delivery, and accurate color calibration for design professionals. Its ergonomic stand and wide viewing angles make it an essential upgrade for creative workspaces and multitasking setups.

name: Sony Alpha ZV-E10
description: The Sony Alpha ZV-E10 is a compact, mirrorless vlogging camera that delivers professional content creation features like a flip-out touchscreen, fast autofocus, interchangeable lenses, and clear 4K video. Designed for creators on the go, it combines portability, versatility, and user-friendly controls.

name: Frigidaire Gallery 30" Induction Range
description: The Frigidaire Gallery 30" Induction Range offers fast, precise cooking with induction heating, air fry capability, and a convection oven. Its sleek, smudge-resistant exterior, digital controls, and self-cleaning options make it a reliable, efficient upgrade for home chefs seeking performance and convenience.

name: Skullcandy Crusher Evo Wireless Headphones
description: Skullcandy Crusher Evo Wireless Headphones stand out with sensory bass, customizable sound via app, and up to 40 hours of playback. Their rugged design, built-in Tile tracker, and comfort-focused build ensure immersive listening whether at home or on the move.

name: Samsung T7 Shield Portable SSD (2TB)
description: The Samsung T7 Shield Portable SSD (2TB) offers ultra-fast USB 3.2 Gen 2 transfer speeds up to 1050MB/s within a rugged, IP65-rated shock/dust/water-resistant enclosure. Compact and reliable, it's designed for creatives, professionals, or anyone transporting large file libraries securely and quickly.

name: Belkin SurgePlus USB Swivel Charger
description: The Belkin SurgePlus USB Swivel Charger combines power surge protection with dual USB charging ports and a rotating plug for tight spaces. It's a practical and secure way to charge and safeguard smartphones, tablets, and small appliances in home offices or while traveling.

name: Huawei MatePad Pro 12.6
description: Huawei MatePad Pro 12.6 delivers a vivid OLED display, high-performance Kirin 9000E processor, and robust M-Pencil stylus support. Designed for creativity and productivity, this slim, lightweight tablet excels in multitasking, media consumption, and professional-grade note-taking.

name: Olympus OM System Tough TG-7
description: The Olympus OM System Tough TG-7 is a compact, rugged camera built for outdoor adventures. Waterproof, shockproof, and freezeproof, it captures sharp 12MP images and 4K video in the harshest environments, making it a reliable tool for travelers, hikers, and explorers.

name: JLab Go Air Pop True Wireless Earbuds
description: JLab Go Air Pop True Wireless Earbuds offer surprisingly powerful sound in an ultra-light, pocket-sized package. With touch controls, splashproof rating, built-in charging cable, and over 32 hours of playtime, they're perfect for students, commuters, and busy users seeking affordable wireless convenience.

name: Sony WH-CH520 Wireless Headphones
description: Sony WH-CH520 Wireless Headphones feature up to 50 hours of battery life, comfortable lightweight design, and crisp sound with Bluetooth multipoint pairing. They're an affordable everyday option for music lovers seeking reliable performance without breaking the bank.

name: Theragun Elite Percussive Massager
description: Theragun Elite delivers deep muscle treatment with quiet operation, custom speed settings, and an OLED screen. Its ergonomic design and app-guided routines make it essential for athletes and anyone seeking effective, on-demand muscle relief and recovery.

name: SanDisk Extreme PRO SDXC UHS-I Card (128GB)
description: The SanDisk Extreme PRO SDXC UHS-I Card (128GB) offers blazing-fast write speeds up to 90MB/s, perfect for 4K video recording and rapid-fire photography. Durable in tough conditions, it's trusted by professional photographers and videographers needing reliable, high-performance storage.

name: Bose Smart Speaker 500
description: The Bose Smart Speaker 500 fills rooms with superior stereo sound and features built-in Alexa/Google Assistant for hands-free control. Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, and Apple AirPlay 2 support make it a do-it-all speaker for music streaming and smart home integration.

name: Motorola WiFi Baby Monitor VM855
description: The Motorola WiFi Baby Monitor VM855 offers a 5-inch color screen, remote pan/tilt/zoom, HD camera streaming, and two-way talk. With secure Wi-Fi access via app, night vision, and lullabies, it gives parents peace of mind and flexible monitoring from anywhere.

name: Aqara Roller Shade Driver E1
description: The Aqara Roller Shade Driver E1 automates existing window shades with app/voice control, Zigbee 3.0 compatibility, and easy installation. Ideal for adding smart convenience to homes without replacing current blinds, it supports automation and integration with major smart home platforms.

name: Samsung SmartThings Station
description: Samsung SmartThings Station is an intuitive home automation hub offering Matter, Zigbee, and Wi-Fi compatibility for seamless control of smart devices. With built-in wireless charging, customizable routines, and one-tap scene activation, it’s perfect for simplifying and unifying connected homes.

name: Acer Nitro XV282K KVbmiipruzx
description: The Acer Nitro XV282K KVbmiipruzx is a 28-inch 4K UHD gaming monitor featuring HDMI 2.1 for true next-gen console support, 144Hz refresh, 1ms response, and AMD FreeSync Premium. It's ideal for enthusiasts seeking buttery-smooth, lag-free visuals with vibrant color.

name: Sonos Ray Compact Soundbar
description: The Sonos Ray Compact Soundbar delivers crisp dialogue, solid bass, and easy integration into home setups. Its compact design suits smaller spaces, while simple connectivity and app control offer a world of streaming audio, making it a standout upgrade over built-in TV speakers.

name: LG 65" OLED C3 Series 4K TV
description: The LG 65" OLED C3 Series delivers exceptional 4K picture quality with self-lit pixels, infinite contrast, and true-to-life colors. Its thin, minimalist design fits any living space, while onboard HDMI 2.1 ports are perfect for next-gen consoles. The TV offers Dolby Vision IQ, Dolby Atmos sound, and the latest webOS for smart TV capabilities, making it ideal for both high-end home theater lovers and gamers.

name: Dell XPS 13 Plus 9320
description: The Dell XPS 13 Plus 9320 reimagines the iconic ultrabook, featuring a borderless 13.4-inch OLED display, Intel Core i7 processors, and a futuristic seamless glass touchpad. Its minimalist chassis is robust yet incredibly lightweight for total mobility. With Thunderbolt 4 ports, a zero-lattice keyboard, and impressive battery life, it’s perfect for professional multitaskers who demand performance and style in one package.

name: Sony PlayStation 5 Disc Edition
description: The PlayStation 5 Disc Edition brings next-generation gaming with ultra-fast SSD storage, ray tracing capabilities, and support for 4K graphics. Its powerful hardware allows near-instant load times, and the new DualSense controller introduces haptic feedback and adaptive triggers for deeper immersion. With an expanding library of exclusive games and multimedia apps, the PS5 is the heart of any home entertainment setup for gamers of all levels.

name: Apple Watch Series 8 GPS
description: The Apple Watch Series 8 features advanced health sensors, a sharp always-on Retina display, and new temperature-sensing abilities for improved health tracking. With crash detection, ECG, blood oxygen monitoring, and fitness metrics, it makes a versatile companion for an active lifestyle. Fast charging and seamless integration with the Apple ecosystem keep everything you need, right on your wrist.

name: Eufy RoboVac X8
description: The Eufy RoboVac X8 robot vacuum employs twin turbines for powerful, thorough cleaning on both carpets and hard floors. Its laser navigation system maps your home for efficient navigation and room-specific cleaning. With Wi-Fi app control, Alexa and Google Assistant support, and up to 180 minutes battery life, it’s a reliable, hands-free cleaning solution for busy households.

name: Jabra Elite 7 Pro Wireless Earbuds
description: The Jabra Elite 7 Pro wireless earbuds feature MultiSensor Voice technology for stunning call clarity, active noise cancellation, and up to 8 hours of play (30 with the case). The secure, compact fit plus IP57 water and dust resistance make them perfect for both workouts and travel. Customizable sound, a comfortable fit, and robust companion app ensure a personalized audio experience.

name: Lenovo Legion 5 Pro (2023)
description: The Lenovo Legion 5 Pro gaming laptop harnesses the power of AMD Ryzen 7 processors and NVIDIA RTX 3070 graphics to deliver high frame rates and outstanding visuals on its 16-inch QHD 165Hz screen. Advanced cooling, customizable RGB keyboard, and rapid charging make it a powerhouse for gamers and content creators demanding both performance and reliability.

name: ASUS ROG Swift PG32UQX Monitor
description: The ASUS ROG Swift PG32UQX is an elite 32-inch 4K gaming monitor with Mini LED backlighting, 144Hz refresh rate, and NVIDIA G-SYNC Ultimate. HDR support brings stunning contrast and vibrant colors, while customizable RGB lighting and a robust stand make for both functionality and aesthetics. Ideal for competitive gamers who demand ultra-smooth and responsive visuals.

name: BenQ TK850i 4K HDR Projector
description: The BenQ TK850i brings the excitement of 4K UHD home cinema with HDR-PRO technology for vivid colors and crisp contrasts. Android TV integration offers access to a variety of streaming apps, while easy lens shift and keystone correction allow hassle-free setup. With 3,000 lumens of brightness, it's perfect for movie nights or big-game days, even in brightly lit rooms.

name: Oculus Quest 2 (Meta Quest 2) VR Headset
description: The Oculus Quest 2 is an all-in-one VR headset with a sharp 1832x1920 resolution per eye, 6GB of RAM, and wireless freedom for immersive gaming and social experiences. Its intuitive controls and expanding game library make it suitable for first-timers and VR enthusiasts alike. Lightweight design and no need for a PC offer unmatched convenience.

name: Anker PowerCore 26800 Portable Charger
description: The Anker PowerCore 26800 is a high-capacity power bank capable of charging most smartphones over six times. With three USB outputs, fast-charging technology, and an included dual Micro USB input for speedier refills, it’s an essential companion for frequent travelers or anyone needing power on the go. Its reinforced body ensures durability during adventures and daily use.

name: Acer Nitro XV282K Gaming Monitor
description: The Acer Nitro XV282K is a 28-inch 4K UHD gaming monitor featuring an ultra-fast 144Hz refresh rate, FreeSync Premium, and HDMI 2.1 support. With vivid colors, ergonomic adjustments, and eye protection technology, it’s ideal for competitive gamers and console players seeking the best visuals and smooth gameplay.

name: Polaroid Now+ Instant Camera
description: The Polaroid Now+ is a modern analog instant camera with Bluetooth connectivity and creative lens filters. It offers manual controls through the companion app, allowing advanced photography features like tripod mode and double exposure. The iconic design and instant printing make it a fun and nostalgic way to capture and share moments immediately.

name: Razer Huntsman V2 Optical Gaming Keyboard
description: The Razer Huntsman V2 delivers ultra-fast optical actuation, customizable RGB lighting, and a plush wrist rest for extended gaming sessions. Its sturdy aluminum construction, sound dampening, and dedicated media controls are perfect for gamers who demand performance, durability, and comfort. Multiple onboard profiles enhance personalization and tournament readiness.

name: Canon imageCLASS MF455dw All-in-One Laser Printer
description: The Canon imageCLASS MF455dw is a monochrome all-in-one laser printer designed for small businesses and home offices. With fast printing speeds, automatic duplexing, and an intuitive touchscreen interface, it handles high-volume tasks efficiently. Built-in Wi-Fi, mobile printing, and secure printing options ensure versatility and data protection.

name: Blink Outdoor 3-Camera Security System
description: The Blink Outdoor system features three weatherproof wireless cameras with two-year battery life and 1080p HD video. Easy DIY installation, app-based motion alerts, and cloud or local storage help secure your home day and night. Alexa compatibility and two-way audio further enhance your peace of mind while away or at home.

name: LG UltraGear 27GN950-B Gaming Monitor
description: The LG UltraGear 27GN950-B is a high-end 27-inch 4K gaming monitor with a NVIDIA G-SYNC, 144Hz refresh rate, and Nano IPS technology for ultra-fast response and color accuracy. HDR600 certification and customizable lighting enhance the immersive experience for esports and single-player games alike. It’s a top choice for serious gamers seeking uncompromising image quality.

name: Samsung T7 Portable SSD 1TB
description: The Samsung T7 Portable SSD offers blazing-fast USB 3.2 Gen 2 speeds up to 1,050MB/s in a compact, shock-resistant metal case. With 1TB capacity, password protection, and cross-platform compatibility, it's perfect for creators, gamers, and professionals transferring large files on the go. Sturdy, pocket-sized, and secure, the T7 is the future of portable storage.

name: Sony Alpha ZV-E10 Mirrorless Vlogging Camera
description: The Sony ZV-E10 is a vlogging-focused mirrorless camera with interchangeable lenses, a 24.2MP APS-C sensor, and advanced autofocus. With a vari-angle LCD touchscreen, high-quality built-in microphone, and real-time eye tracking, it’s tailored for creators wanting professional-looking video with intuitive controls. USB streaming and smartphone connectivity further expand workflow possibilities.

name: Apple TV 4K (3rd Generation)
description: The Apple TV 4K (3rd Gen) brings cinematic 4K HDR and Dolby Atmos audio to your home theater. With an A15 Bionic chip, improved Siri Remote, and seamless integration of Apple services, it’s a premium hub for streaming, gaming, and smart home control. The tvOS ecosystem supports a wide range of popular apps for endless entertainment.

name: Brother HL-L2370DW Monochrome Laser Printer
description: The Brother HL-L2370DW is a compact monochrome laser printer ideal for home offices and small workgroups. It delivers fast, reliable printing with automatic duplexing, wireless networking, and low operating costs. Affordable and simple to set up, it supports mobile device printing for added convenience and productivity.

name: Logitech C920s Pro HD Webcam
description: The Logitech C920s Pro HD Webcam is designed for crystal-clear 1080p video calls, streaming, and recording. Featuring a privacy shutter, dual microphones, and autofocus, it delivers sharp images and clear sound even in low light. It’s a must-have accessory for remote work, online learning, or content creation.

name: WD My Passport 4TB Portable External Hard Drive
description: The WD My Passport offers 4TB of reliable, portable storage for backing up important files, photos, and videos. With USB 3.0 compatibility, password protection, and automatic backup software, it’s hassle-free and essential for anyone needing large capacity and security on the go. Its slim, colorful design fits any lifestyle.

name: Sennheiser MOMENTUM 4 Wireless Headphones
description: The Sennheiser MOMENTUM 4 Wireless Headphones offer high-fidelity sound, adaptive noise cancellation, and up to 60 hours of battery life. Comfortable and lightweight, these wireless headphones deliver crystal-clear calls and customizable controls via the Sennheiser app. Premium materials, smart pause/play features, and detailed sound make them a favorite among audiophiles and frequent travelers.

name: Apple iPad Pro 12.9 (6th Gen)
description: The Apple iPad Pro 12.9-inch (6th Gen) wields the powerful M2 chip, powering a Liquid Retina XDR display with ProMotion technology, and comes with up to 2TB storage. Its ultra-wide TrueDepth front camera and advanced LiDAR scanner enhance augmented reality experiences. Support for Apple Pencil (2nd Gen) and Magic Keyboard make it an essential creative and productivity tool.

name: LG C2 OLED EVO 55" 4K Smart TV
description: The LG C2 OLED EVO 55" 4K Smart TV features OLED EVO technology for brighter, sharper images and infinite contrast. Powered by the α9 Gen5 AI Processor, it supports Dolby Vision IQ, Dolby Atmos, and Nvidia G-Sync for a premium cinema and gaming experience. Its sleek design and webOS smart platform make navigation seamless and stylish.

name: Garmin Fenix 7 Sapphire Solar GPS Watch
description: The Garmin Fenix 7 Sapphire Solar GPS Watch is built for adventure with a sun-charging Power Sapphire lens, multi-band GPS/GLONASS/Galileo navigation, and a rugged, water-rated design. Advanced health & fitness tracking, topo maps, and smart notifications make this a top choice for athletes and explorers.

name: Apple Watch Series 9 (GPS + Cellular)
description: The Apple Watch Series 9 features a brighter Always-On Retina display, robust S9 SiP processor, and new double-tap gesture for seamless interaction. Advanced health sensors, crash detection, and built-in cellular keep users connected, healthy, and safe, making it a must-have for active, tech-savvy individuals.

name: Logitech MX Mechanical Wireless Keyboard
description: The Logitech MX Mechanical Wireless Keyboard features tactile mechanical switches, customizable backlighting, and multi-device Easy-Switch for up to three computers. With Bluetooth and Logi Bolt USB, it offers fast, accurate typing and premium build quality, making it suited for productivity enthusiasts and professionals.

name: DJI Mini 4 Pro Drone
description: The DJI Mini 4 Pro is a lightweight, foldable drone with 4K60fps video, obstacle avoidance, and up to 34 minutes of flight time per charge. Its advanced OcuSync 3.0 transmission and intuitive control make it safe for beginners, yet feature-rich for experienced pilots seeking high-quality aerial photography.

name: Amazon Kindle Scribe 10.2" eReader
description: The Amazon Kindle Scribe features a 10.2-inch Paperwhite display and includes a premium pen for handwriting, note-taking, and sketching directly on eBooks or PDFs. Its adjustable warm light, 64GB storage, and long battery life make it ideal for avid readers, students, and professionals who want the functionality of digital paper.

name: Corsair K100 RGB Optical-Mechanical Gaming Keyboard
description: The Corsair K100 RGB Gaming Keyboard delivers ultra-responsive optical-mechanical key switches, dynamic per-key RGB lighting, and programmable macro keys. Features a customizable control wheel for media and workflow shortcuts, detachable palm rest, and onboard profile storage to suit serious gamers and streamers.

name: Microsoft Surface Studio 2+ All-in-One Desktop
description: The Microsoft Surface Studio 2+ offers a 28-inch touchscreen PixelSense Display with instant switching between desktop and drawing board. Powered by Intel Core i7, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 graphics, and high-speed SSD, it delivers outstanding performance for creative professionals in graphic design, architecture, and multimedia.

name: Eufy RoboVac X8 Hybrid Robot Vacuum & Mop
description: The Eufy RoboVac X8 Hybrid combines vacuuming and mopping, with ultra-strong Twin-Turbine suction and AI Map™ 2.0 for precise navigation. Its app and voice controls, large dustbin, and water tank make it an efficient cleaning solution suitable for busy households and pet owners.

name: Synology DiskStation DS923+ NAS
description: The Synology DiskStation DS923+ is a 4-bay NAS server designed for small offices and enthusiasts. Powered by AMD Ryzen Quad-core, it delivers fast file sharing, backup, and virtualization support. With robust data protection and expandability options, it's a professional-grade storage solution for home and business.

name: Samsung Odyssey G9 Neo 49" Curved Gaming Monitor
description: The Samsung Odyssey G9 Neo is a 49-inch curved gaming monitor with 5120x1440 resolution, 240Hz refresh rate, Quantum Mini LED backlighting, and G-Sync support. Its immersive aspect ratio, HDR2000 certification, and customizable RGB lighting make it an ultimate centerpiece for gaming rigs or editing workstations.

name: TP-Link Deco XE75 AXE5400 Tri-Band Mesh WiFi 6E System
description: The TP-Link Deco XE75 utilizes WiFi 6E tri-band technology to deliver fast and reliable coverage for up to 7,200 sq ft and 200+ devices. AI-driven mesh optimizes connections, while robust parental controls, network protection, and easy app setup suit modern connected homes.

name: Kobo Libra 2 Waterproof eReader
description: The Kobo Libra 2 boasts a glare-free 7-inch E Ink Carta 1200 touchscreen, ComfortLight PRO for adjustable color temperature, and 32GB storage. It supports waterproofing (IPX8), audiobooks via Bluetooth, and native OverDrive integration for library eBook lending, making it perfect for avid bookworms.

name: Sony PlayStation 5 Console (Disc Version)
description: The Sony PlayStation 5 Console features lightning-fast load times powered by a custom SSD, an immersive Tempest 3D AudioTech, and a revolutionary DualSense wireless controller. With support for 4K gaming, ray tracing, and backward compatibility, it delivers truly next-gen graphics and gameplay.

name: Netatmo Smart Indoor Air Quality Monitor
description: Monitor temperature, humidity, air quality, CO2, and noise with the Netatmo Smart Indoor Air Quality Monitor. Receive real-time insights and recommendations via a mobile app, helping you create a healthier home for your family or work environment.

name: Apple Mac Mini (M2, 2023)
description: The Apple Mac Mini (M2) redefines desktop compactness with an M2 chip, up to 24GB unified memory, and Thunderbolt 4 connectivity. Its minimalist footprint, macOS Ventura support, and advanced media engine make it a favorite for developers, students, and content creators.

name: DJI Pocket 3 Handheld Gimbal Camera
description: The DJI Pocket 3 is an ultra-portable gimbal camera with a 1-inch CMOS sensor for 4K120fps video and advanced subject tracking. With a pocket-sized form, touchscreen tilt control, and wireless capabilities, it’s ideal for vloggers, travelers, and anyone capturing steady video on the go.

name: Garmin Dash Cam 66W
description: The Garmin Dash Cam 66W captures 1440p HDR video with a wide 180-degree field of view, advanced driver alerts, and voice-controlled features. Its compact design, GPS logging, and automatic cloud backup via WiFi make it a reliable choice for motorists seeking peace of mind on the road.

name: Sony HT-A7000 Dolby Atmos Soundbar
description: The Sony HT-A7000 is a 7.1.2 channel soundbar delivering cinematic Dolby Atmos, DTS:X, and 500W total output power. Its built-in dual subwoofers and up-firing speakers create immersive sound, while streaming and HDMI eARC connectivity integrate easily with any home theater.

name: TCL 6-Series 75" QLED 4K Google TV
description: The TCL 6-Series 75" TV uses QLED technology, Mini-LED backlighting, and native 120Hz refresh rate for dazzling 4K gaming and streaming. Integrated Google TV provides robust app support and voice control, making it an excellent value choice for family living rooms.

name: Xiaomi Smart Air Fryer Pro 4L
description: The Xiaomi Smart Air Fryer Pro 4L lets you cook healthier meals with app-controlled schedules, recipes, and smart adjustments. Its 4-liter capacity, nonstick basket, and real-time progress tracking work perfectly for tech-savvy cooks and busy families looking for quick, convenient meal prep.

name: SteelSeries Aerox 5 Wireless Gaming Mouse
description: The SteelSeries Aerox 5 Wireless delivers ultra-lightweight design, quantum 2.0 dual wireless, and customizable button mapping. With up to 180 hours of battery life and water-resistance, it is tailored for esports players and competitive gamers requiring precision and endurance.

name: Sonos Roam Portable Smart Speaker
description: The Sonos Roam is a portable smart speaker with seamless WiFi/Bluetooth switching, powerful bass, and up to 10 hours of battery. Waterproof (IP67), rugged, and voice-enabled, it integrates with the Sonos multiroom system for music lovers who want great sound indoors and outside.

name: Nest Learning Thermostat (4th Gen)
description: The Nest Learning Thermostat (4th Gen) uses AI to optimize your home’s heating and cooling, learning preferences and schedules over time. With a sharp high-res display, smartphone control, and energy-saving suggestions, it helps reduce utility costs while maximizing comfort and convenience.

name: Lenovo Yoga Tab 13 Android Tablet
description: The Lenovo Yoga Tab 13 offers a 13-inch 2K display, Qualcomm Snapdragon 870 CPU, JBL quad speakers, and a built-in stainless steel kickstand for versatile usage. Compatible with active stylus and featuring Google Kids Space, it’s perfect for entertainment, productivity, and families.

name: TP-Link Kasa Smart Wi-Fi Plug Mini (4-Pack)
description: The TP-Link Kasa Smart Wi-Fi Plug Mini allows remote control of appliances via app or voice with Alexa and Google Assistant support. The compact design fits any outlet and includes scheduling and timer features, making home automation effortless and expandable.

name: Canon imageCLASS MF753Cdw All-in-One Laser Printer
description: The Canon imageCLASS MF753Cdw delivers fast, vibrant color prints, scans, and faxes with wireless connectivity and duplex auto-document feeder. High-yield toner options, robust security features, and intuitive 5-inch touchscreen make it an ideal office solution for productivity-driven environments.

name: Apple MacBook Pro M2 (16-inch)
description: Apple’s MacBook Pro M2 (16-inch) excels at performance-intensive tasks, thanks to the M2 Pro chip, up to 64GB unified memory, and high-efficiency thermal design. The Liquid Retina XDR display delivers vivid colors and deep contrast. With 21-hour battery life, a six-speaker sound system, and robust privacy features, this laptop is crafted for creative professionals and power users demanding ultimate reliability and speed.

name: Netgear Orbi RBK753 Wi-Fi 6 Mesh System
description: The Netgear Orbi RBK753 offers seamless, high-speed whole-home Wi-Fi coverage up to 7,500 square feet. Powered by Wi-Fi 6, it supports dozens of devices with minimal interference, perfect for busy households or home offices. The tri-band mesh system ensures fast streaming, gaming, and secure connection anywhere in your home.

name: TP-Link Kasa Smart WiFi Plug Slim (HS105)
description: The TP-Link Kasa Smart WiFi Plug Slim (HS105) allows remote control of appliances via the Kasa app or voice commands. Its compact form means it doesn’t block adjacent outlets. Schedule automation, energy monitoring, and seamless compatibility with Alexa and Google Assistant make it an affordable step into home automation.

name: Alienware Aurora R13 Gaming Desktop
description: The Alienware Aurora R13 Gaming Desktop is a powerhouse, boasting up to 12th Gen Intel Core i9, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3080 Ti GPU, and advanced cooling. Its customizable chassis, tool-less upgrades, and immersive RGB lighting meet the needs of gamers looking for both performance and style.

name: Ultimate Ears BOOM 3 Portable Speaker
description: The BOOM 3 is a waterproof, dustproof portable speaker from Ultimate Ears. Featuring 360° sound, deep bass, and a rugged build, it's ready for any adventure. The rechargeable battery delivers 15 hours of rich music, and the Magic Button makes it easy to control playback on the go.

name: Microsoft Surface Laptop 5 (15-inch)
description: Microsoft’s Surface Laptop 5 combines a vibrant PixelSense touchscreen, 12th Gen Intel processors, and all-day battery in a beautifully slim metal chassis. Thunderbolt 4 support enables ultrafast connectivity and modern workflows. The backlit keyboard and exceptional build quality offer premium comfort and aesthetics for students and professionals.

name: Ecovacs Deebot X1 Omni
description: The Ecovacs Deebot X1 Omni is a premium robot vacuum and mop featuring advanced AI navigation, powerful suction, and an all-in-one station for automated cleaning and self-emptying. App and voice control, object recognition, and customizable schedules make it a hands-off solution for spotless floors every day.

name: ASUS ROG Strix XG16 Portable Gaming Monitor
description: The ASUS ROG Strix XG16 is a 15.6-inch portable gaming monitor with 144Hz refresh rate and adaptive sync. Its built-in battery provides hours of gaming or productivity on the move. A smart case doubles as a kickstand, and USB-C/HDMI inputs ensure broad device compatibility for gamers and professionals alike.

name: HyperX Cloud Alpha Wireless Headset
description: The HyperX Cloud Alpha Wireless features up to 300 hours of battery life, a lightweight design, and DTS Headphone:X spatial audio. With precision-tuned 50mm drivers and a detachable noise-cancelling mic, it's tailored for serious gamers requiring comfort and untethered play during marathon sessions.

name: Lenovo Legion 5 Pro Gen 7
description: The Lenovo Legion 5 Pro Gen 7 excels in gaming and content creation thanks to AMD Ryzen 7 processors and NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070 Ti graphics. Its 16-inch QHD display features a 165Hz refresh rate, while advanced thermal management keeps it running cool. Delivering strong battery life and a full-size keyboard, it’s a top choice for high-performance computing.

name: Acer Predator X34 GS Ultrawide Monitor
description: The Acer Predator X34 GS is a 34-inch curved ultrawide monitor designed for immersive gaming and productivity. With a 180Hz refresh rate, NVIDIA G-Sync compatibility, and QHD resolution, it delivers smooth, vivid visuals. The ergonomic stand and extensive connectivity options enhance comfort and versatility in any setup.

name: Withings Body+ Wi-Fi Smart Scale
description: Withings Body+ is a Wi-Fi connected smart scale offering weight, body composition, and BMI measurements. Sync data automatically to the Health Mate app for tracking progress and gaining insights. Its multi-user support and pregnancy mode provide tailored experiences for the whole family, making health management easy and motivating.

name: Instant Pot Duo Crisp with Air Fryer 8-Quart
description: The Instant Pot Duo Crisp with Air Fryer promises unmatched versatility with its 8-quart capacity. It replaces multiple appliances, offering pressure cook, air fry, roast, bake, and more. Its innovative design, easy-to-use controls, and dishwasher-safe parts provide effortless meal prep for families seeking convenience and variety.

name: Garmin Forerunner 955
description: Garmin Forerunner 955 is designed for serious athletes, featuring advanced GPS, training readiness insights, and multi-band GNSS support. The color touchscreen display is easy to navigate, providing up to 15 days of battery life. Advanced health metrics, music storage, and full triathlon support make it the choice for fitness enthusiasts.

name: Canon EOS R7
description: Canon EOS R7 is a versatile mirrorless camera targeted at enthusiasts and professionals. It features a 32.5MP APS-C CMOS sensor, fast Dual Pixel autofocus, 4K60p video, and in-body stabilization. Lightweight and robust, it excels at sports, wildlife, and vlogging, offering high performance in any scenario.

name: Samsung T7 Shield Portable SSD 1TB
description: The Samsung T7 Shield Portable SSD provides ultra-fast external storage with read/write speeds up to 1,050/1,000 MB/s. Rugged and IP65 water/dust resistant, it's ideal for content creators needing durability and portability. USB 3.2 Gen 2 interface ensures broad device compatibility and rapid file transfer.

name: Razer DeathAdder V2
description: The Razer DeathAdder V2 is a high-performance ergonomic gaming mouse equipped with a Focus+ 20K DPI optical sensor and Razer Optical Mouse Switches for lightning-fast actuation. Lightweight at 82g and featuring customizable Chroma RGB lighting, it ensures pinpoint accuracy and comfort for extended gaming sessions.

name: Anker Nano II 65W Charger
description: The Anker Nano II 65W Charger utilizes advanced GaN II technology for ultra-fast charging in a compact form. With compatibility for laptops, tablets, and phones, it features USB-C Power Delivery and is highly portable, making it the perfect charger for travel or everyday use.

name: LG UltraGear 27GP950
description: The LG UltraGear 27GP950 is a 27-inch UHD gaming monitor featuring a Nano IPS display with 144Hz refresh rate (overclockable to 160Hz) and 1ms response time. Support for NVIDIA G-Sync and AMD FreeSync Premium Pro ensures smooth, tear-free visuals, making it the ultimate choice for competitive gamers.

name: Logitech MX Keys Mini
description: Logitech MX Keys Mini is a minimalist wireless keyboard engineered for creators. Backlit keys, customizable shortcuts, and multi-device pairing increase productivity. With USB-C quick charging and excellent tactility, it’s tailored for seamless typing on Windows, macOS, and mobile devices.

name: SteelSeries Arctis Nova Pro Wireless
description: SteelSeries Arctis Nova Pro Wireless delivers Hi-Fi audio with active noise cancellation and a 2.4GHz wireless connection. Its modular battery system allows swappable batteries for unlimited playtime, while a retractable microphone and customizable EQ provide clear communication and immersive gaming sound.

name: TP-Link Archer AX6000 Router
description: The TP-Link Archer AX6000 is a high-performance Wi-Fi 6 router, supporting speeds up to 6 Gbps. Its 8 antennas, strong security, and advanced parental controls ensure robust and secure whole-home coverage. Perfect for gaming, streaming, and smart home networking environments.

name: Yale Assure Lock SL Wi-Fi
description: Yale Assure Lock SL Wi-Fi is a slim, key-free deadbolt with built-in Wi-Fi, allowing remote locking and unlocking from anywhere. Program unique codes, monitor entry history, and integrate with Alexa or Google Assistant for convenient, secure home access control.

name: Seagate Expansion Desktop 8TB
description: The Seagate Expansion Desktop 8TB provides expansive and reliable storage for your data needs. With high-speed USB 3.0 connectivity and simple plug-and-play setup, it’s ideal for backups, media libraries, and seamless expansion of computer capacity.

name: Dyson V15 Detect
description: Dyson V15 Detect is a powerful cordless vacuum featuring a laser dust detection system. It reveals microscopic dust, automatically increases suction when needed, and provides up to 60 minutes of runtime. LCD screen displays real-time performance data for an ultra-thorough clean every time.

name: Acer Nitro 5
description: Acer Nitro 5 is a popular gaming laptop with Intel i7 or Ryzen 7 processors, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 30-series GPU, and a 144Hz FHD display. It boasts effective cooling, customizable RGB keyboard, and immersive DTS:X Ultra audio, delivering high-frame-rate gaming for all levels of gamers.

name: Netatmo Weather Station
description: The Netatmo Weather Station offers precise indoor and outdoor environmental monitoring, measuring temperature, humidity, CO2, and air quality. Connect wirelessly via app for detailed insights, alerts, and historical trends to optimize comfort and energy use in your home.

name: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold4
description: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold4 redefines multitasking with its foldable 7.6-inch AMOLED main display and robust hinge. Powered by Snapdragon 8+ Gen 1, it supports S Pen, has a triple camera setup, and offers split-screen multitasking for productivity. Premium build and water resistance round out the flagship features.

name: Corsair K95 RGB Platinum XT
description: The Corsair K95 RGB Platinum XT mechanical keyboard features Cherry MX switches, custom macro keys, and dynamic per-key RGB backlighting. Aluminum frame construction ensures durability, while plush wrist rest and dedicated media controls deliver an unparalleled gaming and work experience.

name: TCL 6-Series Roku TV
description: TCL 6-Series Roku TV combines QLED display technology, Mini-LED backlighting, and 4K HDR support for vibrant visuals and deep contrast. With the intuitive Roku OS, voice control, and a comprehensive range of streaming apps, it offers outstanding value and performance.

name: Oculus Quest 2
description: The Oculus Quest 2 is a wireless virtual reality headset with a high-resolution display and powerful Snapdragon XR2 processor. With motion tracking controllers and extensive game library, it delivers an immersive VR experience for gaming, fitness, and entertainment without the need for a PC.

name: Arlo Pro 4 Spotlight Camera
description: The Arlo Pro 4 Spotlight Camera offers 2K HDR video quality, color night vision, and wire-free setup, making it easy to protect your home. Integrated spotlight and siren deter intruders, while app notifications, 2-way audio, and smart alerts ensure you stay informed wherever you are.

name: Huawei Watch GT 3
description: Huawei Watch GT 3 blends classic aesthetics with advanced health tracking, including SpO2, sleep, heart rate, and over 100 fitness modes. Its AMOLED display and two-week battery life, plus built-in GPS and Bluetooth calling, make it a top choice for tech-savvy users and athletes.

name: Google Pixel Buds Pro
description: Google Pixel Buds Pro deliver premium sound with Active Noise Cancellation, wireless charging, and multipoint connectivity. Comfortable and sweat-resistant, they offer up to 11 hours of playtime and hands-free Google Assistant integration for effortless communication and control.

name: Western Digital Black SN850X SSD 2TB
description: The WD Black SN850X 2TB delivers up to 7,300MB/s read speed for gaming and creative workstations. PCIe Gen4 technology, advanced thermal management, and Game Mode 2.0 optimize performance for the most demanding applications and ensure reliability for years to come.

name: Sonos Roam Portable Speaker
description: Sonos Roam is a lightweight, battery-powered smart speaker providing rich, detailed sound at home and on the go. IP67-rated for waterproofing, it switches seamlessly between Wi-Fi and Bluetooth, integrates with voice assistants, and offers 10 hours of continuous playback.

name: D-Link DCS-6500LH Wi-Fi Camera
description: D-Link DCS-6500LH Wi-Fi Camera offers 1080p video, pan and tilt functionality, and night vision for comprehensive home monitoring. Real-time mobile alerts, two-way audio, and cloud recording support round out this budget-friendly, easy-to-install indoor security camera.

name: Xiaomi Mi Smart Band 7
description: Xiaomi Mi Smart Band 7 comes with a large AMOLED display, continuous SpO2 monitoring, over 110 fitness modes, and 14-day battery life. Water resistant up to 50 meters, it offers comprehensive health insights and seamless integration with Android and iOS devices.

name: Fujifilm Instax Mini Link 2
description: The Fujifilm Instax Mini Link 2 is a compact instant photo printer that connects wirelessly to smartphones via Bluetooth. Print credit-card-sized photos in seconds, personalize them with frames and doodles, and relive your memories with the fun, portable companion for parties and events.

name: Roku Voice Remote Pro
description: Roku Voice Remote Pro features hands-free voice controls, TV power/volume buttons, lost remote finder, and rechargeable battery. Compatible with most Roku players and TVs, it enhances your streaming experience, making channel navigation and content search even more convenient.

name: Amazfit Falcon
description: Amazfit Falcon is a rugged multisport GPS smartwatch with premium titanium build, 20ATM water resistance, and AI-powered training insights. Its bright AMOLED display and advanced biometric sensors offer health and fitness tracking for elite athletes, while offline maps ensure peak outdoor adventure performance.

name: Apple MacBook Pro 16” (M2 Pro)
description: The Apple MacBook Pro 16” (M2 Pro) is designed for professionals, featuring a stunning Liquid Retina XDR display, advanced thermal management, and a M2 Pro chip for unmatched speed. Long battery life, a six-speaker sound system, and versatile connectivity make it the creative powerhouse for demanding workflows.

name: Kobo Libra 2
description: Kobo Libra 2 offers a 7-inch glare-free E-Ink screen, adjustable ComfortLight PRO, and waterproof design. With 32GB storage, it supports multiple eBook formats and audiobook playback via Bluetooth, delivering a customizable and immersive reading experience anytime, anywhere.

name: Echo Dot with Clock (5th Gen)
description: The Echo Dot with Clock (5th Gen) is a compact smart speaker featuring an LED display for time and timers. It delivers improved audio quality, Alexa voice assistance, and integration with smart home devices. Its space-saving design enhances any desk or bedside table.

name: Kasa Smart Wi-Fi Plug Mini
description: The Kasa Smart Wi-Fi Plug Mini integrates seamlessly with Alexa, Google Assistant, and SmartThings, enabling remote scheduling and control of devices via app. Its compact size doesn’t block adjacent outlets, and energy monitoring helps you save power and automate your daily routines.

name: HP LaserJet MFP M234sdw
description: The HP LaserJet MFP M234sdw is a compact and efficient all-in-one monochrome laser printer. Offering fast two-sided printing, scanning, and copying with wireless connectivity, it suits home offices and small businesses seeking reliable, high-speed document workflows.

name: Samsung Galaxy Watch6 Classic
description: Samsung Galaxy Watch6 Classic features a rotating bezel, vibrant AMOLED display, and comprehensive health tracking, including ECG, blood pressure, and body composition. It offers Google Wear OS compatibility, contactless payments, and multi-day battery life, blending style with advanced functionality.

name: Energizer Ultimate Lithium AA Batteries (12-Pack)
description: Energizer Ultimate Lithium AA Batteries provide enduring power and leak resistance for high-drain electronics. Lighter than traditional batteries and performing in extreme temperatures, these are optimal for cameras, flashlights, and smart home devices. The 12-pack keeps your gear charged for months.

name: RavPower Solar Power Bank 25000mAh
description: RavPower Solar Power Bank 25000mAh combines a heavy-duty battery with solar charging, offering multiple device charging via USB and Type-C outputs. Built for outdoor use, it features rugged construction, an LED flashlight, and is water resistant, making it ideal for camping and emergencies.

name: Philips Sonicare DiamondClean 9900 Prestige
description: Philips Sonicare DiamondClean 9900 Prestige uses advanced sensors and AI to tailor brushing for optimal oral health. With five modes, Bluetooth app connectivity, and a luxurious glass charger, it ensures a premium and personalized dental hygiene experience every day.

name: SimpliSafe Wireless Home Security System
description: SimpliSafe Wireless Home Security System offers easy DIY installation, professional monitoring, and compatibility with Alexa and Google Assistant. The system includes sensors for entry, motion, and water leaks, plus a loud siren for home protection and peace of mind.

name: MSI PRO MP241X Monitor
description: The MSI PRO MP241X Monitor is a 24-inch FHD monitor designed for work and entertainment. With VA panel technology, anti-flicker, blue light reduction, and a fast response time, it offers comfortable viewing and reliable performance for everyday use.

name: Beats Studio Buds +
description: Beats Studio Buds + deliver exceptional sound with active noise cancelling, transparency mode, and up to 36 hours of play with case. Compatible with iOS and Android, they feature a secure fit, sweat resistance, and easy touch controls for music, calls, and voice assistants on the go.

name: Apple MacBook Pro 16-inch 2023
description: The Apple MacBook Pro 16-inch (2023) is a powerhouse in the laptop world, equipped with Apple's M2 Pro chip for industry-leading performance. It boasts a stunning 16.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR display with 3456x2234 resolution, providing vibrant colors and deep blacks—perfect for creative professionals. With its six-speaker sound system, up to 22-hour battery life, and an advanced thermal system for sustained performance, this device effortlessly handles heavy workloads such as video editing and 3D rendering in a sleek, all-aluminum chassis.

name: Samsung 980 PRO 2TB NVMe SSD
description: The Samsung 980 PRO 2TB NVMe SSD delivers blistering read and write speeds of up to 7000/5100 MB/s, making it ideal for gamers, enthusiasts, and professionals who demand high-performance storage. PCIe Gen4 technology ensures lightning-fast data transfers, while advanced heat control features provide reliability and longevity in demanding applications.

name: Epson EcoTank ET-3850 All-in-One Printer
description: The Epson EcoTank ET-3850 stands out with its cartridge-free printing solution, using refillable ink tanks for ultra-low running costs. It offers versatile print, scan, and copy functions, automatic document feeding, and wireless printing via smartphone or PC. Eco-conscious users appreciate its reduced waste, while families and small offices benefit from excellent print quality and reliability.

name: Valve Steam Deck 512GB
description: The Valve Steam Deck 512GB is a handheld gaming console designed for PC gamers on the move. Featuring a custom AMD APU, a gorgeous 7-inch touchscreen, and a massive 512GB NVMe SSD, it can run the latest AAA titles smoothly. Its ergonomic controls and open software platform ensure a versatile gaming experience anywhere, anytime.

name: Nest Cam (Battery)
description: The Nest Cam (Battery) delivers versatile, wire-free home security with 1080p HD video, night vision, and intelligent alerts. Easy to install indoors or outdoors, it integrates seamlessly with the Google Home app and provides up to three hours of event history stored locally. Two-way audio and weather-resistant design make it reliable for year-round surveillance.

name: Sennheiser Momentum True Wireless 3 Earbuds
description: Sennheiser’s Momentum True Wireless 3 earbuds provide world-class sound with adaptive noise cancellation and customizable touch controls. Featuring refined ergonomic design and IPX4 splash resistance, they are perfect for commuters, athletes, and audiophiles. The case offers fast charging and up to 28 hours of total playtime, ensuring music on the go.

name: ASUS ROG Swift PG32UQX 32-inch 4K Gaming Monitor
description: The ASUS ROG Swift PG32UQX is a pro-grade 32-inch gaming monitor featuring 4K UHD resolution, mini-LED technology with HDR1000, and a blazing-fast 144Hz refresh rate. Its NVIDIA G-SYNC Ultimate certification guarantees breathtaking visuals with no screen tearing, and adjustable stand ensures comfort for marathon gaming sessions or creative workflows.

name: Netatmo Weather Station for Smart Home
description: The Netatmo Weather Station provides real-time monitoring of indoor and outdoor temperature, humidity, air quality, and CO2 levels. It connects to your smartphone for detailed reports, alerts, and integration with smart home devices. Its elegant, minimalist design and reliable sensors make it invaluable for environmentally conscious users and home automation enthusiasts.

name: HP Envy 6055e All-in-One Printer
description: The HP Envy 6055e offers affordable, wireless printing, scanning, and copying in a compact form. With HP+ Smart features, mobile app integration, and automatic two-sided printing, it’s designed for families and students balancing schoolwork and home office tasks. Reliable performance and quiet operation make it a hassle-free addition to any workspace.

name: Razer Viper V2 Pro Wireless Gaming Mouse
description: Razer’s Viper V2 Pro is an ultra-lightweight wireless gaming mouse with a high-precision Focus Pro 30K optical sensor. It offers customizable buttons, long battery life, and Razer HyperSpeed wireless technology for lag-free gaming. Tuned for esports professionals, it’s the ultimate tool for those who demand speed and accuracy.

name: Samsung Odyssey G7 LC32G75TQSNXZA 32-inch Gaming Monitor
description: The Samsung Odyssey G7 32-inch gaming monitor brings immersive curves, QHD resolution, and a rapid 240Hz refresh rate to serious gamers. Its 1000R curved panel, quantum dot technology, and 1ms response time create smooth, vivid visuals for competitive play. G-SYNC and FreeSync Premium Pro support eliminate tearing, delivering flawless gaming.

name: Google Pixel 7a
description: The Google Pixel 7a balances affordability with flagship performance, powered by Google’s custom Tensor G2 chip. Its 6.1-inch OLED display, advanced camera features like Real Tone and Super Res Zoom, and all-day battery make it a compelling choice. Tight Android integration and timely security updates offer a reliable, smooth user experience.

name: Canon PIXMA TR8620a Wireless All-in-One Printer
description: The Canon PIXMA TR8620a is a versatile wireless printer that seamlessly handles printing, scanning, and faxing for home offices. Its intuitive 4.3-inch color touchscreen, automatic document feeder, and support for both wired and wireless connections ensure ease of use. High print quality and excellent connectivity make it a practical solution for remote work.

name: JBL Charge 5 Portable Bluetooth Speaker
description: JBL Charge 5 combines big audio performance with rugged durability. Delivering powerful bass, clear highs, and up to 20 hours of battery life, it’s built to entertain at the beach, by the pool, or on a picnic. Its IP67 waterproof/dustproof rating guarantees worry-free listening in any environment, while its power bank feature charges your devices on the go.

name: Seagate Expansion Desktop 8TB External Hard Drive
description: Seagate’s Expansion Desktop 8TB offers massive, plug-and-play storage for computers, consoles, or media centers. Reliable and fast via USB 3.0, it is perfect for backing up large files, game libraries, or multimedia collections. Designed for simplicity, it’s ideal for users needing huge, reliable capacity with minimal setup.

name: Kindle Scribe 10.2-inch E-Note
description: The Kindle Scribe combines a crisp 10.2-inch Paperwhite display with stylus support for note-taking, sketching, and reading in comfort. It’s perfect for students, writers, and professionals managing heavy reading and annotation workloads. The front light, adjustable warmth, and weeks-long battery elevate the e-reading and note-taking experience.

name: Philips Sonicare 9900 Prestige Electric Toothbrush
description: The Philips Sonicare 9900 Prestige Electric Toothbrush leverages SenseIQ technology and adaptive intensity modes to optimize your oral care. Pair with a smartphone app to track brushing habits, receive personalized coaching, and achieve deeper cleaning. Sleek, travel-friendly design and a premium charging case make it a must-have for maintaining perfect oral health on the move.

name: Apple MacBook Pro 16-inch
description: The Apple MacBook Pro 16-inch features the powerful M2 Pro chip, delivering extraordinary performance for professional creators. With a brilliant Liquid Retina XDR display, six-speaker sound system, and up to 96GB unified memory, it handles demanding workflows effortlessly. The all-day battery life and advanced thermal architecture make this laptop the ultimate portable powerhouse for video editing, software development, and more.

name: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra
description: The Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra redefines mobile innovation with its 200MP pro-grade camera, vivid Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, and Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor. Its 5000mAh battery supports all-day productivity and entertainment, while the S Pen adds creative versatility. The device is IP68 rated and boasts a sturdy Armor Aluminum frame, ensuring durability with cutting-edge features.

name: LG 77-inch OLED evo G3 TV
description: The LG 77-inch OLED evo G3 transforms the viewing experience with stunning 4K resolution, self-lit pixels for infinite contrast, and advanced a9 AI Processor Gen6. Its ultra-thin design complements any living space, while Dolby Vision and Dolby Atmos deliver cinema-quality visuals and sound. Gamers will appreciate the NVIDIA G-SYNC compatibility and 120Hz refresh rate.

name: Bose QuietComfort Ultra Earbuds
description: Bose QuietComfort Ultra Earbuds combine world-class noise cancellation with Spatial Audio for immersive listening. With customizable EQ, touch controls, and a secure fit, these earbuds suit any lifestyle. The IPX4 water resistance and 24-hour battery life (with case) make them ideal for workouts and travel, while Bluetooth 5.3 ensures seamless connectivity.

name: Fitbit Sense 2 Health Watch
description: Fitbit Sense 2 is the ultimate fitness and health smartwatch, offering advanced stress management tools, heart health tracking, and built-in GPS. Its sleek design houses a vibrant touchscreen and up to six days of battery life. Real-time ECG, SpO2 monitoring, and sleep analysis help users take charge of their overall wellness, all synced via the Fitbit app.

name: Nikon Z8 Full-Frame Mirrorless Camera
description: Nikon Z8 offers uncompromising image quality and speed for photographers and videographers alike. The 45.7MP stacked CMOS sensor and EXPEED 7 processor enable 20 fps continuous shooting and 8K UHD video recording. With 5-axis in-body stabilization and a weather-sealed magnesium alloy body, the Z8 is built for serious creators exploring new creative horizons.

name: DJI Air 3 Fly More Combo Drone
description: DJI Air 3 is the latest addition to DJI’s impressive drone lineup. It boasts a dual-camera system with wide-angle and telephoto lenses, 46-minute maximum flight time, and omnidirectional obstacle sensing for safe operation. The drone supports 4K HDR video and intelligent shooting modes, making it an essential tool for creative aerial photography.

name: Jabra Elite 10 True Wireless Earbuds
description: Jabra Elite 10 True Wireless Earbuds offer big sound in a compact form. Active noise cancellation, a customizable equalizer, and HearThrough technology let users control their environment. With a secure ergonomic fit and wireless charging case, these earbuds ensure comfort and convenience for calls, music, and workouts.

name: Asus ROG Strix Scar 18 Gaming Laptop
description: The Asus ROG Strix Scar 18 is a high-performance gaming laptop powered by Intel Core i9 processors and NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4090 graphics. Its 18-inch QHD display boasts a 240Hz refresh rate, and a customizable RGB keyboard delivers immersive gaming. Robust cooling keeps performance high even during marathons, while WiFi 6E ensures ultra-fast connectivity.

name: Kindle Scribe 10.2-inch E-Ink Tablet
description: Kindle Scribe combines the convenience of a premium e-reader with note-taking capabilities. Its 10.2-inch glare-free E-Ink display provides a paper-like experience, and the included stylus allows for handwritten notes in books or journals. With weeks-long battery life and adjustable warm light, it’s the perfect companion for readers and thinkers.

name: Shark IQ Robot Self-Empty XL Vacuum
description: Shark IQ Robot Self-Empty XL Vacuum is an intelligent cleaning solution with powerful suction and self-emptying base holding up to 45 days of dirt. Its mapping technology offers complete home coverage, while app and voice controls add convenience. The multi-surface brushroll and HEPA filter are ideal for homes with pets or allergies.

name: Logitech G Pro X Superlight 2 Mouse
description: The Logitech G Pro X Superlight 2 Mouse is a tournament-ready wireless mouse weighing just 60 grams. Its HERO 2 sensor delivers precise tracking, and the PTFE feet provide ultra-smooth gliding. Designed with esports professionals, it features customizable buttons and up to 70-hour battery life, perfect for competitive gaming.

name: Apple iPad Air (6th Generation)
description: Apple’s latest iPad Air (6th Generation) features the powerful M2 chip for seamless multitasking and creative work. Its 10.9-inch Liquid Retina display, Apple Pencil support, and ultrafast wireless connectivity ensure versatility for work and play. The ultra-thin profile and built-in Touch ID make it a convenient, secure device for everyday use.

name: OnePlus Pad Tablet
description: OnePlus Pad is a sleek Android tablet with an 11.6-inch 144Hz display, flagship Mediatek Dimensity 9000 chipset, and Dolby Vision support. Its lightweight design is perfect for portable productivity or entertainment. Quad speakers deliver immersive sound, while the large battery provides up to 12 hours of continuous use on a single charge.

name: iRobot Braava Jet m6 Robotic Mop
description: The iRobot Braava Jet m6 Robotic Mop uses precision jet spray and smart mapping to tackle sticky messes and kitchen grease. Its Wi-Fi connectivity allows scheduling via app or voice assistant, while the navigation system ensures thorough cleaning. Compatible with cleaning solutions for wooden floors, it’s perfect for busy households seeking convenience.

name: Apple Watch Ultra 2
description: Apple Watch Ultra 2 is engineered for adventure, durability, and exploration. It offers the brightest Apple display yet, customizable action button, advanced GPS, and water resistance up to 100 meters. With new trail running and diving features, precision health sensors, and long battery life, it’s the ultimate smartwatch for extreme sports and daily use.

name: TP-Link Tapo C500 Outdoor Security Camera
description: TP-Link Tapo C500 Outdoor Security Camera offers 360-degree pan and tilt, 2K QHD resolution, and night vision for reliable home surveillance. With motion tracking, two-way audio, and IP66 weatherproof rating, it's ideal for monitoring gardens, driveways, or entrances. Easy app setup and local/cloud storage complete the security package.

name: Tile Pro (2024) Bluetooth Tracker
description: Tile Pro (2024) is a compact Bluetooth tracker with up to 400-foot range, loud ring, and long-lasting replaceable battery. Attach it to keys, bags, or gadgets for quick, reliable item location through the Tile app. Seamless integration with smart assistants and crowd-sourced finding capabilities ensure you never lose important items again.

name: ViewSonic X100-4K+ Smart LED Projector
description: The ViewSonic X100-4K+ Smart LED Projector brings home cinema to life with 4K Ultra HD resolution, 2,900 lumens brightness, and cinematic color accuracy. Wireless streaming, smart voice control, and Harman Kardon speakers create an all-in-one powerful entertainment system. The projector’s quiet operation and flexible installation options make it easy to set up in any room.

name: Razer Basilisk V3 Pro Wireless Mouse
description: The Razer Basilisk V3 Pro Wireless Mouse is crafted for gamers who demand precision and speed. It features the Focus Pro 30K Optical Sensor, 11 programmable buttons, customizable Chroma RGB, and wireless charging capability. Its ergonomic design suits all grip styles, and the HyperScroll Tilt Wheel enhances both gaming and productivity.

name: Roborock S8 Pro Ultra Robot Vacuum & Mop
description: The Roborock S8 Pro Ultra Robot Vacuum & Mop is a fully automated cleaning solution. It features dual brushes, VibraRise mopping technology, and a self-cleaning dock for effortless floor care. Advanced mapping navigates complex layouts efficiently, while adaptive suction adjusts to carpet or hard floors, keeping homes spotless with minimal supervision.

name: OPPO Find X6 Pro 5G Smartphone
description: OPPO Find X6 Pro 5G blends flagship power with a high-end photography experience. Its triple-lens camera system, 6.82-inch AMOLED display with 120Hz refresh, and Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 chipset deliver smooth visuals and rapid performance. The 5000mAh battery supports super-fast charging, while the refined design ensures premium comfort in hand.

name: BenQ Mobiuz EX3210U Gaming Monitor
description: BenQ Mobiuz EX3210U is a 32-inch 4K gaming monitor with a blazing 144Hz refresh rate and 1ms response time. VESA DisplayHDR 600 and built-in treVolo speakers create immersive visuals and audio. HDMI 2.1 support maximizes next-gen console and PC performance, while Light Tuner and Black eQualizer enhance competitive gameplay.

name: Miele Triflex HX2 Pro Cordless Vacuum
description: Miele Triflex HX2 Pro is a cordless vacuum offering unrivaled flexibility and powerful cleaning. Its 3-in-1 design transforms for cleaning floors, upholstery, or tight spaces. HEPA filtration, a swappable battery, and a dustbin that’s easy to empty make this vacuum a premium choice for allergy-sensitive homes.

name: Dell XPS 15 (2024) Laptop
description: The Dell XPS 15 (2024) is a sleek ultrabook with 13th Gen Intel Core i7 processor, discrete NVIDIA RTX 4060 graphics, and a stunning 3.5K OLED display. Precision machined from aluminum and carbon fiber, it offers premium performance and portability for creative professionals, business users, and everyday multitaskers.

name: DJI OM 6 Smartphone Gimbal
description: DJI OM 6 is a compact stabilizer for smartphones, making smooth, cinematic video easy. Its ergonomic handle, magnetic clamp, and advanced stabilization eliminate shaky footage, while gesture control and creative shooting modes add professional flair. With up to 6.5 hours of battery life, it’s perfect for content creators on the move.

name: Bosch Serie 8 Home Connect Oven
description: Bosch Serie 8 Home Connect Oven integrates advanced cooking technology with smart home connectivity. Its large touchscreen, automated recipes, and precise temperature control ensure perfect results every time. Wi-Fi enables remote monitoring and status updates. Sleek design and self-cleaning features make it a standout kitchen upgrade.

name: Sony PlayStation 5 Console (Disc Edition)
description: The Sony PlayStation 5 Console (Disc Edition) brings next-generation gaming with blazing-fast SSD, ray tracing graphics, and haptic feedback in the DualSense controller. Exclusive games, immersive 4K visuals, and backward compatibility ensure endless entertainment. The PS5’s futuristic design and robust ecosystem elevate gameplay to new heights.

name: Amazfit Balance Smartwatch
description: Amazfit Balance Smartwatch offers comprehensive health tracking, including stress level, sleep score, SpO2, and fitness metrics. With Alexa built-in, offline maps, and a high-resolution AMOLED display, it’s suited for both workouts and daily life. The slim metal frame and over two weeks of battery life make it a value-packed competitor in its class.

name: Lenovo Yoga 9i 2-in-1 Laptop
description: Lenovo Yoga 9i is a premium 2-in-1 laptop featuring a 14-inch OLED touchscreen, Intel Core i7 Evo processor, and 360-degree hinge. Its rotating sound bar with Bowers & Wilkins speakers provides superb audio, and all-day battery life makes it a versatile partner for productivity, drawing, or streaming.

name: Alienware AW3423DWF QD-OLED Gaming Monitor
description: Alienware's AW3423DWF features a curved 34-inch QD-OLED display for breathtaking color accuracy and true blacks. The 165Hz refresh rate, NVIDIA G-SYNC compatibility, and fast response times make it a dream display for gamers and digital artists. The ultra-thin profile and customizable AlienFX RGB lighting make it an attractive focal point for any gaming setup.

name: Amazon Echo Show 15 Smart Display
description: Amazon Echo Show 15 is a large, wall-mountable smart display designed as a family organization and entertainment hub. Featuring Alexa, widgets for calendars and to-do lists, video calling, and streaming apps, it's the heart of the smart home. The customizable home screen, Full HD visuals, and slim design suit kitchens, living rooms, or entryways.

name: Canon imageCLASS MF655Cdw Color Laser Printer
description: The Canon imageCLASS MF655Cdw is a compact, powerful color laser printer ideal for home offices or small businesses. It prints, scans, copies, and faxes at high speeds, with a 5-inch color touch panel and WiFi connectivity. The printer delivers professional-quality prints, automatic two-sided printing, and robust security features for confidential documents.

name: Sennheiser Momentum 4 Wireless Headphones
description: Sennheiser Momentum 4 Wireless Headphones offer studio-grade sound and advanced adaptive noise cancellation. The headphones feature touch controls, plush ear cushions, 60 hours of battery life, and Bluetooth 5.2 connectivity for daily comfort and convenience. Their premium build quality and customizable EQ provide an exceptional listening experience for any music lover.

name: Google Pixel Fold
description: Google Pixel Fold brings flexibility with a 7.6-inch OLED main display that folds for portability. It boasts a top-tier camera system, pure Android experience, and Tensor G2 chip for fast, efficient processing. Features like multitasking, robust hinge design, and waterproofing make this device stand out among foldables.

name: Breville Smart Oven Air Fryer Pro
description: The Breville Smart Oven Air Fryer Pro is an indispensable kitchen device that combines 13 cooking functions, including air fry, roast, bake, and dehydrate. Its Element IQ system ensures precise heat control, and the large interior can fit a 14-pound turkey. The sleek LCD display, stainless steel construction, and easy-to-clean surfaces make meal prep effortless.

name: HyperX Alloy Origins 60 Mechanical Keyboard
description: The HyperX Alloy Origins 60 is a compact, 60% mechanical keyboard with HyperX Red linear switches, customizable RGB lighting, and a durable aluminum body. Designed for portability and comfort, it's perfect for gamers or professionals who want performance in a minimalist form. The detachable USB-C cable makes setup fast and convenient.

name: TCL 65-inch Q7 QLED 4K TV
description: TCL’s 65-inch Q7 QLED 4K TV boasts ultra-bright quantum dot color, 120Hz Motion Rate, and Google TV for unified streaming. The TV features HDMI 2.1 for high-performance gaming, Dolby Vision/Atmos for cinematic sound and picture, and a sleek bezel-less frame to elevate home entertainment spaces.

name: Beats Fit Pro True Wireless Earbuds
description: Beats Fit Pro True Wireless Earbuds offer secure-fit wing tips, Active Noise Cancellation, and spatial audio. Compatible with iOS and Android, they deliver punchy sound and hands-free Siri integration. With fast charging, sweat and water resistance, and pocket-sized portability, they’re a top choice for workouts or commuting.

name: Hisense U8N 75-inch ULED Mini-LED TV
description: Hisense U8N 75-inch ULED Mini-LED TV brings ultra-bright HDR, sharp 4K visuals, and a 144Hz gaming-ready panel. With Google TV and Alexa built-in, users enjoy seamless content navigation. Anti-glare coating and advanced local dimming create immersive movie nights and smooth gaming in any setting.

name: Kobo Libra 2 E-Reader
description: Kobo Libra 2 E-Reader features a 7-inch glare-free E Ink Carta display, adjustable brightness and temperature, and waterproof build. With 32GB storage and Bluetooth support for audiobooks, it’s optimized for both reading and listening. The ergonomic design and customizable page buttons enhance comfort during hours of immersive reading.

name: Epson EcoTank ET-4850 Wireless All-in-One Printer
description: The Epson EcoTank ET-4850 is a wireless all-in-one printer designed to minimize costs with its easy-to-refill, high-capacity ink tanks. It prints, scans, and copies efficiently, features a touchscreen for intuitive navigation, and offers mobile printing support. The compact design and eco-friendly operation are perfect for home offices and families.

name: Vizio Elevate 5.1.4 Soundbar
description: Vizio Elevate 5.1.4 Soundbar features Dolby Atmos and DTS:X with rotating speakers for 360-degree sound. The package includes a wireless subwoofer and rear speakers for cinematic audio. Bluetooth and HDMI eARC connectivity allow seamless integration, making it a stellar upgrade for any living room entertainment system.

name: Xiaomi 13 Ultra Smartphone
description: Xiaomi 13 Ultra exemplifies flagship performance with a Leica-tuned quad camera, Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 chip, and a 6.73-inch AMOLED 120Hz display. Fast wireless charging, robust battery life, and IP68-certified design ensure reliability. Android 13 offers cutting-edge software and integration with the Xiaomi ecosystem.

name: Razer BlackShark V2 Pro Wireless Headset
description: The Razer BlackShark V2 Pro Wireless Headset delivers top-tier sound with THX Spatial Audio, breathable memory foam cushions, and a detachable microphone. The 70-hour battery life, lag-free wireless connection, and lightweight form make it ideal for competitive gamers seeking both comfort and clarity.

name: Wacom Cintiq Pro 24 Pen Display
description: The Wacom Cintiq Pro 24 Pen Display is a must-have for digital artists, animators, and designers. Its 24-inch 4K touchscreen features 98% Adobe RGB color coverage and is compatible with the Pro Pen 2 for unrivaled pressure sensitivity. Multiple stand options, express keys, and connectivity ports support versatile creative setups.

name: Samsung Tab S9 Ultra
description: Samsung Tab S9 Ultra boasts a vivid 14.6-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 chip, S Pen support, and IP68 water resistance. With DeX productivity modes, quad speakers, and an ultra-slim build, this Android tablet excels in creative, business, or entertainment roles.

name: LG Gram 17 (2024) Ultralight Laptop
description: The LG Gram 17 is one of the lightest 17-inch laptops available, featuring a 13th Gen Intel Core CPU, bright WQXGA display, and military-grade durability. Its massive battery runs up to 20 hours on a single charge, while Thunderbolt 4 connectivity and a slim magnesium alloy chassis make it a top pick for travel-savvy professionals.

name: Philips 3200 Series LatteGo Espresso Machine
description: The Philips 3200 Series LatteGo Espresso Machine simplifies home coffee with one-touch functionality for espresso, cappuccino, latte, and more. Its ceramic grinders ensure pure flavor, while the LatteGo milk system delivers creamy froth. The intuitive display, dishwasher-safe parts, and quick cleaning process make café-style drinks accessible to everyone.

name: HP Color LaserJet Pro MFP M479fdw
description: HP Color LaserJet Pro MFP M479fdw is a fast, secure, wireless all-in-one laser printer designed for offices. It prints, scans, copies, and faxes with high resolution and automatic duplex. The large touchscreen, robust security features, and wireless/mobile print functions streamline productivity for teams and remote workers.

name: Aqara Smart Door Lock U100
description: Aqara Smart Door Lock U100 offers advanced biometric, keypad, and Apple HomeKey access. Its high-security build resists tampering, while app integration provides remote lock/unlock, usage logs, and guest codes. The long-lasting battery and modern design are perfect for future-proofing home entrances.

name: Sony Xperia 1 V Smartphone
description: Sony Xperia 1 V stands out with a 21:9 4K OLED display, BIONZ XR image processing, and professional-grade triple cameras. It’s engineered for creators, with manual controls, 4K HDR video, and fast Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 power. 5G connectivity and water-resistant construction ensure it excels in every environment.

name: Garmin Edge 1040 Solar GPS Bike Computer
description: Garmin Edge 1040 Solar is a GPS cycling computer that harnesses solar energy to extend ride time. It features real-time performance analytics, mapping, and navigation.
