The detachable magnetic wrist rest and aluminum frame enhance comfort and durability, making it a favorite among pro-level gamers seeking portability and top-tier responsiveness.

name: Honeywell Home T9 Smart Thermostat
description: The Honeywell Home T9 Smart Thermostat features intelligent room sensors that prioritize comfort in multiple rooms. It supports Alexa and Google Assistant voice control, learning your schedule to optimize heating and cooling. Geofencing lets the thermostat adjust based on your location, and the vivid touchscreen interface is user-friendly. The T9’s energy saving technology makes it an excellent addition to any modern smart home.

name: Amazon Echo Show 8 (2nd Gen)
description: The Amazon Echo Show 8 (2nd Gen) blends an 8-inch HD touchscreen, powerful speakers, and a 13MP camera for Alexa-enabled video calls, recipes, and smart home controls. With adaptive color display and stereo sound, it’s perfect for kitchens, bedrooms, or offices. The device’s privacy shutter, adjustable stand, and integration with compatible cameras and apps make it a versatile and secure hub for your connected home.

name: Corsair HX1000i Platinum Power Supply
description: The Corsair HX1000i Platinum is a 1000-watt fully modular power supply engineered for high-end gaming and workstation PCs. It features premium capacitors, a silent Zero RPM fan mode, and 80 PLUS Platinum efficiency for reliable and quiet operation. The modular cables ensure a clean build and easy upgrades, while Corsair’s digital Link compatibility provides real-time monitoring. This PSU is designed for enthusiasts who demand stability and performance.

name: Lenovo Yoga 9i (14-inch) Gen 8
description: The Lenovo Yoga 9i Gen 8 is a premium 2-in-1 convertible laptop with a 14-inch 4K OLED touchscreen. Intel Core i7 processors, 16GB RAM, and a fast SSD make it both powerful and portable. Its unique rotating sound bar delivers immersive audio, and the all-metal chassis offers style and durability. The included stylus and flexible hinge allow for seamless switching between laptop and tablet modes, catering to productivity and creativity.

name: Creative Pebble V3 Desktop Speakers
description: Creative Pebble V3 offers impressive audio enhancement for desktop setups. With USB-C connectivity and built-in Bluetooth 5.0, it provides easy pairing and cable-free listening. The 2.25-inch drivers, angled for clarity, deliver rich sound despite their compact size. An easy-access volume control and understated design make these speakers a popular choice for minimalist workspaces needing reliable, clear audio without occupying much space.

name: Whirlpool WTW8127LC Top Load Washer
description: The Whirlpool WTW8127LC is a premium top-load washer with a 5.3 cu. ft. drum, 2-in-1 removable agitator, and intuitive touch controls. Its Load & Go dispenser holds detergent for up to 20 loads, while powerful washing actions ensure thorough cleaning. This smart washer connects to WiFi for remote start and laundry notifications via app, making it both efficient and convenient for busy households.

name: Withings Sleep Tracking Mat
description: The Withings Sleep Tracking Mat is an unobtrusive sleep monitor that slides under your mattress and tracks sleep cycles, heart rate, snoring, and breathing disturbances. It connects via WiFi to the Health Mate app, providing detailed sleep analysis and personalized tips. The device also features IFTTT integration, enabling advanced automation for smart home routines triggered by your sleep activity. No wearables necessary—just simple, accurate insights.

name: Acer Predator X38 37.5" Curved Gaming Monitor
description: The Acer Predator X38 is a 37.5-inch ultrawide curved gaming monitor with a 175Hz refresh rate and NVIDIA G-Sync Ultimate support. Its IPS panel produces vivid colors and ensures wide viewing angles, while the immersive curvature enhances gameplay. The monitor features built-in speakers, RGB lighting accents, and an ergonomic stand. It's designed for serious gamers who demand top performance and stunning visuals in every match.

name: Panasonic Lumix DC-S5II Mirrorless Camera
description: The Panasonic Lumix DC-S5II is a compact full-frame mirrorless camera that's perfect for hybrid shooters. Offering a 24.2MP sensor, phase-detect autofocus, and 6K video capabilities, it excels in both photography and videography. Its rugged weather-sealed body, vari-angle touchscreen, and real-time LUT support make it an agile and creative tool for content creators. Dual native ISO ensures low-noise performance even in challenging lighting.

name: Bose QuietComfort 45 Wireless Headphones
description: The Bose QuietComfort 45 Wireless Headphones provide an unparalleled listening experience with world-class noise cancellation and high-fidelity audio. Their lightweight comfort and advanced microphones ensure clear calls, making them the perfect companion for work and travel. Long-lasting battery life and easy Bluetooth connectivity make these headphones user-friendly for anyone seeking premium audio quality.

name: Apple MacBook Pro 14-inch (M2 Pro)
description: Apple’s MacBook Pro 14-inch featuring the M2 Pro chip excels in performance and battery life. Its Liquid Retina XDR display, 1080p FaceTime HD camera, and extensive port selection deliver professional-grade productivity. With a sleek aluminum chassis, robust security features, and macOS Ventura, this laptop suits creative professionals and developers seeking top-tier performance.

name: Sony Bravia XR A80K OLED TV (55-inch)
description: Experience lifelike picture quality with the Sony Bravia XR A80K OLED TV. Its XR Cognitive Processor delivers stunning 4K clarity and enhanced contrast. Immersive audio, smooth motion handling, and a slim, modern design round out this TV’s exceptional entertainment features. Google TV integration makes streaming and voice navigation seamless.

name: Fitbit Versa 4 Smartwatch
description: Stay on track with your health and fitness goals using the Fitbit Versa 4 Smartwatch. Monitor heart rate, sleep, and activity levels, while enjoying built-in GPS, voice assistant support, and smartphone notifications. Its lightweight design, long battery life, and customizable watch faces make it a perfect companion for daily wear and workouts.

name: ASUS ROG Strix G16 Gaming Laptop
description: The ASUS ROG Strix G16 Gaming Laptop offers high-octane gaming with its 13th Gen Intel i7 processor and NVIDIA RTX 4070 GPU. Enjoy lightning-fast frame rates on the 165Hz FHD display, while advanced cooling and customizable RGB lighting provide both performance and flair for any gamer.

name: Canon imageCLASS MF455dw All-in-One Printer
description: The Canon imageCLASS MF455dw All-in-One Printer streamlines office workflow with high-speed duplex printing, scanning, and copying. Its intuitive touchscreen, robust security features, and large paper capacity make it perfect for small businesses or home offices seeking professional-quality documentation.

name: Garmin Forerunner 255 GPS Running Watch
description: Achieve fitness goals with the Garmin Forerunner 255 GPS Running Watch. Built-in training plans, advanced heart rate monitoring, and up to 14 days of battery life allow athletes to track progress efficiently. With music storage, contactless payments, and rugged design, it is engineered for runners of all levels.

name: LG UltraFine 27MD5KL-B 5K Monitor
description: The LG UltraFine 27MD5KL-B 5K Monitor provides breathtaking clarity and accurate color for creative professionals. Its Thunderbolt 3 connectivity enables seamless laptop integration, while multiple USB ports add convenience. An adjustable stand and built-in speakers make this monitor a top choice for video and photo editing.

name: Razer BlackWidow V4 Pro Mechanical Gaming Keyboard
description: Engineered for gamers, the Razer BlackWidow V4 Pro Mechanical Gaming Keyboard features customizable RGB backlighting, durable mechanical switches, and dedicated macro keys. Its ergonomic wrist rest and advanced software customization set it apart for competitive play and seamless typing.

name: TP-Link Deco X55 Mesh WiFi System
description: Eliminate dead zones with the TP-Link Deco X55 Mesh WiFi System, which delivers seamless whole-home coverage and strong performance for multiple devices. Easy app-based setup, strong security protocols, and support for speeds up to 3 Gbps make it an essential upgrade for any modern household.

name: Samsung Odyssey G7 32-Inch Curved Gaming Monitor
description: The Samsung Odyssey G7 Curved Gaming Monitor offers an immersive experience with its 32-inch QHD display, 240Hz refresh rate, and 1ms response time. Quantum Dot technology and HDR600 support bring visuals to life, while ergonomic adjustments and multiple ports ensure versatile connectivity.

name: Corsair RM850x Power Supply
description: The Corsair RM850x Power Supply ensures stable, quiet, and efficient power delivery for high-end PCs. Its fully modular cabling, 80 PLUS Gold certification, and durable build make it popular among custom builders and overclockers. Reliability and silent operation are its hallmarks.

name: Dyson V15 Detect Cordless Vacuum Cleaner
description: The Dyson V15 Detect Cordless Vacuum Cleaner enhances cleaning precision with laser dust detection and intelligent suction adjustment. Its lightweight, cordless design, powerful motor, and HEPA filtration make it ideal for thoroughly cleaning carpets, hard floors, and upholstery.

name: Brother DS-940DW Wireless Mobile Scanner
description: Scan documents on the go with the compact Brother DS-940DW Wireless Mobile Scanner. It offers double-sided scanning, wireless connectivity, and built-in rechargeable battery. Efficient and portable, it’s ideal for business professionals who need digital document management from anywhere.

name: Shure SM7B Dynamic Vocal Microphone
description: Renowned for its warm and rich sound, the Shure SM7B Dynamic Vocal Microphone is a staple in recording studios and podcast setups. Its cardioid pattern, internal air suspension, and versatile applications make it an industry favorite for vocals and speech.

name: BenQ PD3220U 32" 4K Designer Monitor
description: The BenQ PD3220U Designer Monitor offers a 32-inch 4K UHD display with superior color accuracy for professionals in creative fields. Thunderbolt 3 connectivity, ergonomic stand, and specialized viewing modes ensure precise editing and comfortable use over long hours.

name: Samsung Jet Bot AI+ Robot Vacuum
description: The Samsung Jet Bot AI+ Robot Vacuum uses advanced object recognition and LiDAR navigation to clean smarter and more effectively. With automatic emptying and powerful suction, it handles various floor types and pet hair efficiently. Smart home connectivity enables remote control from any location.

name: Bose Soundbar 700
description: Elevate home theater audio with the Bose Soundbar 700. Its immersive sound, built-in Alexa and Google Assistant, and sleek design complement any living space. AdaptIQ audio calibration and Wi-Fi music streaming make it the flagship soundbar for discerning listeners.

name: Logitech MX Keys Advanced Wireless Keyboard
description: The Logitech MX Keys Advanced Wireless Keyboard combines tactile comfort with smart backlit keys, making it ideal for productivity. Multi-device pairing, USB-C charging, and a solid build ensure reliability, while its minimalist design complements any workspace.

name: LG C3 55" OLED evo 4K Smart TV
description: The LG C3 OLED evo 4K Smart TV delivers brilliant picture quality with true blacks, vibrant colors, and self-lit OLED pixels. Featuring the α9 Gen6 AI Processor, Dolby Vision, and Dolby Atmos, it transforms any living room into a cinematic experience. With built-in smart features, including webOS, voice control, and compatibility with major streaming apps, this TV is perfect for entertainment enthusiasts seeking both sophistication and performance in a slim, elegant design.

name: Samsung QN90C Neo QLED 4K TV
description: The Samsung QN90C Neo QLED 4K TV stands at the forefront of home entertainment with its cutting-edge Quantum Mini LED technology, delivering exceptional brightness and deep blacks. The 55-inch screen supports 4K Ultra HD resolution, providing sharpness and clarity in every scene. With features like Quantum HDR 32X, Anti-Glare panel, Dolby Atmos sound, and an intuitive Tizen-powered smart platform, this TV is perfect for movie lovers and gamers alike. Its ultra-slim design also enhances any living space, offering stunning views from every angle.

name: Anker PowerCore 26800
description: The Anker PowerCore 26800 is a high-capacity portable charger designed for charging multiple devices on the go. With 26,800mAh capacity and three USB output ports, it can charge smartphones, tablets, and other electronics multiple times before needing a recharge itself. Advanced PowerIQ and VoltageBoost technologies ensure safe and efficient charging at the maximum possible speed. The compact yet sturdy design makes it an essential travel companion for students, travelers, and business professionals.

name: JBL Charge 5 Bluetooth Speaker
description: The JBL Charge 5 Bluetooth Speaker combines powerful audio performance with impressive battery life and rugged durability. It features JBL's signature Pro Sound with an optimized long-excursion driver and separate tweeter, delivering immersive sound and deep bass. With up to 20 hours of playtime, IP67 water and dust resistance, and a built-in power bank for charging devices, it's perfect for parties, outdoor adventures, and everyday use. Its compact, modern design fits any setting.

name: Roku Ultra 4K Streaming Player
description: The Roku Ultra 4K Streaming Player offers a premium entertainment experience with support for 4K, Dolby Vision, HDR10+, and Dolby Atmos. Its powerful quad-core processor ensures responsive navigation, while the included voice remote with lost remote finder and private listening makes operation easy. Dual-band Wi-Fi and Ethernet provide connections stable enough for the highest-quality content available from all major streaming platforms. USB and microSD slots allow for additional media playback and expanded storage.

name: Nvidia GeForce RTX 4070 Ti
description: The Nvidia GeForce RTX 4070 Ti is a top-tier graphics card built for gamers and creators demanding rapid, high-performance rendering. It features advanced ray tracing, AI-powered DLSS 3, and massive VRAM to easily handle 4K gaming, content creation, and AI workloads. High efficiency, quiet thermal designs, and robust driver support make it a plug-and-play upgrade for any powerful desktop build. It's perfect for gamers seeking maximum visual fidelity and smooth frame rates.

name: LG Gram 17
description: The LG Gram 17 is an ultra-lightweight laptop designed for those who need productivity on the go without compromise. With a massive 17-inch WQXGA (2560x1600) display, 13th Gen Intel Core processors, and all-day battery life, it handles everything from creative projects to spreadsheets. Its magnesium alloy construction keeps it under 3 pounds, while Thunderbolt 4 and ample storage ensure you have the performance and flexibility to work anywhere.

name: Dell UltraSharp U2723QE 4K Monitor
description: The Dell UltraSharp U2723QE is a 27-inch 4K monitor tailored for professionals. It features an IPS Black panel for superior color accuracy and contrast, making it perfect for creative work, spreadsheets, or multitasking. With extensive connectivity including USB-C (up to 90W power delivery), DisplayPort, HDMI, and a built-in USB hub, it streamlines your workspace. A fully adjustable stand and ComfortView Plus technology reduce eye strain for comfortable extended use.

name: Instant Pot Duo Crisp with Air Fryer
description: The Instant Pot Duo Crisp with Air Fryer combines the versatility of a pressure cooker and the finishing power of an air fryer in one compact device. With 11 smart cooking functions—including sauté, steam, slow cook, bake, and dehydrate—it replaces multiple kitchen gadgets. The intuitive control panel makes meal prep easy and efficient for busy families. Dishwasher-safe accessories and safety features add to its convenience and value for home cooks at any skill level.

name: Marantz M-CR612 Network CD Receiver
description: The Marantz M-CR612 Network CD Receiver is an elegant, compact audio system with exceptional sound quality. It plays CDs, AM/FM radio, and supports streaming via Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, AirPlay 2, and Spotify Connect. Its powerful amplification and ability to connect to two speaker pairs make it suitable for any room. Smart features include HEOS multi-room support and Alexa voice compatibility, providing a seamless and immersive home listening experience.

name: Oculus Quest 2 (128GB)
description: The Oculus Quest 2 (128GB) is a standalone VR headset offering immersive virtual reality experiences without the need for a PC or console. Its high-res display, intuitive controllers, and wide game library make it accessible and fun for all ages. With built-in speakers, wireless gameplay, and comfortable ergonomics, the Quest 2 excels in entertainment, education, and fitness. It supports hand tracking, multiplayer gaming, and social VR apps, opening up a world of cutting-edge interactive possibilities.

name: Miele Classic C1 Pure Suction Canister Vacuum
description: The Miele Classic C1 Pure Suction Canister Vacuum delivers superior cleaning with strong suction and a lightweight, maneuverable design. Precision German engineering, an AirClean filtration system, and adjustable suction settings make it ideal for hard floors and low-pile carpets. The included combination floorhead, dusting brush, upholstery tool, and crevice nozzle provide versatile cleaning options throughout the home. Its compact, quiet operation ensures a pleasant and effective cleaning experience.

name: Sony XAV-AX6000 Digital Media Receiver
description: The Sony XAV-AX6000 Digital Media Receiver brings modern technology to your commute with a vibrant 6.95-inch touchscreen and seamless support for Apple CarPlay and Android Auto. It features high-resolution audio, a responsive interface, multiple camera inputs, and wireless connection options. The sleek design fits most vehicles and provides excellent sound quality, making every drive more enjoyable and connected. Expandability options ensure compatibility with advanced sound systems and safety accessories.

name: Eufy Security Floodlight Cam 2 Pro
description: The Eufy Security Floodlight Cam 2 Pro combines 360-degree pan-and-tilt camera coverage with powerful 3000-lumen LED floodlights for comprehensive home monitoring. Its 2K resolution, color night vision, and AI-powered human detection ensure accurate alerts day and night. The camera offers local storage without monthly fees, customizable light schedules, and integration with Alexa and Google Assistant. Weather-resistant construction ensures dependable performance year-round, making it the ideal choice for outdoor security.

name: Moza Mini-MI Smartphone Gimbal
description: The Moza Mini-MI Smartphone Gimbal is a portable stabilization device that transforms smartphone videos and photos into smooth, cinematic content. Its brushless motors, multiple follow modes, and wireless charging capability make it easy to capture dynamic shots on the fly. Intuitive controls and an ergonomic grip let you create professional-quality footage anywhere, while the lightweight, foldable design fits easily in a backpack for travel or daily use.

name: Netgear Nighthawk M6 Pro Mobile Hotspot
description: The Netgear Nighthawk M6 Pro Mobile Hotspot offers high-speed, 5G WiFi for work and travel anywhere. Supporting up to 32 simultaneous device connections, it features a robust battery and advanced security. Its 2.8-inch touchscreen provides intuitive controls, while Ethernet and USB-C ports allow for versatile connectivity. This compact hotspot ensures you stay productive and connected on-the-go, whether for business trips, camping, or keeping your smart devices online at home.

name: Cuisinart TOA-60 Air Fryer Toaster Oven
description: The Cuisinart TOA-60 Air Fryer Toaster Oven brings multifunctional cooking to your kitchen countertop, offering air frying, baking, convection broiling, and toasting in a single appliance. With a spacious interior, adjustable thermostat, and easy-to-use controls, it simplifies meal preparation for busy families. The stainless-steel construction is durable and easy to clean, while built-in safety features add reassurance. It’s the perfect addition for anyone looking to eat healthier without sacrificing flavor.

name: Bowers & Wilkins Zeppelin Wireless Speaker
description: The Bowers & Wilkins Zeppelin Wireless Speaker is a statement piece that marries striking design with world-class acoustics. It supports Bluetooth, AirPlay 2, and Spotify Connect for seamless streaming, while its custom drivers and high-quality amplification deliver punchy bass and crystal-clear highs. The intuitive app provides deep customization and multi-room capability. Its elegant silhouette fits both modern and classic interiors, making it as much a visual centerpiece as an audio one.

name: LG OLED C2 Smart TV
description: The LG OLED C2 Smart TV brings cinematic visuals directly into your home with its self-lit OLED technology that offers perfect blacks, infinite contrast, and extraordinary color accuracy. Designed with a sleek, slim profile, this 4K television supports Dolby Vision IQ and Dolby Atmos for an immersive audio-visual experience. Powered by the α9 Gen 5 AI Processor, it enhances image quality and scales content beautifully. The webOS platform makes it easy to access streaming services, while built-in voice assistants enable hands-free control, making it the centerpiece of any modern living room.

name: ASUS ROG Swift PG279QM
description: The ASUS ROG Swift PG279QM is a 27-inch QHD gaming monitor designed for competitive gamers. Featuring a blazing 240Hz refresh rate and 1ms response time, it ensures ultra-smooth visuals and minimal motion blur during fast-paced action. G-SYNC technology minimizes screen tearing for immersive gameplay, while the IPS panel delivers wide viewing angles and vibrant colors. Customizable lighting and ergonomic adjustability allow for comfortable, personalized setups. With multiple connectivity options, the ROG Swift PG279QM is the ultimate display for those seeking top-tier performance in their gaming experience.

name: Lenovo Yoga 9i (14” Gen 7)
description: Lenovo Yoga 9i (14” Gen 7) is a premium convertible laptop offering flexibility for creators, professionals, and students. It features a 14-inch 4K OLED touchscreen that rotates 360 degrees, facilitating use in laptop, tent, stand, or tablet modes. Powered by Intel’s 12th Gen Core i7 processors, it balances performance and efficiency, while the Dolby Atmos rotating soundbar delivers impressive audio clarity. All-day battery life, stylus support, and robust build quality make the Yoga 9i perfect for users who value innovation and versatility in mobile computing.

name: Netgear Orbi AX6000 (RBK852)
description: The Netgear Orbi AX6000 (RBK852) is a high-speed tri-band Wi-Fi 6 mesh system designed to provide expansive wireless coverage and lightning-fast internet throughout large homes. With support for over 100 connected devices, the Orbi delivers up to 6 Gbps of combined Wi-Fi speeds. Advanced security features, including Netgear Armor, protect your devices from cyber threats. The sleek modular design allows for easy expansion and seamless roaming between rooms, ensuring stable connectivity in every corner and eliminating dead zones.

name: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4080
description: The NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4080 is an advanced graphics card tailored for PC gamers and content creators who desire remarkable gaming and rendering performance. Built on the Ada Lovelace architecture, it features 16GB of GDDR6X memory, real-time ray tracing, and DLSS 3 for ultra-smooth visuals. This card supports the latest gaming technologies, ensuring high frame rates in 4K resolution and immersive virtual reality experiences. Its efficient cooling system and robust software make the RTX 4080 a top choice for next-gen gaming setups and heavy-duty creative workloads.

name: Sonos Move
description: The Sonos Move is a portable smart speaker built for versatile, high-quality sound indoors and out. With Wi-Fi and Bluetooth connectivity, it delivers rich, room-filling audio and seamless integration with popular streaming services and voice assistants. The weather-resistant design, shockproof housing, and up to 11 hours of battery life make it perfect for backyard gatherings or adventures. Auto Trueplay tuning adapts sound to your environment, guaranteeing immersive listening anywhere. The Sonos Move redefines portable speaker performance with sophistication and convenience.

name: Samsung Odyssey G9 Neo
description: The Samsung Odyssey G9 Neo is an immersive 49-inch curved gaming monitor with a Quantum Mini LED panel that enables exceptional brightness, color, and contrast. Boasting a 240Hz refresh rate, 1ms response time, and NVIDIA G-SYNC support, it caters to the most demanding gamers. The ultra-wide 32:9 aspect ratio provides expansive multitasking for creative professionals. Customizable RGB lighting and robust build quality ensure this monitor stands out in any gaming setup. Odyssey G9 Neo promises a seamless blend of performance and aesthetics for the ultimate display experience.

name: Razer Viper Ultimate Hyperspeed
description: Razer Viper Ultimate Hyperspeed is an elite wireless gaming mouse engineered for competitive esports. Equipped with the Focus+ Optical Sensor and Razer HyperSpeed wireless technology, it delivers ultra-low latency, swift tracking, and pinpoint accuracy. The lightweight ambidextrous design ensures comfort for all grip styles, while the 70-hour battery duration and dock charging offer hassle-free uptime. The mouse’s programmable buttons and customizable RGB lighting enable personalized setups, making it the tool of choice for gamers craving both style and substance.

name: Instant Pot Duo Evo Plus 10-in-1
description: The Instant Pot Duo Evo Plus 10-in-1 is a versatile kitchen appliance that combines the functions of a pressure cooker, slow cooker, rice cooker, steamer, sauté pan, yogurt maker, and more. With a user-friendly interface, durable stainless steel insert, and even heating technology, meal preparation is quick and easy. The Duo Evo Plus features 48 customizable presets and advanced safety features, making it suitable for novice cooks and culinary enthusiasts alike. Its large capacity and convenience help users save time and energy in the kitchen.

name: Philips Sonicare DiamondClean Smart 9700
description: Philips Sonicare DiamondClean Smart 9700 offers a personalized brushing experience with multiple smart sensors and real-time feedback via a connected app. It includes four high-performance brush heads, five brushing modes, and a sleek glass charging base. The pressure sensor ensures gentle yet thorough cleaning, while the travel case with USB charging makes it ideal for frequent travelers. Up to two weeks of battery life per charge and smart reminders for brush head replacement provide convenience, making the DiamondClean Smart 9700 a leader in dental technology.

name: TCL 6-Series R655 Mini-LED QLED TV
description: TCL 6-Series R655 is a mini-LED QLED TV that combines Quantum Dot technology with precise LED backlighting for impressive brightness, color, and HDR performance. The 4K panel supports Dolby Vision, HDR10+, and 120Hz refresh rates, providing stunning clarity for movies, sports, and gaming. The Roku TV platform offers easy access to thousands of streaming channels, while the sleek bezel-less design enhances any living space. With robust gaming features and voice control compatibility, this TV is an excellent value for home entertainment enthusiasts.

name: Eufy Video Doorbell Dual
description: Eufy Video Doorbell Dual features dual cameras to simultaneously monitor visitors and packages at your doorstep. The 2K resolution, advanced AI detection, and built-in voice assistant provide robust home security and convenience. It records detailed events without monthly fees, storing footage locally with military-grade encryption. Designed for simple installation and compatibility with smart home ecosystems, the Eufy Video Doorbell Dual is ideal for tech-savvy homeowners looking for modern security and peace of mind.

name: TP-Link Kasa Smart Plug HS300
description: The TP-Link Kasa Smart Plug HS300 is a six-outlet smart power strip that enables remote control of connected devices via app or voice assistants. Each outlet is individually controllable, while built-in energy monitoring helps track power consumption to promote efficiency. Scheduling features and surge protection safeguard electronics from voltage fluctuations. Easy setup with the Kasa app and seamless integration with Alexa, Google Assistant, and SmartThings make the HS300 a practical choice for automating and protecting home and office electronics.

name: Roborock S7 MaxV Ultra
description: Roborock S7 MaxV Ultra is a fully automatic vacuum and mop robot that tackles floors with advanced AI obstacle avoidance and real-time home mapping. The self-cleaning docking station empties the dustbin, refills the water tank, and washes the mop, minimizing user intervention. With powerful suction, Sonic Mopping technology, and multi-level navigation, it delivers efficient and thorough cleaning. The companion app allows for zone targeting and virtual barriers, making the S7 MaxV Ultra an innovative solution for the tech-savvy household.

name: Alienware Aurora R15
description: Alienware Aurora R15 is a high-performance gaming desktop featuring 13th Gen Intel Core processors and NVIDIA GeForce RTX graphics for outstanding gameplay and content creation. The advanced cooling architecture ensures optimal thermal management during intense sessions, while customizable AlienFX lighting adds flare. Multiple storage and memory options afford future upgradeability. With premium build quality and iconic design, the Aurora R15 is ideal for gamers who demand power, reliability, and style in their desktop experience.

name: Marshall Emberton II Bluetooth Speaker
description: Marshall Emberton II Bluetooth Speaker is a compact, portable audio device delivering signature Marshall sound with over 30 hours of playtime on a single charge. Its IP67 dust- and water-resistance makes it perfect for outdoor adventures. The multi-directional sound technology ensures clear, balanced audio from any angle. Classic Marshall design elements lend vintage flair, while intuitive controls, fast USB-C charging, and Bluetooth 5.1 connectivity provide modern convenience. The Emberton II is an excellent choice for music lovers seeking portability, durability, and iconic style.

name: LG OLED evo C3 65" 4K Smart TV
description: The LG OLED evo C3 65" 4K Smart TV delivers extraordinary visuals with perfect blacks, vibrant colors, and infinite contrast. Powered by the α9 Gen 6 AI Processor, it offers lifelike picture quality and exceptional upscaling for all content. With webOS, users gain easy access to a wide range of streaming apps, voice control, and smart home integration. It’s crafted with a slim minimalist design, making it a stunning centerpiece for any home theater.

name: Dell XPS 15 (9520)
description: The Dell XPS 15 (9520) is a premium Windows laptop with an edge-to-edge 15.6-inch 4K OLED touch display, 12th Gen Intel Core processors, and dedicated NVIDIA graphics. Its ultra-slim chassis, robust performance, and expansive I/O options cater to professionals and creatives who demand power and portability. With long battery life and a comfortable keyboard, the XPS 15 excels in productivity, content creation, and entertainment.

name: Kingston FURY Renegade 2TB NVMe SSD
description: The Kingston FURY Renegade 2TB NVMe SSD offers blazingly fast PCIe 4.0 speeds of up to 7,300MB/s, ideal for gamers and content creators needing high throughput and low latency. Its heat spreader ensures stable performance during heavy data transfers, while its compact M.2 form factor fits desktop and laptop builds. It’s a must-have upgrade for reducing load times and increasing system responsiveness.

name: Garmin Forerunner 255 Music
description: The Garmin Forerunner 255 Music caters to athletes, with built-in GPS, advanced running dynamics, heart rate tracking, and the ability to store and play music without a phone. Lightweight and waterproof, it offers customizable workout plans, sleep/health insights, and up to 14 days of battery life, making it a great companion for fitness enthusiasts who want data-driven results.

name: Casio G-Shock Move GBDH2000 Smartwatch
description: The Casio G-Shock Move GBDH2000 Smartwatch combines G-Shock’s legendary toughness with a full suite of fitness tracking sensors, including heart rate, GPS, and compass. Solar charging extends its operation, and Bluetooth sync lets athletes track their stats via a dedicated app. Shock and water-resistant, it’s built for the most demanding activities.

name: BenQ PD3205U 32" 4K Monitor
description: The BenQ PD3205U is a 32-inch 4K UHD monitor designed for creators, featuring factory-calibrated color accuracy, HDR10 support, and multiple display modes. The ergonomic stand, USB-C connectivity, and built-in KVM switch enable efficient multitasking and seamless workflow. Its minimal bezels deliver an immersive, professional-grade viewing experience.

name: Wellue O2Ring Wearable Pulse Oximeter
description: The Wellue O2Ring Wearable Pulse Oximeter provides continuous blood oxygen and heart rate monitoring, making it ideal for those with sleep disorders or respiratory concerns. Its comfortable, ring-design sensor records all-night data, and Bluetooth sync enables sharing with healthcare providers. Silent vibration alerts help users maintain healthy SpO2 levels overnight.

name: Acer Nitro 5 Gaming Laptop (AN515-58)
description: The Acer Nitro 5 Gaming Laptop (AN515-58) balances performance and value with its 12th Gen Intel Core i7, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 GPU, and a fast 144Hz FHD display. A sophisticated thermal system and customizable RGB keyboard appeal to gamers and creators seeking powerful portable computing for competitive titles and creative workflows.

name: Insta360 X3 360° Action Camera
description: The Insta360 X3 lets you capture immersive 360-degree footage in 5.7K resolution. Using advanced stabilization and reframing features, users can shoot cinematic action videos for social media or VR content. Rugged and waterproof, this compact camera enables everyone to create dynamic, interactive stories from any angle without missing a moment.

name: Pure Enrichment PureZone Halo Air Purifier
description: The Pure Enrichment PureZone Halo Air Purifier offers effective air filtration with a HEPA filter for rooms up to 100sq ft, removing 99.97% of pollutants, allergens, and odors. With quiet operation and a modern design, it seamlessly integrates into bedrooms, offices, or small living spaces for healthier, fresher air year-round.

name: Wyze Cam v3 1080p Security Camera
description: The Wyze Cam v3 is a versatile, weatherproof security camera with color night vision, motion detection, and free cloud storage of 12-second clips. It’s suitable for indoor or outdoor use and can be monitored via app. Featuring a magnetic base and easy setup, it offers affordable, reliable security for any home.

name: Google Pixel Tablet (11-inch, 2023)
description: The Google Pixel Tablet (11-inch, 2023) combines productivity and entertainment in a sleek design running Android 13. Its bright 11-inch screen, Tensor G2 chip, and multi-user support allow seamless switching between work and play. The included Charging Speaker Dock transforms it into a smart home display with excellent sound, making it a versatile centerpiece for modern households.

name: Brother MFC-L3770CDW Color Laser All-in-One Printer
description: The Brother MFC-L3770CDW is a versatile all-in-one color laser printer with fast print speeds, wireless connectivity, duplex printing, and an intuitive touchscreen. It handles high-volume tasks effortlessly, making it ideal for home offices and small businesses needing reliable, high-quality color output, scanning, copying, and faxing functions.

name: Audio-Technica AT-LP120XUSB Direct-Drive Turntable
description: The Audio-Technica AT-LP120XUSB is a professional-grade direct-drive turntable offering USB output for digital recording, adjustable anti-skate control, and selectable phono preamp. Designed for audiophiles and DJs, it delivers high-fidelity audio from vinyl collections and integrates seamlessly with modern sound systems for the best of analog and digital listening.

name: ASUS ROG Swift PG259QN 24.5” Gaming Monitor
description: The ASUS ROG Swift PG259QN is a 24.5-inch esports gaming monitor boasting a 360Hz refresh rate and 1ms response time. NVIDIA G-SYNC support ensures ultra-smooth, tear-free gameplay. The ergonomic stand, customizable RGB lighting, and extensive connectivity make it the ultimate choice for competitive gamers demanding lightning-fast visual performance.

name: Braun Series 9 Pro 9450cc Electric Shaver
description: The Braun Series 9 Pro 9450cc Electric Shaver offers a close, gentle shave with advanced sonic technology and a flexible, adaptive shaving head. Its five shaving elements capture more hair in each stroke, and the included Clean & Charge station ensures optimal performance. Waterproof and cordless, it’s engineered for convenience and luxury.

name: Lenovo Tab M10 Plus (3rd Gen)
description: The Lenovo Tab M10 Plus (3rd Gen) is an affordable, versatile Android tablet with a 10.61-inch 2K display, octa-core processor, and up to 12 hours of battery life. Featuring stylus support and a kid-friendly mode, it’s perfect for families, students, or anyone needing a feature-rich tablet for streaming, reading, or productivity on the go.

name: Apple AirTag 4 Pack
description: Apple AirTag helps you keep track of your belongings, like keys or bags, using the Find My network. Ultra Wideband technology and a built-in speaker aid with precise location, while encrypted tracking ensures privacy. The Water-resistant, coin-sized trackers seamlessly integrate with your iPhone or iPad for peace of mind every day.

name: LG C2 OLED 55" 4K Smart TV
description: The LG C2 OLED TV features a 55-inch self-lit OLED display, providing infinite contrast, perfect blacks, and vibrant colors. With support for Dolby Vision IQ, 120Hz refresh rate, and NVIDIA G-Sync/AMD FreeSync, it's ideal for cinema lovers and gamers. webOS delivers smart functionality, allowing access to popular apps and voice assistants. Its ultra-slim design and gallery stand complement any home theater setup.

name: Anker PowerCore 20,000mAh Power Bank
description: Anker PowerCore 20,000mAh offers ultra-high capacity portable charging for smartphones, tablets, and other USB devices. With dual output ports, PowerIQ and VoltageBoost technology ensure optimal charging speeds. The compact, sturdy design with multi-protection safety system makes it a reliable travel companion during trips, emergencies, or daily commutes.

name: Samsung Odyssey G9 Neo Curved Gaming Monitor
description: The Samsung Odyssey G9 Neo is a 49-inch 1000R curved gaming monitor featuring Quantum Mini LED technology, 240Hz refresh rate, and a fast 1ms response time. With a Dual QHD resolution, HDR2000, NVIDIA G-Sync, and AMD FreeSync Premium Pro support, this monitor provides a deeply immersive gaming or productivity workspace. The futuristic design and customizable LED CoreSync add style to any setup.

name: iRobot Roomba J7+ Robot Vacuum
description: The iRobot Roomba J7+ uses advanced PrecisionVision navigation to identify and avoid obstacles, pets, and cords while delivering powerful cleaning on carpets and hard floors. The Clean Base Automatic Dirt Disposal allows hands-free emptying for up to 60 days. Customizable cleaning schedules, Alexa/Google Assistant integration, and a smart self-learning system make apartment and house cleaning effortless.

name: Amazon Kindle Paperwhite (2021)
description: Amazon Kindle Paperwhite (2021 edition) features a 6.8-inch glare-free, high-resolution screen with adjustable warm lighting for comfortable day or night reading. Waterproof design (IPX8) makes it perfect for reading at the beach, pool, or bath, while battery life lasts for weeks. Store thousands of books for offline reading, and enjoy robust integration with the Audible audiobook platform.

name: Netgear Orbi AX6000 Mesh WiFi 6 System
description: The Netgear Orbi AX6000 Mesh WiFi 6 System delivers blistering-fast, reliable WiFi coverage up to 5,000 sq. ft. for homes of all sizes. Featuring tri-band mesh technology with 4.2Gbps speeds, advanced security, and easy app controls, it ensures seamless video streaming, gaming, and smart home device connectivity across multiple floors and rooms. Expandable and future-proof, it supports up to 100 devices.

name: Garmin Forerunner 955 Solar GPS Watch
description: The Garmin Forerunner 955 Solar is a GPS multisport watch with a solar-powered display that extends battery life. Designed for athletes, it tracks running, cycling, swimming, and advanced training metrics. Full-color maps, heart rate, sleep, and blood oxygen monitoring, coupled with smart notifications and onboard music storage, make it ideal for fitness enthusiasts. The lightweight, durable construction withstands rigorous outdoor activities.

name: LIFX Clean Antibacterial Smart Bulb
description: LIFX Clean Smart Bulb combines app-controlled LED tech with high-energy visible light (HEV) functionality that's proven to kill bacteria. It features millions of color options, schedules, dimming, and voice assistant compatibility. Safe for people, pets, and plants, it provides both hygienic and atmospheric lighting—ideal for homes and healthcare environments.

name: TP-Link Archer AX11000 Tri-Band WiFi 6 Router
description: The TP-Link Archer AX11000 is a cutting-edge tri-band WiFi 6 router designed for high-performance gaming and streaming. With 10 high-gain antennas, 2.5Gbps WAN port, OFDMA, and MU-MIMO technology, it supports up to 10Gbps combined speeds. Game Accelerator and HomeCare security protect your network, while the robust online management tools make setup and control a breeze.

name: Eufy Video Doorbell Dual Camera
description: Eufy’s Video Doorbell Dual features two cameras for full coverage: one for the visitor and one facing packages to prevent theft. With dual motion detection and 2K video resolution, it ensures you never miss a visitor or delivery. No monthly fees, smart alerts, local storage, and a slim, weather-resistant body make it a must for home security.

name: Panasonic LUMIX GH6 Mirrorless Camera
description: The Panasonic LUMIX GH6 is a flagship micro four thirds camera with a 25.2MP sensor, 5.8K video recording, and industry-leading stabilization. Ideal for professional videographers, it supports ProRes and All-Intra recording, features dual card slots, and a high-brightness articulating LCD. The rugged body resists dust, splash, and freezing—perfect for fieldwork.

name: Weber Connect Smart Grilling Hub
description: The Weber Connect Smart Grilling Hub is an app-connected BBQ assistant that turns any grill into a smart grill. Step-by-step grilling notifications, readiness countdowns, and custom alerts ensure perfectly cooked food every time. The weather-resistant, magnetic base and long-range Bluetooth connection make grill monitoring easy, whether you’re in the backyard or kitchen.

name: LG UltraFine 32UN880-B 4K Ergo Monitor
description: The LG UltraFine 32UN880-B is a versatile 32-inch 4K monitor designed for creative professionals. Its adjustable Ergo stand enables flexible positioning for ergonomic comfort, while the IPS panel offers outstanding color accuracy and wide viewing angles. With USB-C connectivity, HDR10 support, and multiple input ports, it's ideal for multitaskers, designers, and content creators.

name: Coway Airmega AP-1512HH Air Purifier
description: The Coway Airmega AP-1512HH offers powerful 4-stage filtration, including a HEPA filter that captures 99.97% of airborne particles down to 0.3 microns. With air quality sensors, Auto mode, and Eco mode for energy savings, it's perfect for bedrooms, offices, or kitchens. The modern compact design blends seamlessly into any decor, providing clean air with minimal noise.

name: SanDisk Extreme Pro 2TB Portable SSD
description: The SanDisk Extreme Pro 2TB Portable SSD delivers blazing-fast NVMe speeds up to 2000MB/s, rugged drop protection, and IP55 water/dust resistance. Compact and lightweight, it’s perfect for photographers, videographers, and professionals who need reliable portable storage. Integrated carabiner loop and 256-bit AES hardware encryption provide both convenience and security.

name: Vizio V-Series 50" 4K Smart TV
description: The Vizio V-Series 50-inch 4K Smart TV delivers vibrant Ultra HD resolution, fast V-Gaming Engine, and support for HDR10+ and Dolby Vision at an affordable price. It includes built-in SmartCast for easy access to streaming apps and voice assistant compatibility. The low profile and thin bezels make it an excellent choice for budget-conscious viewers wanting immersive home entertainment.

name: TP-Link Kasa Smart WiFi Plug Mini
description: The TP-Link Kasa Smart WiFi Plug Mini enables app and voice-controlled on/off scheduling for lamps, appliances, and other devices. Its compact, stackable design makes it easy to fit in any outlet without blocking adjacent plugs. No hub required—simply connect via WiFi for effortless integration into your smart home routines.

name: Sony Alpha ZV-E10 Vlog Camera
description: The Sony Alpha ZV-E10 is perfect for vloggers and content creators, featuring a 24.2MP sensor, fast autofocus with Eye-AF, and a vari-angle display for easy framing. Advanced microphone and wind screen ensure clear audio, while real-time tracking and background defocus provide professional-quality results. Lightweight and customizable with interchangeable lenses, it adapts to any shooting style.

name: Belkin Boost Charge Pro 3-in-1 Wireless Charger
description: Charge your iPhone, Apple Watch, and AirPods simultaneously with the Belkin Boost Charge Pro 3-in-1 Wireless Charger. This elegantly designed stand supports MagSafe charging at up to 15W, includes a fast-charging module for the watch, and fits perfectly on your nightstand or desk. Its secure, upright orientation keeps devices visible and accessible at all times.

name: Hisense PX1-PRO 4K UHD Ultra Short Throw Laser Projector
description: The Hisense PX1-PRO ultra short throw laser projector delivers stunning 4K UHD images up to 130 inches, powered by tri-chroma laser light for wide color coverage. Android TV smart features, Google Assistant integration, and premium built-in speakers offer a cinematic experience with easy connectivity for movies, sports, and games from the comfort of your living room.

name: Yale Assure Lock SL with Wi-Fi
description: The Yale Assure Lock SL is a slim, key-free smart lock that supports WiFi connectivity for remote app control and voice compatibility with Alexa, Google, and Apple HomeKit. Enjoy secure, convenient, and trackable access code entry, auto-locking, and easy installation for upgrading any front door. Manage permissions for family, guests, or service providers anytime, anywhere.

name: Xiaomi Mi Electric Scooter Pro 2
description: The Xiaomi Mi Electric Scooter Pro 2 offers a top speed of 25 km/h, a 45km range, and a powerful 300W motor. With a foldable, lightweight design, advanced E-ABS braking, and an LED display, commuting and urban adventures are a breeze. Safety features include headlights, taillights, and a reflectors package. Ideal for city commuters seeking convenience and eco-friendly transport.

name: LG OLED C2 55-Inch 4K TV
description: The LG OLED C2 55-inch 4K Smart TV features self-lighting OLED pixels for perfect blacks, intense colors, and infinite contrast. Its α9 Gen5 AI Processor 4K ensures lifelike picture and crisp details, while Dolby Vision IQ and Dolby Atmos enhance the home theater experience. The ultra-slim design blends seamlessly into modern living spaces, and the built-in smart platform supports all major streaming services. With NVIDIA G-SYNC compatibility, gamers enjoy ultra-smooth gameplay with low input lag. The C2 is an all-around winner for movie buffs, sports fans, and gamers alike.

name: Apple MacBook Pro 16-inch (M2 Pro, 2023)
description: The Apple MacBook Pro 16-inch (M2 Pro, 2023) is a high-performance laptop designed for professionals and creators. Featuring Apple's latest M2 Pro silicon chip, brilliant Liquid Retina XDR display, and up to 32GB of unified memory, this powerhouse excels at heavy multitasking, graphic design, and video editing. It boasts an impressive battery life of up to 21 hours, robust security features with Touch ID, and a wide array of ports, including HDMI, SD card slot, and Thunderbolt 4 for maximum connectivity.

name: Hisense U8H 65-inch QLED ULED 4K TV
description: The Hisense U8H 65-inch QLED ULED 4K TV offers an immersive viewing experience with Quantum Dot Color, Dolby Vision IQ, and Mini-LED backlighting. Its high peak brightness and full array local dimming deliver outstanding contrast and HDR visuals. With Google TV built-in, stream your favorite content easily, while the Game Mode PRO ensures low latency for gaming. The slim bezel and metal stand enhance any entertainment space with a modern touch.

name: ASUS ROG Zephyrus G15
description: The ASUS ROG Zephyrus G15 is a powerful gaming laptop combining portability with high-end specs. It features a 15.6-inch WQHD display with a 165Hz refresh rate, AMD Ryzen 9 processor, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3080 GPU, and up to 32GB RAM. With six speakers, customizable RGB keyboard, and an ultra-light magnesium-alloy chassis, this laptop is made for gamers and creators who demand top-tier performance and style on the go.

name: Apple iPad Air (5th Gen, M1)
description: The Apple iPad Air (5th Gen) features the powerful Apple M1 chip, delivering desktop-level performance in a lightweight, portable form. Its 10.9-inch Liquid Retina display provides vibrant color and clarity for browsing, design, and streaming. With Apple Pencil (2nd Gen) and Magic Keyboard support, it's ideal for both productivity and creativity. Advanced cameras and 5G connectivity ensure fast, reliable performance for work or play.

name: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip4
description: The Samsung Galaxy Z Flip4 is a stylish foldable smartphone that fits perfectly in your pocket. Its 6.7-inch Dynamic AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8+ Gen 1 chip, and advanced FlexCam capture feature redefine mobile creativity and portability. The device offers versatile multitasking and fast charging, making it a trendsetter in the world of compact, innovative smartphones.

name: Acer Predator X27 UHD Gaming Monitor
description: The Acer Predator X27 is a premium 27-inch 4K UHD gaming monitor designed for serious gamers. It features NVIDIA G-SYNC Ultimate, 144Hz refresh rate, and 1ms response time for fluid, tear-free gameplay. Quantum Dot technology and full-array local dimming bring vivid colors and deep contrasts, while customizable RGB ambient lighting adds style to your battle station. Multiple connectivity options round out this high-performance display.

name: ASUS ZenWiFi AX (XT8) Mesh Router
description: The ASUS ZenWiFi AX (XT8) Mesh Router delivers high-speed, whole-home WiFi 6 coverage up to 5,500 sq. ft. Rated for multi-device streaming, gaming, and smart home setups, it features strong parental controls, built-in security powered by AiProtection Pro, and a sleek, modern design. Its easy setup via a mobile app ensures anyone can enjoy blazing-fast, reliable internet anywhere in the house.

name: Sony A80K 65-inch OLED 4K TV
description: Sony’s A80K 65-inch OLED 4K TV combines the power of the Cognitive Processor XR with OLED’s infinite contrast, delivering deep blacks, vibrant colors, and lifelike visuals. Support for Dolby Vision, HDMI 2.1 for gaming, and acoustic surface audio + means the screen itself delivers immersive sound. Google TV provides wide app access and smart home controls while the elegant design suits any environment.

name: ViewSonic XG2431 Gaming Monitor
description: The ViewSonic XG2431 combines a 24-inch Full HD IPS display with a 240Hz refresh rate and 1ms response time, perfect for fast-paced FPS and esports gaming. AMD FreeSync Premium delivers smooth, tear-free visuals, while fully customizable ergonomic design and RGB accent lighting enhance comfort and ambiance during extended sessions.

name: Canon Pixma G6020 Wireless All-In-One Printer
description: The Canon Pixma G6020 Wireless All-In-One Printer is ideal for home offices, featuring a refillable MegaTank ink system delivering high page yields and cost efficiency. It prints, scans, and copies with sharp color output and supports wireless, mobile, and voice-activated printing. Easy setup, duplex printing, and a compact design make it a practical addition to any workspace.

name: TCL 6-Series 65-inch QLED 4K TV
description: The TCL 6-Series 65-inch QLED 4K TV delivers stunning imagery through Quantum Dot technology, Mini-LED backlight, and Dolby Vision HDR. Its THX Certified Game Mode ensures ultra-low latency for gamers. With Roku TV built in, enjoy thousands of streaming channels, while voice remote and numerous inputs make entertainment simple. The sleek edge-to-edge glass design suits modern décor.

name: Dell UltraSharp U2723QE 27” 4K Monitor
description: The Dell UltraSharp U2723QE is a 27-inch 4K IPS Black monitor designed for professionals who demand precise color accuracy, sharp visuals, and productivity features. With USB-C connectivity, built-in KVM switch, and ergonomic adjustments, it supports multitasking and decluttered workspaces. Its anti-glare, ultra-thin bezel design looks elegant in any office setting.

name: Netgear Nighthawk AX8 (RAX80) WiFi 6 Router
description: The Netgear Nighthawk AX8 (RAX80) is a powerful dual-band WiFi 6 router supporting speeds up to 6Gbps and covering large homes. Its 8-stream MU-MIMO technology ensures smooth connections for dozens of devices, while advanced cyber threat protection keeps your network secure. Easy setup, multiple Ethernet ports, and futuristic design round out this top-tier networking option.

name: Brother HL-L2370DW Wireless Laser Printer
description: The Brother HL-L2370DW is a compact wireless monochrome laser printer, perfect for busy home offices. Offering fast print speeds of up to 36 ppm, automatic duplex printing, and robust WiFi connectivity, it handles large workloads efficiently. Its compact footprint, low operating costs, and quiet operation make it ideal for shared spaces and productivity-focused users.

name: Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra
description: The Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra is a flagship smartphone that merges advanced performance with sleek design. Featuring a 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, it offers crisp clarity and vivid colors for immersive viewing. Powered by an octa-core processor and packed with up to 12GB of RAM, this device handles multitasking, gaming, and productivity with ease. It sports an adaptive 120Hz refresh rate, S Pen support for precision input, and a quad-lens camera system highlighted by a 108MP main sensor, delivering stunning photography in any condition. The large battery and fast-charging capabilities ensure lasting usage, making this phone a top contender for both work and play.

name: LG 55-inch OLED EVO C2 Series
description: The LG OLED EVO C2 is a 55-inch 4K television designed to deliver a breathtaking home cinema experience. Its OLED panel provides perfect blacks, infinite contrast, and vibrant colors, enhanced by Dolby Vision IQ and Dolby Atmos for an immersive audio-visual feast. The a9 Gen5 AI Processor optimizes picture and sound quality in real time. Gamers will appreciate HDMI 2.1, G-SYNC/FreeSync compatibility, and a 120Hz refresh rate for ultra-smooth gameplay. The sleek, ultra-thin frame blends seamlessly with any decor, while webOS offers effortless access to a wide range of streaming services and apps.

name: Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Gen
description: The Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Gen intelligently optimizes home climate and energy usage. Equipped with sensors and machine learning, it learns your habits and programs itself to save energy without sacrificing comfort. Compatible with most HVAC systems, it features a bright, high-resolution display and can be remotely controlled via smartphone. Energy history and monthly reports provide insights for further savings, while easy installation and elegant design fit any home décor. Integration with Google Assistant and Alexa enables voice control, making temperature adjustments seamless and intuitive.

name: Apple MacBook Air 15-inch (M2, 2023)
description: The 2023 MacBook Air 15-inch, powered by Apple’s M2 chip, delivers a perfect mix of portability and performance. Its spacious Liquid Retina display provides stunning visuals while maintaining a slim, fanless design. The M2 chip ensures swift multitasking and runs demanding applications efficiently with extended battery life. The Magic Keyboard, Touch ID, and Thunderbolt 4 ports boost productivity, while the six-speaker sound system provides immersive audio for media and calls. Its sleek enclosure, available in multiple finishes, makes it stylish for students and professionals alike.

name: Roku Ultra 2022
description: Roku Ultra 2022 is a high-performance streaming device supporting 4K, Dolby Vision, and Dolby Atmos for an ultimate home theater experience. The device boasts a fast quad-core processor and offers extended wireless range. The included voice remote supports personal shortcuts, lost remote finder, and private listening via headphone jack. The intuitive Roku OS provides access to thousands of channels and apps. It is perfect for cord-cutters wanting fast, reliable performance, and extensive streaming options.

name: Synology DiskStation DS220+
description: The Synology DiskStation DS220+ is a powerful, compact 2-bay NAS designed for home and small business data management. It features a dual-core processor, 2GB of DDR4 RAM (expandable), and supports up to 32TB of raw storage. The intuitive DiskStation Manager OS allows for effortless file sharing, data backup, and streaming. Advanced data protection features, add-on packages, and remote access ensure your files are safe, accessible, and organized. The DS220+ is ideal for users seeking a reliable, smart solution for digital storage and multimedia streaming.

name: Wacom Cintiq Pro 24
description: Wacom’s Cintiq Pro 24 is the go-to pen display for professional artists and designers. This 24-inch 4K display features 99% Adobe RGB coverage, delivering color-accurate visuals for illustration, animation, and photo editing. The included Pro Pen 2 provides 8192 levels of pressure sensitivity and tilt recognition, offering a natural, responsive drawing experience. Touch capability, multiple customizable ExpressKeys, and versatile stand options ensure comfort and productivity throughout long creative sessions. It supports both Windows and Mac for maximum compatibility.

name: Anker PowerCore III Elite 25600 87W Portable Charger
description: The Anker PowerCore III Elite 25600 87W Portable Charger is a powerful external battery designed for laptops, tablets, phones, and more. Boasting a massive 25,600mAh capacity and high-speed charging via USB-C and dual USB-A ports, it ensures your devices stay powered on long trips or busy days. The robust construction, rapid recharge, and multi-device support make it indispensable for travelers, professionals, and anyone needing reliable on-the-go power.

name: BenQ SW271C 27-inch 4K Photo Monitor
description: The BenQ SW271C is a 27-inch 4K monitor tailored for photographers and videographers. Delivering 99% Adobe RGB and 100% sRGB color space coverage, it guarantees superb color accuracy for editing. The hardware calibration support ensures consistency, while USB-C connectivity simplifies cabling and device charging. Its uniformity technology, anti-glare IPS panel, and detachable shading hood further enhance the creative workflow. The SW271C is an indispensable tool for professionals demanding color fidelity and versatility.

name: Acer Predator X34 GS
description: The Acer Predator X34 GS is a 34-inch curved gaming monitor engineered for immersive, ultra-wide gaming. Boasting a 3440x1440 resolution, 180Hz refresh rate, and NVIDIA G-SYNC compatibility, it ensures smooth, tear-free visuals. The IPS panel delivers rich colors and wide viewing angles, while customizable RGB lighting and ergonomic adjustments enhance comfort and ambiance. Multiple HDMI, DisplayPort, and USB ports support diverse connectivity. It is the ultimate upgrade for serious gamers seeking expansive screen real estate and top-tier performance.

name: Western Digital Black SN850X NVMe SSD 2TB
description: The Western Digital Black SN850X NVMe SSD 2TB offers top-tier performance for gaming and workstation systems. With blazing-fast read/write speeds up to 7300/6600 MB/s, it slashes load times and boosts productivity. The SSD features advanced Game Mode 2.0, thermal management, and RGB lighting for customization. Its durable M.2 2280 form factor ensures broad compatibility, while the included software suite assists with monitoring and firmware updates. This SSD is ideal for enthusiasts seeking speed and reliability.

name: Huawei Watch GT 3 Pro
description: Huawei Watch GT 3 Pro combines elegance with advanced health and fitness tracking. Its titanium case, sapphire glass screen, and ceramic back offer a luxurious look and feel. Supporting over 100 workout modes, professional-level GPS, SpO2 monitoring, and ECG heart health tracking, it caters to athletes and health-conscious users. With wireless charging and up to 14 days of battery life, it is as practical as it is stylish, and compatible with both iOS and Android devices.

name: Corsair iCUE H150i Elite Capellix Liquid CPU Cooler
description: The Corsair iCUE H150i Elite Capellix is a premium all-in-one liquid CPU cooler designed for gaming rigs and high-performance builds. It features a 360mm radiator, three ML120 RGB fans, and ultra-bright Capellix LEDs for striking visuals. Advanced pump design ensures efficient cooling and quiet operation, while the iCUE software allows complete control over lighting, fan speeds, and performance monitoring. Tool-free mounting makes installation quick and easy, blending top-notch performance with aesthetic flair.

name: Vizio M-Series 5.1 Sound Bar (M51ax-J6)
description: The Vizio M-Series 5.1 Sound Bar (M51ax-J6) provides immersive home theater sound with a sleek, easy-to-install package. This system combines a low-profile sound bar, wireless subwoofer, and discrete satellite speakers for true surround audio. Dolby Audio and DTS Virtual:X support deliver cinematic effects, and Bluetooth connectivity enables convenient music streaming from your mobile devices. Simple remote control and HDMI eARC ensure effortless setup and compatibility with the latest TVs. Perfect for upgrading any living room experience.

name: Samsung Odyssey G9 Neo 49-inch Curved Monitor
description: The Samsung Odyssey G9 Neo offers a jaw-dropping 49-inch curved QLED display for gamers and creators seeking immersive, panoramic visuals. Boasting a 240Hz refresh rate, 1ms response time, and support for G-SYNC and FreeSync Premium Pro, it eliminates motion blur in fast-paced action. The DQHD resolution delivers razor-sharp details across wide workspaces. RGB CoreSync lighting and a futuristic design complement its flagship performance. Multiple inputs and ergonomic adjustability round out this premium package.

name: Oculus Quest 2 (Meta Quest 2) 256GB
description: The Oculus Quest 2 (now Meta Quest 2) is a standalone VR headset that democratizes immersive gaming and experiences. Its Snapdragon XR2 processor, high-resolution display, and 256GB storage enable untethered gameplay without a PC or console. The lightweight, comfortable design, intuitive controllers, and app ecosystem support both virtual reality games and social VR spaces. With up to three hours of battery life and charging ease, it’s an excellent entry point into the world of VR entertainment and exploration.

name: Canon PIXMA TR8620a All-In-One Printer
description: The Canon PIXMA TR8620a is a compact, wireless all-in-one printer designed for home offices and students. It handles printing, scanning, copying, and faxing with rapid print speeds and high color accuracy. The intuitive 4.3-inch touchscreen simplifies navigation, while automatic document feeder and duplex printing boost productivity. With built-in Wi-Fi, AirPrint, and Alexa support, it enables flexible, mobile printing. Its compact footprint and quiet operation make it a discreet yet powerful addition to any workspace.

name: RAVPower 61W PD Pioneer Charger
description: The RAVPower 61W PD Pioneer is a compact and fast USB-C charger ideal for laptops, tablets, and smartphones. With GaN technology, it offers high-efficiency charging in a pocket-friendly size. The built-in safeguards protect against overheating, overcurrent, and short-circuiting. This charger is compatible with a wide range of devices and suitable for travel, office, or home use, ensuring you stay powered no matter where you are.

name: TP-Link Kasa Smart Plug HS300 Power Strip
description: The TP-Link Kasa Smart Plug HS300 Power Strip is the ultimate solution for home automation and energy monitoring. With six independently controllable outlets and three USB ports, it replaces standard power strips for modern smart homes. Each outlet can be scheduled or controlled remotely via the Kasa app or voice assistants (Alexa/Google Assistant). Real-time energy monitoring helps track usage and save costs. Its surge protection safeguards your electronics from power fluctuations, ensuring safe, connected convenience.

name: Creative Sound Blaster Katana V2
description: The Creative Sound Blaster Katana V2 is a slim, powerful soundbar engineered for gaming, music, and movies. With tri-amplified drivers, immersive virtual surround sound, and robust connectivity options (Bluetooth, optical, USB, AUX), it’s perfect for both desktops and living rooms. The customizable RGB underglow lighting and programmable buttons enhance gaming ambiance and convenience. Powerful audio processing delivers crystal-clear dialogue, thumping bass, and rich mids. The Katana V2 elevates your setup’s audio-visual presence.

name: Moft Z 5-in-1 Sit-Stand Desk
description: The Moft Z 5-in-1 Sit-Stand Desk is an ultra-portable, folding desk accessory designed to improve ergonomics in any workspace. Made from lightweight yet durable materials, it transforms between five configurations, enabling both sitting and standing postures. It supports up to 22 lbs, fits laptops up to 17 inches, and folds down to just half an inch for easy transport. The versatile design encourages healthier working habits and reduces physical strain during long computer sessions.

name: Audio-Technica AT-LP120XUSB Turntable
description: The Audio-Technica AT-LP120XUSB is a direct-drive turntable engineered for vinyl enthusiasts and aspiring DJs. Offering switchable phono/line preamp and USB output, it allows for analog playback through speakers or digital archiving of records to PC. The adjustable dynamic anti-skate, pitch control, and S-shaped tonearm ensure precise sound and smooth operation. Stylish and versatile, the AT-LP120XUSB is a reliable choice for music lovers wanting classic audio with modern convenience.

name: Netgear Nighthawk M5 Mobile Hotspot 5G
description: The Netgear Nighthawk M5 is a compact, portable 5G mobile hotspot offering high-speed internet access wherever you go. Supporting Wi-Fi 6, it efficiently connects up to 32 devices, making it perfect for work trips, road travel, or backup connectivity. The 2.4-inch touchscreen provides easy control of settings and data usage. It delivers gigabit-level speeds where 5G is available, supports VPN pass-through, and has a robust battery for all-day use. The M5 offers unmatched connectivity and freedom without wires.

name: JBL Flip 6 Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker
description: The JBL Flip 6 is a rugged portable speaker that delivers bold sound and deep bass, even outdoors. Rated IP67 waterproof and dustproof, it withstands pool parties, beach trips, and adventure hikes. With 12 hours of battery life, PartyBoost mode for stereo pairing, and Bluetooth 5.1 compatibility, it’s a fun and versatile companion for music lovers on the go. Its compact cylindrical design and vibrant color options appeal to users of all ages.

name: Roku Streambar
description: The Roku Streambar is a compact 2-in-1 device, combining a powerful streaming player and high-fidelity soundbar. Delivering 4K HDR streaming and enhanced audio in one sleek unit, it declutters your entertainment setup. Simple HDMI setup, automatic volume leveling, voice controls, and compatibility with Roku’s wireless surround speakers make it an affordable and easy home theater upgrade. The Streambar provides clear dialogue, rich sound, and Roku's intuitive streaming platform all-in-one.

name: Samsung 55-Inch Neo QLED 4K Smart TV
description: This Samsung 55-Inch Neo QLED 4K Smart TV boasts Quantum Matrix Technology for vibrant colors, precise contrast, and incredible detail. It features Quantum HDR, object tracking sound, and an ultra-slim design that enhances any living space. The intuitive smart platform offers access to all streaming services, voice assistants, and gaming enhancements, delivering a superior home entertainment experience.

name: Google Pixel Tablet
description: The Google Pixel Tablet combines a sleek 11-inch LCD display, the power of the Google Tensor G2 processor, and a magnetic charging speaker dock for superior media experiences. It supports smart home controls, hands-free Google Assistant integration, and multiple user profiles, making it a versatile device for families and smart home enthusiasts.

name: TP-Link Deco XE75 Pro Mesh WiFi 6E System (2-Pack)
description: The TP-Link Deco XE75 Pro Mesh WiFi 6E System blankets your home in lightning-fast, low-latency WiFi via the new 6GHz band. Supporting up to 200 devices and covering up to 5,500 square feet, this system dynamically optimizes signal quality. Parental controls, robust security, and seamless roaming ensure a worry-free, connected experience for modern households.

name: Blink Outdoor 3rd Gen Security Camera
description: The Blink Outdoor 3rd Gen Security Camera delivers wire-free, weather-resistant surveillance with customizable motion alerts, two-year battery life, and HD video. Setup is quick via smartphone app, and integration with Alexa provides hands-free monitoring. With secure cloud or local storage, it offers peace of mind for home and property owners.

name: Hisense U8K 65-Inch Mini-LED TV
description: The Hisense U8K 65-Inch Mini-LED TV features quantum dot color, up to 1,500 nits peak brightness, IMAX Enhanced, Dolby Vision support, and Game Mode Pro for ultra-smooth, responsive action. Google TV integration gives you access to endless streaming content and smart home controls, all presented in a striking, slim-bezel design.

name: Dell UltraSharp U3223QE 32-Inch 4K Monitor
description: The Dell UltraSharp U3223QE is a professional 32-inch 4K monitor with IPS Black technology for deep contrast, a vast color range, and excellent viewing angles. With USB-C hub connectivity, picture-in-picture, and advanced calibration tools, it's ideal for creatives, designers, and productivity-focused users who demand visual excellence.

name: Meta Quest 3 Virtual Reality Headset (128GB)
description: Meta Quest 3 Virtual Reality Headset ushers in immersive VR with a slimmer profile, 4K+ Infinite Display, and full-color passthrough for mixed reality. Experience next-gen gaming, social apps, and productivity features wirelessly. With intuitive controls, inside-out tracking, and a strong content ecosystem, VR is now more accessible and exciting than ever.

name: Samsung HW-Q990C Dolby Atmos Soundbar
description: The Samsung HW-Q990C Dolby Atmos Soundbar delivers 11.1.4 channel surround sound with wireless rear speakers and subwoofer for a cinematic audio experience. Featuring Q-Symphony, SpaceFit Sound Pro, and adaptive audio, it pairs perfectly with Samsung TVs. Bluetooth and WiFi streaming, voice control, and premium design complete this top-tier audio solution.

name: Seagate Expansion 8TB External Desktop Hard Drive
description: Seagate Expansion 8TB External Desktop Hard Drive offers massive plug-and-play storage for backups, media libraries, and work files. With USB 3.0 high-speed transfers, broad compatibility, and simple drag-and-drop operation, it delivers effortless expansion for PCs, Macs, and gaming consoles. Reliable and robust, it meets demanding data storage needs.

name: Lenovo Smart Clock Essential with Alexa Built-In
description: The Lenovo Smart Clock Essential with Alexa streamlines your nightstand with an easy-to-read LED display, built-in Alexa controls, and ambient nightlight. Stream music, set reminders, control smart devices, and check weather hands-free. Its compact footprint and intuitive controls make mornings and evenings easier and more enjoyable.

name: Xiaomi Mi Band 8
description: Xiaomi Mi Band 8 delivers health, fitness, and sleep tracking in a slim, affordable package. With a vibrant AMOLED display and up to 16 days of battery life, it supports 120+ sports modes and all-day heart rate monitoring. Lightweight, waterproof, and easy to sync with smartphones, it’s an excellent starter wearable for active lifestyles.

name: ASUS ROG Rapture GT-AXE16000 Quad-Band WiFi 6E Router
description: ASUS ROG Rapture GT-AXE16000 is a powerhouse quad-band WiFi 6E gaming router delivering up to 16Gbps speeds, with triple-level game acceleration and customizable RGB. Loaded with robust security features, multi-gig ports, and mesh capability, it ensures elite gamers and streamers get total control and lag-free performance throughout their home.

name: LG 65-Inch OLED evo C3 Smart TV
description: The LG 65-Inch OLED evo C3 Smart TV delivers stunning visuals with perfect blacks, vibrant colors, and infinite contrast. The α9 Gen 6 AI Processor optimizes picture and sound for every type of content. With webOS and voice controls, streaming is effortless, and integrated HDMI 2.1 ports support next-gen gaming features. Sleek and ultra-thin, it fits beautifully in any living room, while Dolby Atmos audio provides an immersive listening experience.

name: KitchenAid Artisan Stand Mixer
description: The KitchenAid Artisan Stand Mixer is an iconic appliance for home chefs and bakers. It features a powerful 325-watt motor, 5-quart stainless steel bowl, and versatile attachment hub. From kneading dough to whisking egg whites, it handles all kitchen tasks with ease and precision. Its robust construction, tilt-head design, and wide range of color options make it both functional and stylish, fitting seamlessly in any kitchen.

name: Ecovacs Deebot T20 Omni Robot Vacuum and Mop
description: The Ecovacs Deebot T20 Omni is a smart robot vacuum and mop that takes floor care to the next level. Equipped with advanced mapping, obstacle avoidance, and powerful suction, it cleans both hard floors and carpets efficiently. The self-cleaning and emptying station automates maintenance, while smart app and voice controls allow for customized schedules and zone cleaning. Ideal for pet owners and busy households.

name: Dell UltraSharp U2723QE 27-inch 4K Monitor
description: The Dell UltraSharp U2723QE offers exceptional clarity and color accuracy with its 27-inch 4K IPS panel and wide connectivity options, including USB-C with 90W power delivery. The monitor features ComfortView Plus to reduce eye strain, built-in KVM switch for multitasking, and an ergonomic stand for flexible positioning. Ideal for professionals and creatives who demand reliable, high-quality displays.

name: Wacom Intuos Pro Medium
description: The Wacom Intuos Pro Medium is a high-precision pen tablet designed for digital artists, illustrators, and photographers. Its wireless capability, multi-touch gestures, and customizable ExpressKeys streamline creative workflows. The Pro Pen 2 delivers 8192 pressure levels and virtually lag-free tracking for smooth and accurate drawing. Its slim, durable build fits comfortably on any desk, making it a staple for creative professionals.

name: Brother HL-L2350DW Monochrome Laser Printer
description: The Brother HL-L2350DW is a reliable monochrome laser printer designed for home or small office use. It delivers fast printing speeds up to 32 ppm, wireless connectivity, and automatic duplex printing to save paper. The compact, quiet design fits easily in tight spaces, while the large 250-sheet tray reduces the need for frequent refills. It’s known for its low running costs and excellent print quality.

name: TP-Link Kasa Smart Wi-Fi Plug Mini
description: TP-Link’s Kasa Smart Wi-Fi Plug Mini lets you control appliances from anywhere using your phone or voice assistants. Its compact design fits into any outlet without blocking adjacent sockets. Use the app to schedule, set timers, or monitor energy usage. Easy setup and broad compatibility make it a smart addition to any modern, connected home.

name: Sony XG500 Portable Wireless Speaker
description: The Sony XG500 Portable Wireless Speaker delivers powerful sound and impressive bass with its X-Balanced speakers and Mega Bass technology. Water and dust resistant, with up to 30 hours of battery life, it's built for parties, BBQs, or outdoor adventures. The integrated handle, ambient lighting, and Bluetooth connectivity allow easy, stylish playback wherever you go.

name: Western Digital My Passport 4TB Portable HDD
description: The Western Digital My Passport 4TB Portable HDD offers large capacity and fast USB 3.0 transfer speeds in a slim, stylish package. Password protection and 256-bit AES hardware encryption keep your files secure. Compatible with PC and Mac, it’s ideal for storing photos, videos, music, and documents during travel or at home. Backup software ensures your important files are always safe and recoverable.

name: Corsair RM850x 850W Power Supply
description: The Corsair RM850x 850W Power Supply is a fully modular, high-efficiency power unit built with 80 PLUS Gold certification and premium Japanese capacitors. Designed for gaming PCs and workstations, it delivers reliable, quiet operation and easy cable management. Designed for demanding hardware and overclocked systems, it includes a ten-year warranty for long-term confidence.

name: De’Longhi Magnifica Evo Espresso Machine
description: The De’Longhi Magnifica Evo Espresso Machine automates gourmet coffee-making with one-touch controls, a built-in conical burr grinder, and LatteCrema system for creamy milk froth. Pre-set beverage options, easy cleaning, and sleek Italian design make it a standout for any countertop. Brew everything from espresso to cappuccino, delivering cafe-quality drinks at home with minimal effort.

name: Google Nest Audio Smart Speaker
