Its tough build resists water and crushing, providing security for online accounts, password managers, and more. Ideal for professionals, businesses, and privacy-conscious users.

name: Seagate IronWolf Pro 8TB NAS Hard Drive
description: The Seagate IronWolf Pro 8TB is a high-reliability, high-capacity hard drive designed for NAS systems in businesses and creative studios. With vibration resistance, optimized firmware for 24/7 use, and advanced data recovery services, it ensures data integrity and consistent performance. It supports workloads up to 300TB/year, making it essential for multi-user encrypted storage solutions in demanding environments.

name: Logitech StreamCam Full HD Webcam
description: The Logitech StreamCam is a versatile Full HD 1080p webcam designed for streamers, vloggers, and remote workers. It features smart autofocus, face tracking, and a premium glass lens, delivering sharp, vibrant video at 60 fps. The flexible mounting options, USB-C connectivity, and software controls make it easy to create professional content or engage in high-quality video calls and conferences.

name: Victrola Stream Carbon Wireless Turntable
description: The Victrola Stream Carbon is a modern turntable combining vintage vinyl playback with wireless streaming. It’s certified for Sonos, providing direct audio streaming throughout connected rooms, and features a carbon fiber tonearm for precise, high-quality sound. The sleek, minimalist design, quick setup, and compatibility with both legacy and modern speakers make it the top choice for audiophiles and vinyl enthusiasts.

name: LG UltraGear 27GN950-B 4K Gaming Monitor
description: The LG UltraGear 27GN950-B is a 27-inch 4K HDR gaming monitor with a fast 144Hz refresh rate, 1ms response time, and NVIDIA G-Sync compatibility for tear-free gaming. Its Nano IPS panel covers 98% of DCI-P3 for vivid colors and great viewing angles. Multiple connectivity options and RGB lighting on the back make it a versatile centerpiece for gaming or creative workstations.

name: OWC Thunderbolt 4 Dock
description: The OWC Thunderbolt 4 Dock manages connectivity for modern laptops with four Thunderbolt 4 ports, three USB-A ports, audio out, SD card reader, and Ethernet. Supporting 85W charging, dual 4K displays, and fast data transfer, it streamlines workspace setup for power users and creators. Its compact footprint and metal construction ensure both reliability and minimal desk clutter.

name: Anker PowerCore 20000mAh Portable Charger
description: Anker's PowerCore 20000mAh Portable Charger is a reliable power bank for on-the-go charging. Compact yet high-capacity, it can recharge multiple devices several times over. Anker’s proprietary PowerIQ and VoltageBoost technologies ensure efficient, high-speed charging for smartphones, tablets, and other electronics. Its durable construction and multiple output ports make it a travel essential.

name: Dell Ultrasharp U2723QE Monitor
description: Dell’s Ultrasharp U2723QE Monitor features a 27-inch 4K IPS display for crystal-clear images and vivid colors, perfect for creative professionals. With a range of connectivity options, including USB-C with power delivery, HDMI, and DisplayPort, it streamlines desk setups. The monitor’s ergonomic stand allows for easy tilt, swivel, and height adjustments, ensuring maximum comfort during long work sessions.

name: JBL Flip 6 Bluetooth Speaker
description: JBL’s Flip 6 Bluetooth Speaker packs punchy sound in a compact, waterproof design, perfect for outdoor adventures. It delivers deep bass, crisp highs, and overall balanced sound. With 12 hours of battery life, a portable carry strap, and PartyBoost for stereo pairing, the Flip 6 is the go-to for pool parties, picnics, and traveling.

name: HP LaserJet Pro MFP M428fdw
description: The HP LaserJet Pro MFP M428fdw is a versatile all-in-one printer for busy small offices. It offers fast printing, scanning, copying, and faxing capabilities, with robust wireless and mobile printing options. Advanced security features protect sensitive data, while the intuitive touchscreen makes operation easy. Its high-yield toner cartridges and auto-duplexing save time and resources.

name: Garmin Forerunner 965 GPS Watch
description: The Garmin Forerunner 965 is an advanced GPS smartwatch for athletes and active users. Its bright AMOLED display and ultra-light titanium frame are designed for comfort and visibility. It tracks multi-sport activity, advanced health stats, recovery data, and offers turn-by-turn navigation. With music storage and customizable training plans, it’s a comprehensive tool for achieving your fitness goals.

name: LG C3 OLED 55'' 4K TV
description: The LG C3 OLED 55" 4K TV delivers breathtaking image quality with perfect blacks, infinite contrast, and stunning color accuracy, thanks to OLED Evo technology. The a9 Gen6 AI processor enhances picture and sound, offering an immersive cinema-like experience. With support for Dolby Vision, Dolby Atmos, and next-gen gaming features, it’s a top choice for movies, sports, and gaming enthusiasts alike.

name: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold5
description: The Samsung Galaxy Z Fold5 redefines smartphones with its foldable AMOLED display that transforms from a compact device to a tablet-sized screen. It delivers flexibility for multitasking, immersive gaming, and vivid video playback. Powerful cameras, S Pen support, and a slim, durable build make it the flagship for those who want the cutting edge of mobile technology.

name: Sonos One (Gen 2)
description: The Sonos One (Gen 2) is a compact smart speaker that fills your room with rich, detailed audio. With support for both Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant, it offers hands-free voice control for music playback, smart home management, and more. Its modular design integrates seamlessly with other Sonos speakers for multi-room sound.

name: iRobot Roomba J7+
description: The iRobot Roomba J7+ is an intelligent robot vacuum featuring PrecisionVision Navigation to avoid obstacles like pet waste and charging cords. Its self-emptying base means maintenance is minimal, while app integration lets you schedule and monitor cleans from anywhere. Ideal for pet owners and busy households, it keeps floors spotless with minimal input.

name: Acer Predator XB323QK 32" Monitor
description: Acer’s Predator XB323QK is a premium 32-inch 4K gaming monitor with a fast 144Hz refresh rate, low input lag, and stunning color reproduction. With NVIDIA G-Sync compatibility, it delivers buttery-smooth visuals and tear-free gaming experiences. Ergonomic adjustments and ambient RGB lighting ensure both comfort and style in any gaming setup.

name: Instant Pot Duo Crisp with Ultimate Lid
description: The Instant Pot Duo Crisp with Ultimate Lid is a game-changer in modern kitchen tech, combining pressure cooking, air frying, slow cooking, and more in one device. The intuitive controls and integrated air fryer lid provide versatility and convenience. It’s perfect for preparing fast weekday meals or experimenting with new recipes without cluttering the kitchen.

name: Theragun Prime Percussive Massager
description: The Theragun Prime delivers deep muscle treatment with advanced percussive therapy technology. Its ergonomic handle and customizable speed settings reduce muscle soreness, accelerate recovery, and improve overall mobility. The connected app guides users through routines and tracks progress, making it a perfect companion for athletes or anyone seeking pain relief.

name: Oculus Quest 2 VR Headset (Meta Quest 2)
description: The Oculus Quest 2, now known as Meta Quest 2, is an all-in-one VR headset delivering immersive experiences without the need for a PC or console. Its fast processor, high-res display, and extensive game library make it perfect for gaming, fitness, social, and creative apps. Lightweight, adjustable, and wireless, it brings virtual reality to everyone.

name: TP-Link Deco XE75 WiFi 6E Mesh System (3 Pack)
description: The TP-Link Deco XE75 WiFi 6E Mesh System blankets your home with fast, reliable wireless coverage. Harnessing the power of WiFi 6E, it supports multi-gig speeds and handles dozens of connected devices without slowdown. Easy app-based setup, built-in security features, and parental controls make this 3-pack mesh kit a must-have for large homes and busy households.

name: Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra
description: The Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra is a premium flagship smartphone featuring a stunning 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display with a 120Hz refresh rate. Its robust Qualcomm Snapdragon 888 processor ensures seamless multitasking, and up to 16GB of RAM enhances performance even further. Capture exceptional photos and videos with its quad-camera setup, including a powerful 108MP main sensor and up to 100x Space Zoom. The device supports S Pen functionality, has a large 5000mAh battery for all-day use, and comes with 5G connectivity for ultra-fast mobile data speeds. Designed with a sleek glass and metal body, it offers both style and durability.

name: Apple MacBook Pro 16-inch (M1 Pro)
description: The Apple MacBook Pro 16-inch featuring the M1 Pro chip redefines professional laptop performance. Its breathtaking Liquid Retina XDR display delivers vibrant colors and incredible brightness, ideal for creative professionals. Powered by the Apple M1 Pro processor, the MacBook Pro excels at demanding tasks such as 4K video editing, 3D rendering, and complex computation. Its battery life is outstanding, allowing up to 21 hours of usage on a single charge. The enhanced keyboard, improved speakers, and comprehensive port selection—including HDMI and SD Card slot—make this laptop suitable for any workflow.

name: LG C2 OLED 55” 4K Smart TV
description: LG’s C2 OLED 55” Smart TV delivers mesmerizing visuals with deep blacks and infinite contrast, thanks to its advanced OLED Evo technology. It supports Dolby Vision IQ, HDR10, and HLG, offering a cinematic experience from any viewing angle. The TV features the a9 Gen5 AI Processor for smooth performance and intelligent upscaling. With built-in access to streaming apps, voice assistants, NVIDIA G-Sync and AMD FreeSync compatibility for gaming, this TV is ideal for both entertainment and gaming enthusiasts.

name: Anker PowerCore III Elite 25600
description: The Anker PowerCore III Elite 25600 is a high-capacity portable charger with a staggering 25,600mAh battery. Its three USB ports (two USB-A, one USB-C with Power Delivery) allow simultaneous fast charging of multiple devices, including laptops, tablets, and smartphones. The rugged yet sleek design makes it travel-friendly, and comprehensive safety features ensure reliable power on the go.

name: Razer Huntsman V2 Analog
description: The Razer Huntsman V2 Analog gaming keyboard introduces analog optical switches, providing variable key actuation for unparalleled precision and responsiveness. Fully customizable RGB Chroma backlighting, programmable macros, and a comfortable wrist rest enhance long gaming sessions. With USB 3.0 passthrough and durable aluminum construction, this keyboard is designed for competitive gamers seeking an edge.

name: Sonos Beam (Gen 2)
description: Sonos Beam (Gen 2) soundbar upgrades your home audio with immersive Dolby Atmos support, delivering panoramic sound from a compact form factor. Voice control with Alexa and Google Assistant, easy setup via HDMI eARC, and integration with other Sonos speakers for multi-room audio make the Beam perfect for living rooms and entertainment spaces.

name: Seagate Expansion Portable 2TB External Hard Drive
description: The Seagate Expansion Portable 2TB External Hard Drive offers reliable, convenient data storage for backing up important files, photos, and videos. Compact and plug-and-play compatible with Windows and Mac computers, it features USB 3.0 connectivity for fast file transfers. This drive is an ideal solution for mobile professionals, students, or anyone needing extra space on the go.

name: Corsair iCUE H150i ELITE LCD
description: The Corsair iCUE H150i ELITE LCD is a powerful liquid CPU cooler with a customizable LCD display that showcases system stats or custom graphics. Three CORSAIR ML120 RGB fans ensure exceptional cooling and quiet operation, perfect for high-performance gaming PCs. The comprehensive mounting kit supports most Intel and AMD sockets, making this cooler a must-have for PC enthusiasts and overclockers.

name: Sony PlayStation 5 DualSense Wireless Controller
description: The Sony PlayStation 5 DualSense Wireless Controller offers immersive gaming with haptic feedback and adaptive triggers that respond to in-game actions, creating a new dimension of gameplay. Its ergonomic design, built-in microphone, motion sensors, and integrated rechargeable battery make it the essential controller for PS5 owners seeking next-generation interactivity and comfort.

name: Canon PIXMA TR8620a
description: The Canon PIXMA TR8620a all-in-one printer streamlines both home and office tasks with fast wireless printing, scanning, copying, and faxing. Its 4.3-inch LCD touchscreen, auto document feeder, and compatibility with Alexa and Google Assistant make it highly convenient and versatile. With high-resolution photo printing and flexible connectivity—Wi-Fi, Ethernet, and Bluetooth—you get beautiful results every time.

name: ASUS ROG Strix Z690-E Gaming WiFi Motherboard
description: The ASUS ROG Strix Z690-E Gaming WiFi is a premium motherboard supporting Intel’s 12th Gen CPUs, DDR5 memory, and PCIe 5.0. It offers robust power delivery, multiple M.2 slots for fast storage, and integrated WiFi 6E connectivity. With Aura Sync RGB lighting, reinforced PCIe slots, and advanced overclocking tools, it’s the foundation for a powerful, customizable gaming PC.

name: Ultimate Ears BOOM 3
description: The Ultimate Ears BOOM 3 is a rugged, portable Bluetooth speaker delivering bold 360° sound and deep bass. With IP67 waterproof and dustproof rating, it thrives in any environment—beach, pool, or party. It offers up to 15 hours of battery life and features Magic Button technology for easy music control. Lightweight and colorful, the BOOM 3 is the perfect companion for on-the-go listening.

name: Panasonic Arc5 Electric Razor
description: The Panasonic Arc5 Electric Razor offers a close, comfortable shave with its five ultra-sharp precision blades and powerful linear motor. The multi-flex pivoting head adapts to facial contours, and wet/dry operation allows convenient use with or without shaving cream. With a built-in pop-up trimmer and LCD battery indicator, it's the ideal grooming tool for modern men.

name: Bosch 12V Max Cordless Drill/Driver Kit
description: The Bosch 12V Max Cordless Drill/Driver Kit delivers lightweight, powerful performance for tough drilling and fastening jobs in tight spaces. The compact design, intuitive controls, and two included 12V lithium-ion batteries enable all-day use in the workshop or around the house. With a robust chuck and variable-speed trigger, it’s an essential tool for homeowners and professionals alike.

name: Philips Norelco 9800 Wet/Dry Electric Shaver
description: The Philips Norelco 9800 Wet/Dry Electric Shaver offers ultimate comfort and closeness with contour-detect technology and self-sharpening blades. With three shaving modes, skin-protection heads, and a digital interface, it tailors the shave to your skin type. Use it in the shower or dry, and clean up easily thanks to the SmartClean system. It’s the perfect choice for a personalized grooming experience.

name: LG C2 55" OLED TV
description: The LG C2 OLED TV sets a new standard for home cinema with its self-lit pixels, delivering infinite contrast and vivid, true-to-life colors. With support for HDMI 2.1, NVIDIA G-Sync, and a lightning-fast 120Hz refresh rate, it’s the perfect choice for gamers and movie lovers alike. The webOS platform offers intuitive navigation, while its slim design and versatile stand suit any modern living room decor.

name: Bose Smart Soundbar 700
description: The Bose Smart Soundbar 700 delivers immersive audio with deep bass and crystal-clear dialogue for your home entertainment system. It features advanced voice pickup with Google Assistant and Alexa built-in. Its sleek, expertly crafted design fits beautifully in any living room, and Bose’s proprietary ADAPTiQ audio calibration ensures optimal sound for any environment.

name: Apple iPad Pro 12.9" (6th Gen)
description: The iPad Pro 12.9” (6th Gen) pairs the blazing-fast M2 processor with a Liquid Retina XDR display for stunning graphics and responsiveness. Designed for creative professionals, it supports Apple Pencil and the Magic Keyboard, transforming the tablet into a powerful mobile workstation. Advanced camera systems, 5G connectivity, and robust battery life round out this top-tier tablet experience.

name: Jabra Elite 85t
description: Jabra Elite 85t earbuds provide active noise cancellation, customizable fit, and rich, clear sound in a compact design. Up to 25 hours of battery life with the charging case ensures all-day listening. Intuitive touch controls and robust water-resistance make them versatile for work, workouts, and travel.

name: Oculus Quest 2 (Meta Quest 2)
description: Meta Quest 2 is an all-in-one VR headset offering immersive gaming, fitness, and social experiences. With a fast processor, crisp display, and wireless freedom, it stands out for its plug-and-play simplicity. The expansive library of games and apps ensures fun for players of all ages without the need for a PC or console.

name: HP Envy Inspire 7955e
description: The HP Envy Inspire 7955e is an all-in-one printer designed for home and small office efficiency, handling high-quality printing, scanning, and copying. With robust wireless connectivity and compatibility with HP+, it makes mobile printing and remote operation effortless. Fast print speeds, easy touchscreen controls, and eco-friendly cartridges make it a top choice for productivity.

name: Razer Basilisk V3 Pro
description: The Razer Basilisk V3 Pro is a wireless gaming mouse featuring a 30K DPI optical sensor, customizable Chroma RGB lighting, and 11 programmable buttons. Its ergonomic shape supports long hours of gaming, while advanced switch technology ensures instant responsiveness. Suitable for competitive and casual gamers looking for both performance and comfort.

name: Sonos Roam
description: The Sonos Roam is a portable smart speaker with Wi-Fi and Bluetooth capabilities, designed for seamless sound everywhere you go. With rich bass, clear vocals, and automatic Trueplay tuning, it adapts to any environment. Waterproof and drop-resistant, it’s ideal for outdoor adventures and home audio setups, supporting voice assistance for hands-free convenience.

name: Garmin Fenix 7
description: Garmin Fenix 7 is a rugged multisport GPS smartwatch offering advanced training tools, health metrics, and long battery life. Its touchscreen and physical buttons allow easy navigation during workouts or outdoor adventures. Mapping, solar charging options, and water resistance make it a favorite for athletes, explorers, and fitness enthusiasts alike.

name: Acer Predator X34
description: Acer Predator X34 is a 34-inch curved ultra-wide monitor with QHD resolution and NVIDIA G-Sync for ultra-smooth gaming. Featuring an IPS panel with vibrant colors, a 144Hz refresh rate, and ergonomic design, it’s built for immersive gameplay and multitasking. Customizable RGB lighting adds a touch of personality to any gaming setup.

name: Lenovo Yoga Tab 13
description: The Lenovo Yoga Tab 13 is an entertainment powerhouse with a large 13-inch 2K display, quad JBL speakers, and built-in kickstand. Ideal for streaming, gaming, and productivity, it offers long battery life, stylus support, and a micro HDMI input for use as a portable monitor. Its soft-touch back and versatile design make it a unique choice for multimedia lovers.

name: WD My Passport 5TB Portable External Hard Drive
description: The WD My Passport 5TB offers massive portable storage with USB 3.0 speed and robust hardware encryption. Slim and pocket-sized, it’s designed for secure transport of important files, photos, and videos. With automatic backup options and a reliable build, it's perfect for students, creatives, and travelers needing extra space on the go.

name: Theragun PRO (4th Gen)
description: The Theragun PRO (4th Gen) is a professional-grade percussive therapy massager providing deep muscle recovery and relaxation. With a quiet, powerful motor, customizable speeds, and interchangeable attachments, it caters to athletes and anyone seeking muscle relief. The OLED display and Bluetooth app integration allow for tailored routines and guided therapy sessions.

name: Sony A80K 65" OLED TV
description: The Sony A80K 65” OLED TV dazzles with stunning contrast, vibrant colors, and XR Motion Clarity technology for smooth, immersive viewing. A Google TV interface ensures easy access to popular streaming services, while acoustic surface audio+ delivers precise sound directly from the screen itself. It’s a focal point for home theaters and living rooms alike.

name: Asus ROG Zephyrus G14
description: The Asus ROG Zephyrus G14 is a compact gaming laptop featuring AMD Ryzen 9 processors, Radeon RX graphics, and a 14-inch QHD display. With customizable LED lid animations, a magnesium-alloy chassis, and long battery life, it blends style with power. The precision keyboard and cooling system deliver top-tier gaming on the go.

name: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Machine
description: The Nespresso Vertuo Next brings café-style coffee and espresso into your home with one-touch brewing and Centrifusion extraction technology. It supports a range of pod sizes for different cup types and includes a compact design for small spaces. Connectivity with the Nespresso app offers maintenance alerts and flavor discovery.

name: Samsung Odyssey G7 32" Curved Gaming Monitor
description: The Samsung Odyssey G7 is a 32-inch curved QHD gaming monitor with a 240Hz refresh rate and 1ms response time. Quantum Dot technology delivers stunning color accuracy and deep contrast, while NVIDIA G-Sync and FreeSync Premium ensure tear-free gaming. Its bold design and customizable RGB add flair to any gaming environment.

name: Corsair HS80 RGB Wireless Gaming Headset
description: The Corsair HS80 RGB Wireless Gaming Headset offers high-fidelity audio through custom-tuned 50mm drivers and Dolby Atmos support for competitive play. Memory foam ear pads, a broadcast-quality microphone, and dynamic RGB lighting deliver style and comfort. Robust wireless connectivity and long battery life make it an exciting choice for immersive gaming sessions.

name: Vivint Smart Door Lock
description: The Vivint Smart Door Lock provides secure, keyless entry with touchscreen access codes, smartphone control, and integration with the Vivint security ecosystem. Its auto-lock and tamper alerts enhance home security, while the sleek, weather-resistant design fits seamlessly into any modern doorway.

name: Insta360 ONE RS Twin Edition
description: The Insta360 ONE RS Twin Edition offers modular shooting with interchangeable 4K Boost Lens and 360° lens modules. Rugged, waterproof, and featuring FlowState Stabilization, it’s perfect for vloggers, adrenaline junkies, and creative professionals. Quick editing tools, AI highlights, and live streaming options set it apart in the action camera market.

name: ASUS ZenBook 14X OLED
description: The ASUS ZenBook 14X OLED combines breathtaking OLED visuals, lightweight construction, and robust Intel Core performance. The 14-inch NanoEdge touchscreen provides vivid colors, high contrast, and intuitive controls for creative work. With long battery life, advanced cooling, and extensive connectivity, it serves both mobile workers and multimedia enthusiasts.

name: TP-Link Kasa Smart Plug Mini (4 pack)
description: TP-Link’s Kasa Smart Plug Mini allows voice or app-based control of appliances and lamps from anywhere, supporting schedules and energy monitoring. Compact and easy to install, they work seamlessly with Alexa, Google Assistant, and SmartThings, making them an affordable step toward home automation.

name: Philips Sonicare DiamondClean Smart 9500
description: The Philips Sonicare DiamondClean Smart 9500 electric toothbrush offers personalized coaching, smart sensors, and five unique modes for extraordinary oral care. The glass charger cup adds elegance to bathroom counters, while the connected app ensures optimal brushing and dental hygiene habits for every user.

name: Logitech C922 Pro Stream Webcam
description: The Logitech C922 Pro Stream Webcam is tailored for streaming and video conferencing with Full HD 1080p clarity, automatic light correction, and stereo microphones. Its sturdy tripod and background removal technology make it a staple for content creators and professionals aiming for high-quality online presence.

name: LaCie Rugged Mini 4TB External Hard Drive
description: The LaCie Rugged Mini 4TB is known for its shock, rain, and pressure resistance, making it the go-to option for field photographers and travelers. High-speed USB 3.0 transfers and easy compatibility with Mac and PC streamline workflows for saving and backing up large media projects quickly and reliably.

name: Anova Culinary Precision Cooker Nano
description: The Anova Culinary Precision Cooker Nano makes sous vide cooking accessible with compact design and simple dial controls. Bluetooth connectivity and the Anova app enable precise temperature regulation for perfectly cooked meals every time. It attaches easily to any pot and is easy to clean, suiting home chefs seeking professional results.

name: Satechi Aluminum Multi-Port Adapter V2
description: The Satechi Aluminum Multi-Port Adapter V2 provides MacBook and laptop users with expanded connectivity, including HDMI, USB-C PD charging, USB-A, SD card reader, and Ethernet ports in a sleek aluminum body. Its plug-and-play design eliminates cable clutter, making it essential for remote work and productivity setups.

name: Keychron K6 Wireless Mechanical Keyboard
description: The Keychron K6 is a versatile wireless mechanical keyboard offering hot-swappable key switches, RGB backlighting, and compact 65% layout for space-saving productivity. With Bluetooth or wired modes, it connects to three devices at once, making it ideal for multitaskers and typing enthusiasts.

name: Samsung HW-Q990B Soundbar
description: The Samsung HW-Q990B Soundbar provides lifelike surround sound with 11.1.4 channels, Dolby Atmos and DTS:X support, and wireless rear speakers. Q-Symphony blends TV and soundbar speakers for immersive audio, while SpaceFit Sound Pro ensures optimal tuning for your room. Designed for home theater setups that demand cinematic audio quality.

name: BenQ GV30 Portable Projector
description: The BenQ GV30 is a compact, portable projector featuring 720p HD projection, integrated Android TV, and auto focus for effortless big-screen viewing anywhere. Its 2.1 channel Bluetooth speakers provide powerful sound, while its rotating lens enables unique angles for movie nights or presentations on the go.

name: Apple MacBook Pro 16-inch M2 Pro
description: The Apple MacBook Pro 16-inch with M2 Pro chip delivers powerful computing performance for professionals and creatives. Its Liquid Retina XDR display showcases stunning visuals, while the unified memory architecture ensures smooth multitasking. Features like MagSafe charging, upgraded speakers, and a long-lasting battery round out this flagship laptop.

name: LG C3 Series 65-inch OLED TV
description: The LG C3 Series OLED TV offers ultra-realistic picture quality with self-lit OLED pixels, delivering deep blacks and vivid colors. Dolby Vision and Atmos support provide immersive viewing, and its smart webOS platform supports all major streaming apps, making this TV ideal for home theater enthusiasts.

name: Fitbit Versa 4
description: Fitbit Versa 4 combines advanced fitness and health tracking with a lightweight, swim-proof design. Featuring heart rate monitoring, sleep tracking, built-in GPS, and up to 6 days of battery, it’s perfect for those tracking workouts and daily health stats.

name: Garmin Forerunner 255
description: The Garmin Forerunner 255 is a versatile GPS running watch offering advanced performance metrics, heart rate tracking, sleep analysis, and multisport modes. With up to 14 days of battery life in smartwatch mode, it’s a companion for serious runners and fitness fans.

name: Samsung Odyssey G9 Neo 49"
description: The Samsung Odyssey G9 Neo is a 49-inch ultrawide curved gaming monitor with Quantum Mini-LED technology, fast refresh rates, and vivid HDR2000 contrast. Designed for immersive gaming and productivity, it supports dual QHD resolution and multiple connectivity options.

name: Leica Q3
description: Leica Q3 is a full-frame compact camera known for its exceptional build quality and 60MP sensor. The Summilux 28mm f/1.7 lens, intuitive controls, and weather-sealed body make it a favorite among street photographers and enthusiasts looking for uncompromising image quality.

name: Belkin BOOST↑CHARGE PRO 3-in-1 Wireless Charger
description: Belkin’s BOOST↑CHARGE PRO 3-in-1 Wireless Charger powers iPhone, Apple Watch, and AirPods simultaneously with MagSafe compatibility. Its sleek design, fast charging speeds, and ease of use make it an ideal addition to any nightstand or workspace.

name: LG UltraFine 27MD5KL-B Monitor
description: The LG UltraFine 27MD5KL-B is a 5K monitor designed for creative pros, featuring Thunderbolt 3 connectivity and precise color reproduction. With a wide color gamut and high brightness, it’s the perfect companion for Mac users needing top-quality displays for design, photography, or video work.

name: TCL 6-Series 75" Mini-LED QLED TV
description: The TCL 6-Series TV combines Mini-LED backlighting with QLED quantum dot technology for exceptional contrast, vivid color, and deep blacks. Dolby Vision, HDR10, and game mode features make it ideal for movies and next-gen gaming.

name: Amazon Fire HD 10 (13th Gen)
description: The Amazon Fire HD 10 tablet features a vivid full HD 10.1-inch display, powerful octa-core processor, up to 13 hours of battery, and Alexa integration. Ideal for reading, streaming, and light productivity, it's a budget-friendly tablet for everyday use.

name: ASUS ROG Strix G16 (2023)
description: The ASUS ROG Strix G16 is a powerhouse gaming laptop equipped with Intel Core i9 processors, NVIDIA RTX 4060 graphics, and a 165Hz 16-inch display. Advanced cooling, customizable RGB, and robust build quality ensure top-tier gaming and productivity capabilities.

name: Bosch 800 Series Dishwasher SHPM88Z75N
description: Bosch's 800 Series dishwasher delivers ultra-quiet cleaning, PrecisionWash technology, in-rack water jets, and a flexible third rack for more loading space. Its energy efficiency and reliability make it a sought-after choice for modern kitchens.

name: EcoFlow Delta 2 Portable Power Station
description: The EcoFlow Delta 2 Portable Power Station offers a high-capacity battery with fast charging, multiple AC/DC outlets, and solar panel compatibility. Ideal for camping, emergencies, or backup power, it provides reliable, clean energy on the go.

name: Steam Deck 512GB
description: Valve's Steam Deck is a handheld gaming system packing a custom AMD APU, 7-inch touchscreen, and 512GB NVMe SSD. Designed for seamless PC gaming on the go, it supports a vast library, customizable controls, and expands into a desktop experience when docked.

name: Apple HomePod (2nd Gen)
description: The Apple HomePod (2nd Gen) delivers spatial audio, voice assistant features, and seamless integration into the Apple ecosystem. With high-fidelity sound, adaptive audio tuning, and privacy-focused controls, it’s the choice for audiophiles seeking a smart home speaker.

name: Tineco Pure ONE S15 Pet
description: The Tineco Pure ONE S15 Pet cordless vacuum offers intelligent suction adjustment, powerful pet hair removal, and a freestanding design. Its smart LED display, washable filters, and quiet operation make it ideal for pet owners seeking thorough home cleaning.

name: TP-Link Archer AX11000 Gaming Router
description: The TP-Link Archer AX11000 is a tri-band WiFi 6 gaming router with ultra-low latency, advanced security features, eight high-gain antennas, and a robust 1.8GHz quad-core CPU. Gamers and power users enjoy prioritized traffic, expanded device support, and blazing-fast throughput for demanding setups.

name: Bang & Olufsen Beoplay EX Wireless Earbuds
description: Bang & Olufsen’s Beoplay EX wireless earbuds offer luxurious design, adaptive ANC, IP57 dust/water resistance, and up to 28 hours of playback with their charging case. Audiophiles will appreciate their rich, natural sound signature and comfortable all-day wear.

name: WD My Passport 4TB Portable External HDD
description: The WD My Passport 4TB external hard drive offers massive portable storage, automated backup options, password protection, and USB 3.0 compatibility. Its compact, colorful design makes it easy to carry, and it works seamlessly with both PC and Mac systems.

name: Roku Ultra (2023 Edition)
description: The Roku Ultra 2023 Edition delivers top-tier 4K, Dolby Vision, and Dolby Atmos streaming, plus a voice remote with lost-remote finder. It features ultra-fast startup, Ethernet/WiFi connectivity, and private listening options for the ultimate streaming media experience.

name: Marshall Emberton II Portable Speaker
description: The Marshall Emberton II is a portable Bluetooth speaker with signature Marshall sound, 30+ hours of playtime, and an iconic rock-inspired design. Its rugged, water-resistant build and multi-directional audio make it essential for music lovers on the move.

name: Reolink Argus 3 Pro WiFi Security Camera
description: The Reolink Argus 3 Pro is a battery-powered WiFi security camera featuring 2K video, spotlights, color night vision, and flexible storage (microSD or cloud). Its easy installation, robust motion detection, and weatherproof design provide peace of mind for property owners.

name: Apple MacBook Pro 14-inch (M2, 2023)
description: Apple’s MacBook Pro 14-inch (M2, 2023) is a powerhouse designed for creative professionals. Powered by the latest Apple Silicon chip, it boasts a stunning Liquid Retina XDR display, all-day battery life, and extraordinary performance for tasks like video editing, music production, and software development. Its sleek aluminum chassis and advanced thermal management ensure efficient usage on the go.

name: LG OLED C2 Series 65-Inch 4K TV
description: The LG OLED C2 Series offers breathtaking picture quality with infinite contrast and vibrant, accurate colors thanks to its OLED Evo panel. The 65-inch 4K TV features Dolby Vision, HDMI 2.1 support, and an intuitive webOS interface, making it perfect for binge-watching, gaming, or cinema experiences at home. Superior audio and advanced AI upscaling ensure a premium entertainment experience.

name: TP-Link Archer AX55 WiFi 6 Router
description: The TP-Link Archer AX55 brings blazing fast WiFi 6 speeds, improved capacity, and enhanced security for households and small offices. With four high-gain antennas, OFDMA, and MU-MIMO technology, you get seamless 4K streaming and gaming performance across multiple devices. The intuitive Tether app simplifies setup and network management.

name: Anker PowerCore Essential 20000mAh Portable Charger
description: The Anker PowerCore Essential 20000mAh delivers reliable, high-capacity portable charging wherever you go. Equipped with dual USB outputs and PowerIQ technology, it can charge two devices simultaneously and rapidly. Its slim, durable design fits easily in a bag, making it perfect for travelers, students, and professionals needing to stay powered up on the go.

name: Canon imageCLASS MF644Cdw All-in-One Laser Printer
description: The Canon imageCLASS MF644Cdw is a versatile color laser printer that offers printing, scanning, copying, and faxing. With wireless connectivity, a large touchscreen, and high-speed duplex printing, this all-in-one is ideal for small businesses and home offices looking for reliability and efficiency.

name: Apple AirTag (4-Pack)
description: Apple AirTags help you keep track of important items with ease. Using Bluetooth and Apple’s Find My network, they are perfect for keys, bags, wallets, or luggage. The ultra-compact design and long-lasting replaceable battery offer peace of mind for everyday life or travel.

name: NETGEAR Orbi RBK852 Mesh WiFi 6 System
description: The NETGEAR Orbi RBK852 is a high-performance mesh WiFi 6 system that covers up to 5,000 square feet with fast, reliable internet. With tri-band technology, advanced parental controls, and easy setup, it’s an ideal solution for eliminating dead zones in large homes and supporting numerous connected devices.

name: Huawei MateBook X Pro 2023
description: The Huawei MateBook X Pro 2023 is an ultra-thin, stylish laptop with a stunning 3K display. Powered by Intel Core i7 processors and packed with a comfortable keyboard, large touchpad, and long battery life, it is designed for professionals who need performance and portability in a premium chassis.

name: LG UltraGear 34GP950G-B 34-Inch Curved Gaming Monitor
description: The LG UltraGear 34GP950G-B delivers an immersive gaming experience with its 34-inch Nano IPS curved display, 144Hz refresh rate, and NVIDIA G-SYNC compatibility. Sharp QHD resolution and vibrant colors make it perfect for competitive and casual gamers seeking stunning visuals and smooth gameplay.

name: WD_BLACK SN850X 2TB NVMe SSD
description: The WD_BLACK SN850X is a high-performance 2TB NVMe SSD engineered for gamers and professionals. With ultra-fast PCIe Gen4 speeds, heatsink-equipped designs, and advanced reliability, it drastically decreases load times and keeps your games and applications running at lightning speed.

name: Tile Pro Bluetooth Tracker (2022)
description: The Tile Pro Bluetooth Tracker helps you quickly find misplaced items with increased range and a handy keyring loop. Its durable, water-resistant design and powerful Tile network make locating lost keys, bags, or backpacks easy from your phone app, delivering peace of mind for the forgetful.

name: Samsung Odyssey G7 32-Inch QHD Gaming Monitor
description: The Samsung Odyssey G7 delivers a dynamic gaming experience with its 32-inch QHD curved display, 240Hz refresh rate, and QLED technology. G-SYNC and FreeSync Premium support ensure ultra-smooth, tear-free gaming, while deep contrast and immersive visuals set a new standard for enthusiast monitors.

name: Roborock Q7 Max+ Robot Vacuum and Mop
description: The Roborock Q7 Max+ combines intelligent mapping, strong suction, and advanced mopping for automated cleaning of both carpets and hard floors. Self-emptying functionality, large battery life, and app control make it a standout for busy families or anyone seeking a hands-off approach to spotless floors.

name: Vizio V-Series 50-Inch 4K Smart TV (2023)
description: The Vizio V-Series delivers a vibrant 4K HDR picture across its 50-inch display, along with built-in streaming apps and voice remote. Gamers benefit from low input lag and Variable Refresh Rate (VRR), while families enjoy value-driven smart TV entertainment at the touch of a button.

name: Sony ZV-1 Digital Vlogging Camera
description: The Sony ZV-1 is a compact digital camera optimized for vlogging, YouTube, and social media creators. With its fast autofocus, bright lens, flip-out screen, and integrated microphone, it’s built to produce stunning video and crisp audio whether you’re shooting indoors or outside.

name: Samsung Portable SSD T7 1TB
description: The Samsung Portable SSD T7 provides blazing fast read/write speeds, shock resistance, and ultra-compact portability. With USB 3.2 Gen 2 support, it securely transfers large files, videos, and backups wherever you need, fitting safely in your pocket or bag.

name: Dell UltraSharp U2723QE 27-Inch 4K USB-C Monitor
description: The Dell UltraSharp U2723QE is a professional 27-inch 4K monitor with true-to-life color, high contrast, and Thunderbolt/USB-C connectivity for single-cable display and charging. Its ergonomic stand and wide viewing angles suit designers, editors, and anyone needing crisp, reliable desktop visuals.

name: Ultimate Ears BOOM 3 Portable Bluetooth Speaker
description: The Ultimate Ears BOOM 3 delivers loud, jaw-dropping 360-degree sound with deep bass and accurate clarity. Waterproof, dustproof, and drop-proof, it’s made for adventures and parties. With up to 15 hours of battery life and easy one-touch music control, it’s ready for every outdoor occasion.

name: Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra 5G
description: The Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra 5G is the ultimate flagship device tailored for demanding users. It features a gorgeous 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, a Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 chipset, and a groundbreaking 200MP main camera for incredibly detailed photos. Capture 8K videos, enjoy smooth gaming, and multitask with up to 12GB RAM. The S Pen stylus is integrated for note-taking and creative tasks. Boasting a 5000mAh battery, ultra-fast charging, and robust security features, the S23 Ultra excels whether at work, play, or on the go.

name: LG OLED C2 Series 55-inch TV
description: Immerse yourself in vibrant colors, true blacks, and cinematic picture quality with the LG OLED C2 Series 55-inch 4K Smart TV. Powered by the a9 Gen5 AI Processor, it automatically enhances contrast and detail scene-by-scene. With support for Dolby Vision IQ, Dolby Atmos, HDMI 2.1, and NVIDIA G-Sync, the C2 is perfect for movie enthusiasts and gamers alike. Its ultra-slim design complements modern living spaces, and hands-free voice control makes navigating apps and features effortless. Enjoy stunning visuals with four HDMI ports, webOS streaming, and built-in Wi-Fi.

name: Google Nest Thermostat (4th Gen)
description: The Google Nest Thermostat (4th Gen) is a sleek, energy-saving device designed to optimize home heating and cooling. Its minimalist touchscreen allows easy temperature adjustments, while intelligent scheduling and remote access via the Google Home app ensure your home always feels comfortable. The thermostat helps save energy with Eco and Away modes, provides helpful energy usage insights, and works seamlessly with Google Assistant and Alexa. Quick and simple installation adds further convenience, making it the perfect upgrade for smart home integration.

name: LG OLED C2 Series 55-Inch TV
description: The LG OLED C2 Series 55-Inch TV stands at the pinnacle of home entertainment, offering breathtaking picture quality thanks to its OLED panel with self-lit pixels. Each pixel independently produces rich, accurate colors and infinite contrast, which is ideal for movie buffs and gamers. The α9 Gen5 AI Processor enhances upscaling and motion handling, while the webOS platform gives you access to a vast range of streaming apps. Thin, modern design and support for Dolby Vision IQ make this TV a centerpiece in any living space.

name: Garmin Fenix 7 Sapphire Solar Watch
description: The Garmin Fenix 7 Sapphire Solar is a rugged, multisport smartwatch designed for the serious adventurer. With solar charging capabilities, it offers extended battery life for hiking, biking, and outdoor explorations. Its robust GPS system, health monitoring sensors, and built-in apps support a wide range of activities. The durable sapphire crystal lens and stainless steel bezel withstand harsh environments, while smart notifications and music storage add convenience for active lifestyles.

name: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4090 Graphics Card
description: The NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4090 is the ultimate graphics card for gamers and professionals, offering breakthrough performance, stunning ray-traced visuals, and AI-powered features. Equipped with 24GB of GDDR6X memory and the Ada Lovelace architecture, it delivers smooth gameplay at 4K resolutions. It's a top choice for creators, engineers, and competitive gamers seeking the very best in PC graphics technology.

name: Apple iPad Pro 12.9" (M2, 2022)
description: The Apple iPad Pro 12.9-inch (2022) with the M2 chip brings unmatched power to creative professionals, students, and business users. The Liquid Retina XDR display provides outstanding brightness and crisp detail, while compatibility with Apple Pencil (2nd Gen) and Magic Keyboard enables powerful workflows. With ultra-fast Wi-Fi, advanced cameras and LiDAR scanner, this iPad sets the new standard for what a tablet can achieve.

name: Eufy Security 2K Video Doorbell
description: Keep your home secure with the Eufy Security 2K Video Doorbell. Offering crisp 2K resolution and advanced motion detection, it lets you see visitors with clarity and receive instant notifications on your smartphone. Two-way audio allows for real-time conversations, while local storage ensures your footage stays private and free from subscription fees. Its weather-resistant design and easy installation make it a dependable choice for modern homeowners.

name: JBL PartyBox 310 Portable Speaker
description: The JBL PartyBox 310 is the ultimate portable Bluetooth speaker for parties and outdoor events. With 240W of JBL Pro Sound, dazzling LED light shows, and up to 18 hours of battery life, it creates an electrifying atmosphere anywhere. The splash-proof design and built-in handle with wheels allow easy transport, while connectivity for microphones and instruments supports karaoke and live performance. It's the perfect centerpiece for memorable gatherings.

name: Kindle Scribe E-Reader
description: The Kindle Scribe welcomes readers and note-takers alike with its large 10.2-inch glare-free display and built-in stylus. Enjoy millions of ebooks, annotate documents, and jot down notes just as you would on paper. The adjustable warm light and long battery life make it comfortable to use day or night. Designed for students, writers, and avid readers, the Kindle Scribe is a versatile companion for both work and leisure reading.

name: Acer Predator XB273U Gaming Monitor
description: The Acer Predator XB273U Gaming Monitor delivers a superior gaming experience with its fast 27-inch QHD IPS panel, 170Hz refresh rate, and 0.5ms response time. NVIDIA G-SYNC support eliminates screen tearing, ensuring smooth, immersive gameplay. Fully adjustable stand, vivid colors, and multiple connectivity options make it an excellent choice for serious gamers seeking a competitive edge.

name: Philips Sonicare DiamondClean 9000 Electric Toothbrush
description: The Philips Sonicare DiamondClean 9000 delivers a dentist-like clean at home with its sonic technology and four brushing modes. The sleek, ergonomic handle and smart pressure sensor protect gums, while Bluetooth connectivity tracks your brushing habits via app. Its long battery life, travel case, and elegant design make it a luxurious upgrade to your daily routine.

name: BenQ TK700STi 4K Gaming Projector
description: The BenQ TK700STi 4K Gaming Projector is the ultimate display for gamers and movie lovers who want immersive big-screen action. With ultra-low input lag, crisp 4K HDR resolution, and Android TV built-in, enjoy vivid visuals and smooth gameplay. Flexible throw distances and easy setup make it ideal for any living room or dedicated gaming space.

name: Fujifilm Instax Mini Link 2 Smartphone Printer
description: The Fujifilm Instax Mini Link 2 turns your favorite photos into tangible memories. Connect your smartphone via Bluetooth and print credit card-sized instant photos in seconds. Fun filters, frames, and creative modes add a playful touch. Its lightweight, portable design ensures you can share prints with friends and family anytime, anywhere.

name: Sony UBP-X700 4K Ultra HD Blu-ray Player
description: Experience true cinematic quality at home with the Sony UBP-X700 4K Ultra HD Blu-ray Player. It supports a wide range of disc formats, delivering sharp, detailed video with HDR10 and Dolby Vision. Wi-Fi connectivity allows easy streaming from popular apps, while dual HDMI outputs provide versatile audio and video options. Sleek and compact, it's perfect for dedicated movie buffs and family living rooms.

name: Asus ROG Strix Scar 17 SE Laptop
description: The Asus ROG Strix Scar 17 SE is a gaming powerhouse featuring a 17.3-inch QHD display, 12th Gen Intel Core i9 processor, RTX 3080 Ti graphics, and customizable RGB lighting. Its advanced cooling and high refresh rate make it ideal for esports and AAA titles. Robust build, per-key backlit keyboard, and fast storage promise top-tier gaming performance on the go.

name: Eero Pro 6E Tri-band Mesh Wi-Fi 6E System (3-pack)
description: The Eero Pro 6E delivers lightning-fast, whole-home Wi-Fi coverage with its advanced tri-band mesh and Wi-Fi 6E support. The three-unit system eliminates dead zones and provides gigabit speeds for dozens of devices. Easy app-based setup, smart home integration, and robust security make it an excellent upgrade for modern households and remote workspaces.

name: Samsung Jet 90 Cordless Stick Vacuum
description: The Samsung Jet 90 Cordless Stick Vacuum makes daily cleaning effortless with its lightweight design, strong suction, and removable battery for extended runtime. The telescopic pipe and multi-surface brush head suit carpets and hard floors, while the intuitive display shows battery status and mode. Wall-mounted charging keeps your home organized as you breeze through chores.

name: Sony SRS-XB43 Portable Bluetooth Speaker
description: The Sony SRS-XB43 Portable Bluetooth Speaker brings big sound and deep bass anywhere you go. Designed for parties and travel, it features up to 24 hours of playback, waterproof and dustproof construction, and multicolor lights that sync to the beat. Party Connect allows you to link up to 100 speakers for huge sound, while the sturdy build ensures it goes the distance.

name: Casio G-Shock GBD200 Fitness Smartwatch
description: The Casio G-Shock GBD200 combines traditional G-Shock durability with modern fitness-tracking features. Its slim, shock-resistant body is water-resistant up to 200 meters, while Bluetooth pairing allows for smartphone notifications and workout stats. The vibrant MIP display and customizable training modes ensure you stay on track with your wellness goals, whether you're in the gym or outdoors.

name: Samsung Odyssey G9 Neo Curved Monitor
description: The Samsung Odyssey G9 Neo is a 49-inch ultra-wide curved gaming monitor with Quantum Mini-LED technology for breathtaking HDR and brilliant color. Its 240Hz refresh rate, 1ms response time, and G-SYNC compatibility create a smooth, immersive PC gaming or multitasking experience. This futuristic display is perfect for creators, gamers, and power users.

name: MacBook Air M2
description: The Apple MacBook Air M2 is a lightweight and powerful laptop with a next-generation M2 chip, offering improved CPU and GPU performance. Its 13.6-inch Liquid Retina display delivers vibrant colors, while the fanless design keeps things silent and cool. With up to 18 hours of battery life, it’s perfect for students and professionals alike.

name: LG C2 OLED TV
description: The LG C2 OLED TV delivers perfect blacks, vibrant colors, and wide viewing angles thanks to its self-lit pixel technology. Powered by the a9 Gen 5 AI Processor, it optimizes picture and sound for any content. Gamers will enjoy its HDMI 2.1, low latency, and 120Hz refresh rate, while movie lovers relish its cinematic image quality.

name: Nikon Z9
description: The Nikon Z9 is a flagship mirrorless camera aimed at professionals, offering a 45.7MP stacked CMOS sensor and 8K video. Its robust autofocus system, blackout-free viewfinder, and durable build ensure high performance in any environment. With advanced video and stills capabilities, it’s trusted by sports and wildlife photographers worldwide.

name: Anker PowerCore Essential 20000
description: The Anker PowerCore Essential 20000 is a high-capacity portable charger delivering up to 20,000mAh, allowing you to charge multiple devices on the go. It supports PowerIQ and VoltageBoost technologies for optimized charging, and its slim, robust design offers reliable backup in travel or emergencies.

name: Samsung 980 PRO NVMe SSD 2TB
description: The Samsung 980 PRO NVMe SSD delivers read speeds of up to 7,000 MB/s and uses PCIe Gen4 technology, providing fast performance for gaming, content creation, and data-intensive work. Its compact design and robust thermal control make it an ideal upgrade for desktops and laptops requiring reliable high-speed storage.

name: LG UltraGear 27GP950-B
description: The LG UltraGear 27GP950-B is a 27-inch 4K UHD Nano IPS gaming monitor with a 144Hz refresh rate and 1ms response time. It supports NVIDIA G-Sync and AMD FreeSync Premium Pro, offering ultra-smooth gameplay and stunning color accuracy. Ideal for competitive gamers desiring a vivid, responsive display.

name: WD My Passport 5TB External Hard Drive
description: The WD My Passport 5TB external hard drive provides massive portable storage for your files, photos, and videos. It features USB 3.0 connectivity, password protection and backup software for added security and convenience. Slim, durable, and perfect for on-the-go or at-home backups.

name: Instant Pot Pro Plus 6 Quart Wifi Smart Cooker
description: The Instant Pot Pro Plus 6 Quart Wifi Smart Cooker brings cooking into the digital age with smart Wi-Fi controls via app. It combines 10 appliances in one, allowing you to pressure cook, slow cook, sauté, steam, and more. With programmable recipes and voice assistant support, meal preparation is smarter and more efficient than ever.

name: Razer Kiyo Pro Webcam
description: The Razer Kiyo Pro delivers uncompressed 1080p 60FPS video with an adaptive light sensor for excellent performance in any lighting condition. Its wide-angle lens and advanced imaging features make it perfect for streaming, conferencing, or online teaching, ensuring you always look your best.

name: Anova Precision Cooker Nano
description: The Anova Precision Cooker Nano is a compact immersion circulator for sous vide cooking. With Wi-Fi connectivity and app control, it allows precise temperature management for restaurant-quality meals at home. Easy to use and versatile, it’s a must-have for home chefs seeking perfectly cooked dishes every time.

name: Coros Vertix 2 GPS Adventure Watch
description: The Coros Vertix 2 is a rugged GPS adventure watch built for explorers, offering dual-frequency satellite tracking, a 60-day battery in standard mode, and offline topo maps. With pulse oximeter, barometer, and smart notifications, it’s engineered for extreme environments—from high-altitude climbs to deep woodlands.

name: Anker PowerCore 26800 PD Portable Charger
description: Anker PowerCore 26800 PD provides massive portable charging power with three USB ports and fast Power Delivery support. Ideal for travel, it can charge a smartphone multiple times or power up a tablet and laptop on the go. The robust build and multi-protect safety system make it a reliable power solution for busy lives.

name: Western Digital My Passport 4TB Portable External Hard Drive
description: Western Digital My Passport external hard drive equips you with reliable, abundant storage on the go. With 4TB of space, you can safely carry massive files or backup your computer. Hardware encryption and automatic backup software safeguard your data, while its slim, stylish design fits easily in bags or pockets.

name: LG C3 OLED Evo 55" 4K Smart TV
description: LG C3 OLED Evo brings cinema-quality visuals home with self-lit pixels for perfect blacks and infinite contrast. The 4K Ultra HD display, Dolby Vision, and a suite of gaming features—like NVIDIA G-Sync support—make it a favorite among cinephiles and gamers. Its webOS smart platform offers seamless access to streaming services and smart home controls.

name: Samsung T7 Shield 2TB Rugged Portable SSD
description: Samsung T7 Shield 2TB offers lightning-fast read/write speeds in a shock-resistant, water, and dust-proof design. This rugged portable SSD is ideal for photographers, videographers, or anyone needing reliable data storage on the go. With a compact, pocketable form factor and password protection, your data stays both accessible and secure.

name: Harman Kardon Onyx Studio 8 Bluetooth Speaker
description: The Harman Kardon Onyx Studio 8 delivers signature rich, room-filling sound in a beautifully designed portable Bluetooth speaker. With up to 8 hours of battery life, a built-in microphone for calls, and automatic room calibration, it adapts perfectly for any gathering or solo listening session. The premium materials ensure it looks as good as it sounds.

name: Apple AirTag (4-pack)
description: Apple AirTag is a lightweight, intuitive tracker to help locate keys, bags, or other important belongings. Using the vast Find My network, it pinpoints lost items on a map and enables Precision Finding via nearby iPhones. With a replaceable battery and water resistance, it offers peace of mind for busy families and travelers.

name: TP-Link Archer AX90 Tri-Band Wi-Fi 6 Router
description: TP-Link Archer AX90 brings cutting-edge Wi-Fi 6 technology to your home, providing super-fast, low-latency wireless connections even with many devices online. Its tri-band setup, 8 high-gain antennas, and strong security features ensure seamless streaming, gaming, and smart home integration throughout large spaces.

name: Kobo Sage eReader
description: Kobo Sage is a premium eReader with an 8-inch glare-free touchscreen, adjustable brightness, and ComfortLight Pro for reduced blue light. Supporting multiple formats, stylus input, and Bluetooth for audiobooks, it offers a versatile reading and note-taking experience. It’s lightweight and waterproof, making it suitable for reading anywhere.

name: Bosch 800 Series Dishwasher
description: The Bosch 800 Series Dishwasher combines powerful, quiet cleaning with a sleek design. Featuring custom wash cycles, a flexible third rack, and advanced drying technology, it handles large loads efficiently. Energy Star certification means it saves on power and water, making it a smart investment for modern kitchens.

name: Apple Watch Series 9 GPS+Cellular
description: Apple Watch Series 9 delivers cutting-edge fitness tracking, fast performance, and all-day battery life. The GPS and cellular capability mean you can take calls, stream music, and send messages on the go. It features a vibrant, always-on Retina display, advanced health sensors, and tight integration with the Apple ecosystem for seamless everyday usage.

name: Blink Outdoor Wireless Security Camera (3rd Gen)
description: Blink Outdoor (3rd Gen) is a wireless HD security camera designed for easy installation outside your home. With weather resistance, night vision, two-year battery life, and direct app integration, it gives you peace of mind through real-time motion alerts and on-demand live video footage right to your phone.

name: Hisense U8K 65" Mini-LED ULED 4K TV
description: The Hisense U8K Mini-LED ULED TV showcases vibrant 4K HDR, deep contrast, and impressive brightness thanks to Mini-LED technology and full-array local dimming. Gaming features, voice control, and a streamlined Google TV interface make it a versatile centerpiece in modern living rooms.

name: ThermoWorks Thermapen ONE Digital Thermometer
description: The ThermoWorks Thermapen ONE offers lightning-fast, single-second temperature readings with laboratory-grade accuracy—ideal for cooking, grilling, or baking. Its rotating display, waterproof construction, and long battery life ensure reliability in any culinary environment. The compact design makes it an indispensable tool for both amateur and professional chefs.

name: LG OLED C2 Series 55” 4K TV
description: The LG OLED C2 Series offers a stunning 55-inch 4K Ultra HD display, delivering self-lit OLED pixels for perfect blacks, infinite contrast, and vibrant colors. Powered by LG’s α9 Gen 5 AI Processor, it intelligently optimizes picture and sound quality. With support for Dolby Vision IQ and Dolby Atmos, your home entertainment experience is immersive whether you're watching movies, sports, or gaming. The ultra-slim design, webOS smart platform, and HDMI 2.1 support round out its capabilities, making this TV a centerpiece for any modern living room.

name: Roku Ultra Streaming Media Player
description: Roku Ultra is the ultimate streaming device, offering 4K streaming, Dolby Vision, and Dolby Atmos for immersive entertainment. The fast and powerful quad-core processor guarantees smooth navigation and instant channel launching. With a lost remote finder, voice remote, and customizable shortcuts, it's designed for convenience. An Ethernet port, USB, and Bluetooth add more versatility, while access to thousands of channels means endless entertainment for the whole family.

name: Corsair K70 RGB Pro Mechanical Keyboard
description: The Corsair K70 RGB Pro Mechanical Keyboard features the legendary build quality Corsair is known for, with a durable aluminum frame and per-key RGB backlighting. Equipped with Cherry MX switches, it provides a responsive and precise typing experience, ideal for both gamers and typists. The detachable palm rest offers ergonomic comfort, and dedicated media keys make controlling playback straightforward. A tournament switch instantly disables macros and lighting, making this keyboard perfect for both casual and competitive users.

name: ASUS ROG Strix RTX 4080 OC Graphics Card
description: The ASUS ROG Strix RTX 4080 OC Graphics Card is designed for high-end gaming and creative workloads. Featuring NVIDIA’s latest Ada Lovelace architecture, it delivers jaw-dropping ray tracing and AI computing performance. Triple Axial-tech fans and a massive heatsink ensure premium cooling during demanding sessions, while RGB lighting offers customization. Robust power delivery and premium build credentials make it a standout in any enthusiast or gaming PC build.

name: Anker PowerCore 20,000mAh Portable Charger
description: Anker’s PowerCore 20,000mAh Portable Charger is the ultimate solution for staying powered on the go. Capable of charging most smartphones over five times, it features dual USB outputs for simultaneous charging of multiple devices. PowerIQ and VoltageBoost technologies guarantee optimal charging speeds, while the robust build makes it ideal for travel, commuting, or emergencies. Compact size and a sleek design round out this highly practical accessory.

name: TP-Link Deco XE75 WiFi 6E Mesh System (2-pack)
description: The TP-Link Deco XE75 Mesh WiFi 6E System provides whole-home coverage with the latest in wireless technology. Supporting up to 5,500 square feet and more than 200 devices, it includes a dedicated 6GHz band for interference-free connections. Intelligent networking ensures seamless roaming, while robust parental controls and security features keep your network safe. The setup is simple via the Deco app, making it a great fit for both tech enthusiasts and regular households.

name: Amazon Fire HD 10 (2023) Tablet
description: The Amazon Fire HD 10 (2023) Tablet offers an affordable, feature-rich experience with a vibrant 10.1-inch 1080p display. Ideal for streaming, reading, and productivity, it packs an octa-core processor and 3GB RAM for smooth multitasking. Alexa integration enables hands-free assistance, and versatile parental controls make it a family-friendly device. With up to 12 hours of battery life and expandable storage, the Fire HD 10 is perfect for both work and play on the go.

name: Nikon Z50 Mirrorless Camera Kit
description: The Nikon Z50 Mirrorless Camera Kit is designed for creators who demand excellent image quality and portability. Paired with a 16-50mm VR lens, the 20.9MP DX-format sensor delivers crisp photos and 4K UHD videos. The flip-down touchscreen is perfect for vlogging and selfies, while robust autofocus and Eye-Detection AF keep subjects sharp. Built-in Wi-Fi and Bluetooth make sharing effortless, turning every spontaneous shot into a masterpiece.

name: Samsung 980 Pro 2TB NVMe SSD
description: The Samsung 980 Pro 2TB NVMe SSD delivers ultra-fast read and write speeds up to 7,000 MB/s, making it perfect for gamers, creators, and professionals who need rapid data access. Its PCIe Gen4 support ensures compatibility with the latest motherboards, and advanced thermal control maintains peak performance under heavy loads. The compact M.2 form factor makes installation easy in desktops and laptops alike, significantly speeding up boot times and file transfers.

name: Polk Audio React Sound Bar
description: The Polk Audio React Sound Bar delivers immersive home theater sound with Alexa Built-in for hands-free control. Its custom-tuned drivers, a wide soundstage, and virtual surround sound technology make movies and TV shows more engaging. The slim, wall-mountable design blends seamlessly into any living space. It can be paired with optional subwoofer and surround speakers for a true surround sound experience. Setup is simple with HDMI ARC and a guided voice setup feature.

name: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless Headset
description: The SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless Headset provides premium sound, wireless versatility, and exceptional comfort. With simultaneous Bluetooth and 2.4GHz wireless connection, you can stay connected to both your console and mobile device. The Nova Acoustic System offers clear, detailed sound and support for 360° spatial audio. ClearCast Gen 2 microphone ensures your voice is heard even in noisy environments, while up to 38 hours of battery life means less downtime between charges.

name: MSI MAG B550 Tomahawk WiFi Motherboard
description: The MSI MAG B550 Tomahawk WiFi Motherboard empowers AMD Ryzen builds with robust VRM, dual M.2 slots, and WiFi 6 support. Built for reliability and performance, the board features PCIe 4.0 capability for future-ready graphics and storage. Enhanced thermal solutions and heavy-duty heatsinks keep your system cool under load. ARGB lighting and user-friendly BIOS make it a top choice for gamers and PC enthusiasts alike.

name: iRobot Roomba Combo j7+ Robot Vacuum and Mop
description: The iRobot Roomba Combo j7+ integrates both vacuuming and mopping with advanced PrecisionVision Navigation for object avoidance. The Clean Base Auto-Empty system means you can forget about emptying the dustbin for months. Personalized cleaning suggestions adapt to your habits and schedule, while Alexa, Google Assistant, and app control provide hands-free convenience. It's ideal for pet owners and busy households seeking a hands-off cleaning solution.

name: Google Pixel 7 Pro 5G
description: The Google Pixel 7 Pro 5G elevates mobile photography and productivity with its advanced computational imaging and smooth Android 13 experience. The 6.7-inch LTPO OLED display, triple rear camera with a 50MP main sensor, and new Tensor G2 chip provide superior performance and intelligent features. Face Unlock, all-day battery, and an eco-friendly design round out an award-winning flagship that’s both innovative and approachable.

name: Sandisk Extreme 1TB Portable SSD
description: The Sandisk Extreme 1TB Portable SSD offers fast and reliable storage for content creators and professionals on the move. With NVMe solid-state performance and read speeds up to 1,050MB/s, you can transfer large files in seconds. The rugged IP55-rated construction resists water, dust, and drops. The compact design includes a carabiner loop for easy attachment. Compatible with USB-C and USB-A, it’s ideal for backing up photos, videos, and documents anywhere, anytime.

name: Microsoft Surface Laptop 5 (13.5-inch)
description: The Microsoft Surface Laptop 5 (13.5-inch) combines ultra-lightweight design, powerful performance, and premium materials for productivity on the move. Powered by 12th Gen Intel Core processors, it features a PixelSense touchscreen display, fast Thunderbolt 4 ports, and all-day battery life. The keyboard is comfortable and quiet, making long typing sessions a breeze. Available in a range of stylish colors, the Surface Laptop 5 is ideal for students and professionals who value both form and function.

name: Ubiquiti UniFi Dream Machine SE
description: The Ubiquiti UniFi Dream Machine SE is an all-in-one enterprise-grade gateway and network controller. Featuring integrated 8-port Gigabit switch, advanced security, and 2.5GbE WAN, it’s perfect for high-performance home or small office networks. The built-in touchscreen allows easy monitoring and management, while seamless UniFi Controller integration offers centralized control of your entire network. With support for PoE devices and ample storage for security cameras, it’s the cornerstone for a modern smart home setup.

name: Apple iPad Pro 12.9” M2 (2022)
description: The Apple iPad Pro 12.9” M2 (2022) is engineered for demanding creative and productivity tasks. Its Liquid Retina XDR display delivers outstanding HDR content, and the M2 chip offers unmatched speed for multitasking, pro apps, and gaming. With Apple Pencil hover detection, advanced cameras, Thunderbolt port, 5G options, and an all-day battery, this iPad takes versatility to new heights for creators, students, and business professionals.

name: Hisense U8H Series 65” Mini-LED 4K TV
description: The Hisense U8H Series brings a stunning viewing experience to your living room with its 65-inch Mini-LED 4K display. Quantum Dot technology and Dolby Vision IQ produce vibrant, lifelike images, while the 120Hz refresh rate ensures smooth motion. Game Mode Pro, built-in Google TV, and hands-free voice control round out a comprehensive package, making this TV ideal for movie lovers, gamers, and sports fans alike.

name: Epson EcoTank ET-4850 All-in-One Printer
description: The Epson EcoTank ET-4850 All-in-One Printer redefines home and office printing with its cartridge-free, high-capacity ink tanks. Achieve stress-free, low-cost printing, copying, scanning, and faxing in a compact, wireless design. The fast auto document feeder and 2.4” touchscreen make everyday tasks a breeze. Enhanced connectivity includes Wi-Fi, Wi-Fi Direct, and voice-activated printing, all with impressive print speeds and ultra-low running costs—a sustainable solution for busy families and small offices.

name: BenQ EX2780Q 27” QHD Gaming Monitor
description: The BenQ EX2780Q 27” QHD Gaming Monitor provides a stunning gaming experience with a 144Hz refresh rate, FreeSync support, and HDRi technology for vivid colors and sharp detail. Integrated 2.1 channel speakers with a subwoofer deliver rich sound. The remote control and USB-C connectivity add convenience, while customizable game modes and eye-care features reduce fatigue during long sessions. Sleek design and thin bezels make it perfect for multi-monitor setups as well.

name: Western Digital Black SN850X 1TB NVMe SSD
description: The Western Digital Black SN850X 1TB NVMe SSD pushes gaming and creative workflows to the max with read speeds up to 7,300MB/s. Designed for next-gen PCs and PlayStation 5 consoles, it accelerates load times and responsiveness. Advanced cooling options and a customizable dashboard help you monitor performance. With PCIe Gen4 technology, it’s future-proof and ready to handle the most demanding applications.

name: Seagate Expansion Portable 5TB HDD
description: The Seagate Expansion Portable 5TB HDD offers expansive storage in a conveniently compact design. Plug-and-play simplicity via USB 3.0 makes it compatible with both Windows and Mac systems. With enough capacity to back up thousands of photos, videos, and documents, it’s ideal for students, professionals, and content creators alike. The lightweight build fits easily into any bag or briefcase, ensuring you never run out of space on the go.

name: Belkin BoostCharge Pro 3-in-1 Wireless Charging Pad
description: The Belkin BoostCharge Pro 3-in-1 offers fast, wireless charging for your iPhone, Apple Watch, and AirPods, all in one elegant unit. With official MagSafe support, up to 15W charging for iPhone, and optimized alignment, it provides a clutter-free nightstand or workstation. The anti-slip design, LED status indicators, and sleek matte finish round out this must-have accessory for Apple ecosystem users.

name: Amazon Echo Studio Smart Speaker
description: Amazon Echo Studio Smart Speaker delivers premium sound with support for Dolby Atmos and spatial audio processing. Five integrated speakers create powerful bass, dynamic mids, and crisp highs, while adaptive audio technology automatically tunes sound to your room. With Alexa voice control, smart home integration, and support for Zigbee devices, it’s a hub for both music and automation. Built-in privacy controls give you peace of mind at home.

name: Logitech G29 Driving Force Racing Wheel
description: The Logitech G29 Driving Force Racing Wheel is designed for serious racing game enthusiasts. With dual-motor force feedback, responsive pedals, and a leather-wrapped steering wheel, it delivers an immersive, realistic driving experience for PlayStation and PC gamers. Stainless steel paddle shifters and 900-degree rotation add to the precision, while compatibility with major racing titles provides versatility for any racing setup.

name: LG Gram 17 Ultra-Light Laptop
description: The LG Gram 17 Ultra-Light Laptop delivers big-screen productivity with featherweight portability. Weighing just under 3 pounds and featuring a 17” WQXGA IPS display, it’s ideal for work, creativity, or streaming. Powered by the latest Intel Core i7, it offers all-day battery life, a fingerprint reader, Thunderbolt 4 support, and a sleek magnesium alloy chassis, making it perfect for professionals on the move.

name: Wyze Cam v3 Pro WiFi Camera
description: Wyze Cam v3 Pro offers 2K resolution with color night vision and two-way audio, bringing budget-friendly security to your home. Weatherproof for indoor and outdoor use, it features a built-in spotlight, advanced motion detection, and free cloud event recording. Setup is quick via the Wyze app, and it supports voice control with Alexa and Google Assistant.

name: Samsung HW-Q990B Dolby Atmos Soundbar
description: The Samsung HW-Q990B Dolby Atmos Soundbar is an 11.1.4 channel powerhouse that envelops your space with sound from every direction. With wireless rear speakers, a powerful subwoofer, and support for both Dolby Atmos and DTS:X, it offers an unmatched home theater experience. Adaptive sound and space fit technology optimize audio for any room, while tap sound, Alexa built-in, and HDMI eARC provide smart convenience.

name: Canon imagePROGRAF PRO-300 Pro Photo Printer
description: The Canon imagePROGRAF PRO-300 Pro Photo Printer is a professional-grade, 13-inch inkjet photo printer ideal for serious photographers and artists. Its 9-color LUCIA PRO ink system ensures gallery-quality prints with deep blacks and wide color gamut. Versatile media handling supports fine art papers and rolled canvas. The compact desktop form factor, intuitive color touchscreen, and robust software make printmaking easy and precise from your own studio.

name: Brother MFC-J995DW INKvestment Tank Printer
description: The Brother MFC-J995DW INKvestment Tank Printer offers cartridge-free, expandable ink tanks for cost-effective, high-yield printing. It handles print, copy, scan, and fax tasks, has wireless and NFC connectivity, and works with both Windows and Mac OS. The compact design, automatic duplexing, and intuitive touch display make it a breeze for busy homes or small offices. Its reliable wireless setup and Amazon Dash Replenishment support keep you in business without hassle.

name: Philips Sonicare DiamondClean 9700 Toothbrush
description: The Philips Sonicare DiamondClean 9700 Toothbrush provides advanced oral care with five brushing modes and smart sensors that coach your technique. The ergonomic design includes a wireless, glass charging base and premium travel case. Bluetooth connectivity syncs data to the Sonicare app so you can monitor your progress. The brush removes up to 10x more plaque than a manual brush, promoting a brighter, healthier smile.

name: Lenovo Tab P12 Pro Android Tablet
description: The Lenovo Tab P12 Pro is a premium Android tablet featuring a 12.6-inch AMOLED display and Dolby Vision support for cinematic streaming and gaming. With a Snapdragon 870 processor, 6GB RAM, and an included Precision Pen 3, multitasking and creative work are effortless. Its quad speakers, 8,600mAh battery, and 5G connectivity make the Tab P12 Pro a versatile, portable productivity powerhouse.

name: Sony SRS-XG300 Portable Wireless Speaker
description: The Sony SRS-XG300 is a rugged, powerful portable Bluetooth speaker with up to 25 hours of battery life. Dual passive radiators and X-Balanced speakers produce punchy, detailed sound. It’s equipped with customizable LED lighting, a built-in carrying handle, and water/dust resistance (IP67), making it ideal for parties, outdoor use, or travel. Party Connect allows you to sync up to 100 compatible speakers for a massive sound wall.

name: Creative Pebble Pro Desktop Speakers
description: Creative Pebble Pro desktop speakers balance stylish compactness with surprisingly rich, room-filling audio. The 2.25-inch full-range drivers and built-in digital amplifier deliver excellent clarity and bass. Customizable RGB lighting adds flair to any desk setup. USB-C power and AUX input ensure compatibility with PCs, laptops, or tablets, making Pebble Pro a simple, affordable audio upgrade for any workspace.

name: RAVPower FileHub AC750 Wireless Travel Router
description: The RAVPower FileHub AC750 serves as a wireless travel router, portable media backup device, and SD card reader all in one compact unit. Share files, photos, or movies easily over WiFi, create a private wireless hotspot on the go, or use it to back up your camera cards to a USB drive. Dual-band WiFi and 6700mAh power bank functionality make it an essential accessory for travelers, photographers, and remote workers.

name: Blink Outdoor 3 Security Camera System
description: The Blink Outdoor 3 Security Camera System provides cost-effective, cable-free security with two-year battery life and HD video. The weather-resistant build supports flexible placement, and motion alerts are sent directly to your phone for peace of mind. With two-way audio and customizable activity zones, you can interact with visitors and fine-tune coverage. Works seamlessly with Alexa for easy command and automation.

name: Astro A50 Gen 4 Wireless Gaming Headset
description: The Astro A50 Gen 4 is a professional-grade wireless gaming headset for Xbox, PlayStation, and PC. Featuring Dolby Audio, a precision microphone, and up to 15 hours of battery life, it delivers immersive sound and clear voice chat. The included charging base ensures your headset is always ready to go, while the lightweight design and plush ear cushions provide lasting comfort for marathon gaming sessions.

name: Nvidia Shield TV Pro 4K
description: The Nvidia Shield TV Pro is a powerful 4K streaming media player with AI upscaling, Dolby Atmos, and built-in Google Assistant. Perfect for home entertainment enthusiasts, it supports a wide range of apps and emulators, plus smart home features and Plex server capability.
