Fast, responsive navigation is powered by the Tegra X1+ chip, and two USB ports allow for external storage or peripheral attachment. Sleek and compact, it seamlessly blends into any setup.

name: Netatmo Weather Station with Smart Home Integration
description: The Netatmo Weather Station provides hyper-local weather data, including temperature, humidity, air quality, and CO2 levels. Wi-Fi connectivity and a smartphone app make it easy to monitor trends inside and outside your home. Connects with Alexa, Apple HomeKit, and IFTTT for automation based on current weather. Its modular design supports additional sensors for wind and rain, helping you make informed decisions about daily activities or outdoor events.

name: Sony Xperia 1 IV Smartphone
description: The Sony Xperia 1 IV smartphone is crafted for creatives, featuring a 6.5-inch 4K OLED 120Hz display and triple-lens camera system with true optical zoom. Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 ensures smooth performance, while pro video and photography tools inspire high-quality content creation. 5G connectivity, Hi-Res audio, and water-resistant build make it a premium pick for professionals who need cutting-edge capabilities in their pocket.

name: Govee Glide Wall Light Smart Panels
description: Govee Glide Wall Light Smart Panels are modular LED panels that let you create custom wall designs with 40+ scene modes and millions of colors. The panels respond to music and feature scheduled automation via the Govee app. Seamlessly integrate with Alexa and Google Assistant for hands-free control. Easy to install and expand, Glide panels turn any room into a dynamic light show or a soothing, ambient retreat.

name: Anker Nebula Capsule II Smart Projector
description: The Anker Nebula Capsule II is a portable smart projector with Android TV built in. This soda can-sized powerhouse projects sharp HD images up to 100 inches and features a powerful 8W speaker for clear sound. With voice control, built-in Chromecast, and access to thousands of apps, you can stream movies or presentations anywhere. The battery offers 2.5 hours of playtime, making it perfect for outdoor movie nights or business meetings on the go.

name: Logitech C920s HD Pro Webcam
description: The Logitech C920s HD Pro Webcam is a top pick for streaming, video calls, and remote learning. It delivers sharp 1080p video, clear stereo sound with dual microphones, and automatic light correction. The adjustable clip fits monitors and laptops, while a privacy shutter offers peace of mind. Compatible with all major platforms and conferencing applications, it’s a trusted choice for home or office use.

name: Philips 346E2CUAE 34” Ultrawide Monitor
description: The Philips 346E2CUAE 34” Ultrawide Monitor makes multitasking easy with a 3440x1440 resolution, 100Hz refresh rate, and built-in USB-C docking. The curved VA panel offers wide viewing angles and rich color for both productivity and entertainment. Built-in speakers, ergonomic stand, and flicker-free technology reduce eye strain during long sessions. Perfect as a single display for creative professionals or office warriors alike.

name: Scosche MagicMount Pro 2 Dash Mount
description: The Scosche MagicMount Pro 2 is a smart, versatile magnetic dash mount for smartphones. The powerful magnets securely hold a range of devices, even through lightweight cases. The 360° adjustable head allows for portrait or landscape viewing, while the low-profile base suits any dashboard. An included cable clip keeps charging cords tidy, making it ideal for everyday commuting or road trips.

name: Xiaomi Mi Air Purifier 4 Pro
description: The Xiaomi Mi Air Purifier 4 Pro ensures clean indoor air with a three-layer filtration system that removes 99.97% of airborne particles including dust, pollen, and pet hair. Capable of purifying large spaces quickly, it features smart app control, real-time air quality monitoring, and an intuitive OLED display. With low noise operation and energy efficiency, it’s ideal for allergy sufferers, families, or pet owners.

name: Lenovo Legion T7 34IMZ5 Gaming Desktop
description: The Lenovo Legion T7 34IMZ5 is a high-end gaming desktop built to dominate the latest AAA titles. Powered by 13th Gen Intel Core i9 and NVIDIA RTX 4090 graphics, it features customizable ARGB lighting, an advanced liquid cooling system, and tool-free upgrade access. With fast DDR5 RAM, PCIe Gen4 storage, and a robust power supply, the Legion T7 is equally at home in gaming marathons or creative workflows.

name: Eufy Security EufyCam 2 Pro 2-Cam Kit
description: The Eufy Security EufyCam 2 Pro 2-Cam Kit offers wireless 2K security cameras with 365-day battery life. The system includes a HomeBase for encrypted local storage, and the cameras are IP67 weatherproof for worry-free outdoor use. Advanced AI reduces false alerts and enables person detection. Installation is quick, and integration with Alexa, Google Assistant, and Apple HomeKit delivers flexibility in smart home routines.

name: VAVA 4K UHD Ultra Short Throw Laser Projector
description: The VAVA 4K UHD Ultra Short Throw Laser Projector brings cinematic viewing home with 150-inch projection from just inches away. Boasting a laser light source rated for 25,000 hours, HDR10 support, and Harman Kardon audio, it provides stunning visuals and audio in one device. Multiple HDMI, USB, and smart platform support make it highly versatile, while the sleek design complements any modern living room.

name: Dell Inspiron 7420 2-in-1 Touch Laptop
description: The Dell Inspiron 7420 2-in-1 Touch Laptop combines versatility and power in a sleek, convertible form factor. Powered by Intel’s 12th Gen processors and Iris Xe graphics, it transitions smoothly between laptop and tablet modes. The 14” FHD+ touch display, premium keyboard, and fast SSD storage deliver productivity on the go. With Wi-Fi 6, long battery life, and an active stylus included, it’s the ideal device for work, creativity, or entertainment.

name: Aqara Camera Hub G3
description: The Aqara Camera Hub G3 integrates AI-powered home security with Zigbee smart home controls. The 2K camera supports facial, gesture, and pet recognition for advanced automations. Pan and tilt functions cover wide areas, while local and cloud storage options keep recordings secure. With Alexa, Google, and Apple HomeKit support, G3 is a powerful, all-in-one smart home hub and camera.

name: MSI Optix MAG274QRF-QD 27” Gaming Monitor
description: The MSI Optix MAG274QRF-QD 27” Gaming Monitor boasts a 165Hz, 1ms response time, 1440p QHD resolution, and Quantum Dot technology for wide color reproduction. NVIDIA G-SYNC compatibility ensures buttery-smooth gameplay, while the ergonomic stand lets you swivel, tilt, and adjust height. Multiple inputs and built-in USB hub make it perfect for competitive gaming or creative workflows.

name: Withings Body Cardio Smart Scale
description: Withings Body Cardio Smart Scale delivers precise weight, body composition, and heart health metrics including standing heart rate and cardiovascular assessment. The scale syncs automatically with the Health Mate app, integrates with Apple Health, and supports multiple users. The sleek, rechargeable design and high-accuracy sensors make it a premium addition to any fitness journey, providing valuable health insights at home.

name: ECOFLOW Delta Pro Portable Power Station
description: The ECOFLOW Delta Pro Portable Power Station is a robust and expandable battery generator for home backup, camping, or emergencies. With a massive 3600Wh capacity, multiple AC/DC/USB outlets, and solar charging compatibility, it can power appliances, electronics, and medical devices reliably. Its mobile app allows for real-time monitoring, while fast-charging technology ensures you’re always ready for the unexpected. Rugged wheels and suitcase handle make it easy to move.

name: LG C2 OLED 55-inch 4K Smart TV
description: The LG C2 OLED 55-inch TV brings cinematic experiences into your living room. With self-lit pixels, it offers perfect blacks, infinite contrast, and rich colors. Powered by the α9 Gen5 AI Processor 4K, the TV upscales content beautifully and delivers exceptional clarity. Its ultra-thin frame and multiple HDMI 2.1 ports make it a favorite among gamers and home theater enthusiasts. Smart webOS provides access to all leading streaming services.

name: Samsung Neo QLED QN90B 65'' 4K Smart TV
description: The Samsung Neo QLED QN90B 65'' 4K Smart TV combines next-generation mini-LED technology with Quantum Matrix and HDR for outstanding color, brightness, and contrast. Its anti-reflective screen, intuitive Tizen OS, and Object Tracking Sound make it perfect for movies, sports, and gaming. Slim bezels and wall-mount compatibility add to its contemporary appeal.

name: Sony WH-1000XM5 Noise Cancelling Headphones
description: The Sony WH-1000XM5 offers industry-leading noise cancellation, delivering a crystal-clear audio experience for both music lovers and frequent travelers. These over-ear headphones feature touch controls, adaptive sound control, and a lightweight, ergonomic design for comfortable, long-term use. With up to 30 hours of battery life, quick charging support, and built-in voice assistants, the WH-1000XM5 stands out as a top choice for immersive listening and seamless connectivity.

name: Dell UltraSharp U2723QE Monitor
description: The Dell UltraSharp U2723QE is a 27-inch 4K IPS monitor designed for productivity and color accuracy. It offers exceptional clarity with a 3840 x 2160 resolution and wide color coverage suitable for content creators. With features like built-in USB-C docking (90W charging) and multiple connectivity options, the U2723QE enhances workspace flexibility, making it ideal for professionals needing multitasking capabilities and sharp visuals.

name: Samsung 970 EVO Plus 2TB NVMe SSD
description: Samsung’s 970 EVO Plus 2TB NVMe SSD sets blazing-fast standards for data read/write speeds, making it a formidable storage solution for PC builders and professionals. Its advanced V-NAND technology ensures exceptional durability and efficiency, while the compact M.2 form factor is perfect for space-constrained systems. With comprehensive thermal management and Samsung Magician software support, data integrity and performance are guaranteed.

name: LG OLED55C2PUA 55" 4K OLED TV
description: The LG OLED55C2PUA 55-inch 4K OLED TV delivers unparalleled picture quality with vibrant colors, perfect blacks, and infinite contrast. Its α9 Gen 5 AI Processor optimizes visual and audio performance, creating an immersive home theater experience. With built-in smart TV functionality, support for Dolby Vision IQ and Dolby Atmos, as well as advanced gaming features, the C2 OLED is perfect for movies, streaming, and next-gen gaming alike.

name: Anker 757 PowerHouse Portable Power Station
description: The Anker 757 PowerHouse is a robust portable power station with a massive 1229Wh battery capacity, making it ideal for camping, emergencies, and off-grid events. Multiple AC outlets, USB-A, USB-C, and carport options enable simultaneous charging of all your devices. The durable, easy-carry design offers peace of mind with safety features and fast recharge technology, keeping you powered wherever you are.

name: JBL Charge 5 Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker
description: The JBL Charge 5 offers signature JBL Pro Sound with a long-excursion driver and a separate tweeter, ensuring deep bass and clear highs. This portable speaker boasts an impressive 20-hour battery life and an IP67 waterproof and dustproof rating, making it ideal for outdoor adventures. Additionally, it features a built-in power bank to charge your devices on the go.

name: Garmin Forerunner 955 GPS Smartwatch
description: The Garmin Forerunner 955 is a premium GPS smartwatch tailored for athletes and fitness enthusiasts. It offers advanced training analytics, heart rate monitoring, multi-band GNSS support, and solar charging for extended battery life. The lightweight and durable design features a vibrant touchscreen and physical buttons, making it easy to use during workouts. In-depth sleep, recovery, and performance insights help you optimize your health and training.

name: Nikon Z5 Full Frame Mirrorless Camera
description: The Nikon Z5 delivers impressive image quality with its 24.3MP full-frame sensor and EXPEED 6 processor. Its 273-point autofocus system ensures sharp, accurate photos in various lighting conditions. Featuring in-body image stabilization, dual SD card slots, and robust weather sealing, the Z5 is perfect for photographers seeking reliability and versatility. It also offers 4K UHD video capabilities for content creators.

name: Anker PowerCore III Elite 25600 PD Power Bank
description: The Anker PowerCore III Elite 25600 PD is a high-capacity power bank with 60W USB-C Power Delivery output, capable of charging smartphones, tablets, and even laptops quickly. With three charging ports and rapid recharge technology, it’s perfect for travelers and professionals who depend on reliable power. The rugged design and included travel pouch ensure it’s easy to carry wherever you go.

name: TCL 6-Series 65" 4K QLED Roku TV
description: The TCL 6-Series 65" 4K QLED Roku TV features Quantum Dot technology and Mini-LED backlighting for vibrant colors and breathtaking HDR performance. The Roku smart platform offers access to countless streaming services with a simple, intuitive interface. With support for Dolby Vision, Game Mode, and Auto Low Latency, it delivers a top-notch viewing and gaming experience in any living room.

name: Apple AirPods Pro (2nd generation)
description: The Apple AirPods Pro (2nd generation) feature upgraded active noise cancellation, adaptive transparency, and personalized spatial audio for an unrivaled listening experience. The improved H2 chip enhances sound quality and battery efficiency, while the custom fit ensures comfort for extended use. Seamless integration with the Apple ecosystem and a MagSafe charging case make them the perfect choice for users seeking premium, wireless audio.

name: Razer DeathAdder V2 Pro Wireless Gaming Mouse
description: The Razer DeathAdder V2 Pro is a wireless gaming mouse with an ultra-precise 20,000 DPI optical sensor and Razer HyperSpeed technology for lag-free performance. Its ergonomic design fits comfortably in all hand sizes, while programmable buttons and customizable RGB lighting enhance your gaming setup. A long-lasting battery and reliable build make it a favorite among competitive gamers and professionals alike.

name: Western Digital Black SN850 NVMe SSD 2TB
description: The Western Digital Black SN850 NVMe SSD supplies lightning-fast read and write speeds up to 7,000 MB/s, making it perfect for gaming, content creation, and high-performance computing. Its PCIe Gen4 architecture ensures compatibility with the latest motherboards, while the sleek heatsink design maintains optimal temperatures. Ample 2TB capacity offers plenty of storage for games, applications, and large media files.

name: Bosch 800 Series Dishwashers
description: The Bosch 800 Series Dishwashers set a new standard in quiet performance and cleaning effectiveness. With advanced CrystalDry technology and flexible loading options, it handles delicate glassware and heavy pots alike. The intuitive touch controls, Wi-Fi connectivity, and Energy Star certification ensure efficiency and convenience, making it a smart upgrade for any modern kitchen.

name: Panasonic Lumix S5 Mirrorless Camera
description: The Panasonic Lumix S5 is a compact full-frame mirrorless camera offering stunning 24.2MP photos and outstanding 4K60p video performance. Dual Native ISO ensures low noise in all lighting conditions, while advanced autofocus tracks subjects with speed and accuracy. Balanced design, weather sealing, and a wide range of compatible lenses make it ideal for hybrid creators and professionals.

name: MSI MAG B660 Tomahawk WiFi DDR4 Motherboard
description: The MSI MAG B660 Tomahawk WiFi DDR4 is a feature-rich ATX motherboard built on Intel’s latest B660 chipset. It offers PCIe 4.0 support, robust VRMs, and Wi-Fi 6 connectivity for gamers and PC builders. The premium thermal design, M.2 Shield Frozr, and reinforced PCIe slots ensure reliability and performance. Its user-friendly BIOS and compatibility with 12th Gen Intel CPUs make it a top pick for DIY enthusiasts.

name: Bose Frames Tempo Audio Sunglasses
description: The Bose Frames Tempo combine premium audio with a stylish, sporty sunglasses design. Engineered with open-ear speakers, they let you listen to music, take calls, and stay aware of your surroundings during workouts, cycling, or outdoor activities. With long battery life, water resistance, and interchangeable lenses, these audio sunglasses blend functionality with fashion.

name: VIZIO M-Series 5.1 Sound Bar
description: The VIZIO M-Series 5.1 Sound Bar delivers room-filling surround sound with a wireless subwoofer and dedicated rear speakers for immersive audio. Dolby Atmos and DTS:X create a three-dimensional experience, while HDMI eARC simplifies connectivity. Bluetooth and voice assistant support make streaming music easy, and the low-profile design fits seamlessly under modern TVs.

name: Dell UltraSharp U2720Q 4K USB-C Monitor
description: The Dell UltraSharp U2720Q offers a 27-inch 4K display with exceptional color accuracy and USB-C connectivity for single-cable convenience. The ultra-thin bezels maximize screen real estate for multitasking, while ergonomic adjustments (tilt, swivel, height) ensure comfort during extended use. Ideal for designers, photographers, and office professionals who need sharp visuals and a clutter-free workspace.

name: Samsung HW-Q990B Q-Series Soundbar
description: The Samsung HW-Q990B Q-Series Soundbar delivers true 11.1.4-channel surround sound, powered by wireless rear speakers and Dolby Atmos support. SpaceFit Sound Pro tailors audio to your room, and seamless integration with Samsung TVs unlocks Q-Symphony capabilities. With multiple HDMI inputs, Bluetooth, and Wi-Fi streaming, it’s the ultimate solution for immersive home theater audio.

name: Netgear Nighthawk M6 Mobile Hotspot
description: The Netgear Nighthawk M6 Mobile Hotspot delivers ultra-fast 5G and Wi-Fi 6 connectivity, ideal for travelers, remote workers, or those needing mobile internet. With all-day battery life and support for up to 32 devices, it provides a reliable, secure connection wherever you go. Its touchscreen interface, Ethernet port, and easy management through the Netgear app make staying connected hassle-free.

name: Onyx Boox Nova Air C Color eReader
description: The Onyx Boox Nova Air C is a 7.8-inch color e-ink eReader with Android OS, perfect for reading, note-taking, and sketching on the go. Its lightweight design and front-lit display reduce eye strain, while stylus support and expandable storage enhance productivity. With access to multiple eBook formats and apps, it’s a modern choice for readers and students seeking versatility beyond books.

name: Kingston FURY Beast 32GB DDR4 3200MHz RAM
description: Kingston FURY Beast DDR4 RAM offers 32GB of high-speed, low-latency performance for demanding applications and gaming. The sleek, low-profile heat spreader keeps systems cool, while plug-and-play overclocking ensures easy upgrades. Compatible with Intel and AMD platforms, it’s a reliable, value-oriented option for boosting productivity or maximizing your gaming rig’s potential.

name: Philips Norelco OneBlade Face + Body Trimmer
description: The Philips Norelco OneBlade Face + Body Trimmer combines shaving, trimming, and edging in one versatile device. With dual protection, fast-moving blade technology, and multiple comb attachments, it’s suitable for any facial hair style or body grooming need. Waterproof design and rechargeable battery provide convenience whether used wet or dry, making it an essential grooming tool for men.

name: AOC C27G2Z 27" Curved Gaming Monitor
description: The AOC C27G2Z is a 27-inch FHD curved gaming monitor featuring an ultra-fast 240Hz refresh rate and 0.5ms response time for smooth gameplay. AMD FreeSync Premium technology minimizes screen tearing, and the vivid VA panel ensures immersive visuals. Ergonomic adjustments and a frameless design make it a striking centerpiece for any gaming setup, delivering both performance and comfort.

name: EcoFlow Delta Max Portable Power Station
description: The EcoFlow Delta Max Portable Power Station is a robust backup battery with 2016Wh capacity, able to power appliances, electronics, and tools during outages or outdoor adventures. Featuring X-Stream fast charging, multiple AC, DC, and USB ports, and expandable capacity, it’s ideal for home emergency preparedness, camping, or mobile work. The LCD display and app control provide real-time monitoring for worry-free power management.

name: GIGABYTE GeForce RTX 4080 EAGLE 16G Graphics Card
description: The GIGABYTE GeForce RTX 4080 EAGLE offers elite gaming and creation performance with 16GB DDR6X memory and next-generation ray tracing. The WINDFORCE cooling system, reinforced PCB, and three HDMI 2.1 outputs ensure optimal performance and reliability. NVIDIA’s advanced features support AI-powered acceleration for demanding AAA titles and creative workflows, making it a future-proof choice for power users.

name: Synology DiskStation DS920+ NAS
description: The Synology DiskStation DS920+ is a 4-bay network-attached storage device designed for home and small business data management. Powered by an Intel Celeron quad-core processor and 4GB expandable RAM, it offers reliable file sharing, backup, and cloud synchronization. With support for RAID, Btrfs file system, and an intuitive DiskStation Manager OS, it combines performance, security, and flexibility for all your storage needs.

name: Moto G Power (2023)
description: The Moto G Power (2023) is a budget-friendly smartphone with a massive 5,000mAh battery, providing up to three days of use on a single charge. Its 6.5-inch HD+ display, capable performance, and versatile triple camera system make it perfect for everyday essentials. With expandable storage, a clean Android experience, and water-repellent design, it’s a reliable and affordable choice for value seekers.

name: Epson EcoTank ET-3850 Wireless All-in-One Printer
description: The Epson EcoTank ET-3850 Wireless All-in-One Printer eliminates the need for cartridges with its easy-to-refill, high-capacity ink tanks. Offering fast, high-quality color prints, scanning, and copying, it’s ideal for home offices and families. Its automatic document feeder, wireless connectivity, and voice assistant support increase convenience, while low running costs save money over time.

name: Samsung Odyssey G7 32" Curved QHD Gaming Monitor
description: The Samsung Odyssey G7 delivers outstanding immersion with a 32-inch QHD curved screen, 240Hz refresh rate, and 1ms response time. Quantum Dot technology and HDR600 certification produce vivid colors and deep contrasts, while G-SYNC and FreeSync Premium Pro compatibility ensure smooth gaming. The futuristic, ergonomic design elevates both appearance and performance for gamers of all levels.

name: Dell XPS 13 Plus (2022) Laptop
description: The Dell XPS 13 Plus (2022) is crafted for modern productivity, featuring an edge-to-edge 13.4-inch InfinityEdge display, 12th Gen Intel Core processors, and a revolutionary touch function row for streamlined navigation. The sleek aluminum chassis, fast-charging battery, and up to 2TB SSD make it both powerful and portable. It’s perfect for professionals seeking style, performance, and innovation in one compact package.

name: Wyze Cam v3 Indoor/Outdoor Camera
description: The Wyze Cam v3 is a budget-friendly indoor/outdoor security camera featuring 1080p HD video, color night vision, and motion/sound detection. Its weather-resistant design and free cloud storage make it perfect for monitoring your home, yard, or pets. Compatible with Alexa and Google Assistant, it offers exceptional value and peace of mind in a compact, easy-to-install package.

name: Dell XPS 13 (2023)
description: The Dell XPS 13 (2023) is a compact and powerful laptop featuring the latest Intel Core processors, up to 32GB RAM, and a vibrant 13.4-inch InfinityEdge display. Its sleek aluminum chassis, long battery life, and excellent keyboard make it perfect for professionals and students. It offers multiple connectivity options, including Thunderbolt 4, and is equipped with advanced security features such as a fingerprint reader and facial recognition.

name: Canon EOS R5
description: The Canon EOS R5 is a full-frame mirrorless camera designed for professionals and enthusiasts. It boasts a 45MP sensor, up to 8K video recording, and state-of-the-art autofocus with animal and eye detection. Dual card slots, in-body image stabilization, and a fully articulated touchscreen add to the versatility of this camera. Its robust build and extensive lens compatibility make it a top choice for photographers and videographers.

name: LG C2 OLED TV 55-inch
description: The LG C2 OLED TV offers breathtaking picture quality with perfect blacks, vibrant colors, and fast response times thanks to self-lit pixels. It supports Dolby Vision, HDR10, and HDMI 2.1 for next-gen gaming experiences. The webOS system ensures smooth access to streaming apps, while the slim bezels, voice remote, and gaming-specific features like G-Sync compatibility make it a top-tier home entertainment device.

name: Western Digital Black SN850X 2TB SSD
description: Western Digital Black SN850X is a high-performance NVMe SSD with 2TB of storage, PCIe Gen4 speed up to 7,300 MB/s, and a heatsink for thermal management. Designed for gaming and creative professionals, its reliability and fast load times significantly boost computing performance. The included dashboard software helps monitor drive health and firmware updates.

name: Kindle Paperwhite (Signature Edition)
description: The Kindle Paperwhite (Signature Edition) boasts a 6.8-inch flush-front display, adjustable warm light, and 32GB of storage for thousands of books. It’s waterproof (IPX8), offers USB-C charging, and auto-adjusting front light for reading in all conditions. The ultra-lightweight design and months-long battery life make it perfect for book lovers on the go.

name: Corsair K100 RGB Mechanical Keyboard
description: The Corsair K100 RGB Mechanical Keyboard combines fast, responsive optical-mechanical switches with per-key RGB customization, a programmable iCUE control wheel, and PBT double-shot keycaps. It supports up to 4,000Hz polling and offers up to six macro keys for extensive functionality. The sturdy aluminum frame and dedicated media controls make it a top choice for gaming and productivity users.

name: Netgear Orbi RBK852 Mesh WiFi 6 System
description: Netgear Orbi RBK852 Mesh WiFi 6 System delivers blazing-fast, whole-home WiFi coverage up to 5,000 square feet. It features a tri-band architecture for optimal device connectivity, dedicated backhaul, and support for over 100 devices. The user-friendly app provides parental controls, threat protection, and easy setup, making it ideal for busy homes and small offices.

name: TP-Link Deco XE75 Pro
description: TP-Link Deco XE75 Pro is a high-performance WiFi 6E mesh system featuring support for a new 6GHz band, providing ultra-fast, congestion-free wireless connectivity. Coverage extends to large homes, and the system offers robust security, parental controls, and easy app-based management. It's ideal for streaming, gaming, and smart home device integration.

name: Razer Viper V2 Pro
description: The Razer Viper V2 Pro is an ultra-lightweight wireless gaming mouse weighing just 58 grams. It sports the Razer Focus Pro 30K optical sensor, delivers up to 80 hours of battery life on a single charge, and features customizable Chroma RGB lighting. Designed for professional eSports athletes, it delivers pinpoint precision and low latency for competitive play.

name: Acer Predator XB273U GXbmiipruzx
description: Acer Predator XB273U GXbmiipruzx is a 27-inch QHD gaming monitor with a blazing 270Hz refresh rate, 0.5ms response time, and high color accuracy. It supports both NVIDIA G-SYNC and HDR400, delivering smooth gameplay and vivid visuals. Ergonomic adjustments and multiple connectivity options make it suitable for demanding gamers and content creators alike.

name: Fujifilm Instax Mini Evo
description: Fujifilm Instax Mini Evo is a hybrid instant camera combining digital devices with instant print features. It offers 10 lens and 10 film effects, a retro-inspired design, a built-in selfie mirror, and a microSD slot for saving images. The rechargeable battery and mobile app support modern connectivity, making it fun and convenient for creative photography on the go.

name: Samsung Odyssey Neo G9
description: The Samsung Odyssey Neo G9 is a 49-inch ultra-wide curved monitor with Quantum Mini-LED, 240Hz refresh rate, and 1000R curvature, designed for immersive gaming and multitasking. It supports G-SYNC and FreeSync Premium Pro, delivering vivid HDR visuals and minimal screen tearing. Its advanced cable management and futuristic design complement modern gaming and creative setups.

name: Xiaomi Mi Band 7
description: Xiaomi Mi Band 7 is an affordable fitness tracker featuring a 1.62-inch AMOLED display, continuous heart rate, SpO2 monitoring, and over 120 workout modes. With a battery life of up to 14 days, water resistance, and smart notification support, it's perfect for daily health tracking and staying connected on a budget. The lightweight design ensures comfortable wear day and night.

name: Blink Outdoor Wireless Security Camera
description: Blink Outdoor Wireless Security Camera provides 1080p HD video, infrared night vision, two-way audio, and two-year battery life on AA batteries. Weather-resistant and wire-free, it’s ideal for hassle-free outdoor security. Customizable motion zones, cloud or local storage, and Alexa integration enable simple home surveillance and remote monitoring.

name: Apple TV 4K (3rd Gen)
description: Apple TV 4K (3rd Gen) delivers cinema-quality entertainment with support for Dolby Vision, HDR10+, and high-frame-rate HDR. The A15 Bionic chip ensures fast performance, while the redesigned Siri Remote allows easy navigation. Extensive app support and Apple ecosystem integration provide seamless streaming and smart home controls through HomeKit.

name: Epson EcoTank ET-4850
description: Epson EcoTank ET-4850 is a cartridge-free all-in-one printer utilizing refillable ink tanks for up to two years of printing out-of-the-box. It offers wireless, voice-activated printing, automatic document feeder, and a color touchscreen. The printer is eco-friendly, cost-effective, and ideal for high-volume printing in homes and small businesses.

name: Lenovo Yoga 9i Gen 7
description: Lenovo Yoga 9i Gen 7 is a luxurious 2-in-1 convertible laptop with a brilliant 14-inch OLED touchscreen, 12th-gen Intel Core processors, and advanced audio by Bowers & Wilkins. The 360° hinge allows versatile use, and the sleek chassis features intuitive function keys for creative and business workflows. All-day battery life cements its status among premium convertibles.

name: UE Wonderboom 3
description: UE Wonderboom 3 is a portable Bluetooth speaker offering surprisingly big sound for its size, with 360-degree audio, deep bass, and 14-hour battery life. It’s IP67 waterproof, dustproof, and floatable, making it ideal for pool parties and outdoor adventures. The colorful, shockproof design and easy pairing deliver music anywhere, anytime.

name: Samsung Portable Projector Freestyle
description: Samsung Portable Projector Freestyle is a compact smart projector that delivers sharp 1080p images up to 100 inches on any surface. With autofocus, auto keystone, and 360-degree sound, it’s ideal for movie nights, presentations, or gaming. WiFi connectivity and built-in streaming apps make it adaptable, and its portable design fits in any bag for on-the-go entertainment.

name: Yeedi Mop Station Pro
description: Yeedi Mop Station Pro is an intelligent robot mop and vacuum with dual-spinning mop pads and 3,000Pa suction for deep cleaning. It features automated water tank refill and pad cleaning, smart navigation, and multi-floor mapping. WiFi app control and voice assistant compatibility ensure effortless cleaning automation for busy households.

name: Pocketalk Classic Language Translator
description: Pocketalk Classic is a compact language translator device supporting 82 languages for instant two-way communication. With cellular data and WiFi connectivity, its touchscreen makes operation simple in travel or business environments. The integrated microphone noise reduction and robust battery life make it ideal for travelers or professionals needing real-time translation on the go.

name: Netatmo Smart Weather Station
description: Netatmo Smart Weather Station monitors indoor and outdoor environmental data including temperature, humidity, CO2, and air quality. The wireless module syncs with an intuitive app, providing real-time alerts and long-term trend analysis. Smart home integration supports Alexa and Apple HomeKit to automate actions based on changing conditions.

name: Mophie Powerstation XXL
description: Mophie Powerstation XXL provides 20,000mAh of portable battery capacity with triple-port charging for multiple devices simultaneously. It supports USB-C PD fast charging, sturdy build design, and charge-through capabilities while plugged in. Its compact silhouette and soft-touch finish make it a travel essential for smartphones, tablets, and wearables.

name: Roku Indoor Camera SE
description: Roku Indoor Camera SE delivers affordable 1080p video surveillance, night vision, motion and sound detection, and automatic alerts direct to your phone. The camera offers two-way audio, simple app control, and cloud or microSD storage options for flexible monitoring. The compact camera is perfect for baby rooms, pets, or general home security on a budget.

name: LG 65” OLED evo C2 Series
description: The LG 65” OLED evo C2 Series redefines home entertainment with its self-lit OLED pixels, delivering perfect blacks and vibrant colors. The α9 Gen5 AI Processor 4K optimizes picture and sound quality in real time, while the ultra-thin design complements any decor. Dolby Vision IQ and Dolby Atmos support create a cinematic experience at home, and gamers will appreciate HDMI 2.1 compatibility, low input lag, and a 120Hz refresh rate. The webOS smart platform provides access to a wide variety of streaming apps, making this TV the centerpiece of your living room.

name: Kindle Paperwhite (2023 Edition)
description: The 2023 Kindle Paperwhite features a 6.8-inch glare-free display with adjustable warm lighting, making it comfortable for reading day or night. With a waterproof IPX8-rated build and weeks-long battery life, it's ideal for avid readers. The device supports USB-C charging, has a lightweight form factor, and provides seamless access to millions of titles via Amazon’s Kindle Store. Its fast page turns and enhanced contrast create a pleasurable reading experience akin to real paper.

name: Samsung 990 Pro NVMe SSD 1TB
description: The Samsung 990 Pro NVMe SSD offers lightning-fast read/write speeds up to 7,450/6,900 MB/s, enabling rapid data transfers and reduced game load times. Its thermal control ensures reliability even during heavy workloads. Designed for high-performance gaming PCs and workstations, it also features AES 256-bit encryption for data security. The SSD’s advanced power efficiency adds to its appeal for professionals and gamers alike.

name: Govee DreamView T1 TV Backlight System
description: Govee DreamView T1 offers immersive TV backlighting, dynamically adjusting color in real-time based on what’s on the screen. Its smart camera reads TV content and syncs LEDs, creating vibrant ambiance for movies or games. Control lighting via app or voice assistants for further customization. The system fits TV sizes from 55 to 65 inches and enhances entertainment spaces with an affordable, easy-to-install solution.

name: Casio G-Shock GBDH2000
description: Casio G-Shock GBDH2000 is a rugged smartwatch designed for outdoor athletes. It features multi-sport GPS tracking, a heart rate monitor, solar charging, and six sensors for activity and health metrics. With Bluetooth connectivity, it pairs with your phone for notifications and utilizes G-Shock’s hallmark shock resistance for durability in extreme environments.

name: BenQ PD3220U 32-inch 4K Monitor
description: BenQ PD3220U is a professional 32-inch 4K monitor designed for designers and creators. Featuring Thunderbolt 3 connectivity, DisplayHDR 400, and 100% sRGB/Rec. 709 color accuracy, it delivers vivid visuals and seamless multi-device workflows. Its ergonomic stand, KVM switch, and multiple color modes provide necessary flexibility for creative professionals seeking precision and productivity.

name: Zojirushi NS-TSC10 Micom Rice Cooker
description: Zojirushi NS-TSC10 is a versatile rice cooker with micro-computerized fuzzy logic technology that automatically adjusts temperature and cooking time for perfect results. It features multiple menu settings, including white rice, brown rice, cake, and steam. The appliance includes a delay timer, keep warm function, and a removable, easy-to-clean inner lid, making it indispensable for busy kitchens.

name: TCL 6-Series 65-inch QLED Roku TV
description: TCL’s 6-Series QLED TV features a 65-inch 4K resolution, Quantum Dot technology, and Mini-LED backlighting for vibrant color and exceptional contrast. With Roku TV OS, voice control, and support for Dolby Vision and THX Certified Game Mode, it’s optimized for both cinematic viewing and gaming. Its slim profile, multiple HDMI ports, and simple setup make it a smart addition to any home theater.

name: TP-Link Deco XE75 Pro Mesh WiFi 6E System
description: TP-Link Deco XE75 Pro Mesh WiFi 6E system delivers whole-home coverage with tri-band connectivity, including the latest 6GHz band for minimal interference. Up to 5,500 square feet of coverage with one three-pack, seamless roaming, and AI-driven mesh create a smooth, fast, and secure wireless experience. The easy-to-use Deco app provides setup and parental controls for families.

name: Ecovacs Deebot X1 Omni Robot Vacuum and Mop
description: Ecovacs Deebot X1 Omni is a premium robot vacuum and mop with AI navigation, dual-side brushes, and powerful suction. Its Omni Station automatically empties the dustbin, washes mops, and even dries them for hands-free maintenance. The robot features 3D mapping, voice assistant YIKO, and multi-floor memory, ensuring automated deep cleaning for all types of floors.

name: Beats Fit Pro Wireless Earbuds
description: Beats Fit Pro Wireless Earbuds feature flexible secure-fit wingtips, active noise cancellation, and the Apple H1 chip for instant pairing. With spatial audio and dynamic head tracking, they offer an immersive soundstage for music and calls. Sweat and water resistance, on-ear controls, and up to 24 hours battery with the charging case, make them ideal for active lifestyles.

name: Philips Premium Airfryer XXL HD9650
description: Philips Premium Airfryer XXL HD9650 uses Twin TurboStar technology to fry, bake, grill, roast, and reheat food with little or no oil. Its extra-large basket is ideal for family-sized meals, and the digital interface provides easy presets. The appliance ensures even cooking with rapid air circulation and is dishwasher-safe for effortless cleaning. Enjoy crispy, healthier meals every day without sacrificing taste or texture.

name: LG C3 OLED Evo 55-inch TV
description: The LG C3 OLED Evo 55-inch TV boasts self-lit pixels and an α9 Gen 6 AI Processor, delivering stunning 4K visuals and perfect blacks. Support for Dolby Vision and Atmos ensure a cinematic viewing experience, while HDMI 2.1 ports and advanced gaming features make this TV a favorite for both movie buffs and gamers. Its sleek design and smart platform provide a premium home theater centerpiece.

name: Yamaha RX-V6A AV Receiver
description: The Yamaha RX-V6A AV Receiver brings cinema-quality surround sound to your home theater, with 7.2 channels of powerful amplification, Dolby Atmos, and DTS:X support. WiFi, Bluetooth, and multiple HDMI inputs provide flexibility for all your sources, while MusicCast multi-room technology unites your entertainment spaces. Built for audiophiles and movie lovers alike.

name: Western Digital My Passport 5TB
description: The Western Digital My Passport 5TB provides massive portable storage in a compact, reliable package. Its USB 3.2 connectivity ensures fast data transfers for backups and media files, while built-in password protection keeps your data secure. Ideal for travelers and professionals who need robust, high-capacity storage on the go.

name: Samsung Odyssey G7 32'' Curved Gaming Monitor
description: The Samsung Odyssey G7 32'' Curved Gaming Monitor delivers immersive QHD visuals, a 240Hz refresh rate, and 1ms response time for ultra-smooth gameplay. Featuring NVIDIA G-Sync and FreeSync Premium Pro support, it’s optimized for serious gamers. The aggressive 1000R curvature fills your field of view while advanced eye comfort features help reduce fatigue in long sessions.

name: Sony Alpha a6400 Mirrorless Camera
description: The Sony Alpha a6400 Mirrorless Camera boasts lightning-fast autofocus, a 24.2MP APS-C sensor, and 4K video recording. Its compact body, flip-up touchscreen, and robust connectivity options make it a favorite for vloggers and travel photographers. With real-time eye autofocus and interchangeable lenses, every shot is sharp and professional.

name: HP ENVY Inspire 7958e All-in-One Printer
description: The HP ENVY Inspire 7958e All-in-One Printer brings vibrant photo printing, fast document output, and seamless wireless connectivity to the home office. Advanced scanning, duplex printing, and an automatic document feeder streamline paperwork, while HP+ Smart features ensure secure, sustainable printing and easy mobile management.

name: Lenovo Tab P12 Pro 5G
description: The Lenovo Tab P12 Pro 5G tablet offers cinematic entertainment and productivity, thanks to its 12.6-inch AMOLED display, Snapdragon 870 processor, and ultra-fast 5G connectivity. The included Precision Pen 3, quad JBL speakers, and robust battery life make it a powerhouse for streaming, creative tasks, and multitasking on the move.

name: Govee Permanent Outdoor Lights
description: The Govee Permanent Outdoor Lights offer customizable, weather-resistant RGBIC lighting for patios, rooftops, and walkways. The app-controlled presets, scheduling, and voice assistant compatibility create vibrant lighting effects year-round. Easy installation and energy efficiency make them ideal for elevating curb appeal and celebrations.

name: Acer Predator X34 Ultrawide Monitor
description: The Acer Predator X34 Ultrawide Monitor envelops you in immersive gaming with a 34-inch curved QHD display, 144Hz refresh rate, and NVIDIA G-Sync support. Its expansive 21:9 aspect ratio, RGB ambient lighting, and ergonomic stand make it ideal for gamers seeking a competitive edge and unmatched visual immersion.

name: Samsung 65” QN90B Neo QLED 4K Smart TV
description: The Samsung 65” QN90B Neo QLED 4K Smart TV redefines home entertainment with Quantum Matrix technology powered by Mini LEDs, offering stunning contrast and vivid color. Its ultra-slim profile supports a sleek look, while the Neural Quantum Processor 4K optimizes every scene for exceptional clarity. Access to built-in streaming services, advanced gaming features, voice assistance, and robust smart home integration make this TV a centerpiece for your living room, perfect for movie nights, gaming, or sports.

name: Philips Wake-up Light Alarm Clock
description: Start your day naturally with the Philips Wake-up Light Alarm Clock. This innovative device simulates sunrise to gently wake you with gradually increasing light and customizable sounds. It includes a user-friendly touchscreen, FM radio, and adjustable brightness levels. Proven to improve users’ morning mood and energy, this alarm clock is ideal for anyone seeking a more restful and personalized start to their day.

name: LG C2 55-inch OLED EVO TV
description: The LG C2 OLED EVO TV features a stunning 55-inch 4K OLED display, powered by the latest α9 Gen5 AI Processor for vibrant colors and deep blacks. With built-in support for Dolby Vision, Dolby Atmos, and NVIDIA G-SYNC, this television is perfect for immersive gaming and cinematic experiences. The sleek, minimalist design fits any modern home, while webOS provides quick access to all your favorite streaming services.

name: Asus ROG Strix G15 Gaming Laptop
description: The Asus ROG Strix G15 positions itself as a powerhouse gaming laptop with its AMD Ryzen 9 processor and NVIDIA GeForce RTX graphics. A 300Hz Full HD display ensures smooth and immersive visuals for fast-paced gaming. Thanks to advanced cooling and RGB keyboard lighting, users experience uninterrupted high performance with customizable style. The laptop also includes high-speed Wi-Fi 6, multiple I/O ports, and upgradable storage options.

name: Canon EOS R10 Mirrorless Camera
description: The Canon EOS R10 is a compact mirrorless camera fitted with a 24.2MP APS-C sensor and high-speed autofocus, making it perfect for both photography enthusiasts and beginners. It supports 4K video recording and offers Wi-Fi/Bluetooth connectivity for easy sharing. The vari-angle touchscreen and lightweight build assist in capturing stunning shots from any angle. The EOS R10 merges performance and portability in a versatile imaging tool.

name: Anker PowerCore 20000 Power Bank
description: The Anker PowerCore 20000 is a high-capacity power bank offering dual USB outputs and fast-charging capabilities. Its compact size ensures portability for travel, while the 20000mAh battery can charge phones and tablets multiple times on a single charge. With Anker's MultiProtect safety system, your devices remain protected from surges and overheating. It’s an essential accessory for anyone needing reliable power on the go.

name: Amazon Fire HD 10 Kids Edition Tablet
description: Specifically designed for children, the Amazon Fire HD 10 Kids Edition offers a durable case, robust parental controls, and a 10.1-inch 1080p Full HD display. Access thousands of age-appropriate apps, games, and books, with a worry-free two-year guarantee. The device is equipped with a long-lasting battery and easy-to-use interface, making it perfect for learning and entertainment on-the-go.

name: Google Nest Learning Thermostat (3rd Generation)
description: Google’s Nest Learning Thermostat learns your schedule and programs itself to help save energy. Its circular stainless steel design is sleek and modern, while the simple interface provides intuitive control. The thermostat is compatible with most HVAC systems and connects to Wi-Fi, allowing temperature adjustments from your phone or smart assistant. Stay comfortable and efficient with energy reports and remote scheduling.

name: DJI Mini 3 Pro Drone with RC-N1 Controller
description: The DJI Mini 3 Pro Drone is compact yet powerful, making aerial photography accessible to beginners and enthusiasts alike. Weighing less than 249 grams, it requires no registration in many regions. The 4K HDR camera offers stunning resolution, while tri-directional obstacle sensing ensures safe flights. Advanced features like FocusTrack, MasterShots, and multiple QuickShots modes empower creative cinematography. The RC-N1 controller offers precise, low-latency command.

name: TP-Link Archer AX6000 Dual Band Wi-Fi 6 Router
description: The TP-Link Archer AX6000 Router offers ultra-fast connectivity with Wi-Fi 6 technology, delivering speeds up to 6000 Mbps. With eight high-gain antennas and Beamforming, the signal covers large areas, making it ideal for smart homes and gaming setups. The router includes a robust suite of parental controls, virus protection, and numerous ports for wired connections. Easy app-based setup gets you online in no time.

name: Nest Cam Indoor Security Camera (2nd Gen)
description: The Nest Cam Indoor Security Camera features 1080p HD streaming, night vision, and smart alerts for enhanced home security. Its sleek and magnetic design allows easy placement anywhere. With two-way audio, motion detection, and integration with Google Assistant, users can monitor their home and interact remotely. Store video securely in the cloud with flexible subscription options, ensuring peace of mind from anywhere.

name: Garmin Forerunner 255 Music GPS Running Watch
description: The Garmin Forerunner 255 Music combines advanced fitness tracking with onboard music storage. Monitor your heart rate, sleep, and workout stats while using built-in GPS to map your runs with precision. With support for Spotify and offline playback, leave your phone behind during training. The watch offers adaptive training plans, recovery recommendations, and up to 14 days of battery life, supporting athletes in reaching their goals.

name: Kindle Paperwhite (2021) 8GB
description: Amazon’s Kindle Paperwhite stands out with its 6.8-inch glare-free display, adjustable warm light, and waterproof design (IPX8). Boasting weeks of battery life and a comfortable design for hours of custom reading experience, it is perfect for book lovers. The integrated Wi-Fi lets you download books quickly, while the lightweight build is easy to carry anywhere. Collections and reading progress sync across devices for seamless reading.

name: Oculus Quest 2 Advanced All-in-One VR Headset (256GB)
description: The Oculus Quest 2 offers immersive VR gaming and entertainment with its fast processor, high-resolution display, and wireless freedom. No PC or console is required—simply put on the headset and dive into virtual worlds. The 256GB storage supports hundreds of apps and games, while hand tracking and 6DoF motion make gameplay intuitive. Play solo or with friends, and stream experiences to your TV for group fun.

name: Samsung 980 PRO 1TB NVMe SSD
description: The Samsung 980 PRO 1TB NVMe SSD delivers next-generation storage with read speeds up to 7000MB/s. Perfect for gaming rigs and creative workstations, it reduces load times and boosts system performance. The Dynamic Thermal Guard ensures optimal operating temperatures even under heavy workloads. Its compact form factor allows easy installation in desktops, laptops, or PlayStation 5 consoles.

name: Ecovacs Deebot T10+ Robot Vacuum & Mop
description: The Ecovacs Deebot T10+ combines powerful vacuuming and mopping in an AI-assisted robot. Featuring TrueMapping 2.0, it scans entire floors for efficient cleaning, while the auto-empty station ensures hands-free use for up to 60 days. High suction power, voice assistant support, and multiple cleaning modes tackle pet hair, dust, and spills. The smart app integration allows customized schedules and reports from your phone.

name: Eufy Security Video Smart Lock E330
description: The Eufy Security Video Smart Lock E330 combines a 2K video doorbell with a keyless smart lock, providing ultimate safety and convenience. Unlock with a fingerprint, passcode, or app, while monitoring visits via crystal-clear video. The lock’s weather-resistant build, local video storage, and instant alerts give peace of mind. Integration with Alexa and Google Assistant ensures control from anywhere.

name: Acer Predator X27 4K Gaming Monitor
description: The Acer Predator X27 is a premium 27-inch 4K gaming monitor featuring a 144Hz refresh rate, NVIDIA G-Sync HDR support, and quantum dot technology. With ultra-low latency, fast response times, and wide color gamut, it’s perfect for competitive gaming and content creation. Adjustable stands, multiple I/O ports, and eye care features complete a display built for immersive experiences.

name: Tile Pro (2022 Edition) Bluetooth Tracker
description: The Tile Pro (2022) helps you locate lost keys, bags, or gadgets with a 400-foot Bluetooth range and a loud ring. Water-resistant and rechargeable, it includes a replaceable battery for long-term use. Use the free Tile app or smart speakers to ring your Tile or display its last location on a map. Its compact, durable design is perfect for hectic lifestyles.

name: Samsung Family Hub 28 cu. ft. 4-Door French Door Smart Refrigerator
description: The Samsung Family Hub refrigerator blends culinary storage with smart home capabilities. Its 28 cu. ft. capacity offers ample space for groceries, while the built-in touchscreen displays recipes, manages shopping lists, and streams music. Integrated cameras show the contents from your phone, even at the store. The refrigerator controls smart devices, syncs schedules, and helps simplify daily life for busy families.

name: Dell Ultrasharp U2720Q 27" 4K USB-C Monitor
description: The Dell Ultrasharp U2720Q is a 27-inch 4K monitor featuring vibrant, factory-calibrated colors, USB-C connectivity, and ultra-thin bezels. Ideal for creative professionals, it supports HDR content and daisy-chaining multiple displays. The adjustable stand and flicker-free screen enhance long work sessions. Packed with connectivity options, it turns any workspace into a productivity powerhouse.

name: Belkin BoostCharge Pro 3-in-1 Wireless Charging Stand with MagSafe
description: The Belkin BoostCharge Pro delivers convenient 15W fast wireless charging for your iPhone, AirPods, and Apple Watch simultaneously. Featuring precision-engineered magnetic alignment with MagSafe, this stand keeps your devices securely in place and easily viewable. Its modern, compact design is perfect for desks and nightstands, eliminating cable clutter while charging up to three Apple devices at once.

name: Panasonic NN-SN966S Stainless Steel Countertop Microwave
description: The Panasonic NN-SN966S microwave features 1250W of power, Inverter Technology for even cooking, and a roomy 2.2 cu. ft. capacity. Its Genius Sensor automatically adjusts cooking times and power levels for perfect results every time. With a stainless steel finish and touch controls, it complements any kitchen while delivering convenience, speed, and reliability for cooking or reheating meals.

name: ViewSonic M2e 1080p Portable Smart Projector
description: The ViewSonic M2e is a compact, portable full HD smart projector with instant auto focus and a built-in Harman Kardon speaker. It offers wireless screen mirroring and a short throw lens for large, vibrant images even in small rooms. The projector comes equipped with smart streaming apps, USB-C connectivity, and a sleek carry case, making it ideal for movies, presentations, or travel entertainment.

name: TCL 5-Series 50" QLED 4K Smart TV
description: The TCL 5-Series QLED 4K Smart TV balances value and performance with Quantum Dot technology, Dolby Vision HDR, and a Roku smart platform. Enjoy brilliant color, detailed contrast, and an intuitive user interface for all your streaming needs. Voice control via compatible assistants and multiple HDMI ports offer versatility, while the ultra-thin frame elevates any living space.

name: Omron Platinum Blood Pressure Monitor
description: The Omron Platinum Blood Pressure Monitor provides clinically accurate readings and advanced averaging features for home users. Its dual-display screen, Bluetooth sync, and multi-user support simplify tracking over time. The monitor includes a comfortable, adjustable cuff and onboard memory for up to 200 readings per user. Easy one-touch operation and mobile app integration ensure health insights are always at hand.

name: Asus ROG Strix G16 Gaming Laptop
description: The Asus ROG Strix G16 is a high-performance gaming laptop built to satisfy hardcore gamers. It is equipped with Intel's 13th Gen Core i7 processor, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4060 graphics, a 16-inch FHD+ 165Hz display, and advanced cooling for sustained performance. RGB lighting, customizable macros, and high-speed SSD storage make this laptop suitable for both gaming and creative professionals seeking reliable speed and responsiveness.

name: Anker PowerCore 20100 Portable Charger
description: Anker's PowerCore 20100 is a high-capacity portable battery charger compatible with smartphones, tablets, and other USB-powered devices. It features dual high-speed charging ports, voltage boost technology, and a compact yet sturdy build. With enough capacity to recharge most phones multiple times, it's an essential travel companion for anyone needing reliable power on the go.

name: Nest Audio Smart Speaker
description: Nest Audio is a smart speaker with crisp vocals and rich bass designed to blend into your home. It features Google Assistant integration for voice control of smart home devices, music streaming, and accessing information. The attractive fabric design, energy-efficient operation, and room-filling sound make it an excellent addition for those looking to build a connected, modern home.

name: HP OfficeJet Pro 9015e All-in-One Printer
description: HP's OfficeJet Pro 9015e is a compact, wireless all-in-one printer designed for small businesses and home offices. It features rapid print speeds, automatic two-sided printing and scanning, reliable wireless connectivity, and integration with HP+ smart features. Security essentials, energy efficiency, and an intuitive touchscreen provide a seamless and secure printing experience.

name: Sony Alpha 7 IV Full-Frame Mirrorless Camera
description: The Sony Alpha 7 IV is a versatile full-frame mirrorless camera equipped with a 33MP sensor, advanced real-time autofocus, and 4K60p video capabilities. Its robust weather-sealed body, intuitive controls, and wide array of compatible lenses make it ideal for professional photographers and videographers seeking both flexibility and high image quality.

name: Apple iPad Air (5th Gen, 2022)
description: The Apple iPad Air (5th Generation) features the M1 chip for lightning-fast performance, a vibrant 10.9-inch Liquid Retina display, 5G connectivity, and Apple Pencil (2nd Gen) support for creative tasks. Its ultra-slim, lightweight design makes it perfect for productivity, streaming, gaming, or art creation, while the updated camera and long battery life further enhance its appeal.

name: Razer Huntsman Mini 60% Optical Gaming Keyboard
description: The Razer Huntsman Mini is a compact, 60% optical gaming keyboard featuring Razer's linear optical switches for ultra-fast actuation. Its customizable RGB lighting, detachable USB-C cable, and durable PBT keycaps make it favored among esports athletes and gamers who prioritize desk space and rapid responsiveness.

name: Xiaomi Mi 11 Lite 5G NE Smartphone
description: The Xiaomi Mi 11 Lite 5G NE brings slim elegance and strong performance to the mid-range segment. Featuring a 6.55-inch AMOLED display with 90Hz refresh rate, Snapdragon 778G chipset, and triple-camera system, it delivers vivid visuals and reliable multitasking. Its lightweight design, robust battery life, and affordable price make it an attractive choice for style-conscious users.

name: Panasonic Lumix S5IIX Mirrorless Camera
description: The Panasonic Lumix S5IIX is a full-frame mirrorless camera designed for hybrid creators. It offers advanced phase hybrid autofocus, internal 6K video recording, and exceptional low-light performance. V-Log/V-Gamut and professional audio support cater to videographers, while its deep grip and weather-sealed construction benefit on-the-go photographers.

name: Wyze Cam Pan v3 Security Camera
description: The Wyze Cam Pan v3 is a budget-friendly pan-and-tilt security camera with 360° coverage, color night vision, and motion tracking. With two-way audio, cloud and local storage options, and simple app controls, it's an ideal solution for monitoring large indoor spaces or small businesses, offering peace of mind with minimal setup complexity.

name: Epson EcoTank ET-3850 All-in-One Inkjet Printer
description: The Epson EcoTank ET-3850 offers cartridge-free printing with refillable, high-capacity ink tanks. Its fast print speeds, wireless and Ethernet connectivity, and automated document feeder make it ideal for busy homes or offices. The EcoTank system saves money over time while reducing waste, and the intuitive LCD display simplifies management.

name: Lenovo Legion T5 Gaming Desktop
description: The Lenovo Legion T5 Gaming Desktop packs serious power for gamers, featuring up to AMD Ryzen 7 processors, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070 graphics, ample DDR4 RAM, and SSD/HDD dual storage. Its efficient cooling system and customizable RGB lighting cater to performance seekers wanting an upgradable and reliable gaming rig.

name: Arlo Pro 5S 2K Security Camera System
description: The Arlo Pro 5S 2K offers wire-free security with 2K HDR video, color night vision, and integrated spotlight. Its weather-resistant design, long battery life, and cloud/local storage options make it suitable for indoor and outdoor use. Smart detection lets you monitor activity and receive alerts, ensuring comprehensive home protection.

name: Apple MacBook Pro 14-inch (M2 Pro, 2023)
description: The 2023 Apple MacBook Pro 14-inch features the powerful M2 Pro chip, providing unmatched performance for professionals and creatives alike. With a stunning Liquid Retina XDR display, up to 18 hours of battery life, and a robust set of ports including HDMI, SD card slot, and MagSafe 3, this laptop is built for productivity. The advanced camera and mic system ensure crisp video calls, while macOS delivers a smooth, secure operating environment. It’s the go-to device for demanding workflows like video editing, coding, and design.

name: Anker PowerCore 10000 Portable Charger
description: The Anker PowerCore 10000 is a compact, lightweight portable charger, delivering remarkable charging capabilities in a pocket-sized shell. With 10,000mAh capacity, it can fully charge most smartphones two to three times. PowerIQ and VoltageBoost technologies ensure fast, safe charging for various devices. The sturdy build, safe-cell protection, and broad device compatibility make it an essential accessory for travel, commutes, or emergencies.

name: Dell UltraSharp U2723QE 27-inch 4K USB-C Monitor
description: The Dell UltraSharp U2723QE is a premium 27-inch 4K monitor with IPS Black technology for exceptional contrast and color accuracy. It features USB-C connectivity for single-cable power, data, and video delivery, enhancing workspace efficiency. With a fully adjustable stand, built-in KVM switch, and extensive vision comfort certifications, it’s ideal for professionals who demand precise visuals and productivity from their workstation.

name: Hisense 65U8K ULED Mini-LED 4K TV
description: Hisense 65U8K delivers a premium home cinema experience with Mini-LED backlighting, co-developed by Dolby Vision and IMAX Enhanced. The TV offers Quantum Dot color, Full Array Local Dimming, and high peak brightness for realistic, vivid visuals. HDMI 2.1 ports support 4K/120Hz gaming, while built-in Google TV brings personalized streaming and voice search. With powerful, room-filling sound and a stylish bezel-less design, it’s a standout for entertainment lovers.

name: BenQ TK700STi 4K HDR Gaming Projector
description: The BenQ TK700STi is a versatile 4K HDR gaming projector with ultra-low input lag and vivid color reproduction. Engineered for gamers, it offers bright, sharp visuals up to 300 inches, Android TV built-in, and HDMI 2.0 for next-gen console compatibility. Its short throw design is ideal for small spaces, while the robust built-in audio makes it an all-in-one entertainment solution for movies, sports, and gaming nights.

name: Lenovo Legion 5 Gen 8 Gaming Laptop
description: The Lenovo Legion 5 Gen 8 Gaming Laptop combines powerful AMD Ryzen or Intel Core processors with NVIDIA GeForce RTX 40-series graphics to deliver top-tier gaming performance. Its 16-inch WQXGA display supports a 165Hz refresh rate for silky-smooth visuals. The sophisticated cooling system and customizable RGB lighting ensure optimal performance and unique style. Ideal for gamers who want both performance and portability.

name: Ninja Foodi 12-in-1 Smart XL Air Fry Oven
description: The Ninja Foodi 12-in-1 Smart XL Air Fry Oven is a versatile countertop appliance that bakes, air fries, roasts, broils, toasts, dehydrates, and more. Its True Surround Convection technology ensures even cooking, while the Smart Cook System takes the guesswork out of meal prep. The spacious interior fits a 12-inch pizza or an entire chicken, making it perfect for busy families and cooking enthusiasts seeking convenience and quality.

name: Acer Predator X27U OLED Monitor
description: The Acer Predator X27U is a 27-inch 1440p OLED gaming monitor offering stunning color accuracy, infinite contrast, and a blistering 240Hz refresh rate. Its ultra-fast response times and AMD FreeSync Premium certification deliver tear-free, immersive gameplay. The ergonomic stand, USB-C connectivity, and customizable RGB lighting add practical versatility and style, making it a top choice for gamers and creative professionals alike.

name: Steam Deck 512GB Handheld Gaming PC
description: Valve’s Steam Deck is a portable gaming PC with a custom AMD APU, 7-inch touchscreen, and precise controls. With 512GB NVMe SSD storage, it allows fast game loading and ample capacity for your favorite titles. SteamOS enables access to your entire library, and USB-C docking transforms it into a desktop gaming workstation. Its versatility makes it the ultimate handheld for PC gamers wanting to play AAA titles on the go.

name: TP-Link Kasa Smart WiFi Plug Slim (KP125M)
description: The TP-Link Kasa Smart WiFi Plug Slim offers compact convenience for automating lights, coffee makers, or any plug-in device. It supports voice controls with Alexa, Google Assistant, and Apple HomeKit, and the Kasa app lets users schedule or remote-control devices from anywhere. Its small form factor prevents adjacent outlets from being blocked, while robust energy monitoring tools track power usage for greater efficiency.

name: Canon imageFORMULA R40 Document Scanner
description: The Canon imageFORMULA R40 is a high-speed document scanner ideal for home and small office use. It easily digitizes up to 40 pages per minute in duplex mode, with a 60-sheet automatic feeder for efficient batch processing. The included software suite supports conversion to multiple file formats and easy integration with popular cloud services. Its compact footprint and one-touch controls provide productivity without clutter.

name: Brydge Pro+ Wireless Keyboard with Trackpad
description: The Brydge Pro+ is a premium wireless keyboard designed for iPad Pro users, featuring an integrated multi-touch trackpad for laptop-like productivity. Its aluminum construction and adjustable hinge match Apple aesthetics, while Bluetooth connectivity, backlit keys, and long battery life provide comfort and convenience for on-the-go professionals or students.

name: DJI Osmo Mobile SE 3-Axis Smartphone Gimbal
description: The DJI Osmo Mobile SE is a handheld gimbal stabilizer for smartphones, allowing smooth, cinematic video capture for content creators and vloggers. Intuitive controls, advanced stabilization technology, and intelligent shooting modes (ActiveTrack, Timelapse, Gesture Control) make it easy to use for everyone. Its foldable, lightweight design fits any bag or backpack, ensuring shake-free footage wherever you go.

name: LG CineBeam PF610P 120" Full HD LED Projector
description: The LG CineBeam PF610P is a portable, Full HD LED projector capable of projecting up to a 120-inch screen. With 1000 ANSI lumens of brightness, webOS smart platform, and integrated speakers, it’s great for home theaters or backyard movie nights. HDMI and USB connectivity, screen sharing from mobile devices, and long-lasting LED light source (up to 30,000 hours) provide convenience and reliability.

name: Arlo Pro 5S 2K Wireless Security Camera System
description: The Arlo Pro 5S 2K is a wireless security camera system offering crisp 2K HDR video, 12x digital zoom, and color night vision. With dual-band Wi-Fi support, extended battery life, and a versatile magnetic mount, it allows fast installation indoors or outdoors. Smart notifications, two-way audio, built-in siren, and direct emergency call support provide peace of mind and robust protection for any property.

name: Lenovo Tab P11 (2nd Gen) Android Tablet
description: The Lenovo Tab P11 (2nd Gen) features an 11.5-inch 2K display, MediaTek Helio G99 processor, and quad speakers with Dolby Atmos for immersive entertainment. Its lightweight design, 7700mAh battery, and Kids Space make it suitable for families, students, and on-the-go professionals. Seamless integration with Lenovo’s stylus and keyboard case enables both creative and productive uses, while Android 12 maximizes compatibility.

name: Cuisinart Air Fryer Toaster Oven TOA-65
description: The Cuisinart TOA-65 is a versatile air fryer toaster oven offering 1800 watts of cooking power. With 7 functions including air fry, bake, broil, toast, and more, it replaces multiple kitchen appliances. Its spacious interior fits an entire chicken or 6 slices of bread. Intuitive digital controls, adjustable temperature, and a viewing window make meal prep quick and convenient for families or home cooks.

name: VAVA 4K Ultra Short Throw Laser Projector
description: The VAVA 4K Ultra Short Throw Laser Projector transforms any room into a home theater, projecting up to 150 inches from just inches away. With 2500 ANSI lumens, 4K HDR support, and Harman Kardon tuned speakers, it delivers stunning visuals and powerful sound. Smart connectivity and an elegant design make it perfect for movie nights or sports events without the clutter of traditional projectors.

name: iRobot Roomba j7+ Self-Emptying Vacuum
description: The iRobot Roomba j7+ is a self-emptying robot vacuum with PrecisionVision navigation, enabling it to avoid obstacles like pet waste and cords. The Clean Base allows hands-free dirt disposal for up to 60 days. Intuitive scheduling, smart mapping, and voice controls ensure spotlessly clean floors with minimal effort. Pet owners and busy households will appreciate its reliability and convenience.

name: Samsung Odyssey OLED G8 Gaming Monitor
description: Samsung Odyssey OLED G8 is a 34-inch ultrawide gaming monitor with a 175Hz refresh rate, QD-OLED panel, and blazing-fast 0.03ms response time. Vivid colors, infinite contrast, and built-in smart TV apps make it equally suited for gaming and entertainment. The premium aluminum frame, adjustable stand, and CoreSync RGB lighting enhance any gaming desk with both function and style.

name: Jabra Elite 7 Active Wireless Earbuds
description: Jabra Elite 7 Active are wireless earbuds built for workout enthusiasts, featuring ShakeGrip coating for a secure fit during intense exercise. Powerful noise isolation, HearThrough awareness mode, and customizable EQ deliver balanced sound for music and calls. With IP57 water/sweat resistance and up to 30 hours battery (with case), they’re ready for the toughest routines indoors or out.

name: Asus ZenDrive U9M External DVD Drive
description: Asus ZenDrive U9M is a slim, lightweight external DVD writer compatible with Windows and Mac laptops. Powered by USB, it offers M-DISC support for long-term data preservation and fast read/write speeds for CDs and DVDs. Its brushed metal finish and plug-and-play design make it a stylish, useful addition to modern laptops lacking optical drives.

name: Apple MacBook Air (M2, 2022)
description: The Apple MacBook Air (M2, 2022) is engineered for efficiency and power. Featuring Apple's next-generation M2 chip, this ultra-lightweight laptop boasts impressive speed and power efficiency, making it ideal for both work and play. With its Liquid Retina display, long-lasting battery life, and a fanless design, the MacBook Air delivers a quiet yet powerful performance. Its premium aluminum body, improved keyboard, and larger touchpad make it both stylish and user-friendly. Designed for students, professionals, and creatives, the MacBook Air is perfect for everyday tasks and demanding applications alike.

name: Dell UltraSharp U3223QE 31.5-Inch 4K Monitor
description: The Dell UltraSharp U3223QE is a state-of-the-art 31.5-inch 4K monitor featuring IPS Black technology for deep contrasts and exceptional color accuracy. With USB-C connectivity for easy docking, picture-by-picture and picture-in-picture modes, and an adjustable stand, it’s perfect for professionals who demand versatility and superb visuals in their workflow.

name: LG C3 65-Inch OLED 4K Smart TV
description: The LG C3 OLED TV brings cinematic quality to your living room with self-lit pixels for perfect blacks and vibrant colors. The TV features Dolby Vision IQ and Dolby Atmos for an immersive experience, as well as HDMI 2.1 for gaming and sports enthusiasts. The webOS platform offers easy access to all major streaming services and voice control compatibility.

name: Satechi USB-C Multiport Adapter V2
description: Satechi’s USB-C Multiport Adapter V2 consolidates essential ports into one hub – HDMI, USB-A, SD/microSD, and pass-through charging. Its aluminum construction is both stylish and durable, making it the perfect companion for laptops and tablets with USB-C connectivity.

name: Sony Bravia XR A90J 55-Inch OLED 4K TV
description: The Sony Bravia XR A90J delivers brilliant OLED 4K visuals with Cognitive Processor XR for lifelike contrast and color. Features include Google TV, HDMI 2.1, and Acoustic Surface Audio+ for immersive sound. Its minimalist design complements any home theater setup.

name: Western Digital My Passport 5TB Portable External Hard Drive
description: The WD My Passport 5TB portable drive offers reliable, on-the-go storage with automatic backup and password protection. Its compact design makes it easy to carry, while USB 3.0 interface ensures fast data transfers for your movies, photos, and important documents.

name: Samsung Galaxy Watch 6 Classic Bluetooth
description: The Galaxy Watch 6 Classic combines timeless design with cutting-edge functionality. It features a rotating bezel, vivid Super AMOLED display, advanced health tracking, and seamless integration with Galaxy smartphones. Receive notifications, measure ECG, and monitor sleep with style and convenience.

name: Shure SE215 Sound Isolating Earphones
description: Shure SE215 earphones deliver detailed sound with deep bass and excellent isolation, thanks to their ergonomic design. Detachable cables and a secure fit make them perfect for both on-stage performance and everyday listening. Their durable, compact build ensures lasting quality.

name: ASUS ROG Strix X670E-E Gaming Motherboard
description: Built for the latest AMD Ryzen processors, the ASUS ROG Strix X670E-E offers PCIe 5.0 support, robust VRM cooling, DDR5 compatibility, and premium audio. Its cutting-edge connectivity ensures unbeatable speed and customization for PC builders seeking top-tier gaming or creative performance.

name: Hisense U8K 75-Inch Mini-LED ULED 4K Google TV
description: The Hisense U8K TV boasts stunning 4K visuals with Mini-LED backlighting and Quantum Dot Color. Google TV brings together streaming, live TV, and gaming content in a responsive interface. With Dolby Vision HDR and 144Hz refresh rate, it’s ideal for movie lovers and gamers alike.

name: Sony SRS-XE300 Portable Bluetooth Speaker
description: The SRS-XE300 features Sony’s unique Line-Shape Diffuser for wide sound dispersion, EXTRA BASS technology, and up to 24 hours of battery life. Its IP67 rating for dust and water resistance makes it perfect for outdoor parties and adventures.

name: ViewSonic XG2431 24-Inch 240Hz Gaming Monitor
description: ViewSonic’s XG2431 delivers an ultra-smooth 240Hz refresh rate and 1ms response for competitive esports gaming. Its IPS panel offers vibrant colors and wide angles, while advanced adjustability ensures comfort during long sessions. Certified for Blur Busters’ pursuit images, it’s a top pick for fast-paced games.

name: Instax Mini Evo Hybrid Instant Camera
description: The Instax Mini Evo combines instant film fun with digital flexibility. Choose from 10 lens effects and 10 film effects to create 100 combinations for your photos. Print instantly on Instax Mini film, or save images digitally via the built-in memory. It blends retro aesthetics with today’s creativity.

name: LG OLED C2 65'' 4K Smart TV
description: LG’s 65-inch OLED C2 brings cinematic brilliance to your living room with its self-lit pixels that deliver perfect blacks, intense colors, and infinite contrast. Powered by the α9 Gen 5 AI processor, it elevates picture and sound quality, while advanced features like Dolby Vision IQ and Dolby Atmos provide an unparalleled home theater experience. With webOS, Alexa, and Google Assistant integration, controlling your entertainment has never been more convenient.

name: Razer Basilisk V3 Wired Gaming Mouse
description: With 11 programmable buttons, customizable RGB lighting, and a 26,000 DPI optical sensor, the Razer Basilisk V3 is built for competitive gamers. The ergonomic shape, tactile scroll wheel, and high-speed tracking ensure winning performance in fast-paced games. Durable mechanical switches guarantee longevity for hundreds of intense gaming sessions.

name: Philips Wake-up Light Alarm HF3520
description: The Philips Wake-up Light Alarm HF3520 simulates natural sunrise to gently wake you, improving the quality of your mornings. Multiple light settings and customizable alarms promote healthy sleep cycles. With a built-in FM radio and touch controls, this light alarm is both functional and stylish, enhancing your bedroom environment.

name: MSI GeForce RTX 4090 SUPRIM X
description: The MSI GeForce RTX 4090 SUPRIM X brings next-level performance to PC gaming and creation. With 24GB of GDDR6X memory, ray tracing, and AI-enhanced graphics, it renders games at ultra-high resolutions and speeds. Triple-fan cooling ensures quiet operation, and RGB lighting adds a customizable flair to your PC build.

name: Kasa Smart Plug HS103P4
description: Remotely control lights, fans, and appliances with the Kasa Smart Plug HS103P4. This 4-pack supports scheduling, Amazon Alexa, and Google Assistant for voice control, and the easy setup via app means you’ll be automating your home in minutes. Its compact size fits easily into any wall outlet.

name: Hisense U8H 75” QLED ULED 4K TV
description: The Hisense U8H 75-inch QLED ULED 4K TV delivers spectacular brightness, contrast, and color accuracy. Mini-LED technology and variable refresh rate support immersive gaming, while Dolby Vision and Atmos provide a theater-like experience. With Google TV built-in, you’ll access your favorite apps and voice control with ease.

name: ASUS ROG Swift PG259QN 360Hz Monitor
description: The ASUS ROG Swift PG259QN is the world’s fastest esports gaming monitor, featuring a 24.5-inch Full HD display at a stunning 360Hz refresh rate. NVIDIA G-SYNC compatibility and low motion blur technology ensure tear-free, ultra-smooth gameplay. Ergonomic stand and customizable RGB lighting round out its premium features.

name: Eufy RoboVac G30 Edge
description: The Eufy RoboVac G30 Edge is a sleek robot vacuum featuring smart navigation, strong suction power, and boundary strips to avoid restricted areas.
