App and voice controls offer effortless operation, while its slim design glides under furniture for thorough cleaning. Large dustbin and quiet operation make it ideal for busy families.

name: Polk Audio Signa S4 Dolby Atmos Soundbar
description: Polk Audio’s Signa S4 brings theater-quality Dolby Atmos sound in a slim soundbar with a powerful wireless subwoofer. HDMI ARC, Bluetooth streaming, and a simple remote make setup and use straightforward. Voice adjust technology enhances dialogue clarity, perfect for movie nights and TV shows.

name: Fujifilm X-T30 II Mirrorless Camera
description: The Fujifilm X-T30 II is a feature-rich mirrorless camera blending classic design with modern technology. Its 26.1MP X-Trans CMOS 4 sensor, fast autofocus, and renowned film simulation modes make it a favorite among photographers and vloggers. Lightweight yet robust, it excels in both still photography and 4K video recording.

name: BenQ MOBIUZ EX3410R 34'' Curved Monitor
description: The BenQ MOBIUZ EX3410R features a 34-inch UWQHD curved display, 144Hz refresh rate, and built-in treVolo speakers for immersive ultrawide gaming or productivity. HDRi optimization, blue light reduction, and versatile connectivity ensure comfortable long sessions, making it a top pick for creators and gamers alike.

name: COSORI Pro II Air Fryer Oven Combo 5.8QT
description: COSORI’s Pro II Air Fryer Oven Combo features 12 presets and rapid heating for healthier, crispy meals. Its 5.8-Quart basket is perfect for families, and the shake/keep warm functions support versatile meal prep. Dishwasher-safe parts and a digital display streamline the cooking experience.

name: Canon imageCLASS MF644Cdw
description: Canon’s imageCLASS MF644Cdw is a color laser all-in-one printer built for small businesses. Fast print speeds, automatic duplex, large touchscreen, and Wi-Fi direct support fast-paced offices. Secure printing and expandable paper capacity ensure reliability for daily printing needs.

name: Samsung Bespoke Jet Cordless Stick Vacuum
description: The Samsung Bespoke Jet Cordless Stick Vacuum brings powerful suction, lightweight design, and an All-in-One Clean Station for automatic dust disposal. Five-layer filtration, digital display, and interchangeable batteries make cleaning efficient and hands-free. Its sleek look fits seamlessly into any modern home.

name: Bissell CrossWave Pet Pro
description: The Bissell CrossWave Pet Pro vacuums and washes floors in one pass, making pet messes easy to manage. Special pet brush roll, tangle-free design, and multi-surface cleaning provide powerful performance on tile, hardwood, and carpets. The two-tank system ensures fresh water is always cleaning your floors.

name: Govee Immersion TV LED Backlights
description: Govee Immersion TV LED Backlights create dynamic, color-matching lighting for TVs up to 65 inches. A camera captures onscreen content and syncs the LEDs for an immersive experience. App and voice controls, customizable scenes, and easy install make any movie night magical.

name: Lenovo IdeaPad 5 Pro 16ARH7
description: The Lenovo IdeaPad 5 Pro 16ARH7 combines AMD Ryzen 7 power, a brilliant 16-inch QHD display, and long battery life in a sleek aluminum chassis. Fast SSD storage, Dolby Atmos speakers, and a fingerprint reader ensure a secure, smooth experience for work or play.

name: JBL Live Free NC+ TWS Earbuds
description: JBL’s Live Free NC+ TWS offer active noise cancellation and JBL Signature Sound in a water- and sweat-resistant design. Up to 21 hours total playback, wireless charging, and intuitive touch controls provide freedom and convenience for music lovers and commuters.

name: Fitbit Inspire 3
description: The Fitbit Inspire 3 is a slim fitness tracker with all-day activity, heart rate, and stress monitoring. Vibrant AMOLED display, sleep tracking, and smartphone notifications make it a well-rounded health aid. With up to 10 days battery and water resistance, it’s perfect for anyone improving their wellness routine.

name: ASUS ZenWiFi AX (XT8) Mesh System
description: The ASUS ZenWiFi AX (XT8) delivers whole-home WiFi 6 coverage with tri-band mesh, supporting gigabit speeds, and secure parental controls. Easy app-based setup and robust security features ensure seamless streaming and gaming throughout your home.

name: Victrola Vintage 3-Speed Bluetooth Suitcase Turntable
description: This retro-inspired Victrola suitcase turntable plays vinyl at three speeds and streams music via Bluetooth. Portable, lightweight, and with built-in speakers, it’s perfect for vinyl collectors or anyone wanting to blend classic sound with modern convenience.

name: ASRock Z790 Taichi Carrara Motherboard
description: The ASRock Z790 Taichi Carrara blends cutting-edge DDR5, PCIe 5.0, and Thunderbolt 4 support for gamers and creators building the latest Intel platforms. Reinforced slots, exquisite design, and advanced cooling make it the foundation for extreme performance PCs.

name: TCL 6-Series 65'' QLED 4K TV
description: TCL’s 6-Series 65-inch QLED 4K TV offers impressive mini-LED backlighting, Dolby Vision HDR, and a 120Hz refresh rate for smooth action and stunning color. Roku TV platform ensures an easy interface with endless streaming apps, making it great for movie nights and gaming alike.

name: Eero Pro 6E Tri-Band Mesh WiFi 6E System
description: The Eero Pro 6E brings blazing wireless speeds and low latency for smart homes, supporting hundreds of devices and expansive coverage. With WiFi 6E tri-band and Ethernet, advanced parental controls, and easy setup, it excels in fast, seamless internet in any household.

name: Whirlpool WRS325SDHZ Side-by-Side Refrigerator
description: The Whirlpool WRS325SDHZ features frameless glass shelves, LED lighting, and adaptive defrost for easy organization and energy efficiency. Fingerprint-resistant stainless steel and filtered water/ice dispenser make it an attractive and functional addition to modern kitchens.

name: GoPro MAX 360 Action Camera
description: The GoPro MAX captures immersive 5.6K30 360-degree video and studio-quality 360 audio. Max HyperSmooth stabilization, horizon leveling, and touchscreen interface provide creative control. It’s ideal for adventurers, filmmakers, and VR content creators.

name: Mavic Air 2 Fly More Combo
description: The DJI Mavic Air 2 Fly More Combo offers advanced aerial photography with a 1/2” sensor for 48MP stills and 4K/60fps video. Multi-directional obstacle sensing and intelligent shooting modes elevate creativity, while extra batteries and accessories keep you flying longer.

name: Alienware AW3423DW QD-OLED Gaming Monitor
description: Alienware’s AW3423DW brings QD-OLED brilliance, 175Hz refresh rate, and ultrawide 34-inch curved display for breathtaking gaming visuals. NVIDIA G-SYNC Ultimate, customizable RGB lighting, and ergonomic stand ensure an elite, immersive gaming setup.

name: Samsung Galaxy Book3 Pro 360
description: The Samsung Galaxy Book3 Pro 360 is a versatile 2-in-1 laptop with a 16-inch Super AMOLED touchscreen, S Pen support, and Intel Evo platform performance. Thin, light, and offering all-day battery, it’s ideal for creators, students, and professionals needing flexibility.

name: Brother P-touch Cube Plus Label Maker
description: The Brother P-touch Cube Plus is a Bluetooth label printer controlled via smartphone or PC. It supports custom fonts, symbols, and templates for home or office organization. Compact and rechargeable, it’s a versatile tool for tackling any labeling project.

name: VIZIO 40” Class V-Series LED Smart TV
description: The VIZIO V-Series 40-Inch TV offers 4K resolution, Dolby Vision HDR, and SmartCast for instant access to top streaming apps. Voice remote, Apple AirPlay 2, and Chromecast built-in offer smooth integration into any entertainment system.

name: KitchenAid K400 Blender
description: The KitchenAid K400 Blender powers through tough ingredients for smoothies, soups, and nut butters. Three preset programs, Intelli-Speed Motor Control, and durable BPA-free jar deliver consistent blends. Sleek design and easy cleaning add style and practicality to your kitchen.

name: WD My Passport 4TB Portable Hard Drive
description: The WD My Passport 4TB offers massive portable storage in a slim, vibrant enclosure. USB 3.0 compatibility, hardware encryption, and automatic backup software keep your data safe and accessible wherever you go. It’s perfect for students, business travelers, or photographers.

name: Ecobee SmartThermostat Premium
description: The Ecobee SmartThermostat Premium features enhanced sensors, Alexa/Bluetooth/Siri support, and built-in air quality monitoring. Its glass touchscreen and smart scheduling optimize comfort and energy savings. Compatible with most HVAC systems, it’s a smart solution for climate control.

name: Sony Alpha a7 IV Mirrorless Camera
description: Sony’s Alpha a7 IV delivers incredible 33MP full-frame photos and up to 4K60 video, powered by the advanced BIONZ XR processor. Real-time Eye AF and intuitive controls give both photographers and videographers professional results in a compact package.

name: TCL Alto 8+ 2.1 Channel Sound Bar with Built-In Subwoofer
description: TCL’s Alto 8+ sound bar enhances your TV experience with powerful 2.1 channel sound and a built-in subwoofer for deep bass. Voice assistant ready, Bluetooth, and Dolby Digital support provide flexible connections for all your devices.

name: Samsung The Frame QLED 55" Smart TV (2023)
description: Samsung’s The Frame 2023 transforms into art when not in use, featuring customizable bezels and a vibrant QLED screen. With 4K HDR, anti-reflection, and a slim wall mount, it blends seamlessly into any decor, offering both stunning visuals and gallery-style elegance.

name: Lenovo Legion 5 Pro Gen 7 (16")
description: The Lenovo Legion 5 Pro Gen 7 packs AMD Ryzen 7 and NVIDIA RTX 3070 graphics into a 16-inch QHD+ 165Hz display. Coldfront cooling, customizable RGB keyboard, and advanced audio make it a top pick for premium gaming and creative performance.

name: Beats Studio Pro Wireless Over-Ear Headphones
description: The Beats Studio Pro combines spatial audio with personalized ANC, delivering deep bass and crystal clarity in a comfortable, iconic design. With USB-C audio, long battery life, and intuitive controls, they are perfect for audiophiles, commuters, and creatives seeking standout sound and style.

name: LG UltraGear 27GP950-B 27” 4K Gaming Monitor
description: The LG UltraGear 27GP950-B is a premium 27-inch 4K gaming monitor perfect for competitive gamers and content creators alike. It features a high refresh rate of 144Hz (overclockable to 160Hz) and NVIDIA G-Sync compatibility for smooth, tear-free gameplay. The Nano IPS panel supports HDR600, providing vibrant colors and deep blacks. Its ergonomic design includes height, tilt, and pivot adjustability.

name: Anker PowerCore III Elite 25600 87W Power Bank
description: The Anker PowerCore III Elite 25600 is a high-capacity portable charger delivering up to 87W, perfect for charging laptops, tablets, and smartphones multiple times on the go. With both USB-C and USB-A ports, plus fast-charging capabilities, it is designed to keep all your devices powered during travel or emergencies. Its sleek, robust build ensures durability and efficiency, and the digital display shows real-time battery status.

name: Amazon Kindle Paperwhite (11th Generation)
description: The Amazon Kindle Paperwhite (11th Generation) is the go-to e-reader for avid bookworms. Featuring a 6.8-inch glare-free display, adjustable warm light, and waterproof design, it’s built for reading anywhere and anytime. The high-resolution screen gives printed-paper clarity and the battery lasts weeks on a single charge. Integrated Bluetooth allows wireless audiobooks, enhancing the reading experience further.

name: ASUS ROG Strix GeForce RTX 3080 OC Edition
description: The ASUS ROG Strix GeForce RTX 3080 OC Edition is a powerhouse graphics card, unleashing next-level gaming performance with NVIDIA Ampere architecture. It features triple Axial-tech fans, RGB lighting, and robust cooling for sustained high FPS. With 10GB GDDR6X memory and support for ray tracing and DLSS, it’s built for smooth 4K gaming and content creation.

name: Polar Vantage V2 Multisport Watch
description: The Polar Vantage V2 is a sophisticated multisport GPS watch designed for serious athletes and endurance training. It delivers advanced performance analytics, heart rate monitoring, sleep tracking, and training load insights. With long battery life and support for over 130 sport profiles, it’s lightweight yet durable, making it an essential companion for marathon runners, triathletes, or anyone pursuing peak fitness.

name: Netgear Nighthawk M1 Mobile Hotspot
description: The Netgear Nighthawk M1 Mobile Hotspot is a portable 4G LTE Wi-Fi solution for reliable, fast internet anywhere. It supports up to 20 devices simultaneously, features an all-day battery, and boasts a compact design. Ideal for travelers or remote workers, the Nighthawk M1 offers robust parental controls, media streaming, and a convenient display for managing connectivity on the go.

name: Sony A80K 55” BRAVIA XR OLED 4K TV
description: The Sony A80K BRAVIA XR OLED TV delivers spectacular picture quality with true blacks, vibrant colors, and XR Motion Clarity. Its Acoustic Surface Audio+ technology turns the screen into a speaker for immersive sound, while Google TV integration provides easy access to favorite streaming content. With HDMI 2.1 and smooth gaming features, it’s perfect for cinephiles and gamers alike.

name: Seagate FireCuda 530 2TB PCIe Gen4 SSD
description: The Seagate FireCuda 530 Gen4 SSD offers blazing-fast read and write speeds, making it the ultimate upgrade for hardcore gamers and content creators. With a durable heatsink design, the drive is optimized for sustained heavy workloads and next-gen consoles. Its 2TB capacity ensures ample space for large files, games, and projects, while advanced endurance technology extends lifespan.

name: Kasa Smart Wi-Fi Plug Mini (EP10)
description: The Kasa Smart Wi-Fi Plug Mini (EP10) allows you to control lamps, fans, and other devices from your smartphone or with voice assistants like Alexa and Google Assistant. Its compact size avoids blocking adjacent outlets, and scheduling or away modes help save energy. Simple app setup makes automating your home stress-free.

name: LG OLED C2 65-inch 4K TV
description: The LG OLED C2 65-inch 4K Smart TV provides spectacular picture quality with self-lit OLED pixels, delivering perfect blacks, vibrant colors, and infinite contrast. Enhanced with Dolby Vision IQ, AI-powered 4K upscaling, and immersive Dolby Atmos audio, it offers a cinematic experience for movies, gaming, and sports. Seamless smart features and a slim, elegant design make it a centerpiece for any modern home entertainment setup.

name: LG 48-inch C3 OLED Evo 4K TV
description: The LG 48-inch C3 OLED Evo TV brings cinematic quality to your living room, with self-lit pixels for perfect blacks and vivid colors. It features the α9 AI Processor Gen6, Dolby Vision, and an immersive AI Sound Pro system, making it a great choice for home theater enthusiasts and gamers demanding low input lag.

name: Apple Mac Mini M2
description: The Apple Mac Mini M2 packs the next-generation Apple silicon, delivering outstanding speed and efficiency in a compact form factor. Ideal for creative workflows and everyday use, it features multiple Thunderbolt 4 ports, high-speed SSD storage, and quiet operation, making it the perfect desktop for home or office.

name: Samsung Odyssey G7 32-inch Curved Gaming Monitor
description: The Samsung Odyssey G7 is a 32-inch QHD curved gaming monitor with a 240Hz refresh rate and 1ms response time. Quantum Dot technology, HDR600 support, and NVIDIA G-Sync compatibility deliver stunning, tear-free visuals and ultra-smooth gameplay, satisfying even the most demanding gamers.

name: Eufy Security Video Doorbell 2K
description: Eufy's Security Video Doorbell 2K features a crystal-clear 2K resolution, local storage, and advanced AI for human detection. With two-way audio, night vision, and weather-resistant build, it offers home security with privacy in mind, easily integrating with existing doorbell wiring.

name: Hisense 75-inch U8K QLED 4K Google TV
description: The Hisense 75-inch U8K QLED 4K Google TV delivers outstanding brightness, color, and detail thanks to Quantum Dot technology, Mini-LED backlighting, and Dolby Vision. It’s perfect for home theaters and gamers with HDMI 2.1 ports, ultra-low latency, and smooth motion handling.

name: ASUS ROG Ally Handheld Gaming Console
description: The ASUS ROG Ally is a portable handheld gaming console featuring a fast AMD Ryzen Z1 processor, 7-inch Full HD display with 120Hz refresh, and Windows 11 for access to PC game libraries. Its ergonomic shape and responsive controls make it ideal for gaming on the move.

name: Jabra Elite 5 True Wireless Earbuds
description: Jabra Elite 5 True Wireless Earbuds deliver rich sound with hybrid active noise cancellation, 6 microphones for crystal-clear calls, and up to 28 hours of playtime with the charging case. Their IP55 rating means they’re ready for workouts and commutes alike, while quick pairing makes them easy to use.

name: Acer Nitro 5 Gaming Laptop
description: The Acer Nitro 5 Gaming Laptop features a 12th Gen Intel Core i7 processor, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 GPU, and a 144Hz 15.6-inch FHD display. It’s a gamer’s favorite with its efficient cooling, RGB keyboard, and customizable performance profiles for AAA gaming at an accessible price.

name: HP Smart Tank 6001 All-in-One Printer
description: The HP Smart Tank 6001 All-in-One Printer delivers high-volume, low-cost printing with its refillable ink tank system. It offers fast wireless printing, scanning, and copying, plus intuitive touchscreen controls and cloud printing features, making it suitable for home offices and small businesses.

name: Western Digital My Book 8TB External Hard Drive
description: Western Digital’s My Book 8TB is a desktop external hard drive offering high-capacity storage and automatic backup software. With USB 3.0 connectivity and password protection, it provides a secure and convenient solution for backing up large collections of documents, photos, and videos.

name: VIZIO M-Series 5.1 Sound Bar with Dolby Atmos
description: The VIZIO M-Series 5.1 Sound Bar system features Dolby Atmos and DTS:X support for immersive home theater audio. With a wireless subwoofer and dedicated rear speakers, it produces rich, dynamic surround sound that brings movies, music, and games to life.

name: Ninja Foodi DualZone 2-Basket Air Fryer
description: The Ninja Foodi DualZone 2-Basket Air Fryer lets you cook two foods two ways at the same time with DualZone technology. Its six customizable programs, large capacity, and easy-to-clean baskets make it perfect for quick, healthy family meals and entertaining.

name: Ring Alarm 8-Piece Kit (2nd Gen)
description: Ring's Alarm 8-Piece Kit (2nd Generation) offers comprehensive DIY home security with a base station, keypad, sensors, and range extender. Optional professional monitoring, smartphone alerts, and seamless integration with Ring cameras and Alexa make protecting your home simple and effective.

name: Tile Pro (2022) High Performance Bluetooth Tracker
description: The Tile Pro (2022) offers extended Bluetooth range and a loud ring to help you find lost items like keys and backpacks. With a user-replaceable battery and robust water resistance, it combines high performance and reliability to help keep your essentials safe and easy to find.

name: Apple MacBook Pro 14” M2
description: The Apple MacBook Pro 14” M2 delivers outstanding performance with Apple’s next-generation silicon. It features a Liquid Retina XDR display, an improved battery life, and an ultra-fast SSD for smooth multitasking. The durable aluminum chassis houses an enhanced keyboard and a robust selection of ports, making it suitable for creative professionals and students alike.

name: LG OLED C3 55” 4K Smart TV
description: The LG OLED C3 55” 4K Smart TV offers stunning picture quality with deep blacks and vivid colors. The self-lit OLED pixels, combined with AI-powered 4K upscaling, provide an immersive viewing experience. Its thin profile, webOS smart platform, and supports for Dolby Atmos and Vision make it a premium entertainment choice.

name: Nikon Z8 Mirrorless Camera
description: The Nikon Z8 is a high-end mirrorless camera hosting a 45.7MP stacked CMOS sensor and EXPEED 7 engine, delivering ultra-fast continuous shooting and 8K video capability. Its durable build, versatile controls, and advanced autofocus suits professional photographers and videographers.

name: Jabra Elite 8 Active
description: The Jabra Elite 8 Active are durable wireless earbuds built to withstand sweat and dust, making them ideal for workouts. They offer powerful bass, active noise cancellation, and a secure fit, with up to 8 hours of battery life per charge. Customization via the Jabra Sound+ app enhances user experience.

name: Asus ROG Strix G16 Laptop
description: The Asus ROG Strix G16 is a performance-driven gaming laptop featuring the latest Intel Core processor, NVIDIA RTX graphics, and a fast 165Hz display. Designed for gaming marathons, it incorporates advanced cooling and customizable RGB lighting to elevate gaming sessions.

name: Wyze Cam OG
description: Wyze Cam OG is an affordable smart security camera with 1080p HD video, color night vision, and motion/sound alerts. It supports both local storage and cloud backup, offering easy installation for indoor or outdoor use and integration with major smart home platforms.

name: Sony Bravia XR A80L 65” OLED TV
description: The Sony Bravia XR A80L is a 65-inch OLED TV utilizing the Cognitive Processor XR for lifelike image processing and immersive color. The Acoustic Surface Audio+ technology makes the screen itself the speaker, creating a powerful home cinema experience. Smart Google TV interface rounds out this premium package.

name: Bosch Serie 8 Built-In Oven HBG6764S6B
description: The Bosch Serie 8 Built-In Oven HBG6764S6B offers precise cooking with its 4D hot air technology and touch TFT display. Its self-cleaning Pyrolytic function minimizes maintenance, and built-in WiFi allows remote operation via the Home Connect app, upgrading the modern kitchen with smart cooking control.

name: TCL 6-Series 75” QLED TV
description: The TCL 6-Series 75” QLED TV features 4K HDR, Mini-LED backlighting, and Quantum Dot technology for stunning visuals and precise contrast. Integrated Roku TV smart platform, voice control, and robust gaming features make it a top choice for both home cinema and gaming.

name: DeLonghi Dinamica Plus ECAM370.95.T
description: DeLonghi Dinamica Plus ECAM370.95.T is an automatic coffee machine with a touchscreen control panel, 13 grind settings, and smart personalization of coffee beverages. Its LatteCrema system crafts perfect milk foam, offering barista-quality espresso, cappuccino, and more at home.

name: BenQ EX3203R 32” Curved Monitor
description: The BenQ EX3203R brings immersive visuals with its 32-inch, 144Hz curved VA panel, HDR support, and FreeSync 2 technology. With USB-C connectivity and adjustable ergonomics, it's optimal for gamers and professionals seeking smooth performance and impressive color accuracy.

name: Samsung 65-Inch QN90B Neo QLED 4K TV
description: Samsung’s 65-Inch QN90B Neo QLED 4K TV is designed to deliver extraordinary picture quality using Quantum Matrix Technology and mini LED backlighting. Combined with motion enhancements and anti-glare features, it offers a superb cinematic experience in any lighting. Smart TV capabilities with voice assistant support make streaming and content discovery effortless.

name: Dell XPS 13 (9310) Laptop
description: The Dell XPS 13 (9310) redefines compact productivity with its nearly bezel-less 13.4-inch FHD+ display and 11th Gen Intel Core processors. With integrated Intel Iris Xe graphics and up to 16GB RAM, this ultra-light laptop is perfect for professionals on the move. Premium materials and long battery life ensure seamless multitasking throughout busy workdays.

name: Logitech MX Master 3s Wireless Mouse
description: Ergonomic design meets precision in the Logitech MX Master 3s Wireless Mouse. With its custom shortcut buttons, electromagnetic MagSpeed scroll wheel, and cross-device functionality, this mouse accelerates productivity for creative and professional users. It’s rechargeable via USB-C and supports up to 70 days of usage on a single charge.

name: HP LaserJet Pro M283fdw All-in-One Printer
description: The HP LaserJet Pro M283fdw delivers fast, high-quality color printing, scanning, copying, and faxing in one compact device. Featuring wireless connectivity, automatic two-sided printing, and a 50-sheet automatic document feeder, it handles busy office tasks efficiently. Enhanced security features and a 2.7-inch color touchscreen facilitate user-friendly operation.

name: Roku Ultra 4K Streaming Media Player
description: Bring all your entertainment together with the Roku Ultra 4K Streaming Media Player. It supports Dolby Vision, Dolby Atmos, and provides ultra-fast interface navigation. The included voice remote with personal shortcut buttons, lost remote finder, and built-in Ethernet port ensure a user-friendly streaming experience for any TV setup.

name: Samsung Galaxy Buds2 Pro True Wireless Earbuds
description: The Samsung Galaxy Buds2 Pro True Wireless Earbuds provide premium studio-quality sound and active noise cancellation in a compact, ergonomic design. With IPX7 water resistance and up to 18 hours of battery life with the case, these earbuds offer a comfortable and immersive listening experience for music lovers on the go.

name: BenQ EW3270U 32-Inch 4K Monitor
description: BenQ’s EW3270U 32-Inch 4K Monitor is the ideal solution for professionals and entertainment enthusiasts. With HDR support, Brightness Intelligence Plus technology, and eye-care features to reduce vision fatigue, this monitor stands out for both work and play. Multiple connectivity options ensure compatibility with desktops, laptops, consoles, and more.

name: Apple MacBook Air 15-inch M2
description: The Apple MacBook Air 15-inch M2 delivers powerful performance with Apple’s next-gen M2 chip in an ultra-slim, fanless design. Its Liquid Retina display, up to 18 hours of battery, and MagSafe charging combine style and efficiency. Perfect for students, professionals, and creatives who value high performance on the go.

name: Xiaomi Mi Smart Projector 2 Pro
description: Transform any room into a home cinema with the Xiaomi Mi Smart Projector 2 Pro. Offering full HD resolution, 1300 ANSI lumen brightness, Dolby Audio, and Android TV integration, it brings big-screen entertainment to life. Auto-focus and keystone correction ensure a hassle-free setup for movies, streaming, or gaming.

name: Synology DiskStation DS220+ NAS
description: The Synology DiskStation DS220+ Network Attached Storage is perfect for home or small office users needing reliable file backup and sharing. With a dual-core processor, two drive bays, and support for up to 32TB, it offers fast, secure, and centralized storage. Enhanced security and app support extend functionality beyond mere backup.

name: Klipsch Cinema 600 Sound Bar with Subwoofer
description: Experience cinematic audio at home with the Klipsch Cinema 600 Sound Bar. Featuring 600W peak power, a wireless 10-inch subwoofer, and patented horn-loaded tweeters, it elevates your TV sound for movies, music, and gaming. HDMI-ARC and Bluetooth connectivity ensure easy integration with any media setup.

name: Sony PlayStation 5 Disc Edition Console
description: The Sony PlayStation 5 Disc Edition introduces next-gen gaming with super-fast SSD storage, ray tracing, and support for 4K graphics. The ergonomic DualSense controller enhances immersion with adaptive triggers and haptic feedback. A growing library of exclusive titles ensures an unrivaled entertainment experience for gamers of all levels.

name: TP-Link Kasa Smart Plug HS103P4
description: The TP-Link Kasa Smart Plug HS103P4 four-pack turns any household device into a smart gadget. Control appliances via app or voice assistants, set schedules, and monitor energy usage easily. Its compact, no-hub-required design is simple to set up—ideal for beginners in smart home automation.

name: Epson EcoTank ET-2850 Wireless Printer
description: The Epson EcoTank ET-2850 is an innovative wireless printer with refillable ink tanks, drastically reducing ink costs and environmental impact. Designed for busy homes and small offices, it prints, copies, and scans with high efficiency and minimal downtime. Wireless printing and voice assistant support streamline your workflow.

name: Wyze Cam Pan v3 Wi-Fi Security Camera
description: Monitor every angle of your home with the Wyze Cam Pan v3. Featuring 360° pan/tilt/zoom, night vision, and motion tracking, this compact camera streams high-definition video straight to your smartphone. Versatile mounting options and two-way audio make it easy to check in, interact, and keep your property secure from anywhere.

name: Razer BlackShark V2 Pro Wireless Gaming Headset
description: The Razer BlackShark V2 Pro delivers pro-level audio with THX Spatial surround, a detachable noise-canceling mic, and ultra-comfortable ear cushions. Designed for esports and marathon sessions, it offers up to 24 hours of wireless freedom, low-latency connection, and premium sound precision for an optimal competitive edge.

name: Amazon Fire HD 10 Kids Tablet
description: The Amazon Fire HD 10 Kids Tablet is built for young learners, offering a 10.1-inch Full HD display, robust parental controls, and a kid-proof case. With a year of Amazon Kids+ content, up to 12 hours of battery life, and a worry-free guarantee, it’s the perfect solution for educational and fun activities at home or on the go.

name: LG C2 OLED EVO 55-inch TV
description: LG’s C2 OLED EVO TV delivers breathtaking picture quality with self-lit pixels and enhanced brightness. Its α9 Gen5 AI Processor 4K optimizes content in real-time, while support for Dolby Vision IQ and Dolby Atmos creates a cinematic experience at home. The ultra-thin design and multiple HDMI 2.1 ports make it perfect for gaming and streaming alike.

name: Roku Ultra 2022 Streaming Media Player
description: The Roku Ultra offers fast and powerful streaming in 4K, Dolby Vision, and Dolby Atmos. With an improved remote, ethernet port, and voice control, it provides easy access to thousands of channels and streaming services. Its user-friendly interface, private listening, and customizable shortcuts make it ideal for any entertainment setup.

name: Ecovacs Deebot X1 Omni Robot Vacuum
description: The Ecovacs Deebot X1 Omni is an advanced robot vacuum equipped with vacuuming, mopping, and self-cleaning features. AI-powered navigation ensures thorough cleaning, while its docking station manages dust disposal and water refills. Voice commands and app control make it a cutting-edge solution for automated home cleaning.

name: Netgear Orbi WiFi 6E Mesh System
description: Netgear’s Orbi WiFi 6E Mesh System delivers ultra-fast, whole-home connectivity with support for the 6 GHz band. It provides exceptional speed, coverage, and stability for multiple devices, making it perfect for smart homes, gaming, and streaming. Easy setup and management ensure seamless and secure internet throughout large spaces.

name: Eufy Security eufyCam 3
description: EufyCam 3 is a wire-free security camera system with 4K resolution, AI-powered person detection, and built-in solar charging panels for maintenance-free use. Secure local storage, weatherproof design, and easy app integration make it an excellent option for monitoring home exteriors.

name: Polk Audio MagniFi Mini AX Sound Bar
description: Polk Audio MagniFi Mini AX delivers expansive surround sound from a space-saving bar and wireless subwoofer. Dolby Atmos support, voice adjustment, and multiple connectivity options result in crystal-clear dialogue and immersive audio for any TV setup.

name: BenQ MOBIUZ EX2710Q Gaming Monitor
description: BenQ’s MOBIUZ EX2710Q is a 27-inch QHD gaming monitor with a 165Hz refresh rate and HDRi technology. Its fast response time and AMD FreeSync Premium support ensure ultra-smooth visuals, while built-in speakers and customizable color modes suit a range of genres.

name: Brother HL-L2350DW Laser Printer
description: Brother’s HL-L2350DW is a compact monochrome laser printer with fast printing, auto duplex, and wireless connectivity. Designed for home or small office use, it delivers crisp documents with low cost and minimal space requirements. Easy setup and reliable performance make it a workhorse for everyday tasks.

name: Kobo Clara 2E E-Reader
description: The Kobo Clara 2E is a sustainable e-reader made from ocean-bound and recycled plastics. Featuring a 6-inch Carta E Ink display, adjustable ComfortLight PRO, and water resistance, it offers a comfortable, eco-friendly reading experience. Integration with OverDrive and Pocket provides access to ebooks and articles anywhere.

name: Seagate Game Drive for Xbox 4TB
description: Seagate’s 4TB Game Drive provides ample portable storage specifically designed for Xbox consoles. It allows users to store and play hundreds of games directly, thanks to high-speed USB 3.2 connectivity and a rugged build for travel. Official licensing with Xbox ensures plug-and-play compatibility.

name: Hisense U8K ULED Mini-LED TV
description: Experience cinematic brilliance at home with the Hisense U8K ULED Mini-LED TV. With 4K resolution, Quantum Dot technology, and Dolby Vision IQ, it produces stunningly vivid colors and sharp contrasts. Google TV integration ensures easy streaming access, while the 144Hz panel and low latency make it ideal for gaming. Its ultra-thin bezel and elegant stand fit seamlessly into any room.

name: Amazon Kindle Paperwhite Signature Edition
description: The Amazon Kindle Paperwhite Signature Edition enhances your reading experience with a 6.8-inch glare-free display, auto-adjusting front light, and wireless charging capabilities. With 32GB of storage, you can carry thousands of books wherever you go. Its waterproof design makes it great for reading at the beach or in the tub, and long battery life lets you read for weeks without worry.

name: LG C3 OLED Evo TV
description: The LG C3 OLED Evo delivers breathtaking picture quality with perfect blacks, infinite contrast, and vibrant colors powered by the α9 Gen6 AI Processor. Its slim profile, HDMI 2.1 support, and advanced 4K upscaling make it the ultimate choice for cinephiles and gamers. With webOS smart TV platform and support for Dolby Vision and Atmos, entertainment is more immersive than ever.

name: Apple iPad Pro 12.9-inch (M2, 2022)
description: The Apple iPad Pro with M2 chip sets the gold standard for tablets, featuring a Liquid Retina XDR display, up to 2TB storage, and support for Apple Pencil 2. Designed for creative professionals, it provides desktop-class performance, Thunderbolt connectivity, and an ultra-wide front camera for pro-quality video calls. The iPad Pro blurs the line between laptops and tablets, offering unmatched versatility and performance.

name: Netgear Nighthawk AXE11000 Tri-Band Wi-Fi 6E Router
description: Netgear’s Nighthawk AXE11000 delivers blazing wireless speeds and ultra-low latency with Wi-Fi 6E support, perfect for large homes, gaming, and streaming 8K video. Advanced security, easy setup, and robust parental controls make it a solid choice for demanding households. Loaded with multiple Ethernet ports and high-performance antennas, it ensures broad coverage and reliability for all your devices.

name: Ecovacs Deebot T10 Omni Robot Vacuum Mop
description: The Ecovacs Deebot T10 Omni automates floor care with simultaneous vacuuming and mopping, an auto-empty dustbin, and a self-cleaning mop station. LiDAR navigation ensures precise cleaning routes, and voice control compatibility lets you schedule or customize sessions. With strong suction and obstacle avoidance, it keeps your floors spotless with minimal intervention.

name: BenQ EX3501R Curved Ultrawide Monitor
description: The BenQ EX3501R provides a panoramic, ultra-smooth viewing experience with a 35-inch curved QHD display, 100Hz refresh rate, and HDR support. Engineered for both productivity and entertainment, it offers USB-C connectivity, AMD FreeSync support, and comfortable ergonomics. Its immersive size is perfect for multitasking, gaming, and cinematic movie nights alike.

name: TP-Link Kasa Spot Pan Tilt Home Security Camera
description: This indoor camera offers sharp 2K resolution video, full pan and tilt control, and smart motion tracking to keep tabs on your home. With two-way audio, night vision, and Alexa/Google Assistant integration, you can check in remotely or communicate with family members easily. The Kasa app’s secure cloud storage ensures your recordings are always accessible when you need them.

name: Sony BRAVIA XR X95L Mini-LED TV
description: Sony’s BRAVIA XR X95L combines Mini-LED contrast with the XR Cognitive Processor for stunning 4K HDR visuals. Google TV integration provides access to streaming apps, and Acoustic Multi-Audio delivers immersive sound. The slim bezel and modern design make it an elegant focal point for any entertainment space, while HDMI 2.1 support keeps gamers happy.

name: SHURE SM7B Dynamic Microphone
description: The SHURE SM7B is a broadcast-quality dynamic microphone known for its smooth, flat, wide-range frequency response, making it a top choice for studio vocals, podcasts, and radio. The air suspension shock isolation and pop filter eliminate mechanical noise and breathiness, while its classic look makes it a staple on professional setups worldwide.

name: Nest Protect Smoke & Carbon Monoxide Alarm (2nd Gen)
description: The Nest Protect alarm combines smoke and CO detection with smart, app-based alerts and voice notifications. Its split-spectrum sensor detects fast and slow-burning fires, while the Pathlight function guides you safely in the dark. Battery or wired options and self-testing functions provide peace of mind for families looking for advanced home safety solutions.

name: Sony A80L OLED 4K TV
description: Bringing true-to-life colors and perfect blacks, the Sony A80L OLED 4K TV features the powerful Cognitive Processor XR for realistic images. Acoustic Surface Audio+ technology transforms the screen into a speaker, yielding immersive sound. Google TV integration and HDMI 2.1 support make it a great companion for both streaming enthusiasts and gamers.

name: Novation Launchpad Mini MK3
description: The Novation Launchpad Mini MK3 is a compact grid controller ideal for live electronic music performance and production. With its 64 RGB pads, customizable controls, and seamless integration with Ableton Live, it empowers musicians and DJs to compose and perform dynamic sets anywhere. The robust design and portability make it a popular choice for creative professionals on the move.

name: Google Chromecast with Google TV (HD)
description: Google Chromecast with Google TV (HD) is a compact streaming device that turns any TV into a smart entertainment hub. The included remote and intuitive menu system aggregate your services and recommend personalized content from across platforms. Google Assistant integration provides fast voice search and hands-free convenience.

name: Corsair HS80 RGB Wireless Headset
description: Built for gamers, the Corsair HS80 RGB Wireless Headset boasts low-latency wireless audio, Dolby Atmos support, and broadcast-grade omni-directional microphone quality. Memory foam ear pads and a floating headband provide superior comfort for marathon sessions, while iCUE software allows for deep customization of both sound and RGB lighting effects.

name: HP Spectre x360 14 2-in-1 Laptop
description: The HP Spectre x360 14 is a premium convertible laptop with a stunning 3:2 OLED touch display, 13th Gen Intel Core processors, and all-day battery life. Its ultra-slim gem-cut design and flexible hinges allow seamless transitions between laptop, tent, and tablet modes. Enhanced security features and high-quality audio make it a top choice for professionals and creatives alike.

name: VIOMI Smart Kettle Pro
description: The VIOMI Smart Kettle Pro brings precision boiling to your kitchen. With app remote control via Wi-Fi, five temperature settings, and double-walled insulation, you get hot beverages exactly how you like them. The stylish design includes a 1.5L capacity and child safety lock, making it the perfect upgrade for tea and coffee lovers.

name: Pioneer DJ DDJ-FLX4 Controller
description: Pioneer DJ DDJ-FLX4 Controller is aimed at beginners and professionals, featuring a mixer and performance pads in a portable body. Compatible with Serato DJ Lite and rekordbox, it lets you mix, scratch, and create loops with intuitive controls. USB-powered and class-compliant, it’s the ideal entry point for home DJs and party hosts.

name: Eve Energy Smart Plug & Power Meter
description: Eve Energy combines a smart plug with energy monitoring, compatible with Apple HomeKit for effortless automation. View real-time consumption data, create schedules, and control appliances remotely via Siri or the Eve app. The compact, minimalist design ensures it fits discreetly into any outlet, promoting efficient energy usage throughout your home.

name: Yale Assure Lock 2 Wi-Fi Smart Lock
description: The Yale Assure Lock 2 brings advanced security and keyless convenience to your entryway, supporting Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, and voice assistant integration. The slim touchscreen keypad and auto-lock functions provide seamless access, while customizable codes accommodate guests and family members. Its modern design complements any door, and remote app control ensures peace of mind.

name: TCL 6-Series 4K QLED Roku TV
description: The TCL 6-Series delivers amazing 4K QLED color with mini-LED contrast and the intuitive Roku TV Smart interface. Dolby Vision and HDR10+ support bring cinematic entertainment to your living room, while THX-certified gaming mode ensures low latency. Its sleek, bezel-less design integrates easily into any modern décor.

name: Lenovo Smart Clock Essential with Alexa
description: Lenovo Smart Clock Essential combines essential alarm clock functions with Alexa voice assistant, a built-in nightlight, and a large LED display for at-a-glance visibility. Its compact and modern design fits any bedside or kitchen. With voice control, you can set reminders, control smart devices, and enjoy hands-free entertainment anytime.

name: Anker Nebula Cosmos Max 4K Projector
description: The Anker Nebula Cosmos Max brings the cinema home with 4K UHD resolution, 1,500 ANSI lumens, and heart-pounding 360° Dolby Audio. Android TV built-in enables streaming from all major platforms, while autofocus and keystone correction make setup a breeze. Its elegant design and portability mean you can create a theater experience in any room or backyard.

name: Fitbit Aria Air Bluetooth Smart Scale
description: Track your weight and BMI effortlessly with the Fitbit Aria Air. This smart Bluetooth scale syncs data straight to your Fitbit app, making it easier to track trends, set goals, and stay motivated. The simple, stylish design fits any bathroom, and multi-user support allows the whole family to participate in healthy living.

name: Canon imageFORMULA R40 Office Document Scanner
description: The Canon imageFORMULA R40 is a high-speed desktop scanner designed for efficient document management. It can scan both sides of a sheet in a single pass, supports up to 40 pages per minute, and is compatible with both Windows and Mac systems. Simple, out-of-the-box setup and bundled software make it ideal for home offices or small businesses tackling paper clutter.

name: Xiaomi Mi Box S 4K Media Player
description: The Xiaomi Mi Box S turns any TV into a 4K smart hub with Android TV, Google Assistant, and Chromecast built-in. Enjoy HDR visuals, access thousands of apps, and use voice search for convenience. Its compact design and easy plug-and-play setup make it a budget-friendly upgrade for your home entertainment system.

name: SanDisk Extreme Portable SSD V2 1TB
description: SanDisk Extreme Portable SSD V2 offers rapid NVMe solid-state performance in a rugged, pocket-sized form. With 1TB of storage, IP55 water and dust resistance, and drop protection, it’s perfect for photographers, creatives, and anyone needing secure and fast mobile storage for large files.

name: Molekule Air Mini+ Portable Air Purifier
description: Molekule Air Mini+ uses PECO technology to destroy airborne pollutants, allergens, and viruses in rooms up to 250 sq ft. With a sleek design, whisper-quiet operation, and Auto-Protect mode, it blends seamlessly into small spaces like bedsides or offices. App control and air quality feedback keep your breathing environment healthier at all times.

name: Samsung Jet Bot AI+ Robot Vacuum with Clean Station
description: The Samsung Jet Bot AI+ uses advanced object recognition, LiDAR navigation, and a self-emptying Clean Station for automated cleaning. Its high-efficiency filters capture dust and allergens, ensuring a healthier home environment. Control schedules, zones, and reports easily via an app, making hands-free floor care seamless and thorough for busy households.

name: TP-Link Archer AX55 Wi-Fi 6 Router
description: TP-Link’s Archer AX55 provides fast and reliable Wi-Fi 6 coverage for medium to large homes, with OFDMA and MU-MIMO technology supporting up to 256 devices. HomeShield security, easy app management, and robust parental controls make it a top upgrade for modern digital lifestyles.

name: Fujifilm Instax Mini Evo Instant Camera
description: The Fujifilm Instax Mini Evo offers a blend of digital capture and instant prints, letting you preview, edit, and choose which shots to print on credit card-sized Instax Mini film. There are 100 different creative effect combinations, a built-in selfie mirror, and Bluetooth connectivity for sharing shots via smartphone. It’s retro on the outside, modern on the inside—perfect for nostalgic photographers.

name: Bosch 800 Series 24" Dishwasher with CrystalDry
description: The Bosch 800 Series dishwasher features CrystalDry technology for the best drying performance, a rack system that fits up to 16 place settings, and exceptionally quiet operation at 42 dB. The flexible third rack and customizable loading options accommodate anything from wine glasses to pots and pans, making after-meal cleanup effortless and efficient.

name: Epson EcoTank ET-2850 Wireless Color All-in-One Printer
description: Epson’s EcoTank ET-2850 delivers cartridge-free printing with easy-fill, high-yield ink tanks, ideal for families and small offices. Voice-activated printing, auto duplex, and wireless connectivity streamline common tasks, while the compact design fits conveniently in tight spaces. Low-cost replacement ink ensures budget-friendly efficiency over time.

name: Philips Somneo Sleep & Wake-up Light
description: Philips Somneo is clinically proven to improve sleep and morning energy with gradual sunrise and sunset simulation, customizable light and sound settings, and guided breathing programs. The touch screen display and built-in FM radio enhance bedside convenience, making it easier to establish a healthy sleep routine.

name: Samsung Frame TV (2023)
description: The Samsung Frame TV masquerades as art when powered off, offering customizable bezels and an Art Mode to display classic paintings or personal photos. QLED 4K, anti-glare matte finish, and slim, no-gap wall mount mean it blends seamlessly with décor, while voice assistants and Smart TV features complete the package for design-focused homeowners.

name: Sony SRS-XG300 Portable Bluetooth Speaker
description: Sony SRS-XG300 packs bold sound and punchy bass into a durable, portable frame with a retractable handle. With up to 25 hours of battery life, IP67 water and dust resistance, and customizable party lights, it’s ready for everything from picnics to pool parties. Fast charging and stereo pairing amplify your music adventures.

name: Lenovo Legion Tower 7i Gaming Desktop
description: The Lenovo Legion Tower 7i offers uncompromising performance with Intel Core i9 processors, NVIDIA RTX 4090 graphics, and advanced cooling in a striking illuminated chassis. Tool-free upgrades, abundant ports, and Wi-Fi 6E connectivity make it every gamer’s dream for AAA and VR gaming. Its bold, modern design fits both home offices and dedicated gaming spaces.

name: LG 65-inch G3 OLED Evo TV
description: Experience cinematic brilliance with LG's 65-inch G3 OLED Evo TV. Featuring cutting-edge self-lit OLED technology, it produces true blacks and infinite contrast for lifelike images. The a9 Gen6 AI processor ensures everything you watch is upscaled beautifully, while support for Dolby Vision and Dolby Atmos brings immersive audio-visual impact. Its ultra-slim gallery design complements any modern living room space.

name: Roomba j7+ Robot Vacuum
description: The Roomba j7+ by iRobot is a revolutionary robot vacuum with PrecisionVision Navigation, allowing it to detect and avoid obstacles like pet waste and charging cords. With automatic dirt disposal, powerful suction, and smart mapping, it ensures your floors are always spotless with minimal effort. It even empties itself for weeks at a time, making home cleaning virtually hands-free.

name: Ecovacs Deebot T10 Omni Robot Vacuum
description: The Ecovacs Deebot T10 Omni is a high-end robot vacuum and mop with fully automated cleaning. Its advanced TrueMapping 2.0 system maps your home with precision, tackling dirt with powerful suction and an oscillating mop system. The self-empty station and anti-tangle brush ensure minimal maintenance, giving you sparkling floors with nearly no effort.

name: Acer Predator X27U OLED Gaming Monitor
description: The Acer Predator X27U brings a 27-inch OLED display with ultra-fast 240Hz refresh rate and 0.03ms response time for fluid gameplay. It supports NVIDIA G-SYNC, and covers 99% DCI-P3 for vibrant, accurate colors. HDR1000 certification and a versatile ergonomic stand mean next-level performance for gaming or creative work.

name: Asus ROG Ally Handheld Gaming PC
description: The Asus ROG Ally is a powerful handheld gaming PC, featuring AMD Ryzen Z1 Extreme processing for AAA gaming on the go. Its 7-inch 120Hz display, ergonomic controls, and Windows 11 OS make it versatile for gaming, media, and productivity applications. Easily dockable to a TV or monitor for a desktop experience at home.

name: Huawei FreeBuds Pro 2
description: The Huawei FreeBuds Pro 2 deliver adaptive ANC that tailors noise-cancellation to your environment. With crystal-clear sound, wireless charging, and dual-device connectivity, they’re perfect for commuting and calls. The ergonomic fit and 30-hour battery life mean you can listen comfortably all day long.

name: BenQ X3000i 4K Gaming Projector
description: The BenQ X3000i is a 4K HDR gaming projector with ultra-low 4ms input lag and high brightness. Rich color performance and immersive sound make it perfect for big-screen gaming or movie nights. With Android TV and robust connectivity, it’s easy to enjoy endless entertainment on demand.

name: Apple iMac 24-inch (M1)
description: The Apple iMac 24-inch harnesses the power of Apple’s M1 chip for lightning-fast performance in a shockingly thin, vibrant design. The 4.5K Retina display produces stunning visuals, while the studio-quality microphones and camera make it ideal for video conferencing and creative tasks. Available in bold colors to personalize your workspace.

name: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless Gaming Headset
description: The SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless Headset features immersive high-fidelity audio, a retractable mic, and simultaneous gaming and Bluetooth connections. Lightweight comfort, customizable sound profiles, and 38-hour battery life make it the perfect choice for long gaming sessions and everyday listening.

name: MSI Gaming GeForce RTX 4080 SUPRIM X
description: The MSI GeForce RTX 4080 SUPRIM X GPU delivers next-gen gaming with advanced Ray Tracing and AI-powered performance boosts. With a robust thermal design, RGB lighting, and superior overclocking potential, it caters to demanding gamers and creators seeking 4K graphics and smooth frame rates.

name: TCL 6-Series Roku TV (65R655)
description: TCL’s 6-Series Roku TV combines QLED and Mini-LED backlighting for dazzling visuals and deep contrast. Its intuitive Roku TV platform provides simple access to thousands of streaming channels, while the 120Hz panel and Dolby Vision HDR bring cinematic quality to your living room.

name: Sony Xperia 1 V
description: Sony’s Xperia 1 V offers a 6.5-inch 4K OLED display, cutting-edge image sensors, and pro-oriented photo/video features for content creators. Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processing and high-fidelity stereo audio deliver an exceptional multimedia smartphone experience in a slender frame.

name: Ring Floodlight Cam Wired Pro
description: The Ring Floodlight Cam Wired Pro adds ultra-bright LED lights, advanced motion detection, and 3D radar mapping to home security. Two-way talk and 1080p video give instant, clear communication with visitors or intruders via your phone, day or night.

name: Sony SRS-XG300 Wireless Portable Speaker
description: The Sony SRS-XG300 delivers punchy, powerful sound, customizable lighting effects, and IP67 rating for water and dust resistance. With up to 25 hours battery and quick-charging, it’s ready for beach parties, camping, and everyday fun.

name: Brydge 12.9 MAX+ Wireless Keyboard for iPad Pro
description: Brydge 12.9 MAX+ Wireless Keyboard is the ultimate productivity accessory for iPad Pro, featuring a multi-touch trackpad, magnetic SnapFit case, and up to 3 months battery life. Its laptop-like typing and seamless integration make it essential for mobile professionals.

name: Bosch 800 Series Dishwasher with CrystalDry
description: Bosch’s 800 Series Dishwasher uses CrystalDry technology to deliver spotless, dry dishes with every cycle. Quiet operation, adjustable racks, and smart WiFi features make this premium appliance a blend of innovation and convenience for modern kitchens.

name: ROG Swift OLED PG42UQ 41.5” Gaming Monitor
description: The ASUS ROG Swift OLED PG42UQ offers a large 41.5-inch 4K OLED panel with ultra-fast 138Hz refresh rate and G-SYNC compatibility. Custom cooling, rich color accuracy, and plenty of ports make it the flagship choice for serious gamers and content creators.

name: Barista Express Impress Espresso Machine
description: The Barista Express Impress by Breville lets home baristas achieve café quality espresso with its intelligent dosing, auto-tamping, and PID temperature control. Its built-in grinder, milk frother, and stainless steel construction provide everything needed to master every shot from bean to cup.

name: Samsung The Frame 55” QLED 4K Smart TV
description: Samsung’s The Frame TV blends entertainment with art, displaying stunning 4K QLED visuals and doubling as a customizable digital art gallery. Slim frame design, anti-reflection screen, and smart home features connect technology with style for every living space.

name: Razer Naga V2 Pro Wireless MMO Mouse
description: The Razer Naga V2 Pro is tailored for MMO gamers needing maximum customizability. Swappable side plates offer up to 20 programmable buttons, Hyperspeed wireless, and Focus Pro optical sensor ensure an edge in fast-paced online games.

name: Sony A90J 65-inch OLED 4K Smart TV
description: The Sony A90J boasts brilliant OLED picture, Cognitive Processor XR for true-to-life contrast and color, and Google TV platform. With built-in Google Assistant, Dolby Vision/Atmos, and premium audio, it transforms any room into an entertainment paradise.

name: Oral-B Smart Clean 360 Electric Toothbrush
description: The Oral-B Smart Clean 360 uses pressure sensors, customizable modes, and Bluetooth feedback for a clean that’s dentist-approved. Its long battery life and gentle bristle action ensure a polished, healthy smile every day.

name: Moen Flo Smart Water Leak Detector
description: The Moen Flo Smart Water Leak Detector provides instant alerts to your phone if a leak or moisture is detected in your home. Wireless, easy to install, and compatible with the Moen Flo system, it’s the first line of defense in water damage prevention and home automation peace of mind.

name: Nextbase 622GW 4K Dash Cam
description: The Nextbase 622GW dash cam captures ultra-sharp 4K footage with image stabilization and enhanced night vision. Features like Emergency SOS, Alexa integration, and intelligent parking mode set it apart as the premium choice for driver safety and road documentation.

name: TP-Link Tapo C200 Pan/Tilt Wi-Fi Security Camera
description: The TP-Link Tapo C200 offers 360-degree coverage, motion detection, and night vision at an extremely affordable price point. It integrates seamlessly with smart home automation for robust, flexible security monitoring.

name: Fitbit Luxe Fitness & Wellness Tracker
description: The Fitbit Luxe is a fashion-forward fitness tracker, blending luxe styling with serious health features. Track steps, workouts, sleep, and stress. Its AMOLED color display, water resistance, and 5-day battery ensure it keeps up with your lifestyle.

name: Eufy RoboVac L35 Hybrid+
description: The Eufy RoboVac L35 Hybrid+ is a smart vacuum and mop robot equipped with LiDAR navigation, ultra-strong suction, and a large dust bag. App control and customizable cleaning maps make it easy to keep floors clean, even with pets and kids at home.

name: LaCie Rugged SSD Pro 2TB
description: The LaCie Rugged SSD Pro offers blazing Thunderbolt 3 speeds in a durable, IP67-rated enclosure. Drop, crush, and water-resistant, it’s trusted by professionals for secure, fast backup in any environment—perfect for content creators on the go.

name: Pioneer DMH-W4660NEX Car Stereo Receiver
description: The Pioneer DMH-W4660NEX packs wireless Apple CarPlay, Android Auto, Alexa built-in, and a vibrant 6.8-inch touchscreen into a sleek double-DIN dash unit. Bluetooth, HD Radio, and expandable audio outputs make it a premier choice for upgrading your car’s infotainment system.

name: LG C2 55" 4K OLED TV
description: The LG C2 Series 55-Inch 4K OLED TV provides a breathtaking cinematic experience with vivid, self-lit pixels, infinite contrast, and Dolby Vision IQ support. The α9 Gen 5 AI Processor optimizes picture and sound automatically, making every scene immersive. With ultra-thin bezels, support for NVIDIA G-Sync, and multiple HDMI 2.1 ports, it’s perfect for movie lovers and gamers alike. Smart TV features and voice assistants round out the package.

name: Garmin Fenix 7X Solar GPS Watch
description: Garmin’s Fenix 7X Solar GPS Watch combines rugged durability with advanced fitness and navigation features. Solar charging extends battery life on long adventures. Track heart rate, sleep, and VO2 max or use multi-band GPS with topographical maps. It supports customizable data fields, behind-the-glass controls, and smart notifications — making it an outdoor enthusiast’s essential companion.

name: Philips Hue White and Color Ambiance 4-Pack Starter Kit
description: The Philips Hue Starter Kit brings flexible, customizable smart lighting to your home. Control up to four bulbs via Bluetooth or the Hue Bridge, choosing from millions of vibrant colors or warm/cool whites. Easily set routines, sync with movies or music, and enjoy voice control through Alexa, Google Assistant, or Apple HomeKit.

name: LG UltraFine Ergo 32UN880-B 32" 4K Monitor
description: The LG UltraFine Ergo 32UN880-B boasts a vibrant 32-inch 4K UHD screen on an adjustable ergonomic arm, allowing easy positioning and comfort. With USB-C, HDMI, and DisplayPort inputs, the monitor delivers accurate colors and sharp details for creative, office, or entertainment use.

name: Philips Sonicare Prestige 9900 Toothbrush
description: The Philips Sonicare Prestige 9900 is an advanced electric toothbrush with SenseIQ technology, providing adaptive cleaning and pressure sensors for optimal oral health. The brush pairs with a smartphone app for real-time feedback, ensuring a personalized brushing experience. Sleek design, USB charging, and premium travel case make it convenient for home and travel.

name: Netgear Nighthawk AX12 12-Stream WiFi 6 Router
description: The Netgear Nighthawk AX12 WiFi 6 Router delivers ultra-fast speeds up to 6 Gbps, supporting dozens of devices with robust coverage. Powered by a 64-bit 2.2 GHz quad-core processor, it’s built for smart homes, gaming, and streaming 4K/8K video. Its advanced security features and easy app controls make managing your network effortless.

name: TCL 6-Series 65" QLED 4K TV
description: The TCL 6-Series 65-Inch TV excites with its QLED display, full-array local dimming, and support for Dolby Vision, HDR10, and Quantum Contrast technology. THX-certified Game Mode ensures fluid visuals for gaming, and Roku TV integration offers intuitive smart features and app access in one package.

name: Sony X900H 65" 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV
description: The Sony X900H 65-inch Smart TV features a full-array LED screen, 4K X-Reality PRO engine, and support for HDR10 and Dolby Vision. With Google TV built-in, voice search, and a dedicated gaming mode, it’s a great centerpiece for entertainment setups.

name: Roomba i7+ Self-Emptying Robot Vacuum
description: The Roomba i7+ by iRobot features intelligent mapping, powerful suction, and automated self-emptying for up to 60 days. Compatible with Wi-Fi and smart assistants, it remembers room layouts, schedules cleans, and adapts to your routines for effortless hands-off vacuuming.

name: Amazon Fire HD 10 Tablet (2023)
description: The Amazon Fire HD 10 Tablet provides a 10.1-inch Full HD display, octa-core processor, and up to 12 hours of battery life. Its durable build and Alexa hands-free support make it family-friendly for streaming, reading, and productivity on the go.

name: Nooie Smart Plug 4-Pack
description: Nooie Smart Plugs let you automate lighting and appliances with voice control via Alexa or Google Assistant. Schedule routines or control devices from your phone. The compact form ensures they fit any socket, making it affordable to start building your smart home.

name: Philips Hue Play Gradient Lightstrip
description: The Philips Hue Play Gradient Lightstrip brings vibrant, multi-color ambient lighting to the back of your TV or living space. Sync with movies, gaming, or music for an immersive experience. Flexible installation and Hue Bridge compatibility allow seamless integration with your smart lighting ecosystem.

name: LG Gram 17 (2023) Lightweight Laptop
description: The LG Gram 17 offers a stunning 17-inch WQXGA display in a remarkably light 2.98 lb frame. It features long battery life, Intel Evo 13th Gen Core i7 processor, Thunderbolt 4, and robust security. Perfect for professionals needing a big screen without weight.

name: Honeywell Home T9 WiFi Smart Thermostat
description: Honeywell’s T9 WiFi Smart Thermostat uses smart room sensors and geofencing for precise comfort and energy savings. Control via touchscreen, app, Alexa, or Google Assistant. Intuitive scheduling and notifications make managing your climate effortless.

name: Roborock S7 MaxV Ultra Robot Vacuum & Mop
description: The Roborock S7 MaxV Ultra features self-cleaning, intelligent obstacle avoidance, and powerful vacuuming/mopping. The dock empties dust, washes mop pads, and refills water automatically. AI-enabled navigation maps your home for precise, efficient coverage and easy app-based control.

name: Corsair iCUE H150i ELITE LCD CPU Cooler
description: The Corsair iCUE H150i ELITE is a liquid CPU cooler with a customizable IPS LCD screen, powerful Corsair AF RGB fans, and Zero RPM mode for silent operation. Integrated software control and dynamic lighting elevate gaming or workstation rigs.

name: Sony Bravia XR A80K 77" OLED 4K Smart TV
description: Sony’s Bravia XR A80K OLED TV features the Cognitive Processor XR, delivering unmatched picture quality and lifelike color. Acoustic Surface Audio+ produces clear, immersive sound from the screen itself. Google TV smart features and four HDMI 2.1 ports make it future-ready for gaming and streaming.

name: Eero Pro 6E Mesh Wi-Fi System (3-Pack)
description: The Eero Pro 6E delivers lightning-fast mesh Wi-Fi 6E performance, supporting gigabit+ internet speeds and more than 100 connected devices. Tri-band coverage and built-in Zigbee smart home hub function make it an easy choice for large homes needing reliable, seamless wireless connectivity.

name: Keurig K-Supreme Plus SMART Coffee Maker
description: The Keurig K-Supreme Plus SMART Coffee Maker brews personalized cups with BrewID tech, connected for scheduling and remote routines via phone. MultiStream extraction yields bolder flavor, while the stainless steel tank and intuitive display ensure ease of use and cleaning.

name: Steam Deck (512GB)
description: The Steam Deck is a portable PC gaming handheld featuring a 7-inch touchscreen, AMD APU with Zen 2 CPU, and 512GB fast NVMe SSD. It supports Steam library compatibility and use as a desktop when docked, giving gamers flexibility at home or on the move.

name: Anker Soundcore Motion+ Bluetooth Speaker
description: Anker's Soundcore Motion+ packs Hi-Res certified audio, BassUp technology, and 30W power into a compact wireless speaker. With IPX7 water resistance and 12-hour battery, it's perfect for outdoor gatherings, poolside, or personal listening anywhere.

name: Samsung The Frame 55" QLED 4K Smart TV (2023)
description: Samsung The Frame TV reinvents viewing with customizable bezels, Art Mode gallery, and anti-reflection QLED 4K display. It doubles as digital art when off and delivers Quantum Dot color, Alexa/Google compatibility, and minimalist style to lift any room’s ambiance.

name: Dell XPS 13 Plus Laptop (2023)
description: The Dell XPS 13 Plus combines a borderless 13.4-inch OLED display, 13th Gen Intel processors, and futuristic capacitive touch function row. Its machined aluminum chassis, zero-lattice keyboard, and ultra-slim profile deliver a luxurious user experience for productivity or creativity anywhere.

name: JBL Go 3 Portable Waterproof Speaker
description: The JBL Go 3 is an ultra-compact Bluetooth speaker with punchy bass, 5 hours of playtime, and rugged IP67 waterproof/dustproof build. Simple controls and a range of bold colors make it easy to enjoy music on the go, rain or shine.

name: MSI Optix MAG342CQR 34" Curved Monitor
description: The MSI Optix MAG342CQR delivers immersive gaming and productivity with a 34-inch ultra-wide 144Hz curved VA panel. FreeSync Premium support, deep contrast, and high color accuracy make it a versatile choice for entertainment and multitasking.

name: Oculus Quest 2 256GB (Meta Quest 2)
description: The Meta Quest 2 is an all-in-one VR headset with 256GB of storage, a fast Snapdragon XR2 platform, and incredibly immersive wireless gameplay. With hand tracking and a massive game library, it invites users to explore virtual worlds, fitness, and creativity risk-free.

name: Sony XAV-AX7000 CarPlay Multimedia Receiver
description: The Sony XAV-AX7000 in-dash receiver features a bright 6.95-inch display, wireless CarPlay/Android Auto, and a high-powered 100Wx4 amp. Bluetooth, hands-free voice control, and a customizable interface upgrade any car’s infotainment.

name: Garmin Forerunner 265 Music Watch
description: The Garmin Forerunner 265 provides touchscreen AMOLED, wrist-based running dynamics, and music storage for phone-free workouts. With advanced training stats, multi-band GPS, and customizable plans, it’s perfect for runners eager to improve and stay motivated.

name: Sony SRS-XE300 X-Series Bluetooth Speaker
description: Sony’s SRS-XE300 provides clear, rich sound with X-Balanced drivers, 24-hour runtime, and IP67 dust/water resistance. The unique line-shape diffuser spreads sound evenly, making it ideal for indoor parties and outdoor adventures alike.

name: Wyze Lock WiFi & Bluetooth Smart Door Lock
description: The Wyze Lock enables keyless home entry with WiFi/Bluetooth connectivity, auto-lock/unlock based on proximity, and secure guest access sharing. Its easy retrofit design works with existing deadbolts, letting you upgrade your home security without major installation.

name: LG OLED C2 55-inch 4K Smart TV
description: The LG OLED C2 55-inch Smart TV is renowned for its self-lit OLED pixels that provide perfect blacks, vibrant colors, and infinite contrast. With support for Dolby Vision IQ and Dolby Atmos, every movie and game comes alive with cinematic clarity and enveloping sound. The ultra-slim design blends seamlessly into any living room, and the intuitive webOS platform lets you access streaming apps and smart home features effortlessly. Gamers will appreciate HDMI 2.1, low input lag, and G-Sync compatibility for a smooth and responsive experience.

name: Hisense U8H 65-inch 4K ULED TV
description: The Hisense U8H 65-inch 4K ULED TV offers brilliant picture quality with Quantum Dot technology, full array local dimming, and Dolby Vision support. Its bright, vibrant display ensures stunning visuals for movies, sports, and gaming. With Google TV built-in, you have easy access to streaming apps and voice controls via Google Assistant. Gamers will appreciate features like low input lag and HDMI 2.1 for next-gen console compatibility.

name: Philips Sonicare DiamondClean Smart Electric Toothbrush
description: The Philips Sonicare DiamondClean Smart Electric Toothbrush brings advanced oral care home with its smart sensors, multiple cleaning modes, and premium brushing technology. The integrated app provides real-time feedback on brushing habits, tracking your progress toward better oral health. With a long-lasting battery, wireless charging glass, and a sleek, waterproof design, it combines convenience, performance, and style in a single package.

name: TP-Link Archer AX90 WiFi 6 Tri-Band Router
description: The TP-Link Archer AX90 is a powerful WiFi 6 tri-band router that delivers ultra-fast wireless speeds and enhanced coverage for busy homes. Ideal for streaming, gaming, and smart devices, it supports up to 6.6Gbps and handles multiple devices seamlessly. Equipped with advanced cybersecurity tools, OFDMA, and parental controls, it ensures fast, secure, and reliable connectivity throughout your entire home.

name: Garmin Forerunner 955 GPS Running Smartwatch
description: The Garmin Forerunner 955 is a premium GPS running watch loaded with performance metrics, training support, and health tracking features. With multi-band GPS, heart rate sensor, built-in music storage, and a vivid color display, athletes can analyze their progress in detail. The long battery life and robust build withstand tough conditions, while smart notifications and mapping functions keep you connected and safe during every run.

name: Samsung Odyssey G9 49-inch Curved Gaming Monitor
description: The Samsung Odyssey G9 is a massive 49-inch curved gaming monitor designed for immersive gameplay. Its QHD resolution, 240Hz refresh rate, and Quantum Dot technology deliver vivid, smooth visuals. With NVIDIA G-Sync and FreeSync Premium Pro support, gamers enjoy tear-free graphics in every scene. The ultra-wide 32:9 aspect ratio offers an expansive field of view, making this monitor ideal for multitasking, simulation, and competitive gaming.

name: ASUS ROG Strix Scar 17 Gaming Laptop
description: The ASUS ROG Strix Scar 17 is a powerhouse gaming laptop equipped with the latest AMD Ryzen 9 processor, NVIDIA RTX 3080Ti graphics, and a 360Hz display. With advanced cooling, RGB lighting, and customizable macros, it’s engineered for competitive gamers seeking top performance. The high-speed SSD and ample RAM ensure seamless multitasking, while the bold design and robust build withstand the demands of intense gaming sessions.

name: Wyze Cam v3 Pro Security Camera
description: The Wyze Cam v3 Pro offers advanced indoor and outdoor security with sharp 2K resolution, color night vision, and AI-powered person detection. Its weather-resistant design and compact form factor allow discreet placement anywhere around your home. Two-way audio, free cloud storage, and compatibility with Alexa and Google Assistant ensure easy monitoring and control from virtually anywhere. Peace of mind comes standard with reliable alerts and recording.

name: Panasonic Arc5 Electric Shaver
description: The Panasonic Arc5 is a premium electric shaver featuring five ultra-sharp nanotech blades and a high-speed linear motor for a close, comfortable shave. Its multi-flex pivoting head glides smoothly across facial contours, while wet/dry operation allows shaving in or out of the shower. The built-in sensor adjusts cutting power based on beard density, ensuring optimal results every time. A pop-up trimmer adds finishing touches for sideburns and mustaches.

name: Sony X900H 65-inch 4K Ultra HD TV
description: The Sony X900H 65-inch 4K Ultra HD TV delivers stunning picture clarity and vibrant colors thanks to its Full Array LED panel and X-Motion Clarity technology. With support for Dolby Vision and HDMI 2.1, it’s perfect for movie nights and next-gen gaming. The Android TV platform provides seamless access to streaming services, voice controls, and smart home features. Its sleek, modern design enhances any living room setup.

name: Lenovo Yoga Smart Tab 10.1-inch
description: The Lenovo Yoga Smart Tab offers flexibility for work, play, and streaming with its innovative design and built-in kickstand. The 10.1-inch FHD display, Dolby Atmos-tuned JBL speakers, and Google Assistant Ambient Mode turn it into an entertainment hub or a smart display. Long battery life, smooth performance, and an intuitive interface make it ideal for family use or home automation control.

name: TP-Link Kasa Smart Light Switch HS200
description: The TP-Link Kasa HS200 Smart Light Switch lets you control your home lighting from anywhere using your smartphone or voice assistant. Easy to install, it features scheduling, timer, and away modes for convenience and energy savings. The sleek design integrates well with most decors, and remote access keeps your home secure and adaptable. Compatible with both Alexa and Google Assistant, it brings intelligence to any standard light setup.

name: Oculus Quest 2 Advanced All-In-One VR Headset
description: The Oculus Quest 2 is a standalone VR headset that brings high-quality virtual reality experiences without wires or a PC. With a sharp 1832 x 1920 resolution per eye and a powerful Snapdragon XR2 platform, it delivers immersive gaming, fitness, and social experiences. The intuitive controllers, ergonomic fit, and robust software library make it accessible for both beginners and VR enthusiasts alike.

name: Bissell CrossWave Cordless Max Wet/Dry Vacuum
description: The Bissell CrossWave Cordless Max combines vacuuming and washing in one step, making household cleaning faster and more efficient. Its multi-surface capability tackles sealed hard floors, rugs, and carpets. The long-lasting battery and two-tank system keep dirty and clean water separate. The self-cleaning cycle and app-based maintenance reminders offer added convenience. Ideal for busy homes with pets and kids.

name: Samsung SmartThings Aeotec Smart Home Hub
description: The Samsung SmartThings Aeotec Hub connects and automates smart home devices from multiple brands, including lights, sensors, cameras, and thermostats. Control everything from the SmartThings app or with voice assistants for a truly connected home. With support for Zigbee, Z-Wave, and Wi-Fi devices, it provides flexible, robust interoperability in a compact form. Ideal for taking your home automation to the next level.

name: BenQ MOBIUZ EX2710Q 27" QHD Gaming Monitor
description: The BenQ MOBIUZ EX2710Q is a 27-inch QHD gaming monitor engineered for fast-paced action. Featuring a 165Hz refresh rate, 1ms response time, and HDRi optimization, it provides immersive visuals for gaming and multimedia. Built-in speakers, customizable lighting, and FreeSync Premium support enhance your gaming setup. The robust stand and multiple connectivity options ensure ergonomic comfort for extensive gaming sessions.

name: Eero Pro 6E Mesh Wi-Fi System
description: The Eero Pro 6E Mesh Wi-Fi System delivers ultra-fast, low-latency connectivity for modern homes. Utilizing Wi-Fi 6E, it supports gigabit+ speeds and hundreds of connected devices. It is easy to set up via the Eero app, and its compact nodes eliminate Wi-Fi dead zones. Enhanced security features and smart home integrations provide flexibility and control over your entire network.

name: Oral-B Genius X Limited Rechargeable Electric Toothbrush
description: The Oral-B Genius X Limited Electric Toothbrush leverages AI to provide personalized feedback for better brushing habits. Multiple cleaning modes, a pressure sensor, and Bluetooth connectivity ensure optimal oral hygiene. Its compact charging travel case and long battery life make it ideal for use at home or on trips. The sleek design and advanced technology make maintaining dental health both easy and effective.

name: Apple Magic Trackpad (2022)
description: The Apple Magic Trackpad (2022) features a spacious surfa...

name: Dell UltraSharp U2720Q 27-inch 4K Monitor
description: The Dell UltraSharp U2720Q delivers crisp 4K resolution and accurate colors, making it a top choice for creative professionals. Its ultra-thin bezels, ergonomic stand, and USB-C connectivity provide flexible options for any workspace. With factory color calibration and a wide color gamut, it is ideal for photo editing, design, and detailed productivity. The built-in KVM feature supports seamless device switching and workflow efficiency.

name: Kasa Smart Wi-Fi Plug Slim (HS105P4), 4-Pack
description: The Kasa Smart Wi-Fi Plug Slim lets you control plugged-in devices remotely via the Kasa Smart app or voice assistants. The compact design fits behind furniture and in tight spaces, while schedules and timers help save energy. Easy setup and integration with Alexa and Google Assistant provide smart automation to lamps, fans, coffee makers, and more.

name: LaCie Rugged USB-C 5TB External Hard Drive
description: The LaCie Rugged USB-C is a durable 5TB external hard drive designed for data protection in any environment. With shock, rain, and pressure resistance, it's the go-to drive for photographers and travelers. The fast USB-C interface ensures quick transfers, while wide compatibility with Mac and PC makes it ideal for backups and transporting large files securely.

name: LG OLED C3 55-Inch TV
description: The LG OLED C3 offers exceptional picture quality with self-lit OLED pixels for perfect blacks, over a billion rich colors, and incredible contrast. The 55-inch model supports Dolby Vision and Dolby Atmos for an immersive viewing and sound experience, and runs on webOS for intuitive smart TV navigation. Its ultra-thin profile makes it an aesthetic centerpiece for modern living rooms.

name: Apple iPad Pro 12.9 (2022)
